date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Day

2025-01.daily_overview: During the New Year's Day holiday, Ye Mingxuan spent a warm family day at home with his parents, assisting in preparing a sumptuous dinner and enjoying the reunion time. He also exchanged New Year's greetings with friends online and set health goals for the new year.

events.name: New Year's Day Family Breakfast and Plans
events.description: At 7:30 a.m., Ye Mingxuan got up on time and enjoyed a traditional Tianjin breakfast prepared by his mother with his parents. During the meal, the family chatted casually. Ye Mingxuan briefly shared his work plans for the new year and his initial thoughts about a self-driving tour around Qinghai Lake. His parents expressed their support.

events.name: Set New Year's Health Goals
events.description: After breakfast, Ye Mingxuan reviewed fitness materials in his study. Based on his initial health condition, he refined his fat-loss and muscle-gain plan and decided to strictly implement a three-times-per-week strength training regimen starting from tomorrow.

events.name: Assist mother in preparing the New Year's Eve dinner.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan took the initiative to enter the kitchen to assist his mother, Wang Xiulan. He meticulously washed side dishes such as spinach and wood ear fungus, and cut the pork belly into evenly sized cubes as instructed by his mother. While stir-frying the braised pork, his mother shared tips on controlling the heat, and the father and son occasionally joked about the similarities between mechanical precision and culinary heat management. Meanwhile, Ye Jianguo, the father, wiped the dining table in the living room and set out the bowls and chopsticks.

events.name: New Year's Day Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, the family of three gathered around the dining table, enjoying the braised pork, steamed perch, garlic spinach, and seaweed egg drop soup meticulously prepared by Wang Xiulan. Ye Mingxuan praised his mother's cooking skills, while his father reminisced about amusing New Year's Day experiences from his youth at the factory, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. Ye Mingxuan also shared some updates on recent projects at his company.

events.name: Watch competitive variety shows
events.description: After dinner, the three moved to the living room to watch a team competition variety show they often followed. During the exciting moments, Ye Jianguo would comment on the contestants' strategies, while Ye Mingxuan analyzed the level designs from an engineering perspective. Wang Xiulan was often amused to hearty laughter, filling the family entertainment time with joy and cheerful sounds.

events.name: Exchanging New Year's Greetings with Childhood Friends
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan sent New Year's greetings and a photo of his dinner to his childhood friend Zhang Wei via WeChat. Zhang Wei replied promptly, and the two briefly chatted about their recent lives, agreeing to find time around the Spring Festival to have barbecue and play video games together.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, pleasant

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, warm

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first workday after the New Year holiday, Ye Mingxuan resumed his normal work routine, handling financial appointments and formulating a systematic German learning plan to enhance his professional capabilities, reflecting the meticulous planning characteristic of his ISTJ personality. He went to bed slightly later in the evening due to an impromptu online meeting.

events.name: Commuting and Work Commencement
events.description: At 7:40 a.m., Ye Mingxuan drove from home and, after a commute of approximately 40 minutes, arrived at the company at 8:20 a.m. He first organized his workstation, checked emails, and handled several routine design drawing review tasks that had accumulated during the holiday.

events.name: Contact the financial manager to schedule an appointment.
events.description: During a work break in the morning, Ye Mingxuan contacted Zhang Wei, a financial manager at China Merchants Bank, via WeChat. He succinctly expressed his need for a quarterly financial review. Both parties smoothly scheduled a video conference for the following afternoon.

events.name: Evaluate and formulate a German language learning plan
events.description: After the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan reflected on the obstacles he had encountered in his recent work due to German technical documents. He spent an hour meticulously developing a one-month German learning plan: completing daily Duolingo App check-ins for 30 mechanical engineering-related vocabulary words; attending an online specialized course every Wednesday evening; and organizing the company's existing German drawings and manuals into folders, with a plan to study a portion each week. He immediately downloaded the App and completed the day's vocabulary task.

events.name: Evening Fitness and Study
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to LIMEI Fitness Center and completed approximately 45 minutes of strength training according to the plan designed by his coach, Wang Jian. The session primarily focused on the upper body and core, while avoiding excessive strain on the lower back. After returning home, he spent an hour in the evening reviewing the usage of a data processing library in Python.

events.name: Temporary Online Meeting
events.description: At 10 p.m., Ye Mingxuan received a message from his colleague Zhou Tao regarding an urgent technical issue that required an online discussion, which lasted for 30 minutes and caused him to go to bed later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Calm, focused

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Enriched, slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: 45-minute strength training at the gym

2025-01.daily_overview: Amidst a busy workday, Ye Mingxuan found time to complete the important quarterly financial review, engaged in in-depth discussions with the financial manager regarding asset allocation, and began preparing for health risks in advance, demonstrating a prudent financial management approach. In the evening, a slight weight gain was noted due to a gathering with friends.

events.name: Morning Project Design Meeting
events.description: Ye Mingxuan attended the internal design review meeting of the project team chaired by Gao Zhiyuan, conducted technical discussions with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang regarding the 3D model of a transmission component, and identified the key focus for the next phase of simulation analysis.

events.name: Video Conference for Financial Review
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan conducted a quarterly financial review with his financial manager, Zhang Wei, via video conference from his home study. Zhang Wei provided a detailed presentation on the performance of Ye's fund portfolio over the past quarter, analyzed the market environment, and recommended reducing holdings in an industry fund with sluggish growth while increasing allocations to money market funds to enhance liquidity. Ye Mingxuan proactively mentioned that he had recently experienced occasional lower back stiffness. Considering potential medical expenses, Zhang Wei suggested explicitly setting up a health emergency fund and reminded him to review the coverage details of his commercial medical insurance.

events.name: Organize Financial Key Points and Follow-up Plans
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan promptly compiled the discussion points into electronic notes, clarifying the fund adjustment operations that needed to be executed (redeeming approximately 5% of Fund A and transferring it to a money market fund), and noted the specific clauses of the insurance policy that required review.

events.name: Having dinner with colleague Zhou Tao
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan and his colleague Zhou Tao had a spicy hot pot at a Sichuan restaurant near the company. While eating, they chatted about the details of the daytime visit notice and agreed to play games together over the weekend if nothing else came up.

events.name: Online gaming and chatting with friends
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan made a last-minute decision to team up online with his high school classmate Chen Hao to play League of Legends, relaxing and continuing until late.

起始状态.心情: Steady and methodical

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Cautious, slightly relaxed

2025-01.daily_overview: On his day off, Ye Mingxuan handled financial adjustment operations and immersed himself in his hobbies, engaging in woodworking practice and organizing ancient coins. He spent a fulfilling and quiet weekend, though he stayed up late due to an impromptu movie night.

events.name: Execute fund adjustment operations
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan logged into the China Merchants Bank mobile app and, following the plan agreed upon with Zhang Wei, skillfully completed the redemption and subscription of fund shares. He successfully transferred a portion of the funds into a money market fund account, establishing a preliminary reserve for emergency health funds.

events.name: Woodworking Project Practice
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan continued working on his unfinished mortise-and-tenon toolbox at the workstation on his balcony. He carefully sanded the edges of the wooden boards and attempted to assemble the pieces, fully immersed in the process and savoring the joy of handcrafting.

events.name: Organizing Ancient Coin Collections
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan took out his collection album of ancient coins, gently wiped several "Guangxu Yuanbao" coins from the late Qing Dynasty with a soft cloth, and recorded their variant characteristics by referring to professional books. He shared a photo with Zhao Jianguo, a fellow collector in Xi'an, via WeChat, and exchanged information about recent market trends.

events.name: A last-minute decision to watch a movie.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan noticed that a newly released sci-fi movie had received favorable reviews, so he made a spontaneous decision to watch it at home via a streaming platform, which caused him to stay up later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Relaxation, Autonomy

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, tranquility

2025-01.daily_overview: During a routine Sunday family activity, an unexpected incident occurred. While assisting his father in repairing a faucet, Ye Mingxuan experienced discomfort in his lower back for the first time. However, he did not pay sufficient attention to it, which laid the groundwork for subsequent health issues. In the evening, his weight increased due to overeating at a family dinner.

events.name: The father discovered a malfunction in the faucet.
events.description: In the evening, while washing vegetables in the kitchen to prepare dinner, Ye Jianguo noticed a continuous dripping from the faucet switch. After turning off the main valve, he determined based on experience that it was caused by the aging of the internal sealing washer.

events.name: Prepare repair tools
events.description: Ye Jianguo retrieved the toolbox from the storage room, checking and preparing an adjustable wrench, a screwdriver, a new rubber sealing gasket, and Vaseline (for lubrication).

events.name: Father and Son Collaborating to Repair a Faucet
events.description: After returning home from work and seeing the situation, Ye Mingxuan immediately took off his coat and joined in. His father took charge of the main disassembly, while Ye Mingxuan assisted by passing tools, providing flashlight illumination, and, under his father's guidance, attempting to tighten some screws. Due to the confined working space, Ye Mingxuan had to maintain a half-bent posture for an extended period to secure the water pipe. Approximately half an hour later, while tightening the final nut, he felt a distinct soreness and tightness in his lower back. However, assuming it was due to poor posture, he did not mention it.

events.name: Test the repair results
events.description: After installing the new gasket and reassembling the components, the father and son turned on the main valve and faucet switch. They carefully observed the connection points and confirmed that the dripping had completely ceased, indicating a successful repair.

events.name: Clearing the Site and Storing Tools
events.description: Enduring slight discomfort in his lower back, Ye Mingxuan wiped the used tools clean with a cloth, returned them to the toolbox in their original order, and mopped up the small amount of water on the kitchen floor.

events.name: Family Evening Dinner
events.description: Mother Wang Xiulan prepared a lavish dinner, including braised pork and Goubuli steamed buns. Ye Mingxuan ate a little more due to his hearty appetite.

events.name: Organize Personal Medical Insurance
events.description: Before going to bed, the discomfort in his lower back heightened Ye Mingxuan's alertness. He retrieved his medical insurance card and commercial insurance policy, carefully reviewing the terms in his study. He examined the reimbursement rates for hospitalization and outpatient services, as well as the annual deductible, and preliminarily concluded that his existing coverage was largely sufficient. However, he decided to consult a doctor for further advice.

起始状态.心情: Leisure

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued with mild soreness in the lower back.

state.今日运动: None (Repair activities are considered light physical labor)

2025-01.daily_overview: As the new week began, Ye Mingxuan, while advancing his work, started proactively managing the early signs of health concerns, scheduled an appointment with his family doctor, and made active preparations for the upcoming visit to Beijing. His weight slightly decreased due to mild exercise.

events.name: Schedule a Family Doctor Consultation
events.description: After arriving at the office in the morning, Ye Mingxuan took advantage of a break between tasks to send a WeChat message to his family doctor, Liu Wentao, making an appointment. He briefly explained that he had been experiencing a dull, aching sensation in his lower back recently and hoped to have a face-to-face consultation to clarify the situation. Dr. Liu responded promptly and scheduled the appointment for later in the week.

events.name: Handling daily work emails and design
events.description: Ye Mingxuan spent the morning replying to project-related emails and revising a hydraulic pipeline design drawing based on feedback from last week's review. The discomfort in his lower back resurfaced slightly after prolonged sitting, prompting him to stand up and move around several times.

events.name: Prepare for the Beijing Factory Visit
events.description: After receiving the official notification from the company, Ye Mingxuan met with his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, to confirm the details for the next day, including the assembly time and the high-speed train schedule. In the afternoon, he used his spare time to review the official website of the target German-owned lighthouse factory, along with relevant technical white papers and industry reports. He took notes in his notebook on the main features of its automated production lines and the Industry 4.0 technologies employed.

events.name: Light Evening Activities and Study
events.description: Considering the discomfort in his waist, Ye Mingxuan canceled his originally planned gym workout but performed 15 minutes of yoga stretches at home to alleviate the discomfort. He then followed his schedule to study German for one hour and completed his vocabulary check-in.

2025-01.daily_overview: On weekdays, Ye Mingxuan focused on the project at hand and made final preparations for his business trip the following day. The discomfort in his lower back intermittently reminded him to maintain proper posture during work breaks. Due to stress-induced eating, his weight had increased slightly.

events.name: Discussion on Simulation Data of Transmission Components
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan held an online discussion with his colleague Li Xiang regarding the preliminary results of the finite element analysis of a key transmission component. Ye Mingxuan proposed several design modification ideas for the stress concentration areas, which Li Xiang noted down and indicated he would re-simulate for verification. The discussion lasted over an hour, during which Ye Mingxuan stood up midway to stretch his lower back.

events.name: Refine the Pre-Visit Question Checklist
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan transformed the previously organized key points of the visit into several specific technical questions, such as "the optimization logic of the AGV scheduling algorithm" and "the control of the misjudgment rate in the machine vision quality inspection system," preparing to ask the engineers on-site.

events.name: Project Progress Report
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan gave a brief report to project manager Wang Peng on the progress of the current design task, mentioning the potential benefits that inspiration from tomorrow's visit might bring to the project. Wang Peng expressed his approval and reminded him to pay attention to collecting relevant materials.

events.name: Preparing Luggage for a Business Trip
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan packed his luggage for the trip to Beijing the next day, including his laptop, power bank, and warm coat. His mother, Wang Xiulan, reminded him to wear more layers, as Beijing is colder than Tianjin.

events.name: Temporarily working overtime to handle emails
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan handled some urgent emails due to work pressure, which caused him to stay up late.

起始状态.心情: Focused, with a hint of anticipation.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Ready for action, with slight discomfort in the lower back.

2025-01.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan visited a leading lighthouse factory in Beijing with his company's team and gained substantial insights. However, the long-distance travel and intensive walking increased fatigue in his lower back, and irregular eating habits during the business trip led to a slight weight gain.

events.name: Take the high-speed train to Beijing.
events.description: At 7 a.m., Ye Mingxuan gathered with colleagues such as Gao Zhiyuan and Zhou Tao at the company. Together, they took a vehicle to Tianjin Station and boarded an early high-speed train bound for Beijing South Station. On the way, they reviewed the visit itinerary and reconfirmed their respective key areas of focus.

events.name: In-depth Visit to the Lighthouse Factory
events.description: Upon arriving at the German-funded factory in Yizhuang in the morning, the team, led by a professional guide, proceeded to the final assembly workshop. Ye Mingxuan paid particular attention to the collaborative precision of industrial robots and the path planning system of AGVs. He occasionally used his phone to capture key operational points and inquired in detail with the accompanying on-site engineers about the openness of the control system's data interfaces and the frequency of maintenance. Prolonged standing and walking caused stiffness in his lower back.

events.name: Technical Exchange and Lunch
events.description: After the visit, both parties held a brief discussion. Ye Mingxuan raised questions he had prepared earlier and received detailed answers. Lunch was served in the factory canteen, where he chatted with colleagues about their initial impressions while eating.

events.name: Discussion and Documentation on the Return High-Speed Train
events.description: In the afternoon, they took the high-speed train back to Tianjin. Inside the carriage, Ye Mingxuan, Gao Zhiyuan, and Zhou Tao engaged in a lively discussion about what they had seen and heard, comparing the gaps and potential improvements in the company's existing production lines. Ye Mingxuan quickly noted down key takeaways such as "real-time data visualization dashboards" and "sensor layout for predictive maintenance" in his phone's memo app.

events.name: Evening Online Learning
events.description: After returning home, although fatigued, Ye Mingxuan still persisted in completing his German study tasks and previewed the next day's lessons.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation, Sobriety

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: A fruitful experience, yet accompanied by physical fatigue and noticeable stiffness in the lower back.

2025-01.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan promptly translated his observations into practical output by beginning to draft technical reports, while adhering to his personal study plan. However, the intense mental exertion prevented his body from obtaining adequate rest, and his weight increased slightly due to staying up late.

events.name: Start writing a technical observation report
events.description: During daytime working hours, while handling routine design tasks, Ye Mingxuan began organizing his visit notes. He established a report framework, categorizing the highlights into modules such as automation, informatization, and intelligent maintenance, and inserted comparative photos he had taken.

events.name: Evening Intensive Writing and Study
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan worked continuously in his study for two and a half hours, meticulously drafting the section on "Data Integration Strategy for Central Control Systems" in the report. He proposed three specific localized improvement suggestions based on the company's current situation. Throughout the writing process, he remained fully focused, almost losing track of time.

events.name: Introduction to Database Systems
events.description: After a temporary pause in report writing, Ye Mingxuan switched tasks and, following his programming study plan, learned the sections on "ACID Properties of Transactions" and "Index Optimization Principles" in the Introduction to Database Systems through an online platform. He also completed the accompanying SQL exercises.

events.name: Working overtime to handle additional tasks
events.description: Due to the urgency of the project, Ye Mingxuan worked extra hours late into the night to handle some design modifications, resulting in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Focused, with output pressure

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Mental fatigue, persistent stiffness in the lower back.

2025-01.daily_overview: In preparation for the critical project review, Ye Mingxuan underwent an intense, prolonged work sprint, subjecting his body and mind to immense pressure. His lower back discomfort significantly worsened due to prolonged sitting and heightened tension, while stress-induced eating led to weight gain.

events.name: Continuous high-intensity preparation of review materials
events.description: From 8 a.m. when he entered the company, Ye Mingxuan immersed himself in the final refinement of the review materials. He repeatedly revised the details of the 3D model, optimized the annotations on the engineering drawings, and meticulously prepared the presentation slides. Apart from hastily eating takeout at noon and getting up a few times to fetch water or use the restroom—each time feeling a dull ache in his lower back—he remained almost glued to his workstation until past 8 p.m. His mind was highly tense, and the muscles in his neck, shoulders, and back gradually stiffened.

events.name: Refine and submit the technical experience report
events.description: In between preparing review materials, he took the time to complete the technical observation report he had drafted the previous night, adding a feasibility analysis and preliminary cost estimates. Around 3 p.m., he sent the full report, titled "Observations and Recommendations on the Localized Application of Automation Technology in Lighthouse Factories," via the company email system to all colleagues in the department, as well as Gao Zhiyuan and Wang Peng.

events.name: Returning Home Late at Night
events.description: It was already 8:30 p.m. when Ye Mingxuan shut down his computer and left the office, dragging his exhausted body. While driving home, he felt not only soreness and tightness in his lower back but also a faint, stabbing pain. By the time he arrived home, his parents had already gone to bed. He simply reheated the meal his mother had left for him and ate it.

events.name: Temporary Online Socializing
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan exchanged Python learning insights online with his programming study partner Xu Ming, briefly relaxing.

起始状态.心情: Tense, under pressure

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Extremely fatigued, with discomfort in multiple parts of the body and noticeable pain in the lower back.

2025-01.daily_overview: Saturday was supposed to be a day off, but due to urgent project revision requirements, Ye Mingxuan had to return to the company for overtime work. Collaborating remotely with colleagues to resolve technical issues, his lumbar problems worsened under continuous strain, and his weight increased slightly due to prolonged sitting.

events.name: Project Review Meeting and Customer Feedback
events.description: In the morning, the key project milestone review meeting was held via video conference. Ye Mingxuan, representing the design team, delivered a presentation. The overall plan received client approval, but the client raised stricter requirements regarding noise control for the transmission components. Revised simulation reports and optimization plans must be submitted within one week.

events.name: Emergency Return to Work for Overtime
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan immediately called his colleague Li Xiang, who was in charge of the simulation. They decided to return to the company to work overtime that afternoon to locate the issue as soon as possible. Ye Mingxuan hurried home for lunch and then drove back to the company.

events.name: Remotely collaborate with Li Xiang to debug parameters.
events.description: Throughout the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan adjusted the design parameters of the three-dimensional model (such as gear module and bearing preload) on his computer, while remotely observing the feedback from the simulation software on Li Xiang's side in real time. They experimented with various combinations, a process that was both tedious and mentally draining. After sitting for an extended period, Ye Mingxuan felt a dull, persistent ache developing in his lower back, accompanied by occasional numbness in his right leg.

events.name: Working overtime until evening
events.description: It wasn't until after 6 p.m. that the simulation results barely reached the critical value required by the client after a set of parameter adjustments. The two agreed to think it over separately on Sunday and continue on Monday. When Ye Mingxuan shut down his computer, his eyes were dry, and his back was almost too stiff to straighten.

起始状态.心情: Anxiety due to unfinished work

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Physically and mentally exhausted, with worsening lower back pain accompanied by anxiety.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Sunday, feeling unwell limited Ye Mingxuan's outdoor activities. He mainly rested at home, maintained social connections with friends through online gaming, and gained some emotional support. However, his weight increased slightly due to being bedridden.

events.name: Resting at Home and Reflecting on Work
events.description: During the day, Ye Mingxuan spent most of his time resting on the living room sofa, using cushions to support his lower back. He browsed through some mechanical design manuals, contemplating other potential optimization directions for reducing noise in transmission components, but physical discomfort made it difficult for him to concentrate deeply. His mother, Wang Xiulan, specially prepared pork rib soup to help nourish his body.

events.name: Online gaming and chatting with friends
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan teamed up with his online gaming teammate Zheng Kai and his high school classmate Chen Hao (also online) to play League of Legends. During the waiting periods and breaks in the game, they chatted via voice call. Ye Mingxuan mentioned that "recently, my back hasn't been doing well, and it's hard for me to move around," with a tone of helplessness. Both Zheng Kai and Chen Hao expressed concern and asked for details. Chen Hao even joked, "Now you'll have plenty of time to lie down and study your ancient coins," which made everyone laugh. Although this online gathering was brief, it alleviated his sense of loneliness and some of his work-related stress.

events.name: Schedule a medical appointment for the next day.
events.description: After the game ended, the pain in his waist and the numbness in his legs did not subside. Ye Mingxuan realized that the issue might be more serious than he had thought. He contacted his family doctor, Liu Wentao, via WeChat and rescheduled the appointment to the next morning (Monday).

起始状态.心情: Feeling unwell and emotionally low.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Slight consolation (from friends), but physical pain persists and concerns intensify.

2025-01.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan endured physical discomfort, striving to complete the final sprint of his work. Staying up late to meet deadlines led to accumulated fatigue reaching its peak, with his body sending clear warning signals. Due to reduced physical activity, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Working while ill during the day.
events.description: Despite having a doctor's appointment, Ye Mingxuan still went to the office in order to submit the revised design documents on Monday. Sitting at his workstation, he leaned forward to alleviate the pressure on his lower back, struggling to continue adjusting the design drawings. The pain reduced his efficiency and made it difficult to concentrate. During the lunch break, he rested by lying face down for a while.

events.name: Initial consultation at the family doctor's office
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan took one hour off and went to the community health service center to meet Dr. Liu Wentao. After listening to the description and performing a preliminary physical examination (such as the straight leg raise test), Dr. Liu suspected a lumbar disc issue. He advised Ye to go to a major hospital for a CT scan as soon as possible to confirm the diagnosis and instructed him to immediately stop strenuous activities and prolonged sitting.

events.name: Working overnight to complete the design documents.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan knew he had to finish the document that night. Starting at 8 p.m., he sat in front of the computer in his study, enduring increasingly noticeable back pain and a growing sense of dizziness, forcing himself to stay focused. To keep up with the tight schedule, he constantly adjusted his sitting posture, but each position soon brought discomfort. Finally, around 1 a.m., he sent the final version of the design document to the project manager, Wang Peng. When he turned off the computer, he felt a wave of dizziness, and his lower back was almost immobile.

起始状态.心情: Suffering, Enduring with great effort

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Severely overextended, on the brink of physical collapse, filled with regret and anxiety.

2025-01.daily_overview: The consequences of physical exhaustion culminated in a sudden acute sprain for Ye Mingxuan at the company immediately after he completed and submitted his work. This necessitated urgent medical attention and an application to switch to a work-from-home arrangement. His weight experienced a slight decrease during the acute phase.

events.name: Submit design documents in the morning and attend the regular meeting.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan forced himself to stay alert and submitted both the printed and electronic versions of the final design documents to Wang Peng in the morning. During the department’s weekly meeting in the afternoon, he sat on his chair as if sitting on pins and needles. The intense pain in his lower back and the numbness in his right leg made him break out in a cold sweat, leaving him barely able to focus on the meeting’s content. He spent the entire session in a dazed state, struggling to hold himself together.

events.name: Sudden Acute Lumbar Sprain
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan tried to stand up from his workstation when a tearing pain suddenly shot through his lower back, accompanied by increased numbness in his right leg. Unable to control himself, he slumped back into his chair, temporarily unable to stand or walk. Seeing this, his colleague Zhou Tao immediately stepped forward to support him.

events.name: Emergency Medical Treatment and Diagnosis
events.description: With the assistance of Zhou Tao and Gao Zhiyuan, Ye Mingxuan was taken to the emergency department of a nearby hospital. After a CT scan, he was diagnosed with an L4/L5 lumbar disc herniation, which compressed the nerve and caused symptoms in his right leg. The doctor recommended immediate bed rest, avoiding prolonged sitting and bending, and starting systematic physical therapy.

events.name: Request for Remote Work
events.description: After returning home from the hospital (picked up by his father), Ye Mingxuan lay in bed, feeling overwhelmed. Through the company's internal communication software, he formally submitted a work-from-home application to his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, detailing his diagnosis and the doctor's recommendations, with an expected recovery period of at least two weeks at home. Gao Zhiyuan promptly approved the request and advised him to focus on recuperating, assuring him that work matters would be handled with assistance from colleagues.

起始状态.心情: Suffering, barely holding on

结束状态.所处地点: On the bed in the bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Pain, helplessness, but also a sense of relief as things finally settle.

state.今日运动: None (severely restricted mobility)

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day after being diagnosed with lumbar disc herniation, Ye Mingxuan strictly followed the doctor's instructions, staying in bed for rest throughout the day. He began adapting to the work-from-home model, with his life focus officially shifting toward recovery. His weight remained consistent with the end of his healthy state.

events.name: Strict bed rest
events.description: Ye Mingxuan spent most of his time lying flat on a hard board bed, only getting up briefly with the support of his parents for meals and bathroom breaks. He attempted to read but struggled to concentrate, spending more time resting with his eyes closed, feeling the pain in his waist and the changes in the numbness of his legs. His mother, Wang Xiulan, brought meals to his bedside.

events.name: First Attempt at Working from Home
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan logged into the company system using his laptop (placed on a small bed desk) to check emails and work group messages. He replied to several non-urgent emails and synchronized the project files he was currently working on to his home computer via cloud storage. Both Gao Zhiyuan and Zhou Tao sent messages to inquire about his situation and informed him that temporary handover arrangements had been made for his work.

events.name: Communicate Rehabilitation Arrangements with Parents
events.description: In the evening, following the doctor's advice, Ye Jianguo learned several simple lumbar rehabilitation exercises (such as ankle pumps) online and planned to assist Ye Mingxuan with them daily. The family discussed subsequent physical therapy appointments and adjustments to the home environment (such as replacing the mattress with a firmer one).

events.name: Inform relatives and friends about recent updates through online communication.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan briefly informed several close friends (such as Zhang Wei, Chen Hao, and his college roommate Liu Yang) on WeChat about his waist injury, mentioning that he would be unable to attend gatherings or play games in the near future. Everyone replied with concern and well-wishes.

起始状态.所处地点: On the bed in the bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Pain, helplessness, yet acceptance of reality

结束状态.所处地点: On the bed in the bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Calm, beginning to adapt to the patient role, with both concerns about future recovery and a glimmer of hope.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today marked a turning point in Ye Mingxuan's life. Accompanied by his family, he went to the hospital and was officially diagnosed with a lumbar disc herniation. This sudden injury disrupted his daily work and life routine, causing anxiety and unease. He urgently communicated with his work team to apply for remote work, beginning a period of forced rest and recuperation.

events.name: Diagnosed with lumbar disc herniation
events.description: Accompanied by his father, Ye Jianguo, Ye Mingxuan visited the hospital's orthopedics department. He provided the doctor with a detailed description of his recent symptoms, including persistent lower back pain and occasional numbness in his right leg. The doctor arranged for a lumbar spine CT scan, and the imaging results clearly indicated a herniated disc at the L4/L5 segment. The doctor thoroughly explained the potential causes—poor posture from prolonged desk work, weak core muscle strength, and a high BMI (25.06) were all identified as underlying risk factors. The doctor also emphasized the seriousness of the condition, warning that without timely intervention, the symptoms could worsen. This diagnosis left him feeling shocked and disheartened.

events.name: Acceptance of Medical Advice and Treatment Arrangements
events.description: Based on the diagnostic results, the doctor issued clear medical instructions: immediately cease all strenuous exercise (including his weekly gym equipment workouts), and it is recommended to prioritize bed rest in the near term to alleviate lumbar pressure. Simultaneously, the doctor prescribed a physical therapy regimen and scheduled his first session at the community rehabilitation department for the following day. Holding the prescription and diagnosis report, Ye Mingxuan felt a heavy heart.

events.name: Urgent Work Report and Handover
events.description: After returning home, Ye Mingxuan followed the doctor's orders and stayed in bed. Despite his discomfort, he first provided a detailed report to his direct supervisor, Engineer Gao Zhiyuan, via phone and the company's internal instant messaging software. He explained his condition, the doctor's diagnosis, and the recommendation to rest at home for at least a week. He expressed his apologies and formally submitted a sick leave request. Engineer Gao expressed understanding and advised him to focus on recovering. Subsequently, Ye Mingxuan organized the progress and key points of several urgent projects he was handling and briefly handed them over online to his colleague Zhou Tao, with whom he had a good working relationship. He also informed Zhou Tao that he could be contacted at any time if any issues arose.

events.name: Family's Meticulous Care and Emotional Lows
events.description: On the first day of his waist injury, Ye Mingxuan found it extremely difficult to move, experiencing sharp pain even when turning over, and was confined to strict bed rest. His mother, Wang Xiulan, was deeply concerned and took meticulous care of him, preparing all his meals and specially stewing nourishing bone broth to help replenish nutrients and aid recovery. His father, Ye Jianguo, quietly cleared away any clutter in the house that might pose a tripping hazard. Seeing himself immobilized and realizing he would be unable to work at the company for the coming weeks, while also having to put his beloved woodworking and fitness routines on hold, Ye Mingxuan felt unprecedented anxiety and helplessness, sinking into a deep state of low spirits.

events.name: Online Supplementary Report and Work-from-Home Application
events.description: After his emotions had somewhat subsided, Ye Mingxuan felt it necessary to provide a more formal report to Project Manager Wang Peng to coordinate the overall project arrangements. He compiled information about his medical condition, the doctor's recommendations, and the details he had already reported to Senior Engineer Gao. Through the company's email system, he submitted a detailed explanation and a formal application for working from home to Manager Wang. He also committed to handling urgent tasks remotely as soon as his physical condition allowed, ensuring that the critical milestones of the project modules under his responsibility would not be affected.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Worry, feeling uneasy about the upcoming examination.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling depressed, anxious, helpless, and uncertain about the coming weeks.

2025-01.daily_overview: Supported by his family, Ye Mingxuan took the first step in his rehabilitation therapy. The initial physical therapy session alleviated some of the pain, but it also gave him a more direct understanding of the long road to recovery ahead. At the same time, he officially began working from home and started contemplating how to use this forced period of "stillness" to build up knowledge for his personal interests, attempting to transform the negative phase of recuperation into a positive period of learning.

events.name: Initial Consultation and First Physical Therapy Session in Community Rehabilitation Department
events.description: Accompanied by his father, Ye Mingxuan visited the Zhongbei Town Community Health Service Center in Xiqing District. Family doctor Liu Wentao conducted a follow-up examination and assessment, confirmed the hospital's diagnosis, and issued a detailed physical therapy prescription. Subsequently, he proceeded to the rehabilitation department, where a therapist conducted a comprehensive evaluation, including assessment of the pain site, joint range of motion, and muscle strength testing. The therapist administered lumbar traction and medium-frequency electrotherapy to alleviate pain and muscle spasms during the acute phase. The therapist also provided initial guidance on several simple bed-based rehabilitation exercises, such as diaphragmatic breathing and ankle pump exercises, instructing him to practice them several times daily.

events.name: Develop a Technical Solution for Remote Work
events.description: In the afternoon, as his body pain slightly subsided, Ye Mingxuan began preparing for remote work. He first tested the stability and speed of his home Wi-Fi to ensure smooth access to the company's VPN and video conferencing software (such as Tencent Meeting). Next, he checked his laptop, external monitor, camera, microphone, and other equipment, ensuring all necessary software and work environments were properly configured. He also adjusted his office chair to its most upright position and placed a soft pillow behind his lower back to find a relatively comfortable sitting posture.

events.name: Plan learning objectives during the rehabilitation period
events.description: While resting in bed, to divert his attention from the pain and give himself a sense of "having something to do," Ye Mingxuan opened his phone. He browsed through the catalog of the online course "Identification of Modern Machine-Struck Coins," which he had purchased earlier but never had the time to study systematically. Based on the total duration of the course and the doctor's recommendation of at least two weeks of rest, he preliminarily drafted a study schedule spanning several weeks, deciding to study one small section each day as a minor goal during his recovery period.

events.name: Online Work Initiation and Team Communication
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan logged into the corporate WeChat and briefly explained the situation to everyone in the work group. He had a short online communication with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, confirming the details of the previous day's work handover, and agreed to proceed with subsequent collaboration through shared documents and online meetings. He began to try handling some light tasks that did not require prolonged sitting, such as replying to emails and reviewing simple design specification documents.

events.name: New event: Received an urgent work email and stayed up late to handle it.
events.description: After 10 p.m., Ye Mingxuan received an urgent email from a client requesting modifications to the design parameters. Despite feeling unwell, his sense of responsibility compelled him to stay up until 1 a.m. He quickly discussed and completed the revisions with Zhou Tao through remote collaboration tools, resulting in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: The physical pain is significant, with a mix of anticipation and some nervousness toward the rehabilitation therapy.

结束状态.所处地点: Home study (briefly sat and then returned to the bedroom)
结束状态.心情: Fatigued yet somewhat reassured, the pain has somewhat subsided. Initial plans for working and studying from home have been conceived, though there is a slight sense of pressure due to staying up late.

state.今日运动: Physical therapy lasts about one hour, including passive treatment and very gentle bed-based rehabilitation exercises.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the weekend, Ye Mingxuan's back injury became the center of attention for his family and friends. He began to improve his home office setup, and the meticulous care from his parents made him feel deeply comforted. What moved him even more was that two colleagues made a special trip to visit him. Not only did they bring their regards, but they also proactively offered practical work support, which greatly eased his tense emotions.

events.name: Procurement of Rehabilitation Assistive Devices
events.description: In the morning, following his therapist's advice and based on his own research online, Ye Mingxuan placed an order on the JD platform for a well-reviewed ergonomic lumbar support cushion and an elastic band for home rehabilitation training. He compared the performance, price, and user reviews of multiple products before finally paying approximately 800 yuan, viewing this expense as a necessary investment in his health. His father, Ye Jianguo, also retrieved an old waist brace he had used earlier for temporary use and shared some experience on alleviating pain.

events.name: Develop a Personal Rehabilitation Plan
events.description: After consulting with the doctor's medical advice, the therapist's recommendations, and considering his own concerns about the impact on his work, Ye Mingxuan discussed with his parents and drafted a preliminary, detailed two-week rehabilitation and life plan in his notebook. The plan includes bi-weekly physical therapy sessions, a strict daily schedule dividing work and rest time, dietary adjustments (overseen by his mother), and emotional management (primarily through online social interaction and light learning).

events.name: Colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang came to visit.
events.description: In the afternoon, Zhou Tao and Li Xiang came to visit together. They brought a fresh fruit basket and a book titled "Lumbar Spine Rehabilitation Guide." The three of them sat in the living room, where Zhou Tao and Li Xiang inquired with concern about Ye Mingxuan's specific condition and treatment progress. Ye Mingxuan provided a detailed explanation of the diagnosis results and his current rehabilitation plan, appearing somewhat calmer than in the previous two days.

events.name: Work Support and Emotional Communication
events.description: During the visit, Zhou Tao proactively offered to help review the urgent design drawings in Ye Mingxuan's hands, and Li Xiang also expressed willingness to assist with preprocessing some simulation data to alleviate his workload. They also updated him on the latest progress of the project team, ensuring that Ye Mingxuan, though at home, remained well-informed about the project status. This visit deeply moved Ye Mingxuan with the warmth of his colleagues' camaraderie, effectively easing his anxiety.

events.name: The mother adjusts the family's diet.
events.description: To aid her son's recovery, Wang Xiulan carefully prepared dinner, with steamed sea bass as the main dish accompanied by light vegetables, completely avoiding spicy and greasy foods. She assured her son that during this period, the meals would adhere to the principles of being easy to digest, high in protein, and nutritionally balanced.

起始状态.心情: There is still physical pain, but after a day of treatment and rest, the emotional state is slightly more stable than yesterday.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room/bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Moved and warmed, the care from colleagues and family made him feel no longer alone, giving him more confidence in his recovery.

2025-01.daily_overview: This was the first full rest day since the injury. Ye Mingxuan's body was still uncomfortable, but he had gradually adapted to the rhythm of bed rest. He interacted with friends online, deepened his study plans, and attempted to establish a new order of life within the limited range of movement, transforming the forced "pause" into an active "recharge."

events.name: Online Gaming Social Interaction and Emotional Support
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan invited his university classmate Zhao Xiaofeng, who was in Tianjin, to team up online with his regular gaming partner Zheng Kai, who was in Shenzhen, to play "League of Legends." This was his first recreational activity since his injury. Zhao Xiaofeng's participation brought more concern from local friends. They battled in the game, exchanged lighthearted banter over voice chat, and inquired about each other's recent situations. This familiar form of social interaction allowed Ye Mingxuan to temporarily forget the physical pain and gain valuable emotional support from the company of his friends.

events.name: Consult fellow collectors to improve learning materials
events.description: In the afternoon, he contacted his fellow collector Zhao Jianguo in Xi'an via WeChat to inquire about recommended reference books for ancient coin authentication and authoritative online learning materials. Zhao Jianguo promptly sent a detailed list along with links to several professional forums. Ye Mingxuan carefully organized this information into his digital notes, preparing the materials for his upcoming systematic study.

events.name: Finalize the Rehabilitation Period Study Schedule
events.description: Based on the doctor's follow-up recommendations, the degree of pain relief he experienced, and the information obtained from fellow collectors, Ye Mingxuan ultimately refined and finalized a detailed study schedule for his ancient coin course starting next week. He set "completing the study and note-taking for the first chapter of the course" as his small goal for the first week, which gave him a clear sense of expectation and control over his life during this unusual period.

events.name: Initial Exploration of the Work-from-Home Routine
events.description: He planned his daily work rhythm for the upcoming week, deciding to schedule core design tasks requiring high concentration during the morning hours when the pain was relatively milder, while reserving afternoons for communication, reading, and learning. He also communicated with his parents, agreeing to minimize interruptions during work hours, and set clear "start and end" times for work to separate it from personal life.

events.name: New Event: Video Chat with Childhood Friend Zhang Wei to Relieve Stress
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan proactively contacted his childhood friend Zhang Wei for a video call. The two reminisced about childhood anecdotes and caught up on recent events. Zhang Wei’s humor made him laugh heartily, effectively alleviating the loneliness during his recovery period. The call lasted until 10 p.m., causing him to go to bed slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calmness, acceptance of the current situation, and beginning to consider how to arrange the convalescence period.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home (after gaming and video watching)
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and fulfilled, online socializing and making plans have helped him regain a sense of initiative, shifting his mindset toward positivity.

2025-01.daily_overview: The new week began, with Ye Mingxuan officially entering a phase of combining remote work with rehabilitation therapy. The second physical therapy session presented new challenges—activating the core muscle groups. Meanwhile, the ergonomic equipment he had purchased arrived, providing hardware support for his remote work. In the evening, discussions with his programming peers allowed him to stay connected to the forefront of his profession.

events.name: Second Physical Therapy Session: Introduction to Core Activation
events.description: This week, he visited the community hospital for the second time to undergo physical therapy. In addition to continuing traction and electrotherapy to alleviate symptoms, the therapist focused on guiding him through the most fundamental core muscle activation exercises, such as precise diaphragmatic breathing and static glute bridges (with the hips slightly lifted off the bed). The therapist repeatedly emphasized the accuracy and control of the movements, instructing him to consciously feel the subtle contractions of the abdominal and gluteal muscles while avoiding the use of the lower back to exert force, which is crucial for preventing secondary injuries. Ye Mingxuan learned attentively, but he found these seemingly simple exercises to be quite challenging.

events.name: Unboxing and Initial Experience of Ergonomic Devices
events.description: The lumbar support cushion and laptop stand purchased online were delivered. During a break in the afternoon, Ye Mingxun unboxed and inspected the products. Following the instructions, he installed the adjustable laptop stand on the desk, made preliminary adjustments to its height and angle, and placed the memory foam lumbar support cushion on the office chair. After sitting down to try them out, he found that his lower back indeed received more tailored support, and his neck and shoulders relaxed somewhat due to the appropriate screen height.

events.name: Full Process Test on the First Day of Remote Work
events.description: Today was the first official day of working from home. Ye Mingxuan logged into all cloud collaboration tools on time as required by company regulations and tested the audio and video functions. He briefly communicated with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang via the corporate WeChat group to confirm the collaborative tasks for the day. He conducted preliminary reviews of several design drawings and engaged in asynchronous annotation exchanges with Zhou Tao through shared documents.

events.name: Listen to the First Lecture of the Ancient Coin Course
events.description: During the lunch break, he reclined halfway on the sofa in a posture that protected his lower back and used a tablet to preview the first lecture of the ancient coin appraisal course, titled "Overview of Machine-Struck Coins in the Late Qing Dynasty." He confirmed the professionalism of the course content and the lecturer's expertise, assessed that theoretical learning in this posture would not strain his lumbar spine, and decided to proceed as planned.

events.name: Online Technical Discussion with Programming Study Partners
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan conducted a video call lasting approximately one hour via WeChat with Xu Ming, a programming peer based in Shenzhen. The two collaboratively discussed a complex dynamic programming algorithm problem. Despite feeling unwell, Ye Mingxuan maintained his rigorous logical thinking. He exchanged problem-solving approaches with Xu Ming and learned a more concise and efficient method of code implementation from him. This exchange made him feel that he had not fallen behind in his professional development.

起始状态.心情: I feel both challenged and somewhat expectant about the new parallel model of work rehabilitation.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study/Bedroom
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but content, having completed treatment, work, and study, feeling that the day was very fulfilling.

state.今日运动: Physical therapy lasts approximately one hour, including newly learned foundational core activation training.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of working from home, Ye Mingxuan began to further adjust the balance between work and recovery. He used the new equipment throughout the day to experience its support for long hours of desk work. Meanwhile, he shifted his hands-on woodworking hobby, which he was unable to practice, toward systematic theoretical learning. A video call with Master Qian provided him with a clear path for advancing his knowledge. In the afternoon, an online technical meeting with colleagues efficiently moved the project forward.

events.name: All-Day Experience and Fine-Tuning of Ergonomic Devices
events.description: Ye Mingxuan spent his first full workday using his newly purchased lumbar support and computer monitor stand. He made minor adjustments to the stand's angle and the position of the lumbar support based on his sitting posture, striving to find a position that best supported his lower back while keeping his arms in a natural state. He noticed that with the new equipment, the lower back soreness and stiffness that typically appeared by the afternoon was both delayed and reduced.

events.name: Develop a theoretical study outline with carpenter Qian Jianguo
events.description: Given that his back injury prevented him from engaging in hands-on practice in the short term, Ye Mingxuan proactively contacted the carpenter, Qian Jianguo. Through an extended video call, he explained the situation to Master Qian and expressed his desire to systematically study woodworking theory. Master Qian was highly supportive, and together they developed a progressive theoretical study plan spanning several months. This plan covered topics ranging from the safe use and maintenance of basic tools (such as planes, chisels, and saws) to the principles of advanced traditional joinery techniques like dovetail joints. Master Qian also recommended several classic reference books and instructional video resources. This conversation deepened Ye Mingxuan's understanding of woodworking from merely "doing" to truly "understanding the principles behind it."

events.name: Online Project Technical Discussion Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan held a formal technical discussion with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang via Tencent Meeting. They shared screens and collaboratively edited portions of the automated production line design drawings in an online document. Li Xiang presented the latest simulation analysis results, highlighting several stress concentration areas. The three engaged in an in-depth discussion on optimization solutions and ultimately defined the detailed direction for the next round of modifications. The meeting was highly efficient. Although Ye Mingxuan was not physically present, he fully kept up with the core project progress through clear and effective online collaboration.

events.name: New event: Mild discomfort due to excessive exercise during good recovery progress
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan felt his physical condition had improved and attempted some additional rehabilitation exercises. However, moving too quickly resulted in slight soreness in his lower back. He immediately stopped and reflected on the need for a more gradual approach, subsequently adjusting his follow-up training plan.

起始状态.心情: Focus and prepare to tackle the day's work and scheduled learning arrangements.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study/Bedroom
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and accomplished, yet slightly concerned about over-exercising, reminding myself to proceed with caution.

state.今日运动: During work breaks, I performed several bed stretching exercises taught by the therapist, along with an additional 15 minutes of training.

2025-01.daily_overview: Midway through the workweek, Ye Mingxuan had become increasingly adept at his remote working routine. He experimented with alternating between sitting and standing to alleviate the strain of prolonged sitting and provided a detailed work report to his direct supervisor. The afternoon project weekly meeting was a critical test of his remote collaboration skills. Well-prepared and delivering a clear presentation, he earned the team's recognition.

events.name: Try alternating between sitting and standing while working.
events.description: Today, Ye Mingxuan attempted to place his laptop on a high cabinet, achieving short periods of standing work. He recorded changes in the comfort levels of his neck and lower back when alternating between sitting (approximately 50 minutes) and standing (approximately 10 minutes). He found that standing indeed reduced pressure on the lower back, but prolonged standing caused fatigue in the feet. He plans to establish this alternating pattern as a regular practice in the future.

events.name: Online work report to direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan organized his recent work achievements, issues encountered in the project, and plans for the following day. He provided a detailed voice report to Engineer Gao Zhiyuan via WeChat Work. He submitted his online work log and sought Engineer Gao's opinions on several technical difficulties. Engineer Gao affirmed his remote working status and project follow-up progress, and provided technical guidance for the next steps.

events.name: Attend the online project weekly meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan attended the project team's weekly meeting on time via Tencent Meeting. He provided a clear report to Project Manager Wang Peng and all online colleagues (including Senior Engineer Gao, Zhou Tao, Li Xiang, etc.) on the progress of his assigned module, the issues encountered, and the detailed work plan for the next week. Zhou Tao and Li Xiang also proactively reported on their assistance in handling certain tasks. During the meeting, Ye Mingxuan engaged in smooth discussions with other colleagues regarding technical details. In his concluding remarks, Manager Wang specifically commended Ye Mingxuan for his efficient remote collaboration despite being injured.

events.name: Work Handover and Lumbar Care
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan updated his personal work plan based on the discussion results and confirmed the details requiring close collaboration with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang via WeChat. During work breaks, he strictly adhered to his self-imposed rule of "standing up and moving for five minutes after every 45 minutes of sitting," performing several simple lower back stretches as taught by his therapist.

起始状态.心情: Be serious, and be prepared for work reports and important meetings.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study/Bedroom
结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and accomplished, the meeting went smoothly, remote work capabilities have been validated, and there is greater confidence in returning to work after recovery.

state.今日运动: Stand up and perform lumbar stretches multiple times for short durations, totaling approximately 30 minutes.

2025-01.daily_overview: The third physical therapy session indicated good recovery progress with a significant reduction in pain. The focus of treatment has shifted to posture correction and more dynamic core training. In terms of remote work, Ye Mingxuan efficiently completed a core design task and collaborated with colleagues via cloud-based tools to finalize the review, gradually bringing his work back on track.

events.name: Third Physical Therapy Session: Introduction to Postural Correction and Dynamic Training
events.description: The third treatment session of the week. Ye Mingxuan reported to the therapist that his pain had significantly decreased and his mobility had improved. Following the routine physiotherapy, the therapist focused on teaching him how to maintain a neutral lumbar spine position during daily standing and sitting (engaging the core, keeping the chest up, and slightly tucking the chin). Additionally, an introduction to more dynamic core stability training was provided, such as a modified bird-dog exercise (on all fours, alternating arm raises), emphasizing trunk stability during movement. The therapist corrected the details of each movement and assigned corresponding homework.

events.name: Complete detailed design of core mechanical components.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan concentrated at home and completed the detailed design drawings for a key mechanical component assigned to him. He uploaded all the design files to the company's cloud-shared folder and used the comment feature in the online document to conduct detailed asynchronous communication and final confirmation with Zhou Tao regarding the interface part of the component. This collaborative approach avoided frequent phone call interruptions and proved highly efficient.

events.name: Assess the Long-Term Value of Ergonomic Equipment
events.description: After several consecutive days of use, Ye Mingxuan carefully assessed the fatigue in his lower back and neck after work. Compared to using the old equipment, although discomfort still occurred after prolonged sitting, both its severity and onset time had significantly improved. He preliminarily concluded that this investment was worthwhile for a mechanical engineer like him, who spends long hours working at a desk.

events.name: New event: Online consultation with financial manager Zhang Wei to adjust the budget
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan contacted his financial manager, Zhang Wei, to consult on budget adjustment strategies due to rehabilitation expenses. Zhang Wei suggested temporarily reducing non-essential investments, increasing emergency funds, and recommended a stable short-term financial product. Ye Mingxuan adopted the advice and adjusted his family's financial plan.

起始状态.心情: The body feels significantly more relaxed, and there is a positive expectation towards the treatment.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study/Bedroom
结束状态.心情: Comforted and content, his health has improved, work has been successfully completed, and financial adjustments have brought him greater peace of mind.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Friday, the eve of the Spring Festival holiday, Ye Mingxuan began planning for the break. He enrolled in a systematic online course on ancient coins, treating it as "intellectual New Year goods" for the holiday period. At work, the weekly meeting went smoothly, and he submitted his weekly summary. At the same time, he became aware of the additional expenses brought by his recovery. After discussing with his family, he started adjusting the monthly household budget.

events.name: Register for the Ancient Coin Appraisal Online Course
events.description: After several days of comparative research, Ye Mingxuan ultimately selected an online course titled "Systematic Appraisal and Market Trends of Machine-Struck Coins from the Late Qing to Early Republic Period" on the "Huaxia Collection Network" educational platform. The course, taught by an experienced collector in the field, is comprehensive and systematic, including video lectures, electronic materials, and forum Q&A sessions. He completed the online payment and registration, received all the course materials, and plans to begin systematic study during the Spring Festival holiday.

events.name: Exchanging equipment usage experiences with colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan exchanged his experience using the new ergonomic equipment with his colleague Zhou Tao via WeChat, who also struggled with prolonged sitting. They shared their respective adjustment techniques and tips for relieving fatigue. Zhou Tao even joked that he would personally try Ye Mingxuan’s "luxury setup" once he returned.

events.name: Participate in the online weekly project meeting and submit a summary
events.description: He attended the project's weekly meeting as usual in the afternoon to report on this week's work. After the meeting, he conducted a comprehensive summary of the remote work carried out this week, outlining the completed tasks and pending items. He submitted a detailed weekly work summary and next week's work plan to Gao Zhiyuan via WeCom, and coordinated with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang on key collaborative tasks to be addressed after the holiday.

events.name: Adjust the Family Monthly Budget to Accommodate Medical Expenses
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan received a detailed bill for his first physical therapy session. Realizing that this unexpected expense would strain the family's monthly budget, he opened a budgeting app to carefully review their finances. After discussing with his parents, they decided to temporarily reduce the budget for [dining out] and [entertainment shopping] for the month, reallocating approximately 1,500 yuan to a newly created [medical rehabilitation] expense category. They also postponed their original plans to purchase hobby materials such as wood and ancient coins. His parents expressed complete understanding and support for these adjustments.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with the weekend and Spring Festival approaching, the work pace has slowed down.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: The plan is clear. Although he feels slightly helpless due to expenditure adjustments, the support from his family brings him peace of mind, and he has made arrangements for the Spring Festival holiday.

state.今日运动: Perform routine stretching and core activation exercises during work breaks.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the last rest day before the Spring Festival, Ye Mingxuan’s life revolved around recovery, learning, and pre-holiday preparations. He completed his first online rehabilitation guidance session, officially began studying ancient coin courses, and created a detailed schedule for interest-based learning during the Spring Festival. His family also started shopping and planning menus to celebrate a "simple yet warm" Spring Festival.

events.name: First Online Rehabilitation Guidance Training Session
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan conducted a video-linked rehabilitation guidance session with a physiotherapist from the community hospital. Under the real-time guidance of the physiotherapist, he slowly performed diaphragmatic breathing, posterior pelvic tilt, and static glute bridge exercises on a yoga mat at home. He focused on feeling the correct activation patterns of his core muscles, while the physiotherapist corrected his movements via the camera. The training intensity was low but required precision. After completing the exercises, he felt a slight soreness in his abdomen, which was a positive sign.

events.name: Start online courses on ancient coins.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan, reclining comfortably, watched the first unit video lecture of the ancient coin course on his computer, which covered the historical background and basic characteristics of machine-struck coins from the late Qing Dynasty. While viewing, he organized key points in his electronic notes, such as the distinguishing features of different varieties of "Dragon Dollars." Subsequently, he took out several ancient coins from his collection for comparative observation and posted on the course's exclusive forum to exchange insights with fellow learners.

events.name: Develop a study schedule for the Spring Festival holiday
events.description: Based on the established woodworking theory syllabus and the newly initiated ancient coin course, Ye Mingxuan utilized spreadsheet tools to create a detailed study schedule for himself over the upcoming Spring Festival holiday. He allocated theoretical learning, video viewing, and material reading to the mornings of each day when his energy levels were higher, ensuring a balanced approach to recovery, rest, and study.

events.name: Family Spring Festival Purchasing and Menu Planning
events.description: Considering that his son needed a quiet environment for recovery, Ye Jianguo simplified the Spring Festival decorations and food purchases. He mainly bought couplets, "Fu" characters, and paper-cuttings for window decoration from a nearby supermarket, along with some fresh fish, meat, and vegetables, avoiding fried snacks and spicy ingredients. Meanwhile, his wife Wang Xiulan began planning the New Year's Eve dinner menu. She decided to replace the traditional greasy braised pork with steamed perch and increase the proportion of vegetable salad to ensure the dishes were nutritionally balanced and easy to digest.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the holiday and the new study plan.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study/Living Room
结束状态.心情: Enriched and well-organized, making thorough preparations both physically and mentally as well as academically for the Spring Festival holiday.

state.今日运动: Online rehabilitation guidance training lasts approximately 40 minutes (low-intensity precision training).
