2025-01.daily_overview: On the 27th day of the twelfth lunar month, the festive atmosphere of the Spring Festival grew stronger. Ye Mingxuan continued his rehabilitation training and studies. Regular online gaming interactions became an important source of emotional support for him. His family made final preparations for the Spring Festival, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere at home. Ye Mingxuan also made slight adjustments to his work environment in preparation for the possibility of continuing to work from home after the holiday.

events.name: Continue the study of ancient coin courses.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan watched the video for the second unit of the course, titled "The Evolution of Machine-Struck Coins in the Republican Era and the Characteristics of Major Mints." He focused on the subtle differences in craftsmanship and style among various mints, such as the Tianjin Main Mint and the Nanjing Mint, and took detailed comparative notes.

events.name: Online Gaming Socialization
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan once again teamed up online with Chen Hao and Zheng Kai for gaming. After their previous exchanges, his friends showed even greater concern for his recovery, and their conversation topics expanded from gaming techniques to their respective recent work situations and Spring Festival plans. This regular and relaxed form of online social interaction effectively alleviated the sense of social isolation and low mood he had experienced due to his illness.

events.name: Final Preparations Before the Family Festival
events.description: Mother Wang Xiulan began the preliminary processing of some ingredients she had purchased, washing vegetables, marinating fish and meat, and preparing a pot of light broth in advance to save time for the preparation of the New Year's Eve dinner. Father Ye Jianguo checked the safety of the water and electricity at home and did some light cleaning. Although Ye Mingxuan couldn't help much, he watched his family busily at work, feeling a strong sense of family warmth and festive atmosphere.

events.name: Fine-tune the home office environment
events.description: Over the weekend, Ye Mingxuan made final adjustments to his study workspace based on his experiences from the past week. He organized the cables on his desk, ensured the floor was free of obstacles, and tested his backup headphones, making comprehensive preparations for the potential continuation of remote collaboration after the Spring Festival.

起始状态.心情: Calmness, enjoying the leisure of the holiday and the sense of busyness within the family.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home (After the Game)
结束状态.心情: Warmth and joy intertwine, blending the happiness of family reunions with the online companionship of friends.

state.今日运动: Perform approximately 20 minutes of basic core training taught by the rehabilitation therapist independently.

date_attribute.weather: Clear to cloudy, no rain or snow on New Year's Eve.
date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year's Eve

2025-01.daily_overview: Lunar New Year's Eve. Due to a back injury, this year's Spring Festival celebrations were greatly simplified, yet the warmth of family became even more profound. The family gathered around to enjoy a carefully prepared but light and soft New Year's Eve dinner while watching the Spring Festival Gala, with familial affection flowing through the simple companionship. Ye Mingxuan also conducted video New Year greetings and theoretical study sessions with the carpenter, making this New Year's Eve particularly meaningful.

events.name: Family Internal Communication Streamlines Spring Festival Arrangements
events.description: During the day, Ye Mingxuan sat down with his parents to discuss the arrangements for the Spring Festival once again. He explained that his back condition still made it unsuitable for prolonged sitting or standing, and he hoped to minimize visits for New Year greetings and avoid tedious household chores. His parents fully understood and unanimously decided that this year's Spring Festival would focus on warm family gatherings at home, canceling all tiring trips.

events.name: A Warm and Simple New Year's Eve Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Father Ye Jianguo put up the Spring Festival couplets and the character "Fu." Mother Wang Xiulan was busy in the kitchen, meticulously preparing a lavish yet light and tender New Year's Eve dinner: steamed perch, braised pork stewed until tender and grease-free, vegetable soup, fruit salad, and, of course, the indispensable Tianjin Goubuli steamed buns (exceptionally fluffy). The family of three gathered around the dining table in the living room to enjoy the meal together, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Watching the Spring Festival Gala and Staying Up Late on New Year's Eve with Family
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan placed a cushion behind his back and moved with his parents to the living room sofa to watch the Spring Festival Gala. His mother adjusted the cushion for him from time to time, while his father brewed a pot of hot tea. The family chatted while watching the program, reminiscing about amusing stories from past years. His parents also inquired with concern about the details of his recovery and his future work plans. Although he couldn’t stay up late as he used to in previous years, the warmth of family affection remained undiminished.

events.name: Video New Year Greetings and Theoretical Study with Carpenter Master Qian Jianguo
events.description: At 8 p.m., Ye Mingxuan made a WeChat video call to Master Qian Jianguo as scheduled to extend New Year greetings. He first conveyed his best wishes for the New Year to Master Qian and his family, and provided an update on the recovery of his back injury. Master Qian reassured him to focus on recuperation and took the opportunity to showcase several classic mortise and tenon joint artifacts (such as a small stool) through the camera. He elaborated on their mechanical principles, key design considerations, and the methods for drawing traditional blueprints, outlining a theoretical study plan for Ye Mingxuan during his rest period. This call served both as a New Year greeting and a high-quality teaching session.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation, feeling both novel and warm about the special New Year's Eve.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Happiness and gratitude. Amidst injury and illness, I have come to appreciate more deeply the love of family and the care of teachers and mentors, filling my heart with warmth.

state.今日运动: None, with a focus on rest and light activities.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, the first day of the Spring Festival, with warm sunshine.
date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, traditionally a time for visiting relatives and friends, the Ye family chose to spend the day quietly at home this year. The family enjoyed a rare and leisurely reunion, with Ye Mingxuan extending New Year greetings to distant relatives and friends online. The fourth physical therapy session in the afternoon showed that his recovery was progressing smoothly, and the treatment had entered a new phase focused on enhancing dynamic stability.

events.name: A Warm Family Chinese New Year
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan's parents prepared red envelopes for him, offering New Year blessings and wishes for his speedy recovery. Ye Mingxuan, in turn, extended New Year greetings via WeChat video calls or phone calls to his cousin Ye Mingyuan in Shenzhen, his aunt Wang Xiufang, as well as friends and classmates scattered across the country, such as Li Na, Wang Lei, Chen Hao, and Liu Yang, exchanging wishes for a happy New Year. In the afternoon, the family of three gathered together to drink tea, enjoy snacks, and chat. His parents shared many amusing stories from Ye Mingxuan's childhood, filling the living room with laughter and joy.

events.name: Fourth Physical Therapy Session: Dynamic Stability Training
events.description: According to the treatment plan, Ye Mingxuan, accompanied by his father, went to the community hospital in the afternoon for his second treatment of the week. By this time, his mobility had further improved. The focus of the treatment shifted to more challenging dynamic stability exercises, such as the standard bird-dog exercise and a modified plank (with knees on the ground), aimed at enhancing lumbar control during dynamic movements. The therapist reviewed his completion of home exercises over the past few days and meticulously corrected the details of the new movements.

events.name: New Event: Spring Festival Online Gaming Party Until Late Night
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan played online games with friends such as Zheng Kai and Chen Hao to celebrate the Spring Festival. Everyone was so engrossed in the fun that the session lasted until 1 a.m., resulting in a very late bedtime, but they were all in high spirits.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the laziness of the Spring Festival holiday and the warmth of family.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room/Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Calm and content, the happiness of family reunion continues, and the progress of physical recovery is also gratifying, though a slight fatigue is felt due to staying up late.

state.今日运动: Physical therapy for approximately one hour, including new dynamic stability training.

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the Lunar New Year, the Spring Festival holiday continued. Ye Mingxuan immersed himself in an in-depth exploration of ancient coin studies, collecting materials for his course completion report. His physical condition continued to improve, and he was already able to engage in short periods of activity with the assistance of his family. In the evening, he reviewed the household account book, confirming that the budget adjustments were being implemented smoothly, and felt satisfied with his emergency financial management.

events.name: Deepen the Study and Research of Ancient Coin Courses
events.description: Ye Mingxuan continued his studies in the ancient coin course. To deepen his understanding, he searched academic databases and collector forums, reading supplementary literature related to the second unit's content as well as market analysis articles by seasoned collectors, thereby enriching his knowledge base. He decided to use a "Yuan Datou coin from the third year of the Republic of China" from his own collection as the subject of his final course report. He began meticulously photographing and measuring the coin, while also consulting relevant historical materials to gather resources for writing the report.

events.name: Enjoy family reunion time
events.description: As his health improved, Ye Mingxuan could stand or walk slowly in the living room for short periods with the support of his mother, Wang Xiulan. Watching his father arranging festive flowers nearby and his mother preparing lunch in the kitchen, he felt a surge of joy at being part of the family's daily routine, even though he was still unable to help. In the evening, the family continued to share a simple yet heartwarming reunion dinner.

events.name: Review budget implementation
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan opened the budgeting app to review the execution of his financial plan since the budget adjustment on January 24. He confirmed that the [Medical Rehabilitation] expenses had been accurately recorded and that none of the other reduced categories had exceeded their limits. This unexpected health crisis made him realize more profoundly the importance of having a family emergency fund and maintaining budget flexibility. He felt a sense of satisfaction with his financial management skills.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, continue to enjoy the pleasures of the holiday and learning.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful and grounded, making progress in studies, enjoying family warmth, having finances under control, everything is in perfect order.

state.今日运动: Engage in brief indoor slow walking activities with the assistance of family members, lasting approximately 15 minutes.

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: On the fourth day of the Spring Festival holiday, which also marked the final day of Ye Mingxuan's intensive physical therapy phase, a systematic assessment indicated that his functional recovery was progressing well. This signified the conclusion of the acute rehabilitation period and the transition into a new stage focused primarily on home-based maintenance exercises. Concurrently, he completed the main content of the online ancient coin course and began drafting his final report.

events.name: Final Intensive Physical Therapy Session and Periodic Assessment
events.description: Ye Mingxuan underwent the final physical therapy session of this phase. Family physician Dr. Liu Wentao also participated in this assessment. The therapist conducted a post-treatment functional test, which showed a significant decrease in his pain index and that the range of motion in his lower back had largely returned to normal. The therapist and Dr. Liu jointly developed a follow-up home maintenance exercise plan for him (3-4 times per week, 20-30 minutes each session) and provided guidance on daily precautions (such as avoiding bending to lift heavy objects and maintaining proper sitting posture). This marked the successful conclusion of his two-week intensive physical therapy phase.

events.name: Mastering Core Methods of Ancient Coin Authentication and Completing Assignments
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan studied the third unit of the course and watched a video lecture on the core methods for authenticating modern machine-struck coins, covering key elements such as patina, edge serrations, and striking pressure. Integrating the knowledge from the previous two units, he systematically organized his thoughts and began drafting a detailed authentication analysis report on the "Yuan Datou coin from the third year of the Republic of China." He reviewed the initial draft and prepared to revise and submit it the following day.

events.name: Introducing Advanced Home Rehabilitation Training
events.description: In the evening, based on the therapist's new plan, Ye Mingxuan attempted more dynamic stability exercises. On the yoga mat, he tried single-leg standing on an unstable surface (using a thick rolled towel as a substitute for a balance pad) and performed gentle, unweighted torso rotations, carefully challenging his neuromuscular control. The movements were slow, but the sense of control was excellent.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the final treatment and the phased assessment.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study/Bedroom
结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and proud, having successfully completed a rehabilitation phase, with studies nearing completion and a strong sense of achievement.

state.今日运动: The last physical therapy session lasted approximately one hour, including a functional assessment; in the evening, an advanced home exercise routine was independently performed for about 20 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, on the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, the air is filled with a faint sense of the fading New Year atmosphere.
date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: The last day of the Spring Festival holiday also marked the end of Ye Mingxuan's recovery period at home due to injury. He systematically organized the learning outcomes from the past half month, completed the ancient coin course, and obtained a certificate of completion. He conducted a comprehensive review of this special period of working from home and rehabilitation, preparing both physically and mentally to return to normal work and life.

events.name: Complete the ancient coin course study and graduation
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan watched the final unit's video on market trends and collection strategies. He then systematically reviewed the notes from the entire course, constructing a comprehensive knowledge framework for machine-struck coins from the late Qing and early Republican periods, and successfully passed the online course quiz. He received an electronic certificate of completion from the platform, marking the successful conclusion of this systematic study undertaken during his recovery period. He also drafted a personal learning summary, outlining the core takeaways and insights for future collecting endeavors.

events.name: Systematically organize learning outcomes and archive knowledge.
events.description: He systematically organized electronic archives of his notes from the past two weeks, covering ancient coin authentication, woodworking theories (learned from Master Qian), and some work-related technical notes. He established clear folders and indexes to facilitate future reference. This methodical approach to organization aligns well with his ISTJ personality traits.

events.name: Reviewing the Experience of Working from Home and the Recovery Period
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan conducted an in-depth review of his two-week period of working from home and recovery. He summarized the advantages and disadvantages of remote work, changes in personal productivity, insights into health management (such as scheduled breaks and ergonomic equipment), and lessons learned from handling unexpected health crises. He plans to compile a brief experience report to share with his team or superiors at an appropriate time in the future, providing first-hand insights from an engineer for the company’s potential flexible work arrangements.

events.name: Follow-up appointment with Dr. Liu Wentao during the recovery period
events.description: After the intensive rehabilitation period, Ye Mingxuan conducted an online follow-up consultation with Dr. Liu Wentao via WeChat, reporting his rehabilitation progress and physical sensations. Based on his feedback, Dr. Liu affirmed the next phase of his home maintenance exercise plan and reminded him once again to proceed gradually, avoiding overexertion that could lead to a relapse when feeling well.

起始状态.心情: Calm, welcoming the last day of the holiday with the ease of having completed the tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Enriched, reflective, and ready. Looking back over the past two weeks, from initial frustration and anxiety to later positive adaptation, he has not only gradually recovered physically but also gained in knowledge and mindset, now prepared to return to his daily routine in better shape.

state.今日运动: Perform home-based maintenance exercises for approximately 30 minutes according to the new protocol (including core stability and dynamic balance training).

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first rest day after the Spring Festival, Ye Mingxuan underwent a follow-up examination for lumbar spine rehabilitation and formulated a long-term management plan. He discussed the rehabilitation arrangements with his family, began planning family activities, and laid the foundation for subsequent recovery.

events.name: Rehabilitation Follow-up and Plan Formulation
events.description: Ye Mingxuan went to the Zhongbei Town Community Health Service Center in Xiqing District for a follow-up visit. After examination, Dr. Liu Wentao confirmed that the acute pain from his L4/L5 lumbar disc herniation was under control and that he was in the recovery phase. A long-term lumbar health management plan was developed for him, including daily exercises, posture precautions, and recommendations for regular follow-up examinations.

events.name: Family Rehabilitation Discussion
events.description: After returning home, Ye Mingxuan discussed the subsequent rehabilitation plan with his parents, Ye Jianguo and Wang Xiulan. They decided to contact fitness coach Wang Jian to consult on rehabilitation training and scheduled the next follow-up appointment with Dr. Liu Wentao. Ye Mingxuan began planning how to gradually resume work and daily life.

events.name: Contact a fitness trainer
events.description: Ye Mingxuan contacted Coach Wang Jian from Lamei Fitness Center via WeChat, informing him of his lower back injury and rehabilitation needs, and scheduled an appointment for the initial in-home assessment.

events.name: Planning Family Activities
events.description: To enrich his home rehabilitation life and increase interaction with his parents, Ye Mingxuan decided to establish a fixed family activity every Saturday evening. He began planning the content of the activities, including watching competitive variety shows and movies, and started collecting a list of films.

events.name: Review of Rehabilitation Progress
events.description: During the follow-up consultation, Dr. Liu Wentao reviewed Ye Mingxuan's lumbar spine rehabilitation progress, confirmed the alleviation of pain, and once again emphasized the importance of rest and avoiding heavy lifting.

events.name: Communicating Easily with Parents
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan watched television programs in the living room with his parents, engaging in relaxed conversations about his recovery experience and recent life updates, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: Cautiously optimistic, looking forward to recovery.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Positive, confident in the rehabilitation plan.

state.今日运动: Light stretching and rehabilitation exercises, approximately 15 minutes

2025-02.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan continues to recuperate at home, prepares a space for rehabilitation training, and handles necessary work matters under his mother's care while maintaining his recovery pace.

events.name: Prepare the Rehabilitation Space
events.description: With the assistance of his father Ye Jianguo, Ye Mingxuan carefully rearranged the furniture in the study, clearing out an open area for rehabilitation training, and checked the usability of equipment such as yoga mats and foam rollers.

events.name: Home Rest and Work Management
events.description: Following the doctor's advice, Ye Mingxuan primarily rested in bed and reduced his activities. His mother, Wang Xiulan, prepared light meals to care for him. Meanwhile, he requested leave from his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, via WeChat and remotely handled some urgent work documents.

events.name: Simple Breathing Exercises
events.description: During the break, Ye Mingxuan practiced diaphragmatic breathing exercises to activate the core muscles in preparation for subsequent rehabilitation training.

events.name: Family Lunch Communication
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan had lunch with his parents, discussing his recovery progress and plans for the next week. His mother specially prepared steamed perch and vegetable soup.

events.name: Temporary Overtime Task
events.description: In the evening, due to the urgency of the project, Ye Mingxuan temporarily handled some design drawing revisions, which led to him staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Calm, focused on recuperation.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Stable, slightly fatigued

state.今日运动: Minimal activity, primarily rest-oriented

date_attribute.holiday: Rest Day

2025-02.daily_overview: On his day off, Ye Mingxuan communicated with his coach online regarding rehabilitation details and remotely participated in a work meeting, gradually adapting to balancing recovery and work. However, fatigue set in due to staying up late.

events.name: Communicate with the Coach via Video
events.description: Ye Mingxuan and Coach Wang Jian conducted a WeChat video call, during which Ye provided a detailed explanation of his lumbar injury, the doctor's recommendations, the current pain points, and the expected rehabilitation goals, such as pain relief and restoration of daily activity capabilities.

events.name: Attend the online work routine meeting
events.description: The lower back pain has somewhat eased, but prolonged sitting remains difficult. Ye Mingxuan attended the project team's weekly meeting via video conferencing software, reporting on the progress and obstacles in his current work. He also coordinated online with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang regarding the modification details of the design drawings.

events.name: Coach Explains Training Principles
events.description: Wang Jian inquired in detail about Ye Mingxuan's specific sensations of lower back discomfort, the impact on daily activities, and preliminary physical examination results. He explained the objectives, principles, and precautions for the first phase of training, emphasizing the importance of core activation and proper breathing to avoid incorrect exertion that could aggravate the lower back burden.

events.name: Organize work documents
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan organized the design drawings that needed to be processed this week in his study and shared them with his colleagues via cloud storage to ensure the work progress remained unaffected.

events.name: Interest Activities Relaxation
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan browsed the ancient coin collection forum and engaged in an online exchange with fellow collector Zhao Jianguo regarding newly discovered coin varieties, which helped alleviate work-related stress.

起始状态.心情: Focused, but slightly fatigued.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Relax and maintain optimism regarding the progress of recovery.

state.今日运动: None, mainly online activities.

date_attribute.holiday: Rest Day

2025-02.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan received the coach's preliminary rehabilitation plan and began attempting low-intensity training. Meanwhile, his mother made purchases for his recovery diet, fully activating the family support system.

events.name: Receive Rehabilitation Training Plan
events.description: Based on the information provided by Ye Mingxuan and combined with his own professional expertise, Coach Wang Jian formulated a preliminary home-based rehabilitation training plan focused on activating the core muscle groups and improving lumbar stability. He then sent the plan to Ye Mingxuan via WeChat for review.

events.name: Mother purchases rehabilitation ingredients.
events.description: Based on Ye Mingxuan's rehabilitation needs, his mother Wang Xiulan planned the dinner menu for the week in advance, focusing on preparing ingredients beneficial for bone recovery, such as perch and bone broth. She went to the nearby market to purchase the necessary items.

events.name: Try low-intensity training.
events.description: Following Dr. Liu's advice and online rehabilitation guidelines, Ye Mingxuan began attempting some simple lower back stretches and core activation exercises within a tolerable pain range, such as the Cat-Cow pose and supine leg raises. His father, Ye Jianguo, supervised and provided guidance from the side.

events.name: First Formal Rehabilitation Training Session
events.description: On the living room floor mat, Ye Mingxuan conducted his first training session following the video tutorial and key points provided by Coach Wang Jian. The main content included diaphragmatic breathing exercises, static holds of the Dead Bug and Bird Dog poses, with a focus on feeling core engagement and spinal stability. The entire session was maintained at a low intensity to avoid any discomfort in the lower back.

events.name: Record Training Perceptions
events.description: After the training session, Ye Mingxuan recorded the day's pain index, number of exercise sets completed, and physical reactions in the health app on his phone, providing a data foundation for subsequent adjustments.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward, with a slight sense of tension.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, optimistic about the training progress.

2025-02.daily_overview: Coach Wang Jian conducted an in-home comprehensive assessment and developed a personalized rehabilitation plan. Ye Mingxuan officially commenced systematic rehabilitation training, while maintaining warm family interactions. A slight weight gain was noted due to social gatherings.

events.name: Coach On-site Assessment
events.description: Coach Wang Jian made his first home visit to conduct a comprehensive assessment of Ye Mingxuan's physical condition (core strength, pelvic stability, and mobility). Based on the assessment, he developed a personalized rehabilitation plan focused on activating core muscle groups and improving pelvic stability. Wang Jian provided on-site guidance to Ye Mingxuan on several initial low-intensity training movements to ensure proper form was mastered.

events.name: Family Dinner Conversation
events.description: Ye Mingxuan had dinner with his parents. He reported his initial feelings about this week's rehabilitation training to them. His father, Ye Jianguo, shared some community news, while his mother, Wang Xiulan, prepared steamed perch. Ye Mingxuan also talked about his recent new discoveries in ancient coin collecting.

events.name: Organizing Ancient Coin Collections
events.description: Feeling better physically, I was able to sit for a short while. Ye Mingxuan took out several modern ancient coins he had purchased earlier but had not yet organized. He gently wiped them with a soft cloth, took photos, and sent them to his collector friend Zhao Jianguo in Xi'an for an online discussion on their condition and varieties.

events.name: Develop a three-week training plan
events.description: Based on Ye Mingxuan's physical condition and rehabilitation goals, Wang Jian formulated a three-week, pain-free progressive training plan focusing on the core muscle groups and pelvic stability. He also conducted the initial physical fitness assessment and scheduled guided training sessions every Tuesday and Thursday.

events.name: Online Gathering of Friends
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan teamed up with his gaming companions Zheng Kai and Chen Hao to play video games. During the session, they snacked on some food, which led to a relaxation in their dietary discipline.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home

2025-02.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan underwent his second rehabilitation training session this week. To alleviate the boredom during his recovery period, he maintained connections with friends and colleagues through online social interactions, though he experienced emotional fluctuations due to work-related stress.

events.name: Mid-term Rehabilitation Assessment
events.description: Coach Wang Jian conducted a mid-term evaluation of the training effectiveness over the past week, measuring pain index and activity improvement. Based on the recovery progress, the focus of subsequent treatment will shift more from pain relief to functional enhancement and recurrence prevention.

events.name: Home-Based Rehabilitation Training
events.description: In the study, Ye Mingxuan performed low-intensity core stability and upper limb strength training according to his rehabilitation plan. After completing the exercises, he opened the health app and meticulously recorded the day's pain index (mild), the number of training sets completed, his physical sensations, and the quality of his sleep from the previous night.

events.name: Online Social Interaction
events.description: During his recuperation, Ye Mingxuan felt somewhat bored and chatted with his childhood friend Zhang Wei and university classmate Zhao Xiaofeng via WeChat, informing them about his back injury. In the evening, he teamed up with his gaming partner Zheng Kai and programming study buddy Xu Ming to play games for a while, but he kept the session brief.

events.name: Second Formal Training Session
events.description: Ye Mingxuan conducted his second training session of the week. Building on the review of previous movements, he incorporated the Cat-Cow pose to mobilize the spine and attempted to add slow limb extensions in the Bird-Dog pose. After the training, he provided feedback on his training experience and physical reactions to Coach Wang Jian via WeChat. Wang Jian affirmed his movement control and reminded him to pay attention to his breathing rhythm.

events.name: Work Pressure Events
events.description: Ye Mingxuan felt stressed due to project deadlines. He communicated with his colleague Zhou Tao via email regarding the modification details of the design drawings to ensure project progress, though he was slightly anxious.

2025-02.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan's follow-up appointment confirmed a good recovery, and he has begun planning his return-to-work arrangements. He is also focusing on healthy eating and succulent plant care in preparation for the weekend, as his weight increased due to a family gathering.

events.name: Follow-up visit confirms good recovery.
events.description: The lower back is essentially pain-free, with full range of motion. Ye Mingxuan returned to the community health service center for a follow-up appointment, where Dr. Liu confirmed after examination that his recovery was progressing well and recommended gradually resuming normal activities while avoiding heavy lifting in the short term. After returning home, he began planning his work arrangements for the upcoming return to work next week and scheduled a weekend fitness class to restore his physical strength.

events.name: Communicating with the Coach about Dietary Adjustments
events.description: At the LIMEI Fitness Center, Ye Mingxuan had a post-class discussion with his personal trainer, Wang Jian. Based on Ye Mingxuan's recent training progress and physical examination report (which indicated a slightly high BMI), Coach Wang advised him to adjust his dietary structure during the recovery period. The focus should be on increasing the intake of high-quality protein, calcium, and vitamins to promote muscle recovery and bone health, while reducing consumption of high-oil and high-salt takeout meals.

events.name: Planning Succulent Plant Care
events.description: After getting off work on Friday evening, Ye Mingxuan carefully inspected the condition of each pot of plants in the balcony succulent corner, particularly several pots of Haworthia cooperi and Lithops. He noticed that some soil had become compacted, while some plants had become etiolated. Based on the plant varieties and the current season (late winter to early spring), he created a weekend plan in his phone memo for repotting, adjusting light exposure, and watering. He also searched online for spring succulent care tips specific to the Tianjin area.

events.name: Organize work documents
events.description: In preparation for returning to work next week, Ye Mingxuan organized this week's work documents, updated the project progress report, and synchronized them with the team via cloud storage.

events.name: Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan had dinner with his parents and his aunt Wang Xiufang, enjoying dishes such as braised pork, which resulted in a slight increase in his weight.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to preparing for the follow-up appointment.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Optimistic, but with slight dietary guilt.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Saturday, his day off, Ye Mingxuan spent a family movie night with his parents, while also repotting and caring for succulent plants—practicing a hobby during his recovery period. His weight remained stable due to snack consumption.

events.name: Home Theater Night
events.description: Ye Mingxuan spent the first family movie night with his parents in the living room. They watched the latest episode of a competitive variety show, followed by a classic film. Simple snacks and drinks were enjoyed during the viewing, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Procurement of Horticultural Materials
events.description: On Saturday morning, Ye Mingxuan went to the flower market near his home and selected granular soil suitable for succulents, clay pellets, and new small gardening tools (such as a small shovel and an air blower). He discussed with the stall owner the effects of different soil mixes on varieties like Haworthia cooperi, ensuring the materials had good breathability.

events.name: Repotting Succulents
events.description: On Saturday afternoon, Ye Mingxuan was working on the balcony. He carefully removed the unhealthy Haworthia cooperi and Lithops from their old pots, cleared away the old soil and withered roots, and repotted them with newly purchased granular soil. Throughout the process, he took care to protect the plants' root systems and ensured there was sufficient drainage at the bottom of the pots.

events.name: Adjust Plant Lighting
events.description: After completing the soil replacement, Ye Mingxuan rearranged the positions of the plants in the balcony corner based on each pot's light requirements (preferring full sun or partial shade). He moved the sun-loving varieties to areas with more abundant light, relocated species such as Haworthia cooperi to spots with diffused light, and tidied up the balcony windowsill.

events.name: Record maintenance information
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened the succulent care app on his phone, updated status photos for the recently repotted plants, and recorded the repotting date along with the new soil mix formula. He also set differentiated watering reminders in the app for different varieties to accommodate the adjusted care frequency.

events.name: Mild Rehabilitation Training
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan performed simple stretching and balance exercises to maintain his rehabilitation pace and avoid prolonged sitting.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the weekend activities.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, enjoying family time.

events.name: Comprehensive Rehabilitation Training
events.description: On Saturday morning, Ye Mingxuan took advantage of the ample time to complete a more comprehensive rehabilitation training at home, including stretching and balance exercises. In the afternoon, he organized the data from this week's rehabilitation log into a table, sent it to Coach Wang via WeChat, and attached his own questions.

events.name: The final training session of the first phase
events.description: Proceed with the final training session of the first phase. Ye Mingxuan felt a clearer perception of core strength engagement, with no significant discomfort in the lower back during the training. After the session, he organized this week's training log (including the duration, sensations, and any anomalies for each session), sent it to Coach Wang Jian via WeChat, and scheduled a time to discuss the training plan for next week.

events.name: Accompanying Mother to Purchase Ingredients
events.description: Ye Mingxuan accompanied his mother to the supermarket and farmers' market near their home to conduct a major shopping trip according to the newly formulated recipe list. They focused on purchasing sea bass, lean meat, eggs, milk, yogurt, a variety of fresh vegetables (especially leafy greens), and fruits, stocking up on ample ingredients for the upcoming implementation of the new dietary plan.

events.name: Online Sharing of Succulent Plant Care Tips
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan shared photos of the process of repotting his Haworthia cooperi in a succulent plant enthusiasts' WeChat group, along with his experience in caring for the plant on his indoor balcony in Tianjin, such as how to gradually increase light exposure in spring and prevent frost damage from late cold spells. He briefly exchanged ideas with other group members.

2025-02.daily_overview: On weekdays, Ye Mingxuan enrolled in an online ancient coin course, conducted the second phase of rehabilitation training, jointly developed a dietary plan for the recovery period with his mother, and began incorporating short outdoor walks.

events.name: Register for Ancient Coin Appraisal Course
events.description: Ye Mingxuan completed the registration and payment for the ancient coin appraisal course on the online platform, downloaded the course syllabus and the learning materials for the first week, and prepared for the official start of the course.

events.name: First Training Session of the Second Phase
events.description: Under the online guidance of Coach Wang Jian, Ye Mingxuan conducted the first training session of the second phase in his home living room. This session increased the difficulty of the basic movements, such as extending the duration of the plank and adding more sets of dynamic glute bridges, with a focus on engaging the transversus abdominis and gluteal muscles. The coach corrected the details of the movements via video.

events.name: Discussing the convalescent diet plan
events.description: Over the weekend at home, Ye Mingxuan shared his coach's advice with his mother, Wang Xiulan. Together, the mother and son consulted nutrition books and online resources. Taking into account Ye Mingxuan's favorite dishes, such as steamed perch, braised pork (adjusted to a low-fat version), and vegetable salad, they discussed and preliminarily drafted a three-week, high-protein, high-calcium, and vitamin-rich home-based recovery diet plan, with the aim of reducing reliance on takeout meals.

events.name: Develop a detailed dietary plan
events.description: Ye Mingxuan and his mother Wang Xiulan are in the kitchen at home, discussing and formulating a two-week dietary plan for his recovery period based on medical advice and Ye Mingxuan's taste preferences. The plan focuses on increasing the frequency of foods such as steamed perch, vegetable salad, and milk, reducing greasy takeout, and establishing a general arrangement for three daily meals.

Between games, they exchanged updates via voice chat, with Zheng Kai sharing insights into the gaming industry in Shenzhen, while Zhou Tao recounted amusing anecdotes from work. This activity marked the resumption of Ye Mingxuan's social life during his recovery period.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the weekend rest day, Ye Mingxuan's life revolves around health re-examination, interest summarization, and social preparation. In the morning, he assesses rehabilitation outcomes and adjusts his training plan. In the afternoon, he organizes Python learning projects. In the evening, he handles financial planning appointments and discusses gathering ideas with old classmates. At night, he conducts preliminary research on investment documents, demonstrating a smooth transition from the recovery phase to an enterprising period.

events.name: Rehabilitation Assessment and Plan Adjustment
events.description: Based on recent systematic rehabilitation, Ye Mingxuan's lower back pain has essentially disappeared, with only slight soreness and tightness after prolonged sitting. At the Lamei Fitness Center in the morning, he and coach Wang Jian jointly assessed his recovery progress. Based on his current condition, Wang Jian officially adjusted the training plan from purely restorative exercises to a phase that balances recovery with mild muscle building. He introduced light resistance training assisted by elastic bands and recommended that Ye try swimming once a week to consolidate core strength and improve body flexibility.

events.name: Python Project Summary Archiving
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan was wrapping up his recently completed Python data processing practice project in his home study. After systematically organizing the project code, key technical issues encountered, and their solutions, he submitted them to his personal GitHub repository. At the same time, he wrote a concise yet well-structured learning reflection, summarizing the insights gained from the data processing workflow and outlining specific directions for his next steps in learning the NumPy and Pandas libraries.

events.name: Schedule a Quarterly Financial Review
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan contacted Zhang Wei, a wealth management manager at China Merchants Bank, via WeChat to schedule a quarterly telephone wealth management review meeting. He had prepared several questions of concern in advance, such as the performance of his current fund portfolio, the impact of market volatility on conservative strategies, and whether there were any new opportunities aligned with his industry knowledge. He noted the key points of these questions in a memo.

events.name: Preliminary Review of Fund Materials
events.description: After receiving the electronic materials on the high-end manufacturing fund sent by financial manager Zhang Wei, Ye Mingxuan quickly browsed through the documents during his leisure time after dinner. He focused on reviewing the fund's overview, investment objectives, and the background of the fund management team. Leveraging his industry sensitivity as a mechanical engineer, he developed a preliminary interest in the fund's focus on the theme of "high-end equipment and intelligent manufacturing."

events.name: Discussing a University Class Reunion
events.description: Zhao Xiaofeng, a university classmate, contacted Ye Mingxuan via WeChat, suggesting that the two of them take the lead in organizing a small-scale university classmate gathering in Tianjin this year. They discussed the feasibility of the gathering, preliminarily identified a list of several classmates who work in Tianjin and maintain good relationships, and agreed that Ye Mingxuan would be responsible for selecting a restaurant, while Zhao Xiaofeng would handle the initial contacts.

events.name: Evening Light Stretching and Reading
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan followed his coach's advice and performed 10 minutes of stretching exercises for his lower back and legs to alleviate the slight discomfort caused by prolonged sitting during the day. Afterward, he spent some time reading books related to ancient coin collecting to prepare for further in-depth study the following day.

起始状态.心情: Calm and slightly expectant, feeling relaxed about being able to arrange one's own time over the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and organized, satisfied with the progress of rehabilitation, and somewhat excited about the upcoming financial consultation and planning for the class reunion in the new week.

2025-03.daily_overview: A Sunday dedicated to in-depth learning and research. Ye Mingxuan spent almost the entire day in his home study. In the morning, he delved into the investment details of a new fund and took meticulous notes. In the afternoon and evening, he systematically studied the variant knowledge of Yuan Datou silver coins, demonstrating the rigorous and studious traits characteristic of an ISTJ personality type.

events.name: Conduct In-Depth Research on Fund Prospectuses
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan carefully studied the prospectus of the high-end manufacturing fund he had received the previous day in his study. He skipped the general introductory sections and focused directly on the fund manager's historical performance, specific investment strategies (such as stock selection logic and industry allocation), detailed risk disclosure clauses, and the fee structure. He used a notebook to jot down key information and his own questions in bullet points.

events.name: Systematically study the basic versions of the Yuan Datou silver dollar.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan switched "channels," taking out the "Illustrated Catalog of Modern Chinese Silver Coins" and several professional journals from the bookshelf. He began systematically studying the basic varieties of the Yuan Datou silver coin by combining insights from multiple collection forums. He focused on sorting out the casting background, overall characteristics, and main patterns of silver coins from key years such as the third, eighth, ninth, and tenth years, establishing a preliminary knowledge framework.

events.name: Deepen the understanding of differences between subdivided versions.
events.description: In the evening, his studies continued to deepen. He focused on researching the differences among specialized varieties such as the "O" mark edition, triangular circle edition, and Gansu edition. By comparing high-definition images, he examined the "hidden marks," including the shapes of the reeded edges, the details of the Jiahe pattern, and the subtle distinctions in the strokes of the characters. Not only did he read extensively, but he also drew simple comparative diagrams and meticulously recorded the key identification points for each characteristic feature.

events.name: Briefly discussing dinner with parents
events.description: During a study break, Ye Mingxuan had a simple dinner with his parents. His mother, Wang Xiulan, prepared stir-fried seasonal vegetables and rice. At the table, Ye Mingxuan briefly shared his findings from studying ancient coins during the day. After listening, his father, Ye Jianguo, nodded and said, "This is exactly how one should delve into their work."

events.name: Outdoor walk temporarily canceled.
events.description: Due to the overcast weather and his focus on studying, Ye Mingxuan temporarily canceled the planned outdoor walk and instead performed simple standing activities in the study to avoid prolonged sitting.

起始状态.心情: Focused and well-planned, ready to devote a full day to studying.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied with acquiring substantial new knowledge, my mind is filled with images of silver dollars and fund clauses, feeling slightly fatigued yet thoroughly fulfilled.

2025-03.daily_overview: A new week begins, with life returning to the rhythm of the workweek. In the morning, I completed the first adjusted rehabilitation training session and received posture guidance. In the evening, I concurrently advanced both fund analysis and ancient coin studies, demonstrating the ability to manage multiple personal tasks amid a busy schedule. During the lunch break, I also discussed industry insights with colleagues.

events.name: Implement the New Rehabilitation Training Program
events.description: Before going to work in the morning, Ye Mingxuan went to the gym and began implementing a new rehabilitation training plan under the guidance of coach Wang Jian. The focus was on activating the core muscles and performing light resistance training using small weights and resistance bands. Wang Jian particularly emphasized coordinating breathing rhythms with exertion patterns during the exercises and, after the training, instructed Ye Mingxuan on maintaining proper sitting and standing postures during daily office work.

events.name: Analyzing the Correlation Between Fund Holdings and Industries
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan turned on his computer and conducted a detailed analysis of the historical simulated performance report provided in the fund materials, with a particular focus on the details of its top ten holdings. He found that these companies were primarily concentrated in the fields of CNC machine tools, industrial robots, and precision instruments, two of which were suppliers or peers he had encountered in his work. Drawing on his industry knowledge, he made a preliminary assessment of the technological positioning and competitive landscape of these companies within the industrial chain.

events.name: Learning the Grading and Value Assessment of Ancient Coins
events.description: During intervals in his fund analysis, Ye Mingxuan continued his study of ancient coin knowledge, shifting his focus to researching grading standards (such as MS for Mint State, AU for About Uncirculated, XF for Extremely Fine, etc.). By examining transaction records on online auction platforms, he gained an understanding of the actual market price ranges for different editions and grades of Yuan Datou coins, recognizing that "grade is the life of a coin."

events.name: Develop a preliminary swimming exercise plan
events.description: Based on Coach Wang Jian's suggestion, Ye Mingxuan used a mobile app in the evening to search for information about swimming pools near his company and around his home, comparing their prices, water quality, and opening hours. He tentatively plans to schedule a weekly swimming session on Saturday or Sunday afternoon as a supplement to his aerobic exercise, setting a goal of swimming for about 40 minutes each time.

events.name: Discussion on Trends in the Midday Rest Industry
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan chatted with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang while eating in the cafeteria. The conversation naturally turned to the development of industrial robots and automation. From the perspective of frontline engineers, the three discussed the technological roadmaps and market competition dynamics of several leading domestic enterprises, which provided Ye Mingxuan with a more intuitive understanding for evaluating the companies in the fund's portfolio.

events.name: Overtime work due to project pressure
events.description: In the evening, due to an urgent project revision requirement, Ye Mingxuan had to stay up late to adjust the design drawings, resulting in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: After the weekend rest, I am refreshed and ready to tackle the workweek.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued but with a clear mind, I have adapted well to the new training regimen. Substantial progress has been made in both fund and ancient coin research, though work pressure has brought about mild anxiety.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the second workday, the focus was on in-depth research and practical preparation. During the day, fundamental analysis of the companies held by the fund was conducted during work intervals. In the evening, meticulous preparations were made for visiting the woodworking master—selecting gifts, organizing recent updates, and conceptualizing projects, reflecting a balance between career orientation and family/hobby pursuits.

events.name: Deepen the Analysis of the Fundamental Aspects of Companies Held in Fund Portfolios
events.description: During work breaks and lunch hours, Ye Mingxuan focused on several core companies among the fund's top ten holdings. He searched online for their latest annual financial reports, publicly disclosed lists of technical patents, and industry research reports published by securities firms. From the perspective of a mechanical engineer, he emphasized evaluating these companies' core technological barriers, the proportion of R&D investment, and their potential positioning in the industrial chain upgrade. He then supplemented the key analytical points into his previous notes.

events.name: Selecting Gifts to Visit the Master
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan did not go straight home. Instead, he made a detour to a familiar tea shop. Knowing that Master Qian Jianguo enjoyed drinking tea, he deliberately selected a box of newly released, high-quality West Lake Longjing tea from this year. He believed that giving tea as a gift was both appropriate and practical, fitting the simple lifestyle of the experienced master.

events.name: Organizing Recent Updates and Conceptualizing Woodworking Projects
events.description: At home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan began preparing for his weekend visit to Master Qian. He organized photos of his recent woodworking practice pieces (several simple mortise and tenon exercises) from his phone and reviewed the maintenance and sharpening records of a set of chisels during his recovery period. At the same time, he formally conceived a small project: creating a simple and practical phone stand. He sketched a preliminary design, noting approximate dimensions and the type of wood he intended to use (a small piece of walnut).

events.name: Handle daily household affairs
events.description: Wang Xiulan reminded Ye Mingxuan that the household internet service fee was about to expire. Ye Mingxuan logged into the carrier's app on his phone and quickly completed the renewal process.

events.name: Start contacting fellow travelers to plan a self-driving trip.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan sent a WeChat message to his self-driving travel companion Wu Bin to preliminarily discuss the feasibility of a self-driving trip around Qinghai Lake. He inquired about route suggestions and the best time to visit, beginning early planning for the goal to be achieved within two years.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today was a day of parallel progress on multiple key fronts. In the morning, an in-depth conference call was held with the financial advisor. During the lunch break, industry insights were exchanged with colleagues. In the afternoon, details for the class reunion were confirmed. The evening involved multitasking: follow-up research on funds, knowledge exchange on ancient coins, and ultimately finalizing investment operations. The decision-making process fully reflected a prudent and pragmatic style.

events.name: Quarterly Earnings Conference Call
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan held a scheduled conference call with his financial advisor, Zhang Wei. Zhang Wei began by reviewing the performance of Ye Mingxuan's existing investment portfolio (primarily consisting of several stable funds) over the past quarter, which remained generally steady. He then focused on recommending the newly launched high-end manufacturing thematic fund, elaborating in detail on its investment rationale (capturing the benefits of import substitution and industrial upgrading), the fund manager's professional background, and objectively analyzing potential risks (industry cyclical fluctuations and concentration risk). Ye Mingxuan listened attentively and took notes on the key points.

events.name: Conduct independent in-depth research after the meeting.
events.description: After the conference call concluded, Ye Mingxuan felt there was still more to explore. Using the fund code provided by Zhang Wei, he consulted more detailed information on professional financial data platforms and the official website of the fund company. This included the full prospectus, the background of the fund company's investment research team, and longer-term simulated backtesting (despite knowing that past performance does not guarantee future results).

events.name: Lunch Break Industry Discussion Among Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan, Zhou Tao, and Li Xiang met again in the cafeteria. Ye Mingxuan steered the conversation toward high-end manufacturing, sharing the key focus areas of the fund. Zhou Tao offered several observations from the perspective of market applications, while Li Xiang analyzed the risks based on the pace of technological iteration. This informal discussion gave Ye Mingxuan a more comprehensive understanding of the industry's "heat" and "uncertainty."

events.name: Confirming the Arrangements for the Class Reunion
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan and Zhao Xiaofeng communicated via WeChat again. They finalized the gathering date for the evening of March 15th (Saturday). Ye Mingxuan took the initiative to handle the task of selecting and booking a restaurant, while Zhao Xiaofeng was responsible for contacting and confirming whether classmates in Tianjin could attend.

events.name: Online Exchange for Ancient Coin Learning
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan logged into the ancient coin collection forum and sent his study notes on complex varieties such as the "Gansu Inscription" to his fellow collector Zhao Jianguo in Xi'an, seeking advice on the identification challenges involved. The two engaged in a discussion on WeChat for about half an hour, during which Zhao Jianguo shared some practical experience in physical coin authentication, greatly benefiting Ye Mingxuan.

events.name: Final Confirmation of Fund Investment Plan
events.description: After synthesizing the financial manager's advice, conducting independent research, and discussing with colleagues, Ye Mingxuan decided to adopt a highly cautious approach: instead of making a large one-time purchase, he set up a small fixed monthly investment of 500 yuan over a one-year period. Before going to bed, he confirmed the details of this operation plan with Zhang Wei via WeChat, including the deduction date, fee structure, and termination rules for the fixed investment.

events.name: Sleepless Nights Due to Financial Planning Decisions
events.description: Due to repeatedly weighing investment risks, Ye Mingxuan had difficulty falling asleep at night. He pondered for a long time before finally resting, resulting in a late bedtime.

2025-03.daily_overview: Thursday is a scheduled day for regular training and study organization. In the morning, I completed the second rehabilitation session of the week, with a slight increase in intensity and a positive feeling. In the evening, I systematically organized my notes on fund research from this week at home, forming my own evaluation conclusions. I also structured the knowledge gained from studying ancient coins in preparation for practical identification over the weekend.

events.name: The Second Rehabilitation Training Session This Week
events.description: During the morning workout, Coach Wang Jian inquired about Ye Mingxuan's physical feedback following the previous training session. Upon learning that there was only manageable mild muscle soreness, he appropriately increased the range of motion for several exercises and the resistance of the resistance band. Additionally, he introduced new exercises targeting scapular stability to address posture issues resulting from long-term desk work. After the session, Ye Mingxuan felt thoroughly energized.

events.name: Review the Fund Investment Evaluation Conclusions
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan compiled and summarized his research notes on the high-end manufacturing fund from the past few days on his computer. He identified several core advantages: the investment field was highly relevant to his profession, making it easier to track, and the fund manager had a professional background. He also clarified potential risks: high industry volatility and relatively concentrated fund holdings. Based on this, he concluded that it could serve as a tool for long-term tracking and learning, with participation through small fixed-amount investments, allowing for risk control while maintaining focus on the industry.

events.name: Establish a Personal Knowledge Base of Ancient Coins
events.description: Switching tasks, Ye Mingxuan began organizing the knowledge about the "Yuan Datou" silver coins he had studied this week. Using mind mapping software, he created a comparison chart of variant characteristics, visualizing the key identification points for different years and editions. He then established a knowledge base titled "Silver Coin Collection" in his personal cloud notes, systematically categorizing text notes, images, and forum links, thereby initially constructing his own professional knowledge system.

events.name: Brief Technical Exchange with Father
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Jianguo asked his son about a hydraulic issue he encountered at work. Based on his knowledge, Ye Mingxuan provided an answer and discussed the pros and cons of two potential solutions. Such brief technical exchanges between father and son had become a routine.

events.name: Temporary change of dietary plan
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan moderately enjoyed the braised pork prepared by his mother, deviating from his usual light diet plan, but he controlled the portion to avoid excessive intake.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday was the day for implementing decisions. In the morning, Ye Mingxuan officially set up a fund fixed investment plan on his mobile banking app, marking the entry into the practical stage of financial exploration. The workday proceeded as usual. In the evening, he embarked on a new Python skills learning module and enrolled in an advanced course, demonstrating a proactive commitment to continuous learning.

events.name: Set up a fund fixed investment plan
events.description: Before heading to work in the morning, Ye Mingxuan opened his mobile banking app and set up a new automatic investment plan from his frequently used salary account: a monthly deduction of 500 yuan on the 10th of each month to purchase that high-end manufacturing fund, with the plan scheduled to last for one year. After completing the setup, he immediately executed the first deduction manually (equivalent to the March installment) and soon received a text message confirming the successful transaction.

events.name: Notify the Financial Manager and Express Gratitude
events.description: After successfully setting up the fixed investment plan, Ye Mingxuan sent a WeChat message to his financial manager, Zhang Wei: "Manager Zhang, I have set up a monthly fixed investment of 500 according to the plan we discussed. Thank you for the detailed analysis and materials provided the other day." Zhang Wei quickly replied, indicating that he would continue to monitor the plan and provide regular updates and reports.

events.name: Start Learning Pandas Data Processing
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan followed his study plan and began the next phase of Python data analysis. He learned the Pandas library through an online platform, focusing on practicing how to read CSV files, handle missing values, and perform data filtering and sorting. He completed the post-lesson exercises using a set of simulated sales data and saved the code to his local project folder.

events.name: Plan Python Advanced Course Learning
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan browsed the Coursera platform and found the course "Advanced Python for Data Analysis." He reviewed the course syllabus and the recommended weekly study time (approximately 4-5 hours). Then, based on his work schedule, he tentatively marked on his calendar Tuesday and Thursday evenings, as well as some Sunday afternoons over the next four weeks as dedicated study times.

events.name: Challenge gaming teammate Zheng Kai to a match this weekend.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan made an arrangement with his teammate Zheng Kai from Shenzhen in the "League of Legends" gaming group to play a few ranked matches together on Saturday night to relax.

events.name: Contact the mentor for career development consultation
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan sent a WeChat message to his university mentor, Chen Jianguo, seeking advice on the career advancement path for senior mechanical engineers and scheduling a follow-up phone conversation.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed, as the weekend is approaching and an important decision (dollar-cost averaging) is about to be implemented.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and highly motivated, the financial plan has been launched, learning new skills is also on track, and there is great anticipation for the weekend arrangements.

2025-03.daily_overview: A Saturday filled with family warmth. The parents busily prepared for dinner, while Ye Mingxuan handled personal affairs during the day and attempted swimming for the first time. The evening family dinner was the highlight, with the family of three enjoying delicious food, chatting about recent updates, and watching variety shows, engaging in deep and pleasant family communication. Seizing this opportunity, Ye Mingxuan also shared his financial planning with his parents.

events.name: Parents are preparing a weekend family banquet.
events.description: In the morning, mother Wang Xiulan went to the market to carefully purchase fresh pork belly, sea bass, and a variety of vegetables. Father Ye Jianguo stayed at home to clean the living room and tidy up the balcony. Throughout the morning, the house was filled with a lively and warm atmosphere in preparation for the family reunion.

events.name: First Attempt at Swimming Exercise
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan took his swimming gear and headed to an indoor heated swimming pool near his home, following his coach's advice. He engaged in approximately 30 minutes of slow-paced breaststroke, feeling the soothing massage of the water flow on his lower back, with noticeably less joint pressure compared to land-based exercises. After swimming, he felt physically and mentally refreshed and decided to incorporate swimming every Saturday afternoon into his regular schedule.

events.name: Update Parents on Recent Developments and Plans
events.description: In the evening, the mother prepared a sumptuous meal including braised pork and steamed perch. During dinner, Ye Mingxiao proactively updated his parents on his recovery progress, mentioning that his lumbar rehabilitation had stabilized, he would attend an industry technology exchange conference the following week, and he had just started a small-scale fixed investment plan in a high-end manufacturing fund. He elaborated on the cautious strategy behind the fixed investment, to which his parents responded with understanding and support. His father added, "Investing in areas you understand—that's the right approach."

events.name: Cozy Family Evening Time
events.description: After dinner, the family of three sat in the living room, watching a competitive variety show that both Ye Mingxuan and his father enjoyed. They chatted while watching and shared some fruit. During the casual conversation, Wang Xiulan, the mother, reminded Ye Mingxuan that the family's property insurance would expire next month. Ye Mingxuan immediately noted it in his phone's memo and promised to take care of it next week.

events.name: Preparing a Heartfelt Gesture for Mother on Women's Day
events.description: Although it was a Saturday, Ye Mingxuan remembered it was Women's Day. While out during the day, he specifically picked out a small bouquet of carnations and a greeting card for his mother, presenting them to her before the family dinner. Wang Xiulan said, "What a waste of money," but the smile on her face was unmistakable.

events.name: Having a long talk with parents about staying up late
events.description: After the family dinner, Ye Mingxuan stayed up later than usual due to an in-depth discussion with his parents about family finances and future plans.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom, 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, looking forward to the weekend time with family.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Warm, happy, with a strong sense of security brought by family bonds, yet slightly fatigued.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is dedicated to exploring interests and social practice. In the morning, I attempted swimming for the second time and extended my stretching routine. In the afternoon, I visited the woodworking master Qian Jianguo, bringing tea and project ideas. I received valuable guidance and deepened our mentor-apprentice bond. In the evening, I applied newly acquired knowledge to examine my collection of ancient coins and unexpectedly discovered clues to rare variants. Excitedly, I sought help from fellow collectors for authentication.

events.name: Consolidate swimming exercises and stretch.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan went to the swimming pool again, extending his swimming time to 40 minutes and paying special attention to his swimming posture. After swimming, he spent more time than usual stretching by the poolside, focusing on relaxing his lower back and leg muscles. He felt that his body's flexibility and overall comfort had further improved.

events.name: Visiting Carpenter Master Qian Jianguo
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan, carrying the prepared Longjing tea, drove to Master Qian's workshop in his home located in Yangliuqing Town, Xiqing District. He provided a detailed report on the progress of his lumbar spine rehabilitation, presented the tool maintenance records, and showed the sketches of the phone stand to seek Master Qian's advice. Master Qian affirmed the project idea, offered specific suggestions for structural improvements and wood treatment, and shared a story from his youth about learning to make the Eight Immortals table. Over tea, the two discussed craftsmanship and spent a pleasant two hours together.

events.name: Record Master Guidance and Project Planning
events.description: After returning from Master Qian's house, Ye Mingxuan immediately went to his study and meticulously recorded the master's suggestions regarding the phone stand, such as the mortise and tenon connection method and the sequence for sandpaper polishing. Simultaneously, based on these recommendations, he preliminarily listed the materials needed for purchase—small pieces of walnut wood and black walnut wood scraps, specific sandpaper grits, and woodworking glue—planning to visit the building materials market next week to acquire them.

events.name: Practical Knowledge of Ancient Coins: Discovering a Suspected Rare Variety
events.description: One evening, Ye Mingxuan was suddenly inspired to take out several of the silver dollars from the third year of the Yuan Datou era that he had collected. Using a magnifying glass and his newly acquired knowledge, he examined each one carefully. On a coin of ordinary condition, he was surprised to discover that the character "贝" inside the "圆" character was written differently from the common version, and the overall pattern displayed some vague characteristics of the "triangular circle" variety. This discovery left him both excited and uncertain.

events.name: Seeking assistance from fellow collectors for preliminary appraisal
events.description: Ye Mingxuan immediately used a macro lens to take high-definition photos of both sides and the reeded edge of the silver coin. He sent them via WeChat to his collector friend Zhao Jianguo in Xi'an, along with a detailed description of the features he had observed. He earnestly requested Zhao's help in examining the coin to determine whether it was indeed the relatively rare "Triangle Circle" variety.

events.name: Staying up late to study due to excitement.
events.description: Excited by the discovery of the ancient coin, Ye Mingxuan stayed up late searching for more information online, which delayed his sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Leisurely, ready to enjoy a day of exploring personal interests.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Exceptionally excited and satisfied, the visit to my master was highly rewarding, and the ancient coin collection may have yielded an unexpected surprise, greatly stimulating my thirst for knowledge and desire for exploration.

2025-03.daily_overview: The new workweek commenced with the launch of multiple tasks. The system automatically executed the first scheduled fund investment deduction; the family doctor called to recommend an annual physical examination, and Ye Mingxuan promptly made an appointment; his supervisor notified him that he would attend an industry technical exchange conference, requiring him to prepare a presentation. Meanwhile, the restaurant reservation for the class reunion was completed, and Python learning progressed as planned. Efficient and fulfilling.

events.name: First automatic execution of the fund fixed investment plan
events.description: In the early morning, Ye Mingxuan received a text message from the bank, notifying him that 500 yuan had been deducted from his salary card for a fund purchase. Shortly after, the fund company also sent a share confirmation notice. This marked the official automated operation of his high-end manufacturing fund regular investment plan, eliminating the need for manual intervention.

events.name: Family doctors recommend annual physical examinations.
events.description: While working in the morning, Ye Mingxuan received a call from Liu Wentao, the community family doctor. Based on Ye's recent recovery from a lumbar spine injury and his still elevated BMI, Dr. Liu recommended that he undergo a comprehensive annual physical examination to establish a new health baseline. He also provided advice such as maintaining a light diet and engaging in regular exercise. Ye Mingxuan found the suggestions quite reasonable.

events.name: Schedule an Annual Physical Examination
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan checked the annual physical examination packages through the official app of a top-tier hospital. He selected a comprehensive package that included liver and kidney function tests, blood lipid and glucose tests, abdominal ultrasound, and cervical and lumbar spine X-rays, and scheduled the examination for the morning of this Friday (March 14).

events.name: Accepting the Invitation to Speak at the Technical Exchange Conference
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan was summoned to the office by his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, who formally notified him that the company had recommended him as a keynote speaker for the "Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Intelligent Manufacturing Technology Exchange Conference" to be held the following week. The speech was required to focus on a practical technical challenge he had resolved during last year's Langfang project. Feeling both pressure and honor, Ye Mingxuan accepted the task and began outlining his presentation.

events.name: Booking a Restaurant for a Class Reunion
events.description: Based on Zhao Xiaofeng's feedback regarding his classmates' taste preferences (leaning towards Tianjin cuisine), Ye Mingxuan searched and compared several restaurants online. He ultimately selected a private Tianjin cuisine restaurant in Nankai District, known for its quiet ambiance and authentic dishes. He successfully reserved a private room for eight people on Saturday evening via telephone. Subsequently, he sent the address to Zhao Xiaofeng.

events.name: Handling Home Property Insurance Renewal
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan recalled his mother's reminder. Using the insurance company's app, he quickly completed the online renewal of his household property insurance, paid the premium, and sent a screenshot confirming the successful renewal to the family WeChat group.

events.name: Start preparing for the speech continuously.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan began to focus on preparing his speech for the technical exchange conference, which would be a key task over the next few days.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: The typical Monday momentum, facing multiple new tasks with focused concentration.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, multiple plans have made progress. Feeling somewhat pressured by the upcoming speaking challenge, but more so eager to take it on.
