2025-03.daily_overview: Tuesday focused on in-depth preparation for specialized tasks. The training intensity slightly increased in the morning. At noon, a positive reply was received from a fellow collector, confirming that the ancient coin was a rare variant, bringing immense joy. In the evening, full effort was devoted to drafting the speech for the technical exchange meeting and organizing materials for tomorrow's project review meeting, maintaining a fast-paced work rhythm.

events.name: Slight increase in rehabilitation training intensity
events.description: During the morning workout, Coach Wang Jian assessed Ye Mingxuan's training experience over the past week, which included swimming, and concluded that he had adapted well. Accordingly, the load of resistance training was appropriately increased, and dynamic stability exercises assisted by resistance bands (such as band walks) were introduced to further challenge his core control ability.

events.name: Ancient Coin Authentication Confirmed with Delight
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan received a voice message reply from Zhao Jianguo, a fellow collector in Xi'an. After conducting a detailed comparison with the database and consulting senior experts in the field, Zhao Jianguo officially confirmed that the "Yuan Datou" coin discovered by Ye Mingxuan was the relatively rare "Triangle Circle" variant. He also informed Ye that its current market reference value was significantly higher than that of the common version. Upon learning this, Ye Mingxuan was thrilled, as it served as the best affirmation of his systematic learning efforts.

events.name: Prepare materials for the project technical review meeting
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan worked overtime at home to prepare for the next day's online technical review meeting with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, as well as his supervisor Gao Zhiyuan. He organized the final version of the drawings for the mechanical structure optimization plan, compiled a PowerPoint presentation outlining the key optimization points, and repeatedly debugged the Python simulation script used to demonstrate the assembly success rate evaluation, ensuring that the data and logic would be flawless during the presentation.

events.name: Drafting the Initial Manuscript for a Technical Exchange Meeting Speech
events.description: After completing the review materials, Ye Mingxuan began to conceptualize his presentation for the technical exchange meeting. He reviewed his work notes from his business trip to Langfang and decided to focus on the theme of "Practice and Thinking in Addressing Tolerance Accumulation Issues in Precision Assembly." He structured the logical framework of his speech as follows: problem description, analysis process, solution approach, effectiveness verification, and a summary of engineering thinking. He then drafted the core sections of the initial manuscript.

events.name: Sharing Joy and Gains
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan couldn't contain his joy and shared with his parents the news that the ancient coin had been confirmed as a rare variety, recounting the entire process of self-study and discovery. Although his parents knew little about ancient coins, they were genuinely happy that their son had gained something through diligent research. His father even praised him, saying, "Your efforts have not been in vain," which was a rare occurrence.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work pressure
events.description: Due to the dual pressures of speech preparation and project review, Ye Mingxuan felt somewhat anxious in the evening, but he alleviated it through deep breathing and self-regulation.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin

2025-03.daily_overview: Today is a day of execution and harvest. In the morning, I completed the second training session of the week and strengthened my core. Afterwards, I went to the hospital for a comprehensive annual physical examination. In the afternoon and evening, I continued refining the speech for the technical exchange conference, and the class reunion list was finally confirmed. Although the physical examination was time-consuming, it provided a scientific basis for health management.

events.name: Consolidative Rehabilitation Training
events.description: The morning training focused on consolidating core strength. Coach Wang Jian arranged various plank variations and small-range trunk rotation exercises. Ye Mingxuan felt that his movements were more stable than before, and his awareness of posture adjustment had subconsciously integrated into the training. At the end of the session, Wang Jian specifically praised his progress and emphasized the importance of thorough stretching after training.

events.name: Undergo an annual comprehensive physical examination.
events.description: After the training session, Ye Mingxuan went directly to the scheduled hospital examination center. He completed all the items in sequence, including blood draw, abdominal ultrasound, electrocardiogram, chest X-ray, lumbar spine X-ray, internal and surgical examinations, ophthalmology, and otolaryngology. The entire process was orderly but time-consuming, lasting until noon. As fasting was required, he immediately had a simple meal near the hospital after the check-up.

events.name: Deepen the Content of the Speech
events.description: In the afternoon, I took leave and stayed at home. After resting for a while, Ye Mingxuan began to refine and polish his speech. He contemplated how to naturally incorporate the typical thinking methods of an ISTJ engineer—such as systematic analysis, rigorous verification, and attention to detail—into the narrative of the case study. This would ensure that the speech not only shared technical knowledge but also conveyed a problem-solving mindset.

events.name: Final Confirmation of Class Reunion Attendee List
events.description: Zhao Xiaofeng sent a WeChat message, informing that a total of five classmates (seven including the two of them) have confirmed their attendance at the Saturday gathering. Ye Mingxuan compiled the detailed address of the restaurant, the private room number, the time, and nearby parking information into a complete notice, which was then posted by Zhao Xiaofeng in the small classmate group chat.

events.name: Adjustments and Learning After Physical Examination
events.description: In the evening, feeling somewhat fatigued (likely due to the effects of blood drawing and fasting), Ye Mingxuan did not schedule any high-intensity study sessions. Following his Python learning plan, he studied the groupby grouping and aggregation operations in Pandas and practiced simple data summarization analysis using a set of simulated data, maintaining a moderate level of intensity.

events.name: Rest early due to discomfort from the medical examination.
events.description: Due to fatigue after the medical examination, Ye Mingxuan went to bed earlier than usual to regain his strength.

2025-03.daily_overview: Thursday is dedicated to online collaboration and high-efficiency output. In the morning, a successful project technical review meeting was conducted with the team, during which Ye Mingxuan's Python simulation demonstration received positive feedback. The afternoon was spent revising the proposal based on the input received. In the evening, work began on creating a PowerPoint presentation for a speech, and enrollment in an advanced Python course was completed, ensuring a seamless continuation of the learning process.

events.name: Online Project Technical Review Meeting
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan conducted a technical review with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, as well as his supervisor Gao Zhiyuan, via the company's video conferencing system. As the main presenter, Ye Mingxuan provided a detailed explanation of the optimization plan for the mechanical structure of the automated production line. He particularly emphasized a demonstration of the simulation script he had written in Python, which successfully quantified the impact of different tolerance zone designs on the final assembly success rate. The presentation was clear and logically rigorous, earning technical approval from Zhou Tao and Li Xiang. Gao Zhiyuan also offered several valuable guiding suggestions.

events.name: Meeting Minutes and Task Allocation
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan promptly compiled the meeting minutes, listing the design points that required modifications (such as tightening the tolerance of a certain connector) and the additional simulation analysis tasks needed (such as stress verification under vibration conditions). He distributed the minutes to the work group and confirmed the respective responsibilities with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang.

events.name: Revise the design plan and script
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan revised the mechanical design drawings based on the review comments and simultaneously updated the relevant parameters in the Python simulation script. After rerunning the simulation, he obtained improved results. He packaged the updated proposal, preparing to submit it as the final version.

events.name: Creating a PPT for a Technical Exchange Meeting
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan began converting the speech draft into a PowerPoint presentation. He first established the overall framework, outlining sections such as the introduction, problem presentation, analysis process, solutions, and summary with future prospects. He then proceeded to create content slides, inserting key design drawings, problem-solving flowcharts, and on-site photographs of the problematic areas, aiming for a presentation that effectively combined text and visuals.

events.name: Complete registration for the Python advanced course
events.description: During a break from making his PowerPoint presentation, Ye Mingxuan logged into the Coursera platform, completed the registration and payment for the course "Advanced Python Data Analysis." The course is set to begin next Monday, and he feels that his existing foundational knowledge of Pandas will serve as a seamless transition.

events.name: Exercise put on hold due to high mental exertion
events.description: Due to the intense mental work throughout the day, Ye Mingxuan temporarily canceled the planned rehabilitation training and opted for rest to regain energy.

The entire day is dedicated to polishing the details of the PPT for the technical exchange meeting, adjusting the layout and animations, and synchronizing it with the script. Meanwhile, Python learning has progressed to the data visualization stage. Although the tasks are concentrated, the mood is relatively relaxed due to tomorrow's gathering and the upcoming weekend.

events.name: Refine the presentation slides
events.description: Ye Mingxuan spent an entire day refining the PPT he had created the day before. He adjusted the color scheme to better align with the steady and professional style of industrial technology, optimized the layout of charts and text to ensure key points were highlighted and easy to grasp, and added simple animations to sections with logical progression to guide the audience's understanding. He repeatedly cross-referenced the speech script to ensure each slide perfectly supported the presentation content, and distilled key speaking prompts for each slide.

events.name: Learning Matplotlib Data Visualization
events.description: In the evening, following his study plan, Ye Mingxuan began learning Python data visualization. Through online tutorials, he learned to use the Matplotlib library to create line charts, scatter plots, and bar charts. He attempted to visualize the summarized sales data generated from his previous Pandas exercises with these charts and adjusted styles such as line thickness, colors, and legend positions.

events.name: Preparing for the Next Day's Gathering and Purchasing Timber
events.description: During the break, Ye Mingxuan sent a message to Zhao Xiaofeng to confirm that everyone would arrive on time for tomorrow's gathering. At the same time, he went online to check the best route to the building materials market for purchasing wood for a phone stand tomorrow afternoon.

events.name: Received the electronic version of the physical examination report.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan received a notification on his phone that the electronic reports for most of his physical examination items were now available for online viewing. He quickly skimmed through them and found that key indicators such as liver and kidney function, blood lipids, and blood glucose were all within the normal range. The lumbar spine X-ray report indicated "physiological curvature present, no significant abnormalities observed," which gave him considerable peace of mind. The detailed paper reports and doctor's interpretation would need to be collected at a later time.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision for a weekend getaway.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan contacted his road trip companion Wu Bin, and they tentatively planned a short-distance self-driving tour around the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region next weekend to unwind and indulge in their travel hobby.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A sense of ease from being well-prepared, the presentation is nearly complete, looking forward to tomorrow's gathering and shopping, the joy of the eve of the weekend.

2025-03.daily_overview: A vibrant and fulfilling weekend. In the morning, I engaged in swimming exercises to reinforce healthy habits, followed by a final simulation rehearsal before a speech. In the afternoon, I visited a building materials market to purchase woodworking supplies, preparing materials for a hands-on project. In the evening, I successfully organized and participated in a university classmates' gathering, actively enlivening the atmosphere as one of the hosts and deepening the bonds of friendship.

events.name: Morning swimming exercise
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan went to the indoor swimming pool at Lamei Fitness Center for his weekly fixed swimming session. He alternated between breaststroke and freestyle for 40 minutes, focusing on proper technique and feeling the soothing effect of the water on his lower back. This further consolidated his rehabilitation progress and enhanced his aerobic endurance.

events.name: Speech Simulation Drill and Final Inspection
events.description: After swimming, Ye Mingxuan conducted a complete speech simulation exercise in his study. He set up his phone to record a video, timed his speech while presenting with the PowerPoint slides, and checked his speaking pace, rhythm, and body language. After the exercise, he reviewed the recording and adjusted a few expressions. Finally, he went through the script once more and checked the PowerPoint slides page by page to ensure there were no technical errors or ambiguous statements.

events.name: Procurement of Materials for Woodworking Projects
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan drove to a building materials market in Xiqing District. Following Master Qian's advice and his own checklist, he carefully selected two pieces of beautiful walnut and dark walnut wood scraps, along with sandpaper of various grits, environmentally friendly wood glue, and a small bottle of wood wax oil, gathering all the materials needed to make a phone stand.

events.name: Reserve the party venue in advance
events.description: In the evening, as the organizer, Ye Mingxuan arrived at the reserved private kitchen restaurant half an hour early. He reconfirmed the private room, the pre-ordered dishes, and beverages with the waiter. He also arranged the seating briefly, reserving the favorable window-side seats for several classmates he hadn’t seen in a long time.

events.name: Successfully held a university class reunion
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan, Zhao Xiaofeng, and five other university classmates who work and live in Tianjin arrived one after another. As one of the initiators, Ye Mingxuan took the initiative to engage everyone during the gathering, skillfully steering the conversation from reminiscing about campus anecdotes (such as working together to complete graduation projects) to discussing recent updates (work and family). This successfully prevented the gathering from devolving into a mere venting session about work, creating a warm and lively atmosphere instead. Everyone agreed to meet more often in the future.

events.name: Post-Gathering Debrief with Zhao Xiaofeng
events.description: After the gathering, Ye Mingxuan and Zhao Xiaofeng walked to the parking lot together. Both felt the event was quite successful and discussed the possibility of organizing another one in the second half of the year, perhaps trying new formats like outdoor barbecues.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Anticipatory with slight nervousness (towards the drill and gathering), subsequently shifting to keen enthusiasm for the gathering and procurement.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful and content, with social energy replenished. The sense of achievement from organizing activities is strong, and there is increased confidence in the upcoming speech next week. Overall health status is good.

2025-03.daily_overview: This was a typical spring weekend in Tianjin, where Ye Mingxuan sought to balance family interaction with personal study. In the morning, he carried forward the lingering warmth from yesterday's gathering with his university classmates, transitioning from a passive participant to an active maintainer of those relationships. In the afternoon, he collaborated with his father, Ye Jianguo, to repair an old radio that carried family memories. This technical collaboration elevated their father-son relationship beyond daily care, transforming them into 'comrades-in-arms' fighting side by side. In the evening, he immersed himself in learning Python, building up his knowledge reserves to apply these skills to work-related data analysis.

events.name: Morning Outdoor Walk
events.description: Following the rehabilitation plan, Ye Mingxuan took a 20-minute walk in the community park at a moderate pace, monitored changes in heart rate, and felt uplifted by the outdoor activity.

events.name: Reviewing the Class Reunion and Establishing New Roles
events.description: The day after the gathering, Ye Mingxuan briefly reviewed the previous night's event with the organizer Zhao Xiaofeng on WeChat after getting up. The feedback was generally positive, and everyone agreed in the class group chat to take turns hosting regular gatherings in the future. Ye Mingxuan responded enthusiastically in the group and proactively offered to help book a venue for the next event. This shift from being a mere "participant" to an "active maintainer" made him feel a stronger sense of control and responsibility over his local social network.

events.name: Commence the study of the Python Data Analysis course (Pandas module)
events.description: After breakfast, Ye Mingxuan opened the Coursera platform in his home study and began systematically learning the Python data analysis course. He watched the first module video on Pandas data processing, focusing on the basic operations of DataFrame, such as creation, indexing, slicing, and preliminary data cleaning methods (such as handling missing values). While watching the video, he followed along by typing code and doing exercises in Jupyter Notebook. This is a typical learning pattern for the ISTJ personality type—learning through practice to deepen understanding.

events.name: Collaborating with my father to diagnose the malfunction of the radio.
events.description: On a weekend afternoon, the sunlight was just right. Ye Mingxuan saw his father, Ye Jianguo, frowning over an old transistor radio that could only emit a crackling static noise. Driven by his instincts as a mechanical engineer and a desire to help his father, he offered to inspect and repair it together. The father and son moved the radio to the well-lit dining table in the living room with tacit understanding. Ye Jianguo began disassembling the outer casing and, as he had once done when mentoring apprentices at the factory, explained the internal structure and working principles of this vintage radio to Ye Mingxuan. Meanwhile, Ye Mingxuan fetched his toolbox, which he usually used for repairing electronic devices, and prepared for the "surgery" by taking out tools such as a multimeter, magnifying glass, and soldering iron.

events.name: Circuit Troubleshooting and Fault Localization
events.description: With the assistance of his father Ye Jianguo, Ye Mingxuan used a multimeter to meticulously inspect each resistor, capacitor, transistor, and soldering point on the circuit board, following the sequence from the power supply to the signal output. Holding his breath and focusing intently, his ISTJ traits of meticulousness were fully displayed at this moment. His father occasionally pointed out potential key test points nearby. After approximately an hour of patient troubleshooting, he finally identified the issue by measuring the charging and discharging characteristics of a capacitor. It was determined that a key capacitor in the tuning circuit had failed due to aging over time, preventing the signal from passing through normally.

events.name: Component Replacement and Solder Repair
events.description: After locating the fault, Ye Mingxuan retrieved a new capacitor of matching specifications from his spare parts box. Under the on-site guidance of his father, Ye Jianguo, he carefully heated the solder joints of the old capacitor with a soldering iron, used a desoldering pump to clear the solder, removed the old capacitor, then bent the leads of the new capacitor into shape, precisely inserted them into the circuit board holes, and proceeded with re-soldering. Throughout the process, his movements were steady and meticulous, as he was deeply concerned that any mistake on his part might damage this aged circuit board. Standing nearby, Ye Jianguo gave a slight nod of approval, his eyes reflecting a sense of commendation.

events.name: Assembly Testing and Repair Successfully Completed
events.description: After replacing the capacitor, the father and son reassembled the radio's casing. The moment they turned on the power and rotated the tuning knob, clear opera broadcasts flowed out, with all static completely gone. The repair was a success! Both father and son simultaneously broke into satisfied smiles. As they listened to the radio playing "The Empty Fort Strategy," they exchanged technical details and insights from the repair process, such as how to judge the condition of a capacitor and how to control soldering temperature. Finally, the two put the tools back in their places and tidied up the desk neatly.

events.name: Evening Python Study and Consolidation
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan continued his studies in the study. He revisited the Pandas tutorial videos he had watched in the afternoon and attempted to independently complete several small exercises provided in the course to reinforce his understanding of DataFrame indexing and basic data cleaning operations. During a break in his studies, he recalled the process of repairing the radio with his father during the day, reflecting that the sense of accomplishment from solving problems hands-on—whether fixing a machine or writing code—is fundamentally similar.

events.name: Plan next week's work and study
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan checked his work calendar for the next week and his Python study plan. He noticed that a technical trial presentation within the company was scheduled for Tuesday, and he needed to start processing equipment failure data on Wednesday. Therefore, he decided to do some preparatory work in advance the next day. He briefly outlined the key points in his phone's memo app, which was his consistent approach to ensuring tasks were handled in an orderly manner.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of weekend relaxation.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and satisfying, it encompasses both the warmth of family interaction and the sense of solidity that comes with learning and growth.

2025-03.daily_overview: The new week began amidst the continuous spring rain. Ye Mingxuan returned to the rhythm of regular workdays. His morning rehabilitation training entered a new phase with heightened challenges. His work focus shifted to a practical automated production line data analysis project, requiring him to apply the Python skills he was currently learning. After work, he actively implemented his coach's suggestions by scouting locations and purchasing equipment for the upcoming swimming exercises, demonstrating his strong execution skills and meticulous planning.

events.name: Compound movements are introduced into rehabilitation training.
events.description: Before work in the morning, Ye Mingxuan arrived at Leme Fitness Center on time. As he entered the mid-phase of rehabilitation training, Coach Wang Jian began introducing more complex compound movements, such as standing overhead presses with resistance bands and single-leg deadlifts. These exercises simulate daily activities and place higher demands on core stability and overall body coordination. Wang Jian continued to emphasize prioritizing movement quality over load. Although Ye Mingxuan found it challenging, he could clearly feel the activation and control in his core region improving, which filled him with confidence in his recovery.

events.name: Launch the Work Data Analysis Project
events.description: Upon arriving at the company, Ye Mingxuan exported the historical fault data of automated production line equipment from the past two years from the internal operations and maintenance system. He conducted a preliminary review of the data fields, which included equipment numbers, fault occurrence times, fault phenomena, maintenance measures, and downtime duration. He clarified the objective of this analysis: to use Python for data cleaning and visualization, identify high-frequency fault equipment, periodic patterns of fault occurrences, and primary causes, aiming to provide data support for the preventive maintenance plans of the equipment maintenance department (such as the department where his colleague Li Xiang works).

events.name: Lunch Exchange and Technical Discussion
events.description: At noon in the company cafeteria, Ye Mingxuan sat down for lunch with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang. He mentioned the ongoing fault data analysis project, which Li Xiang showed great interest in and offered to provide some business background knowledge. Zhou Tao jokingly said that they should treat everyone once the analysis results were out. The three also briefly discussed the competitive variety shows they had each watched the night before, which was a regular topic for them to unwind.

events.name: Inspection of Indoor Swimming Facilities
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan did not go directly home. He used a map app and local lifestyle forums to search for indoor heated swimming pools near his home (Zhongbei Town, Xiqing District). He selected a venue with favorable reviews and a moderate distance for an on-site inspection. He inquired in detail about the pool's opening hours, water quality test reports (with a focus on residual chlorine and pH levels), peak hours on weekdays and weekends, as well as the prices for single visits and membership cards. After comparison, he preliminarily identified this location as his venue for swimming exercise.

events.name: Procurement of Swimming Equipment
events.description: After inspecting the pool, Ye Mingxuan made a detour to a large sporting goods store. Based on his physique, he carefully selected a suitable swimsuit, anti-fog swimming goggles, and a silicone swim cap. While shopping, he deliberately compared the sealing performance and field of view of several goggles, reflecting an engineer's attention to product details. Purchasing the necessary equipment was a rigorous material preparation for his first swimming workout.

events.name: Prepare Technical Trial Lecture Materials
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan spent some time preparing the technical presentation he would give to his colleagues the next day. He reviewed the logical flow of the PPT and rehearsed explanations for several key technical challenges. He hoped that feedback from his colleagues would help make his speech at the upcoming industry conference the day after even more polished.

events.name: New: Temporary overtime to handle urgent emails
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan received an email from the company requiring him to urgently handle a technical inquiry from a client, which kept him up late and left him feeling somewhat stressed.

起始状态.心情: Focus, switch to work mode.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Methodical yet slightly weary, looking forward to the newly started exercise program.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today is the technical preparation day. Ye Mingxuan's core task is to optimize his speech for tomorrow's industry conference and gather feedback through internal rehearsals. Meanwhile, the work data analysis project has entered the substantive data processing phase, and he has begun using Python for data cleaning and preliminary visualization exploration. Balancing theory with practice, this is a typical day for him in enhancing his professional capabilities.

events.name: Internal Trial Lectures and Feedback Collection
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan invited his close colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang to serve as a mock audience for an internal trial presentation in a small conference room at the company. He delivered a complete rehearsal of his speech for the upcoming Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Intelligent Manufacturing Technology Exchange Conference scheduled for the next day. From the perspective of audience comprehension, Zhou Tao suggested adding more relatable analogies at several technical transition points. Li Xiang, on the other hand, raised a detailed question regarding the rigor of the data. Ye Mingxuan carefully noted the feedback and spent the afternoon working hours making final revisions and optimizations to the PPT content and presentation pacing, feeling more confident as a result.

events.name: Cleaning Fault Data Using Pandas
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan immersed himself in the data analysis project. He opened Jupyter Notebook and used the Pandas library to clean the exported fault data: he handled missing values in a few records, removed obviously invalid test records, and converted the 'fault time' field from string format to a standard datetime format, facilitating subsequent analysis based on the time dimension. Although the cleaning process was tedious, his ISTJ personality enabled him to complete each step with patience and meticulousness.

events.name: Preliminary Visual Exploration of Periodic Patterns
events.description: After completing the data cleaning, Ye Mingxuan began writing the analysis code. He first grouped and counted the number of fault occurrences by equipment type and month. Then, using the Matplotlib and Seaborn libraries, he plotted a comparative line chart of the monthly fault frequencies for different equipment types. From the chart, it could be preliminarily observed that a certain model of conveyor belt equipment showed a significant increase in fault rates during the summer months, which provided direction for his subsequent analysis.

events.name: Online Communication with Carpenters
events.description: Before leaving work, Ye Mingxuan contacted carpenter Qian Jianguo via WeChat. He informed Master Qian that he had recovered well and was ready to resume his woodworking practice. He also scheduled a meeting for the following week, hoping to seek advice on a beginner-friendly small project (such as a phone stand or a tool box). Master Qian quickly replied, expressing his welcome and agreeing to first send him some simple blueprints for reference.

events.name: Evening Python Learning (Seaborn Advanced)
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan continued studying the visualization modules in his Python course. He focused on learning the Seaborn library, watching tutorial videos to understand how to create more aesthetically pleasing and informative statistical charts, such as box plots (for displaying data distribution), heatmaps (for showing correlations), and violin plots (which combine box plots and density plots). As he studied, he thought that these charts might be useful for tomorrow's presentation materials or the current work analysis report.

events.name: Check Meeting Itinerary and Items
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan double-checked the travel route to the Meijiang Convention and Exhibition Center, the registration time, and the meeting agenda for the next day. He copied the final version of the PowerPoint presentation for his speech onto both a USB drive and his laptop, and prepared his business cards and notebook. With everything ready, he felt both nervous and excited about the challenges awaiting him the next day.

events.name: Added: Stayed up late preparing for a speech
events.description: To ensure everything went perfectly, Ye Mingxuan stayed up late, repeatedly rehearsing his speech, which caused him to delay his sleep.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly pressured, primarily due to the importance placed on tomorrow's speech.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Calmness after thorough preparation, with cautious optimism for tomorrow's meeting.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today, Ye Mingxuan completed his annual physical examination, establishing a new data benchmark for his health. Meanwhile, the work data analysis project continues to advance, with him delving from macro-level patterns into specific cause analysis. Despite having an important meeting tomorrow, he still insists on evening study, reflecting his habit of continuous learning.

events.name: Receive and Interpret the Medical Examination Report
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan went to the hospital where he had completed his physical examination the previous week to collect the paper-based medical report. Sitting in the hospital lobby, he carefully reviewed the report. The results showed that his lumbar spine imaging findings were favorable, meeting the expectations for recovery. Indicators such as complete blood count, liver function, and kidney function were all within the normal range. However, the low-density lipoprotein cholesterol and triglyceride levels in his lipid profile were close to the upper limit of the normal range, and his fasting blood glucose was also in the higher segment of the normal range. His BMI index was 25.06, still falling within the overweight category. He gained a comprehensive and objective understanding of his physical condition.

events.name: Conduct an in-depth analysis of the root cause of the failure.
events.description: Returning to the company in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan continued his data analysis work. He performed text analysis and classification statistics on the "fault cause" field in the cleaned data, calculating the proportion of various causes such as "component wear," "electrical faults," "program errors," "foreign object jams," and others. Subsequently, he used Python to create a pie chart illustrating the distribution of fault causes, which clearly demonstrated that "component wear" and "poor electrical contact" were the primary factors leading to equipment downtime, accounting for over 60% in total.

events.name: Discussing Physical Examination Results with Mother
events.description: Returning home from work, Ye Mingxuan was asked by his mother, Wang Xiulan, with concern about his physical examination results. Ye Mingxuan told her the truth, emphasizing the need to pay attention to his blood lipids and blood sugar. Upon hearing this, his mother immediately suggested adjusting the dinner menu starting the next day, reducing the frequency of braised pork and preparing more steamed fish and vegetables. Ye Mingxuan felt a warmth in his heart, as family support is always reflected in these subtle details.

events.name: Schedule a follow-up appointment with the family doctor.
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan contacted his family doctor, Liu Wentao, via WeChat. He photographed the key pages of his medical examination report and sent them over, briefly explaining the situation. He scheduled an in-person follow-up appointment for either this Friday or next Monday, hoping to receive professional advice on improving his health. Dr. Liu responded promptly, confirming the successful appointment.

events.name: Evening Programming Study and Consolidation
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan did not become overly anxious about the upcoming speech the next day. Instead, he followed his study plan as scheduled. He engaged in hands-on practice with the Seaborn library he had learned earlier that evening, using a subset of the company's fault data to create box plots and violin plots. This allowed him to gain deeper insights into the distribution differences in fault durations across various devices. Such practical exercises effectively alleviated his nervousness.

events.name: Final rehearsal of the speech
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan once again mentally reviewed the outline of tomorrow's speech and several key technical points. He told himself that, just like solving a technical problem, thorough preparation and clear logic would enable him to handle it with ease.

起始状态.心情: Maintain a calm mindset and focus on the day's tasks and affairs.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Has gained a clear understanding of one's own health and adopted a pragmatic mindset.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today marks both a stage summary day for rehabilitation training and a day of comprehensive awakening in health management awareness. Ye Mingxuan not only reviewed his progress with his coach but also proactively consulted with doctors and trainers to clear obstacles for fully restoring his hobbies and life abilities. Meanwhile, his data analysis project has shown initial results, as he successfully translated the skills he learned into tangible work output. An idea of purchasing insurance for his parents has also begun to take root in his mind, reflecting an enhanced sense of family responsibility.

events.name: Summary of Rehabilitation Training Phase
events.description: After the second training session of the week, Coach Wang Jian did not rush to introduce new content. Instead, he held a brief ten-minute review with Ye Mingxuan. They compared his current state with that at the beginning of the training: back then, Ye Mingxuan had weak core strength and struggled with some basic movements. Now, he can perform multiple sets of compound exercises with proper form, showing significant improvement in posture and a notable reduction in lower back discomfort after prolonged sitting. Wang Jian acknowledged his continuous progress in posture management and core strength development, and outlined that the focus for the latter half of the month would shift toward strength enhancement and endurance improvement.

events.name: Consult on the feasibility of restarting woodworking practice.
events.description: After the training session, Ye Mingxuan proactively consulted Coach Wang Jian about whether his current lower back recovery condition would allow him to resume his hobby of woodworking, which involves prolonged standing, bending, and a certain degree of physical exertion. After evaluation, Wang Jian granted permission and suggested that he start with short sessions and small projects, emphasizing the importance of taking breaks and avoiding continuous bending for more than half an hour. With professional approval, Ye Mingxuan felt more reassured.

events.name: Complete the first draft of the data analysis report
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan began drafting a concise analysis report based on the visual charts and analyses from the previous days. He summarized key findings: for instance, a specific model of conveyor belt on Production Line 3 was identified as a high-frequency failure device, particularly during July and August; 'component wear' was the primary cause of malfunctions. He preliminarily proposed recommendations, such as conducting focused preventive maintenance on this model of conveyor belt before the onset of summer and establishing a replacement schedule for critical components.

events.name: First Swimming Training Experience
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to a pre-inspected indoor swimming pool with his newly purchased gear and engaged in approximately 40 minutes of swimming exercise. He primarily alternated between breaststroke and backstroke, as his freestyle technique was still not quite proficient. The water temperature was comfortable, and the enveloping sensation of the current provided significant relaxation for his lower back. After swimming, he felt refreshed both physically and mentally, and decided to formally incorporate a weekly swimming session into his exercise routine.

events.name: The idea of purchasing insurance for parents emerged.
events.description: After taking a shower in the evening, Ye Mingxuan accompanied his parents in the living room watching the TV news, where he saw a report about the medical burden in an aging society. Reflecting on his own health check-up during the day and his parents' advancing age, an idea occurred to him: although his parents have basic medical insurance, their ability to cope with the risks of serious illnesses is limited. He planned to purchase a commercial supplementary hospitalization insurance for them to enhance the family's risk resilience. He did not mention it immediately but decided to conduct some research first.

events.name: Learn the fundamental concepts of machine learning
events.description: In the study, Ye Mingxuan began a new module of his Python course—Introduction to Machine Learning. He watched an introductory video explaining basic concepts, learned the differences between supervised and unsupervised learning, and practiced the simple implementation process of a linear regression model using the Scikit-learn library. Although he had only scratched the surface, it already allowed him to glimpse the broader possibilities of data analysis.

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday marks the transition from the workweek to the weekend. While efficiently completing his tasks, Ye Mingxuan actively made arrangements for the weekend and his upcoming leisure time. He contacted a carpenter to finalize a hands-on project plan, managed his fixed investment in financial planning, and prepared for his weekly online gaming social activities, maintaining a well-balanced pace of life.

events.name: Share Data Analysis Results
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan shared the preliminary data analysis report and visual charts with his direct supervisor, Engineer Gao Zhiyuan, via the company's internal communication software, and copied Li Xiang, a colleague from the equipment maintenance department. In the message, he briefly explained the analysis conclusions and potential value. Engineer Gao replied to acknowledge receipt and commended his proactive approach in using new technology to address practical issues. Li Xiang sent a message indicating that the report was highly insightful and suggested a detailed discussion next week.

events.name: Confirm the practical project with the carpenter.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan communicated again with carpenter Qian Jianguo via WeChat. Master Qian sent several simple drawings of mortise and tenon structures, such as a small dovetail joint box. Considering his own schedule and available tools, Ye Mingxuan ultimately decided to start by making a phone stand as the first small project to resume his practice. Master Qian suggested that he first prepare the wood (recommending pine or oak) and scheduled to meet at his workshop next Wednesday evening to begin the hands-on work.

events.name: Execute fund fixed investment
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan opened his mobile banking app to check the high-end manufacturing fund he had started investing in at the beginning of the month. The net asset value showed slight fluctuations but remained generally stable. Following his set monthly plan of 500 yuan, he confirmed and executed the scheduled deduction for this month's investment. This was his way of practicing prudent financial management while keeping track of industry trends.

events.name: Planning Weekend Shopping and Travel
events.description: Before leaving work, Ye Mingxuan made a simple plan for the weekend. He needed to go to the building materials market or purchase wood online to make a phone stand; if the weather was good, he also wanted to visit a succulent greenhouse in the suburbs. He marked possible locations on the map app.

events.name: Confirm online game session
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan confirmed the evening gaming schedule with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, as well as his online friend Zheng Kai from Shenzhen, in a WeChat group. He turned on his computer in advance to check for updates for "League of Legends" and tested his headphones and microphone to ensure smooth communication. This was his regular weekly social activity for stress relief.

events.name: Evening Machine Learning Practice (Classification Algorithms)
events.description: There was still some time before the game started, so Ye Mingxuan continued studying machine learning. Following a tutorial, he practiced classification on the classic Iris dataset using the decision tree and K-nearest neighbors (KNN) algorithms from the Scikit-learn library. He experimented with adjusting parameters such as `max_depth` and `n_neighbors`, observed the changes in model accuracy, and gained a preliminary understanding of the significance of parameter tuning.

events.name: Added: Staying up late due to game night
events.description: Playing games with friends until late caused a delayed bedtime, resulting in a relaxed mood but slight fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, the pleasant feeling of the approaching weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, with achievements in work and well-arranged leisure activities.

2025-03.daily_overview: For Ye Mingxuan, today marked a minor milestone in his career. He delivered his first public industry speech at the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Intelligent Manufacturing Technology Exchange Conference, which garnered attention from his peers and successfully represented his initial step toward enhancing his influence in the industry. The nervousness of the speech intertwined with the joy of success, and even in the evening, he did not relax. Instead, he began researching insurance options for his parents, turning his sense of family responsibility into action.

events.name: Arrive at the venue early and prepare accordingly.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan arrived at the Tianjin Meijiang Convention and Exhibition Center more than an hour early. He completed the conference registration, collected the meeting materials, and received his guest pass. Afterward, he located the sub-forum venue where he would be delivering his speech, familiarized himself with the positions of the podium, projector, and presentation remote, and tested the proper playback of his PowerPoint presentation using his own laptop. The thorough preparation alleviated most of his on-site anxiety.

events.name: Successfully delivered a technical presentation at the sub-forum.
events.description: At 2:00 p.m., the sub-forum on Intelligent Manufacturing Technology commenced on schedule. When the host announced his name, Ye Mingxuan took a deep breath and walked steadily onto the stage. Centering on the theme of "On-site Rapid Localization and Resolution of Mechanical Assembly Issues Caused by Tolerance Accumulation," he clearly elaborated on the problem analysis approach, troubleshooting tools, and solutions, drawing from real project cases he had participated in. Although he felt somewhat nervous at the beginning, his delivery became increasingly fluent as he delved into the technical details. He completed his 20-minute presentation on time, receiving applause from the audience.

events.name: Gain peer communication and initial professional connections
events.description: During the tea break following the speech, several engineers from various enterprises and research institutes proactively approached Ye Mingxuan to engage in conversation. Some were interested in a specific testing method he had mentioned, while others sought to delve deeper into similar issues they had encountered. Ye Mingxuan patiently addressed each of their inquiries and exchanged business cards with them. One engineer from an automation company in Beijing also expressed interest in future technical consultations and potential collaboration.

events.name: Report preliminary results to the immediate supervisor
events.description: On his way home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan briefly reported to his direct supervisor, Engineer Gao Zhiyuan, via WeChat that the speech had been completed successfully and mentioned receiving positive feedback from some peers. Engineer Gao replied with "Well done, the effect was good," making him feel that his efforts had been recognized.

events.name: Preliminary Study on Parental Supplementary Medical Insurance
events.description: Returning home in the evening, though somewhat fatigued, Ye Mingxuan felt mentally invigorated. Instead of resting immediately, he opened his phone and computer to begin preliminary research on purchasing supplementary medical insurance for his parents. Through several mainstream insurance platform apps and websites, he explored inpatient medical insurance products available on the market for the elderly, focusing on coverage (including whether non-social-insurance-directory medications were covered), premiums, maximum age limits for enrollment, and health declaration requirements. He initially shortlisted two to three products that appeared to offer good value for money as potential options.

events.name: Seek professional advice from a financial advisor.
events.description: After conducting preliminary research, Ye Mingxuan contacted his financial advisor Zhang Wei via WeChat to schedule a telephone consultation over the weekend or the following week. He briefly explained to Zhang Wei his need to arrange medical insurance for his parents and sent over the names of several products he had shortlisted. He asked Zhang Wei to analyze their pros and cons from a professional perspective and to see if there were any better recommendations. Zhang Wei readily agreed.

events.name: New: Dinner gathering with friends
events.description: After the speech, Ye Mingxuan had a celebratory dinner with several colleagues, enjoying a sumptuous meal which resulted in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Tension and anticipation intertwined, focusing on meeting preparations.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Proud, excited, and slightly fatigued, with a strong sense of professional accomplishment.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for rest and 'warming up' for hobbies. Ye Mingxuan handled the follow-up from yesterday's meeting and organized the takeaways. Then, he dedicated his main efforts to preparing for the revival of his woodworking hobby—from maintaining dust-covered tools to studying blueprints, every step was carried out meticulously, fully reflecting the rigor and planning characteristic of an ISTJ. Learning also proceeded in an orderly manner.

events.name: Morning Outdoor Brisk Walking
events.description: As the weather warmed up, Ye Mingxuan engaged in a 30-minute outdoor brisk walk, maintaining a fast pace to achieve moderate-intensity aerobic effects, and felt joyful.

events.name: Organize Meeting Materials and Review Gains
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan organized the materials he brought back from yesterday's exchange session and the business cards he received. He created a new folder on his computer to store the meeting PPTs and photos, and entered the contact information from the business cards into his address book, adding brief notes about the conversations. He reviewed the entire presentation and exchange process, jotting down a few points of success and areas for improvement in his notebook: for instance, the opening could have been more engaging, but the solid technical content was well-received. At the same time, he also summarized the new technological developments he had heard about from several peer companies, feeling that they were worth following up on.

events.name: Maintaining Dust-Sealed Woodworking Tools
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan retrieved the woodworking toolbox that had been gathering dust for months from the storage room. In a well-lit corner, he patiently maintained tools such as the saw, plane, chisel, and hammer, treating them like precision instruments: wiping away dust and surface rust with a dry cloth, applying anti-rust oil to metal parts, and checking the sharpness of the plane blade and chisel edges, performing simple sharpening with a whetstone. The process was slow and focused, as if reconnecting with old friends.

events.name: Study Drawings and Safety Specifications
events.description: While maintaining his tools, Ye Mingxuan opened the mobile phone stand blueprint sent by Master Qian and studied it carefully. He cross-referenced the tools to understand which tool and method corresponded to each processing step. He also specifically searched for safety precautions in woodworking operations, reviewing how to properly hold tools and how to prevent wood chips from splashing. Safety was his foremost principle when resuming any hands-on hobby.

events.name: Develop the woodworking practice plan for next week
events.description: After completing tool maintenance and study, Ye Mingxuan formulated a detailed practical plan for the following week: order the pine boards specified in the drawings online on Monday or Tuesday; visit Master Qian on Wednesday evening to learn basic operations of material cutting and tenoning; attempt to independently complete assembly and sanding over the weekend. He recorded the plan in his phone's reminder app.

events.name: Complete Python course exercises
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan continued his studies at home. Following the course requirements, he completed the post-lesson programming exercises for the Pandas module in Jupyter Notebook. He worked with a simulated sales dataset, practicing operations such as data filtering (identifying specific products), grouping (by region), and aggregation (calculating total sales), thereby reinforcing the knowledge he had acquired.

events.name: Learning the Basics of Matplotlib Visualization
events.description: After completing the Pandas exercises, he began studying the Matplotlib visualization module. He watched video tutorials and followed code examples to learn how to create line charts to display trends, use bar charts to compare data across different categories, and employ scatter plots to observe the relationship between two variables.

起始状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relax, savoring the afterglow of yesterday's success.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A sense of tranquility and fulfillment, grounded and ready to rekindle one's passion.

2025-03.daily_overview: The new week begins with spring rain. Today marks the final session of this month's rehabilitation training, during which Ye Mingxuan needs to master all the exercises to prepare for independent training in the future. On the work front, he has compiled the final results of the data analysis project and started handling follow-up communications from last week's presentation. Additionally, he has scheduled an appointment for tomorrow's annual health check-up.

events.name: The final formal rehabilitation training session this month.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan conducted his final formal rehabilitation training session with coach Wang Jian for March at the gym. This session resembled a comprehensive review and assessment, during which Wang Jian guided him through a complete run-through of the core activation, stability training, and compound movements he had learned over the past month. The focus was on correcting the details when performing these exercises independently, ensuring each movement was executed in a standard and safe manner. Wang Jian noted that his recovery had exceeded expectations and that he could transition into a regular training phase focused on maintenance and strengthening starting next month.

events.name: Organize and deliver the outcomes of the data analysis project
events.description: Upon arriving at the office, Ye Mingxuan conducted a final review of the scripts from the data analysis project completed the previous week, adding comments to key sections to enhance readability. He then packaged the final concise analysis report and visual charts, formally sending them via email to his direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan and Li Xiang from the equipment maintenance department, while copying the project manager Wang Peng. This marked the formal closure of this self-initiated exploratory project.

events.name: Reply to Peer Technical Inquiry
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan received WeChat messages from several colleagues he had met at last week's exchange event. Some sought further technical consultation, while others shared relevant materials. During breaks in his work, he responded to each message with polite and professional replies. For the engineer from Beijing who expressed interest in collaboration, he scheduled a detailed online discussion for later in the week.

events.name: Schedule an annual physical examination for tomorrow.
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan confirmed the appointment with his family doctor, Liu Wentao, via WeChat. Dr. Liu scheduled him for a comprehensive annual physical examination at 8 a.m. tomorrow (Tuesday) at the Zhongbei Town Community Health Service Center in Xiqing District, and reminded him to refrain from eating or drinking after 10 p.m. tonight.

events.name: Online Procurement of Woodworking Materials
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan followed Master Qian's advice and the dimensions from the phone stand blueprint, ordering the required pine boards, wood glue, and sandpapers of various grits on an e-commerce platform. The materials were expected to arrive in two days, just in time for his Wednesday visit to his master for learning.

events.name: Consulting Father on the Maintenance of Antiques
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan discussed with his father, Ye Jianguo, the maintenance of his woodworking tools. Upon hearing this, his father shared some of his own insights on maintaining the precision parts of old machine tools, such as using different oils for different metal materials and ensuring a dry storage environment. Technical exchanges between father and son always occur in such casual moments.

起始状态.心情: Calm and composed, facing the work and tasks of the new week.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet satisfied, having completed the phased task.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today is the Health Baseline Establishment Day. Ye Mingxuan completed a comprehensive annual physical examination, providing a scientific basis for subsequent health management. There is also a double dose of good news from work: due to his outstanding contributions in projects and industry exchange meetings, he received an additional bonus from the company, which is the most direct recognition of his professional value.

events.name: Complete the annual physical examination.
events.description: As scheduled, Ye Mingxuan went to the Xiqing District Zhongbei Town Community Health Service Center on a weekday morning on an empty stomach. Over the course of nearly three hours, he completed a full set of physical examinations, including blood tests, lipid and glucose tests, liver and kidney function tests, uric acid tests, electrocardiograms, abdominal ultrasounds, chest X-rays, and specialized examinations for the lumbar spine. He remained unfazed during the blood draw and cooperated with the doctor’s instructions during the ultrasound, making the entire process efficient and orderly. After the examination, he ate the breakfast he had brought with him at the hospital entrance.

events.name: Handling Work Emails and Contacting Colleagues
events.description: It was nearly noon by the time he returned to the office. He checked his work emails and WeChat messages, methodically handling several urgent tasks. Meanwhile, he continued responding to messages from colleagues he had met at last week's conference, confirmed the time for tomorrow evening's video call with the engineer from Beijing, and began preparing the materials for the discussion.

events.name: Management Meeting Review and Bonus Determination
events.description: In the afternoon, the company management held a project review meeting. Project Manager Wang Peng reported on the project addressing the technical issues at the Langfang production line, which was led by Ye Mingxuan, and specifically highlighted his successful presentation at the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei Intelligent Manufacturing Technology Exchange Conference, noting that it enhanced the company's technical image. His direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, supplemented with details on Ye Mingxuan's recent technical contributions and professional growth. The attending leaders unanimously recognized his outstanding contributions and decided to award him an additional quarterly project bonus as an encouragement.

events.name: Communicating with the financial manager regarding insurance matters
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan received a phone call from his financial manager, Zhang Wei. Zhang Wei provided a professional analysis of several medical insurance products for parents that he had screened, highlighting the advantages of one particular product in terms of renewal conditions and reimbursement ratios, while also reminding him to pay attention to the health declaration clauses. Based on Ye Mingxuan's family financial situation, Zhang Wei also offered a reasonable range of suggestions for the total annual premium expenditure. This communication provided Ye Mingxuan with a more solid basis for his decision-making.

events.name: Sharing Good News with Parents
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan casually mentioned to his parents that the company had recently completed a project successfully and there might be a bonus. His mother, Wang Xiulan, was delighted to hear this and said, "My son is truly capable." His father, Ye Jianguo, nodded in agreement and remarked, "Your solid work is noticed by the leadership." Although he did not make a big deal out of it, the family's recognition warmed his heart.

events.name: New addition: Early bedtime due to fatigue from medical examination.
events.description: Feeling fatigued after the medical checkup, Ye Mingxuan went to bed early to restore his energy.

起始状态.心情: Slight discomfort due to an empty stomach, but with a calm state of mind.

2025-03.daily_overview: Wednesday was a fulfilling and productive workday. Ye Mingxuan engaged in in-depth technical discussions with potential partners, expanding his professional network. He maintained his swimming routine, feeling positive changes in his physical condition. In the evening, he formally proposed the plan to purchase supplementary medical insurance to his parents and received their support, transforming the sense of family responsibility from an idea into concrete action.

events.name: In-depth technical exchanges with Beijing counterparts
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan made thorough preparations for the evening video conference. At 8 p.m., he held the online video meeting on time with the engineer from an automation company in Beijing. The meeting lasted for over an hour, during which Ye Mingxuan provided detailed answers to the other party's questions regarding tolerance accumulation solutions and presented more project details. The other party also shared some similar cases they had encountered. Both sides discussed the potential for applying the technical solutions in more scenarios, as well as possible future collaboration models, such as technical consulting or joint development of specific modules. The exchange was very pleasant, and both parties agreed to stay in touch.

events.name: Second Swimming Training Session
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to the indoor swimming pool again for exercise. This time, he tried to increase the proportion of freestyle practice. Although his breathing technique was still not proficient, he could feel his water skills improving. After swimming continuously for 40 minutes, his waist felt particularly relaxed, and his muscles throughout his body were also eased. He became even more convinced that incorporating swimming into his regular exercise routine was the right choice.

events.name: Formally propose an insurance plan to parents
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan sat down with his parents, Ye Jianguo and Wang Xiulan, in the living room. He brewed a pot of tea and formally proposed the plan to purchase supplementary medical insurance for them. He explained the findings of his research: this insurance primarily supplements the remaining large hospitalization expenses after social insurance reimbursement, effectively guarding against the risks of major illnesses. He made it clear that he would cover the premiums himself, as an expression of his affection and responsibility as their child. After listening, his father pondered for a moment and nodded in agreement; his mother, somewhat moved, took his hand and said he had grown up. In the end, his parents understood and supported his decision.

events.name: Report External Contact Progress to Direct Supervisor
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan summarized the key points from his exchanges with colleagues in Beijing that day, along with other recent feedback, and provided an oral report to his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, via WeChat. He outlined potential collaboration opportunities and sought Gao's opinion. Gao responded by advising him to maintain professional contact and, when possible, recommend the collaborators to the company, as it would benefit both the individual and the organization.

events.name: Notification of Bonus Distribution
events.description: While checking the company's internal app before bed, Ye Mingxuan noticed that the Human Resources Department had issued a notification regarding the process for distributing quarterly project bonuses. Although no specific list was provided, he knew in his heart that his share should be included.

events.name: Slight increase in dinner portions leads to weight rebound.
events.description: After the technical exchange, I felt relaxed and ate a bit more during dinner, which led to a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Focus, preparing for the important communication tonight.

结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement coexists with a sense of responsibility, technical exchanges proceed smoothly, and family plans receive support.

2025-03.daily_overview: Today, Ye Mingxuan's work focused on consolidating newly established professional connections and formulating follow-up maintenance plans. Concurrently, he actively planned a weekend leisure activity—a self-driving trip to visit a succulent greenhouse. This outing not only caters to his horticultural interests but also serves as a short getaway for relaxation. Additionally, the materials required for his woodworking practice have now been prepared.

events.name: Develop a Professional Contact Maintenance Plan
events.description: In the morning, based on his conversation and suggestions from Engineer Gao the previous day, Ye Mingxuan formulated a simple follow-up plan after careful consideration. The plan includes: regularly (quarterly) sharing valuable industry technical articles or information with several newly acquainted peers via WeChat; inviting them to participate in company open days or technical launch events if available; and moderately sharing his own new technical achievements when appropriate. He decided to maintain these connections in a natural, value-providing manner rather than through rigid sales pitches.

events.name: Inspection of Woodworking Materials upon Arrival
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan received the woodworking boards and sandpaper he had ordered online a few days earlier. He unpacked the package and inspected the items: the pine boards were smooth and free of cracks, with dimensions meeting the requirements, and the sandpaper came in a complete range of grits. He temporarily placed the materials in a well-ventilated area on the balcony, planning to carry out preliminary processing on Saturday or Sunday to prepare for his apprenticeship with Master Qian.

events.name: Planning a Weekend Visit to a Succulent Greenhouse
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan searched online for well-reviewed succulent greenhouses or cultivation bases near Xiqing District. He compared the locations, variety richness, and user reviews of several options, ultimately selecting a greenhouse located in the outskirts of Xiqing, known for its comprehensive selection and professional owner, as his destination. Using a mapping app, he planned a self-driving route, which would take about 40 minutes one way. He also checked the weekend weather forecast and confirmed that Saturday would be sunny, making it suitable for the trip.

events.name: Confirm Friday Game Night
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan confirmed the gaming time for tomorrow evening with Zhou Tao, Li Xiang, and Zheng Kai from Shenzhen in the WeChat group. Everyone agreed to log in promptly at 8:30 p.m. and start with two rounds of ranked matches to unwind. This is their unwavering weekly "online team-building" activity.

events.name: Contact the carpenter to confirm the teaching schedule.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan sent a WeChat message to Master Qian Jianguo, informing him that the materials were ready and reconfirming the appointment to visit his workshop this Saturday or Sunday evening to learn about material cutting and tenoning. Master Qian replied that Sunday evening would be more convenient, so they settled on the Sunday appointment.

events.name: Learning Decision Trees and KNN Algorithms
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan continued his study of machine learning. He delved into practical applications of the decision tree and K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) algorithms, this time not only using the Iris dataset but also practicing with a customer classification dataset provided in the course. He adjusted the depth of the decision tree and the number of neighbors in KNN, observing changes in the model's accuracy on the test set, which gave him a more intuitive understanding of "overfitting" and "underfitting."

2025-03.daily_overview: Friday was a day of both reward and relaxation. In the morning, Ye Mingxuan received the project bonus issued by the company, which served as direct recognition of his professional competence. He rationally planned the use of the bonus, reflecting his pragmatic approach to consumption. The online gaming night in the evening served as a regular social and stress-relief activity with colleagues and online friends, effectively alleviating the fatigue accumulated over the week's work.

events.name: Received quarterly project bonus
events.description: Around ten o'clock in the morning, Ye Mingxuan received a bank deposit notification on his phone, indicating that a post-tax bonus of 8,000 yuan had been credited to his account. He immediately opened his mobile banking app to confirm and saw the increased balance, which filled him with a genuine sense of accomplishment and the gratifying feeling of being recognized. This bonus served as the best reward for his efforts over the past few months in both project work and external communications.

events.name: Plan the Use of Bonus Funds
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan carefully considered how to use the bonus. As an ISTJ, he was accustomed to rational planning. He decided to divide it into two parts: one portion of 3,000 yuan would serve as a reward for himself, which could be used to purchase a long-desired precision woodworking plane from a certain brand or to buy some equipment for his planned self-driving trip around Qinghai Lake; the other portion of 5,000 yuan would be transferred into his dedicated savings account for future home purchase, allowing the "home purchase fund" to take another solid step forward.

events.name: Sharing Joy with Family
events.description: After returning home from work, during dinner, Ye Mingxuan shared the good news of receiving a bonus with his parents, Ye Jianguo and Wang Xiulan. Father Ye Jianguo said, "Good, you earned it with your skills. You deserve it." Mother Wang Xiulan couldn't stop smiling and repeatedly suggested adding an extra dish for the evening. Sharing the joy with the family made the happiness even greater.

events.name: Friday Online Game Night
events.description: At 8:30 p.m., Ye Mingxuan logged into *League of Legends* and the Discord voice channel on time, joining his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, as well as his online friend Zheng Kai from Shenzhen. They played two intense and competitive ranked matches, winning one and losing the other. During breaks between games, everyone chatted casually in the voice channel. Zhou Tao vented about a client’s unreasonable demands, Li Xiang shared some newly learned simulation techniques, and Zheng Kai recounted interesting anecdotes from Shenzhen’s tech circle. After the gaming session, everyone was still in high spirits and continued chatting in the voice channel for a while before gradually logging off.

events.name: Confirm the final insurance plan
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan reviewed the electronic terms of the supplementary medical insurance for his parents, which was recommended by financial manager Zhang Wei and also caught his own interest. Considering his parents' age and health condition, he finally made a decision and planned to complete the online insurance application the next day.

events.name: Addition: Game Night Leads to Late Nights
events.description: Playing games late into the night, combined with chatting, resulted in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a faint anticipation for the distribution of bonuses.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Pleasant and relaxing, achieving both material rewards and spiritual enjoyment.
