2025-03.daily_overview: Saturday was the perfect spring day for leisure. Ye Mingxuan drove his private car to a succulent greenhouse in the suburbs, enjoying a relaxing self-drive trip. He successfully "hunted" for two pots of beloved succulents, and his conversation with the greenhouse owner also provided him with new knowledge. After returning home, he promptly completed the online process of purchasing insurance for his parents, putting the family protection plan into practice.

events.name: Self-driving to the Succulent Greenhouse
events.description: Shortly after nine in the morning, Ye Mingxuan drove his own car along the planned route to the succulent greenhouse in the suburbs of Xiqing District. Outside the car window, the colors of spring grew increasingly vibrant, with willow trees sprouting green and peach blossoms beginning to bloom. He rolled down the window, enjoying the gentle spring breeze and the sense of freedom that came with driving—this was his way of unwinding. Approximately 40 minutes later, he arrived at his destination.

events.name: Selecting Succulent Plants and Exchanging Care Experience
events.description: Inside the greenhouse, a dazzling array of succulent plants in various shapes and colors left one's eyes feasting. Ye Mingxuan strolled slowly, carefully admiring the displays. He eventually selected two pots of exceptionally fine 'Peach Egg' succulents (with plump, rounded leaves in a pink hue) and a pair of peculiarly shaped 'Lithops'. While checking out, he struck up a conversation with the enthusiastic greenhouse owner, seeking advice on spring care, particularly regarding watering and light requirements. The greenhouse owner, highly knowledgeable, shared experience-based tips on judging watering needs according to weather and soil conditions, as well as the varying light requirements among different varieties. Ye Mingxuan listened with great interest, jotting down the key points in his phone's memo app.

events.name: Safely Retrieve the New 'Partner'
events.description: After completing the purchase, Ye Mingxuan carefully wrapped the two potted succulent plants in soft paper and placed them securely in the car to avoid jostling during the journey. He then drove home, feeling joyful along the way as if he had brought back a gift of spring.

events.name: Placing Newly Purchased Succulent Plants
events.description: Upon returning home, Ye Mingxuan promptly moved the two newly purchased succulent plants to the balcony. Following the nursery owner’s advice, he placed the 'Pachyphytum oviferum' in a spot with ample indirect light while avoiding the harsh afternoon sun, and positioned the 'Lithops' in a location with more abundant sunlight. He carefully cleaned the dust off their leaves and gave them a thorough watering. The collection in his balcony garden had grown once again.

events.name: Complete parents' insurance enrollment online
events.description: In the afternoon, after integrating Zhang Wei's suggestions, his own research, and his parents' health conditions, Ye Mingxuan ultimately selected a supplementary hospitalization medical insurance product with favorable renewal conditions and a high reimbursement ratio. Through the insurance company's official WeChat platform, he completed the online application forms for his father, Ye Jianguo, and his mother, Wang Xiulan. He carefully read and confirmed the health declarations, finalized the underwriting and payment processes for both policies, with an annual premium totaling approximately 4,000 yuan. At the moment the policies were successfully issued, he felt the weight of his family responsibilities become more tangible.

events.name: Review this month's learning and prepare for course completion
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan reviewed the knowledge points of Python data analysis and machine learning he had studied this month and organized his study notes. He checked the progress of his Coursera course and found that only one final small project remained. He decided to spend time completing it tomorrow, aiming to obtain the certificate of completion within this month.

起始状态.心情: Feeling lighthearted and looking forward to weekend outdoor activities.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Contentment arises both from the joy of being close to nature and the sense of fulfillment in completing important family matters.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the last Sunday of March, Ye Mingxuan spent his day focusing on personal growth and family financial management. He successfully completed an advanced Python course and obtained a certificate, marking the achievement of his learning goal for the month. As planned, he transferred a portion of his bonus into his home purchase savings account and researched specific items to reward himself. In the evening, he handled follow-up insurance matters and monitored his regular fund investments, maintaining an orderly and well-organized life.

events.name: Complete the Python course final project and obtain the certificate.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan focused on completing the final small project for his Coursera course. He attempted to analyze a set of simulated equipment operation data provided by the course using the knowledge of Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn he had acquired this month, and built a simple fault prediction model based on logistic regression. He wrote a brief project report and submitted the code. A few hours later, he received an email with his course completion certificate, and a sense of accomplishment welled up within him.

events.name: Sharing the Harvest of the Succulent Journey
events.description: After lunch, Ye Mingxuan organized the photos he had taken the day before at the succulent greenhouse. He selected several close-ups of 'Graptopetalum amethystinum' and 'Lithops,' paired them with brief descriptions and the care techniques he had learned, and shared them on a local gardening forum he frequently visited. Soon, fellow gardening enthusiasts liked and commented on his post. This online interaction based on shared interests brought him a sense of joy.

events.name: Executive Bonus Savings Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan used his mobile banking app to transfer 5,000 yuan from his salary card to his dedicated home purchase savings account. Watching the balance in that account increase once again, he felt a step closer to his goal of "buying a home within five years." Next, he began browsing online to decide how to spend the 3,000 yuan he had set aside as a reward for himself—he carefully compared the prices and reviews of several professional woodworking planes, looked at outdoor windproof jackets and road trip gear, but had yet to make a final decision.

events.name: Research on Market Dynamics of High-End Manufacturing Funds
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened the China Merchants Bank app in his home study and carefully reviewed the net value trend of the high-end manufacturing fund he had been investing in regularly over the past month, the latest market analysis report released by the fund company, and related macroeconomic news. He noted that the high-end manufacturing sector had experienced some fluctuations recently, but the long-term logic remained unchanged. He made final preparations for the upcoming regular investment scheduled for the next month, which would be executed the following day (Monday).

events.name: Handle the insurance follow-up and inform the parents.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan received an email with the electronic insurance policy from the insurance company. After carefully reading the policy terms and confirming their accuracy, he downloaded and printed out the electronic policy. Carrying the printed policy, he went to the living room and handed it to his parents for safekeeping. He once again explained to them in detail the policy's effective date, specific coverage, deductible, and the basic process for filing a claim if needed. His parents listened attentively, and his father placed the policy in the drawer designated for important family documents.

events.name: Preview tomorrow's woodworking practice.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan once again took out the blueprint for the phone stand and reviewed the key teaching points sent by Master Qian, mentally rehearsing the steps he might learn the next evening, such as material cutting and marking. He prepared the tools he would need to bring the next day (pencil, square ruler, marking gauge), filled with anticipation for the hands-on practice.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and steady, with fruitful learning, sound financial planning, and secure family support.

2025-03.daily_overview: The last day of March is a moment for reflection and looking ahead. Ye Mingxuan independently completed his rehabilitation training, marking that his lumbar issues have been largely resolved and his health management has entered a new phase of self-maintenance. Together with his coach, he reviewed the rehabilitation achievements of the month and formulated a new plan for the upcoming month. Work and financial management are also progressing steadily, bringing a successful conclusion to a March filled with breakthroughs.

events.name: First independent completion of a full rehabilitation training session
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan completed a full rehabilitation training session alone at the gym without on-site guidance from a coach. The session included core activation, stability training, and compound strength exercises. He strictly followed the key points he had learned over the past month, focusing on the sense of control and strength in his body. After the training, he clearly felt no discomfort in his lower back, and the soreness and stiffness from prolonged sitting had largely disappeared. This demonstrated that he had developed the ability to maintain his training independently.

events.name: Monthly Rehabilitation Summary with the Coach
events.description: After the training session, Ye Mingxuan communicated with Coach Wang Jian via WeChat to review the rehabilitation progress throughout March. Both parties confirmed that the lower back pain had essentially disappeared, and that posture and core strength had significantly improved, laying a solid foundation for a full recovery of work capacity and life interests. They expressed satisfaction with the rehabilitation outcomes and preliminarily discussed the key focus of the training plan for transitioning into the 'Maintenance and Strengthening' phase next month, such as increasing load-bearing and introducing more functional training.

events.name: Organizing Work Documents and Project Archiving
events.description: In the afternoon at the company, Ye Mingxuan systematically organized and archived the relevant technical documents, reports, and meeting minutes for several major projects he participated in during March, including the resolution of production line failures in Langfang, data analysis of equipment malfunctions, and presentations at industry conferences. His ISTJ personality makes him accustomed to ensuring that tasks are completed thoroughly and in an orderly manner.

events.name: Consult a financial manager to adjust the fixed investment strategy.
events.description: Before leaving work, Ye Mingxuan had a brief exchange with his financial manager, Zhang Wei, via WeChat. He shared his recent market observations on the high-end manufacturing sector and inquired whether adjustments were needed to his monthly fixed investment amount of 500 yuan or the investment targets, given the current volatile market conditions. Based on the principles of long-term allocation and cost averaging through fixed investments, Zhang Wei advised him to stick to the original plan unless significant changes occurred in the industry's fundamentals. Ye Mingxuan accepted this suggestion.

events.name: Evening Woodworking Practice (Cutting and Marking)
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan arrived at the small workshop in the home of carpenter Qian Jianguo as scheduled, bringing prepared boards and tools. Under Master Qian’s guidance, he learned the first step of woodworking practice: how to accurately mark lines and lay out patterns on wood according to the dimensions on the blueprint, as well as how to use a handsaw for preliminary cutting. Master Qian personally taught him how to hold the saw and how to apply steady force along the marked lines. Although he only made a few simple cuts, the process of transforming the lines on the blueprint into the initial form of a physical object fascinated him greatly. The master and apprentice agreed to continue learning mortise cutting next week.

events.name: Monthly Personal Summary
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan briefly reviewed the month of March. It had been a highly rewarding month: his health had largely recovered, he had delivered his first successful industry speech, received a project bonus, completed a Python course, arranged insurance for his parents, and restarted several hobbies... He felt that his life was steadily transitioning from the cautiousness of the recovery period toward a more proactive and enriched phase. He was filled with anticipation for the upcoming April.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with thoughts of the month-end summary.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and confident, in good health and self-reliant, making progress in multiple objectives, with a clear plan for the future.

events.name: Weekday Project Progress and Technical Deepening
events.description: As the core mechanical engineer of the project, Ye Mingxuan devoted his entire day to the detailed design of the clamping mechanism for the automated production line. In the morning, he optimized the parameters of the pneumatic linkage and discussed the boundary conditions for finite element analysis online with his colleague Li Xiang.

events.description: After returning home from work, Ye Mingxuan received a package containing a smart speaker. He and his father, Ye Jianguo, inspected and unboxed it together. events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan had a WeChat voice call with insurance agent Li Li, logically inquiring about the details of home property insurance, with particular focus on the differences in insurance strategies for the two properties.

events.name: Preliminary Review of Insurance Plan
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan quickly reviewed the electronic version of the insurance proposal, using his phone's memo app to note down key questions for later clarification.

events.name: Family Discussion
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan presented the insurance plan summary to his parents, explaining its necessity in plain language. They discussed the preliminary estimated annual premium and decided to conduct further research before making a final decision.

events.name: Evening Python Course Study
events.description: After handling family affairs, Ye Mingxuan continued studying the "Advanced Python Data Analysis" course, writing code to analyze the periodic patterns of equipment operation time.

2025-04.daily_overview: Throughout the entire day on Saturday, Ye Mingxuan participated as a volunteer in the judging work for the Youth Science and Technology Innovation Competition. From rigorously reviewing projects to interacting with young innovators, he fulfilled his social responsibilities and gained profound inspiration.

Assigned to the Mechanical Engineering and Automation group, he conducted the preliminary review of over twenty written submissions for the competition, applying his professional expertise to evaluate the design principles and innovative aspects.

events.name: Thank you to the fellow collector and arranging for future interactions.

events.name: On-site review and defense in the afternoon
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan engaged in face-to-face communication with the contestants, observed the demonstrations of their works, and was captivated by the enthusiasm and creativity of the middle school students, feeling deeply moved by their passion for technology.

events.name: Spring Adaptation Activities: Window Ventilation and Light Clothing Arrangement

events.name: Slight physical discomfort

He made progress in expanding his personal skills, completing a data analysis course and discovering an open-source robotics project. The efficient workday was accompanied by continuous growth.

events.name: Monthly Performance Review Meeting

Ye Mingxuan expressed interest in collaborative robots, and Senior Engineer Gao promised to keep an eye out for opportunities.

events.description: At home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan browsed GitHub and was drawn to the OpenGripper pneumatic three-finger robotic hand project. After reading the documentation to understand the pneumatic circuit and control framework, he decided to pursue it as an amateur technical interest.

events.name: Follow-up Action Plan for the Interview
events.description: After the interview, Ye Mingxuan organized his electronic notes and formulated an action plan: take on more coordination tasks, learn technical documentation writing, and stay updated on cutting-edge automation technology sharing.

events.name: Follow-up on Smart Speaker Usage
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan asked his father about his experience using the device, adjusted the morning reminder volume and the opera playlist. His father nodded in satisfaction.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Saturday, Ye Mingxuan immersed himself in the joy of hands-on practice: in the morning, he learned to craft traditional dovetail joints, marking his entry into practical woodworking as a hobby; in the afternoon and evening, he enjoyed relaxed social time with friends.

events.name: Go to the woodworking workshop to learn
events.description: At nine in the morning, Ye Mingxuan drove to Master Qian Jianguo's old residence workshop in Yangliuqing Town, where Master Qian explained the structural principles, stress characteristics, and aesthetic value of dovetail joints.

events.name: Dovetail Joinery: Marking and Cutting
events.description: Under Master Qian's guidance, Ye Mingxuan meticulously drew lines on the pine wood, emphasizing that "a tiny error can lead to a great mistake." He then used a handsaw to cut out the initial forms of the tenons and mortises.

events.name: Fine Finishing and Assembly
events.description: Ye Mingxuan meticulously trimmed the tenons and mortises using a chisel and a file, repeatedly test-fitting and marking the high points. After more than two hours of careful adjustment, the wooden pieces were assembled into a sturdy right angle with a seamless fit.

events.name: Master's Comments and Experience Exchange
events.description: Master Qian commented that the work had a solid structure but uneven tenon shoulders, suggesting that the chisel angle should be more upright. During the break, the two drank tea and shared amusing anecdotes about old carpentry jargon. Ye Mingxuan asked for advice on making a small wooden box.

events.name: A Small Gathering at Zhao Xiaofeng and Zhou Tao's Sichuan Restaurant
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan returned from Yangliuqing to the Sichuan restaurant in the city center, where he dined with Zhao Xiaofeng and Zhou Tao. They discussed industry trends, shared work-related grievances, and exchanged insights from review experiences in a relaxed atmosphere filled with substantive content.

events.name: Arcade Racing Game
events.description: After the meal, the three of them went to the arcade to play simulated racing games. Ye Mingxuan executed precise drifting around corners, which sparked teasing and laughter, as if they had returned to their university days.

events.name: Tool Cleanup and Results Sharing
events.description: In the evening after returning home, Ye Mingxuan cleaned and maintained his chisels and saw blades, took photos of his dovetail joint work, and shared them in family and friend group chats. The caption commemorated the first step into the craft, receiving likes and encouragement.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Looking forward with enthusiasm and ready for a day of hands-on learning and gathering with friends.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied and joyful. The sense of accomplishment from hands-on creation intertwines with the relaxation of chatting and playing with close friends.

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for handling personal matters and family interactions: tending to succulents in the morning, conducting a financial review and budget adjustments in the afternoon, and assisting my mother with grocery shopping in the evening. The rhythm of life is well-balanced between activity and rest.

events.name: Repotting Succulent Plants in Spring
events.description: In the gentle morning sunlight, Ye Mingxuan spread out his tools on the balcony and carefully removed the succulent from its old pot to clean the roots. His mother, Wang Xiulan, assisted by filling the new pot with soil and watering the plant. Working in seamless coordination, the mother and son successfully completed the repotting.

events.name: Monthly Financial Review
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan logged into the banking app and bookkeeping software to verify the income and expenditure records for April. He categorized and entered the data to generate a report, finding that the total expenditure slightly exceeded the budget, with the main overspending occurring in the social and entertainment category.

events.name: Budget Analysis and Adjustment
events.description: Ye Mingxuan reviewed the overspending and deemed it reasonable and necessary. However, considering the procurement plan for May, he decided to reduce the entertainment and dining budget for the following month and transfer the surplus to the emergency reserve fund account.

events.name: Execute Budget Adjustment
events.description: After the review, Ye Mingxuan logged into his mobile banking app to execute a fund transfer, depositing the amount into the emergency reserve account, as he appreciates the sense of "planning-execution-closure."

events.name: Brief sync with the financial manager
events.description: After the transfer, Ye Mingxuan messaged Zhang Wei on WeChat to mention the review and replenishment of the reserve fund, confirming that the fund fixed investment plan would continue. Zhang Wei replied, "Received. Let's stay in touch."

events.name: Assist mother in preparing ingredients for tomorrow's gathering.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan accompanied his mother to the supermarket for shopping, taking charge of pushing the cart and retrieving items. His mother selected fresh ingredients, while Ye Mingxuan suggested opting for lean pork belly and leafy green vegetables.

events.name: Smart Home Procurement Decision
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan finalized the procurement list, placed an order for smart door locks, smart light bulbs, and motion sensors on the official flagship store, selected next-day delivery service, and sent the order screenshot to his parents.

2025-04.daily_overview: The last day of April passed in tranquility and fulfillment: Ye Mingxuan focused on work, handling project wrap-up and cross-departmental coordination; after work, he inspected and accepted smart home devices; in the evening, he engaged in intensive last-minute review for a skills examination. The pace at the end of the month was intense yet orderly.

events.name: Project Weekly Meeting and Cross-Departmental Coordination
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan attended the weekly project meeting and reported on the progress of mechanical and electrical joint debugging tests. The software group requested more precise requirements for the installation surface of the "zero position" sensor, and Ye Mingxuan discussed the feasibility of on-site modifications.

events.name: Addressing the Optimization Requirement for "Sensor Mounting Surface"
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan reviewed the 3D model with the software engineer to assess the impact of adding precision machining surfaces. After confirming the impact was minimal, they modified the model's dimensional tolerances and updated the drawings, notifying the procurement and machining departments accordingly.

events.name: Acceptance of all smart home devices
events.description: After arriving home from work, Ye Mingxuan received the remaining smart home delivery packages. He proceeded to unbox each item, carefully inspected the components of the smart door lock, and read the installation instructions to ensure a smooth setup the following day.

events.name: Intensive Pre-Exam Review for Skill Assessment
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan focused his mind on reviewing for the professional skills certification exam, intensively practicing concepts using notes on error-prone knowledge points, and turned off social notifications to create a focused environment.

events.name: Structured Mixed Training
events.description: Based on the conclusion of the health assessment, Ye Mingxuan performed aerobic endurance training on Wednesday, completing a 45-minute variable pace run to enhance cardiovascular function, and felt mentally refreshed.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focus, with a sense of responsibility to complete the month-end tasks and an emphasis on pre-exam review.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with a sense of inner peace. Work collaboration issues were efficiently resolved, home renovations are fully prepared, and review progress is proceeding as planned. Satisfied with the growth over the past month, maintaining a calm mindset toward May.

state.今日运动: 45-minute variable pace run, as part of structured mixed training.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with warm and comfortable weather.
date_attribute.holiday: Labor Day

2025-05.daily_overview: On the first day of the Labor Day holiday, Ye Mingxuan enjoyed family time reuniting with his parents and launched a three-month scientific fat reduction plan, marking his entry into a new data-driven phase in personal health management.

events.name: Family Labor Day Dinner
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan slept in at home, enjoying the rare relaxation of the holiday. In the afternoon, his mother, Wang Xiulan, began bustling in the kitchen, meticulously preparing home-cooked dishes such as braised pork and steamed sea bass, which Ye Mingxuan loves. His father, Ye Jianguo, helped by selecting vegetables and tidying up the house, creating a warm atmosphere. In the evening, Ye Mingxuan returned home after his holiday activities, and the family gathered around the dining table to enjoy a hearty home-cooked meal. They chatted casually, shared updates on their lives, and celebrated Labor Day together.

events.name: Watch competitive variety shows
events.description: After dinner, the family moved to the living room to watch a rerun of the competitive variety show "Keep Running," which both Ye Mingxuan and his father enjoy. The father and son discussed the contestants' strategies while watching, while the mother shared clips from the show related to food, creating a relaxed and pleasant family atmosphere.

events.name: Launch the Scientific Weight Loss Program
events.description: In the afternoon, at the LIMEI Fitness Center, Ye Mingxuan had an in-depth discussion with his personal trainer, Wang Jian. Based on the latest physical examination report (height: 173 cm, weight: 71.5 kg, BMI: 23.9), they jointly set a three-month fat loss goal: to reduce body weight to 70 kg and lower body fat percentage by 3%. The meticulous Ye Mingxuan recorded the basic principles of training and diet in his phone's memo and downloaded the fitness tracking app recommended by Wang Jian, ready to begin data logging.

events.name: Tidy up before bed
events.description: After the program ended, Ye Mingxuan took the initiative to help clear the dining table and wash the dishes, while his mother tidied up the kitchen. Afterwards, the family continued chatting in the living room for a while, discussing their plans for the upcoming holiday days, before each retired to their own rooms to rest.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the holiday.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, feeling motivated about the weight loss plan.

date_attribute.holiday: Labor Day

2025-05.daily_overview: On the second day of the holiday, Ye Mingxuan initiated a smart home renovation project, collaborating with his father to install a smart door lock and refining his weight-loss plan. However, he stayed up slightly late in the evening due to his dedication to programming studies.

events.name: Smart Door Lock Installation
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan took out the prepared smart door lock kit and began the renovation project with the assistance of his father, Ye Jianguo. He first removed the traditional mechanical lock from the entry door, then followed the instructions step by step to install the new lock body and connect the gateway. During the process, he explained in detail to his father the working principles of the smart door lock's fingerprint recognition, password setup, and remote authorization, as well as its improved security compared to traditional locks. His father handed him tools, listened with great interest, and raised several questions regarding backup power supply and network stability.

events.name: Refine the Fat Loss Plan
events.description: After the midday break, Ye Mingxuan had an online discussion with Coach Wang Jian via WeChat in his home study, where they jointly refined a three-month fat loss plan. The detailed plan specifies the specific duration and intensity of three weekly strength training sessions (targeting the chest, back, and legs respectively), two aerobic workouts (morning runs or elliptical machine sessions on weekends), as well as a diet plan emphasizing high protein, low carbohydrates, and high fiber. Ye Mingxuan imported the finalized plan into a fitness app and began planning the first week's meals within the app.

events.name: Learn Open Source Project Documentation
events.description: In the evening, in his home study, Ye Mingxuan focused on reading the online documentation of a previously selected open-source ROS project. He organized the project's overall objectives, technology stack, and module divisions, leveraging his systematic thinking as an engineer to form a preliminary understanding framework and took notes using mind mapping software. Due to excessive immersion, he stayed up half an hour later than planned.

events.name: Temporary dietary changes
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan was engrossed in the installation work and had a simple takeout meal for lunch, which did not fully adhere to his fat-reduction diet. This led to a slight sense of guilt during dinner.

起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to start the project

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled yet somewhat fatigued, satisfied with the installation and learning process.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the third day of the holiday, Ye Mingxuan continued to advance the smart home renovation, completing the installation and system debugging of smart devices in the living room and hallway. In the evening, he conducted the first strength training session of his new fat-loss plan, but post-exercise muscle soreness slightly affected his sleep.

events.name: Installation of Intelligent Lighting and Sensors
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan continued installing smart bulbs and motion sensors in the living room and hallway. He replaced the light fixtures, configured sensor placements, and connected each new device to the home Wi-Fi network via a mobile app. During the process, he set up automation scenarios such as "Home Mode" (entrance light turns on upon opening the door) and "Night Sensing Mode" (lights automatically turn on when someone walks in the hallway). His father assisted by handing over tools and screws, while curiously asking how these IoT devices communicate and coordinate with each other.

events.name: Smart Home System Joint Commissioning
events.description: In the afternoon, after all hardware installations were completed, Ye Mingxuan conducted system integration testing on the installed smart door lock, lighting, and sensors. He simulated the complete process from opening the door to the automatic illumination of lights and fine-tuned the sensitivity of the sensors and the delay time for turning off the lights based on the family's usage habits. Both father and son participated in the testing together. The father experimented with different triggering methods and suggested lowering the brightness of the entrance hall light, which Ye Mingxuan gladly adopted.

events.name: Perform the first strength training session
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan went to the Lamei Fitness Center and, under the guidance of Coach Wang Jian, carried out his first strength training session as part of his new fat-loss plan. The focus was on volume training for the chest and back, such as bench presses and seated rows. Coach Wang provided guidance on proper form and emphasized the feeling of muscle engagement during the exercises. After the workout, Ye Mingxuan used a fitness app to record detailed information about his training sets, repetitions, and physical sensations, and briefly discussed his post-workout muscle feedback with the coach.

events.name: Conduct an in-depth study of the project source code
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened his computer in the study and used a code-reading tool to focus on analyzing the source code and internal comments of the core functional modules in the open-source ROS project he had studied during the day. He made efforts to understand the data flow, algorithmic logic, and interface definitions between the modules, and recorded his questions in his notes.

events.name: Muscle soreness affects rest.
events.description: Due to his first systematic training, Ye Mingxuan experienced noticeable muscle soreness in the evening. Although he rested early, his sleep quality was slightly affected.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive but slightly sore in body.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with a strong sense of accomplishment.

state.今日运动: Chest and back strength training, duration approximately 60 minutes.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the last day of the holiday, Ye Mingxuan started his first aerobic jog in the morning, officially kicking off his exercise routine. For the rest of the day, he focused on theoretical learning and hands-on practice of the Robot Operating System (ROS), but he went to bed early in the afternoon due to a mild headache.

events.name: Weekend Morning Jogging
events.description: At 7 a.m., Ye Mingxuan followed his plan and conducted his first aerobic exercise on the greenway of a park near his residential area, jogging for approximately 30 minutes. Wearing a sports watch, he used a fitness app to record the running distance (about 4.5 kilometers), duration, and average heart rate, gaining an initial experience of his new exercise rhythm. The morning air in May was fresh, and the run left him feeling refreshed and invigorated.

events.name: Systematically learn the fundamentals of ROS
events.description: In the morning, at his home study, Ye Mingxuan systematically studied the basic architecture of ROS through online courses on the China University MOOC platform and the official ROS Chinese Wiki. He focused on understanding core concepts such as nodes, topics, services, and messages, and followed the tutorials to complete the basic environment configuration of ROS Noetic and the 'Hello World' test on his personal laptop.

events.name: Hands-on Writing of ROS Nodes
events.description: In the afternoon, building upon the morning's learning content, Ye Mingxuan proceeded to write two simple Python ROS nodes. One node simulated publishing sensor data (such as temperature), while the other subscribed to this data and printed it out. He also attempted to write a simple service for calculating the sum of two numbers. Through these small examples, he reinforced his understanding of ROS's asynchronous communication mechanisms.

events.name: Chatting with Family Over Dinner
events.description: In the evening, the family gathered for dinner. Mother Wang Xiulan specially prepared a light vegetable salad and steamed fish to support Ye Mingxuan's fat-reducing diet. During the meal, Ye Mingxuan demonstrated the smart lighting effects controlled by a mobile app to his parents. His father shared his successful experience of trying to use voice commands to play crosstalk through the smart speaker alone during the day, which amused everyone.

events.name: Rest early due to headache
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan decided to retire early due to mild headache and fatigue, postponing the originally planned code debugging to regain his energy.

起始状态.心情: Stay alert and ready to embrace new challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Calm but physically unwell, satisfied with the mastery of new knowledge.

state.今日运动: Jog for 30 minutes.

date_attribute.holiday: Day Off (Make-up Work Day)

2025-05.daily_overview: On the adjusted workday, Ye Mingxuan completed the finishing touches on the smart home renovation, adjusted his grocery shopping according to his weight-loss plan, and discovered and signed up for a volunteer activity in the community homeowners' group. However, he had to work overtime in the evening due to an urgent project task.

events.name: Finalization and Instruction for Smart Home Renovation
events.description: In the morning, the renovation project entered its final stage. Ye Mingxuan gave his mother, Wang Xiulan, a detailed demonstration of how to use the new equipment, focusing on controlling the lights via a mobile app and the voice commands for the smart speaker. He specifically searched for and saved channels such as "Tianjin Crosstalk Radio" and classic storytelling programs on the smart speaker for his father, who enjoys traditional performing arts. The family experienced the convenience brought by smart technology together and engaged in a lighthearted conversation about whether to install smart curtains in the future. Finally, Ye Mingxuan tidied up the packaging boxes and tools generated during the installation process.

events.name: Adjusting Diet and Purchasing Healthy Ingredients
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan adjusted his lunch structure according to the new dietary plan, reducing the portion of rice as the staple food and increasing the amount of chicken breast and broccoli. After work (due to a schedule adjustment, today was effectively a regular workday), he went to a large supermarket near his home to purchase high-protein ingredients and healthy snacks for the upcoming week, such as ready-to-eat chicken breast, oatmeal, blueberries, nuts, etc. He also carefully examined the nutritional information labels on the food products.

events.name: Discover and sign up for community volunteer opportunities
events.description: While resting at home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan saw a recruitment notice for "Garbage Sorting Volunteer Supervisors" posted by the community residents' committee in the mobile phone owners' WeChat group. After carefully reading the job responsibilities, service hours (primarily fixed time slots on weekends and weekday evenings), and application requirements, he considered this a meaningful and time-compatible activity based on his "social responsibility-oriented" values and his desire to regularly engage with the outdoors and people. Using the online registration link provided in the notice, he truthfully filled out his personal information, available service time slots, and submitted his application.

events.name: Study the Build Process of Open Source Projects
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan carefully studied the package.xml and CMakeLists.txt files of the previously noted open-source ROS project in his home study. He clarified the project's third-party dependencies and the ROS-specific Catkin build process, preparing for subsequent attempts to compile and run the project locally.

events.name: Work overtime temporarily to handle project issues.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan received an urgent message from his colleague Zhou Tao regarding a design issue in the automated production line project that required immediate coordination. He held an online meeting with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang for half an hour, which delayed his dinner and caused him to stay up slightly late.

起始状态.心情: Methodically

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled yet somewhat fatigued, finding meaning in signing up as a volunteer.

2025-05.daily_overview: Resuming his normal work routine, Ye Mingxuan persisted with his fat-loss training during work breaks and utilized his evenings for quarterly financial reviews and knowledge revision, though his mood experienced slight fluctuations due to work pressure.

events.name: Commuting and Work on Weekdays
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan took the subway to his company located on Haitai Fazhanliu Road in Xiqing District, with a one-way commute taking approximately 40 minutes. He primarily focused on optimizing the design of the conveyor belt tensioning mechanism for the automated production line renovation project and conducted an online discussion with his colleague Li Xiang regarding the input conditions for the simulation analysis. Due to the tight project schedule, he felt somewhat pressured.

events.name: Perform leg strength training independently.
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to the gym alone to carry out the second strength training session of his fat loss plan, focusing on leg exercises such as squats and leg presses. He strictly followed the plan on the app, paid attention to proper form, and meticulously recorded the training weights, sets, and his physical sensations. As it was his first systematic leg workout, he experienced noticeable muscle soreness afterward.

events.name: Quarterly Fund Investment Review
events.description: In the evening, in his home study, Ye Mingxuan carefully reviewed the first-quarter reports of several conservative funds he holds (primarily money market funds and bond funds) through his mobile banking app. He focused on the yield rates, net value fluctuations, and changes in holdings, recording key data in a spreadsheet to prepare for subsequent asset adjustments.

events.name: Consult a Financial Manager
events.description: After the review, Ye Mingxuan had a brief communication via WeChat with Zhang Wei, the wealth management manager at China Merchants Bank. He inquired about the reasons for the slightly lower-than-expected recent performance of one of the hybrid funds and received the recent market analysis brief and adjustment recommendations tailored to his risk preference provided by Zhang Wei.

events.name: Knowledge Review and Consolidation
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan systematically reviewed and organized the core knowledge of ROS and key points of open-source project documentation he had studied over the past few days. He used mind mapping software to outline the knowledge framework and compiled the challenging issues he had not yet fully understood into a document, planning to seek answers on technical forums later.

events.name: Feeling down due to work pressure
events.description: During the day, Ye Mingxuan felt somewhat down due to recurring design issues at work, but his mood improved through exercise and reviewing his financial plans.

起始状态.心情: Return to work mode with a slight sense of urgency.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Although tired, I feel that I have accomplished a lot, and my mood has improved.

2025-05.daily_overview: On a workday, Ye Mingxuan prepared for the project's weekly meeting and reviewed his first week of fat loss progress with his coach, making fine adjustments to the plan based on feedback. Meanwhile, following financial advice, he decisively executed an optimization adjustment of his fund assets. However, he returned home late in the evening due to a gathering with friends.

events.name: Prepare materials for the project weekly meeting
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan organized the design progress of the automated production line project for the week at his workstation, preparing materials for the next day's weekly meeting. He refined the optimization scheme drawings for the conveyor belt tensioning mechanism, compiled a list of typical load conditions requiring simulation verification, and drafted a brief design description.

events.name: First Week Review and Fine-Tuning of the Fat Loss Plan
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan reviewed the first week (May 1–7) of his fat-loss plan, including the completion of three training sessions, adherence to the diet, and physical sensations (such as hunger and muscle soreness). He communicated with Coach Wang Jian via WeChat, sharing screenshots of data from his fitness app. The coach acknowledged his execution and, in response to his mention of post-work hunger, suggested shifting a portion of his dinner protein (such as chicken breast) to an afternoon snack. Additionally, the coach made a slight reduction in the intensity of next week’s leg training to better accommodate recovery.

events.name: Execute fund asset adjustment
events.description: In the evening, based on the previous day's fund report data and the financial manager's advice, Ye Mingxuan decided to perform an optimization operation after analysis. He submitted an application via his mobile banking app to redeem a portion of the poorly performing hybrid fund, with the redemption funds expected to arrive within 1-3 business days. He plans to use this amount, along with part of his salary surplus for the month, to initiate a new fixed investment plan.

events.name: Technical Forum Communication
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan visited the ROS Chinese community and the GitHub Issue pages of the selected open-source projects. He reviewed discussions by others on similar technical challenges and posted a request for help regarding the issues he had compiled about "ROS Node Lifecycle Management," hoping to obtain more practical insights.

events.name: Gathering with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan met with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang for dinner at a nearby restaurant, where they discussed work projects and shared gaming experiences. The gathering lasted until quite late. Upon returning home, he felt somewhat tired, but the social interaction left him in a pleasant mood.

起始状态.心情: Focus, organization

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling relieved after making a decision, enjoying social interactions but staying up late.

2025-05.daily_overview: On a busy workday, Ye Mingxuan attended a crucial project weekly meeting and took on clearly defined tasks. After work, he guided his father in familiarizing himself with smart devices and scheduled a weekend gathering with old classmates, but he felt fatigued due to staying up late the previous night.

events.name: Automation Project Weekly Meeting
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan attended the weekly progress meeting for the automation production line renovation project in the company's conference room. Project manager Wang Peng presided over the meeting. Ye Mingxuan reported the optimized design of key components to his direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan, as well as colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang. He clearly outlined specific requirements and deadlines for the simulation analysis under Li Xiang's responsibility. Additionally, he engaged in an in-depth discussion with the innovative-minded Zhou Tao regarding a technical detail of tolerance fit, ultimately reaching a consensus.

events.name: Follow-up Tasks After the Meeting
events.description: After the weekly meeting, Ye Mingxuan promptly engaged in a brief discussion with Li Xiang and Zhou Tao regarding the tasks confirmed during the session. They clarified the specific load files and output requirements needed for the simulation analysis, as well as the follow-up verification steps for the tolerance issues. Ye Mingxuan subsequently updated his personal work schedule.

events.name: Guiding Father in Using Smart Devices
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan encouraged his father, Ye Jianguo, to try using smart devices independently. With Ye Mingxuan’s guidance, his father successfully used voice commands to make the smart speaker play a piece of crosstalk by Hou Baolin. After succeeding, his father smiled happily, showing growing interest in this new technology and began asking about more voice commands.

events.name: Arranging a weekend class reunion
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan contacted his university classmate Zhao Xiaofeng, who is also in Tianjin, via WeChat. Both confirmed their availability this Sunday and tentatively agreed to meet for lunch at a Hunan restaurant not far from either of them, with the specific location and time to be discussed. They planned to catch up on each other's recent lives during the meal.

events.name: Configure the local development environment
events.description: During the half hour before bedtime, Ye Mingxuan, in his home study, completed the installation and final configuration of Python, ROS, and related dependency libraries (such as NumPy and SciPy) on his computer, following the requirements of the previously studied open-source project documentation. He ensured that the environment variables were correctly set, laying the groundwork for the subsequent reproduction of the robotic arm simulation code.

events.name: Fatigued from the previous evening's gathering
events.description: Due to staying up late at the gathering the night before, Ye Mingxuan felt slightly less energetic during the day, but maintained his condition through coffee and work focus.

起始状态.心情: Ready to take on work challenges but feeling somewhat fatigued.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and satisfied with the meeting outcomes and family interactions.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Friday, a workday, Ye Mingxuan handled the setup of regular investments after the arrival of his financial funds. During his spare time at work, he began preliminary exploration of the robotic arm simulation code. However, he went to bed early in the evening due to a mild cold.

events.name: Set up a fund fixed investment plan
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan received a text message notification that the funds from the mutual fund he redeemed the day before had been credited to his account. During his lunch break, he logged into his mobile banking app and set up a monthly fixed investment plan for a "CSI 300 Index Enhanced Fund" with more stable historical performance and lower fees, using the credited funds along with part of his reserved salary balance for the month. This further optimized his long-term asset allocation, reflecting his prudent financial management style.

events.name: Update Family Asset Records
events.description: After completing the setup for the fixed investment, Ye Mingxuan updated his family financial spreadsheet with a complete record of this asset adjustment. The record included the redemption date, amount, the name of the fund for the new fixed investment plan, the investment amount, the deduction date, and a brief reason for the adjustment, to facilitate future review and auditing.

events.name: Download and preliminarily review the simulation code.
events.description: In the evening, in his home study, Ye Mingxuan downloaded the core code package for the robotic arm kinematics simulation from the company's internal Git repository. He imported the code into his locally configured ROS development environment and conducted a preliminary review of the code's directory structure and main source files, gaining an intuitive understanding of the project's scale.

events.name: Online casual chat with colleague Zhou Tao
events.description: Before going to bed, colleague Zhou Tao shared a link to a Bilibili video about a new collaborative robot on WeChat. Ye Mingxuan clicked to watch it and briefly exchanged a few thoughts with Zhou Tao about the technical highlights in the video, agreeing to find time for a more detailed discussion next week.

events.name: Rest due to cold symptoms
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan experienced a mild sore throat and fatigue, likely due to recent overexertion. He decided to rest earlier in the evening and drink more water to recover his health.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend but feeling unwell.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Peaceful, with financial arrangements in order but slight concerns about health.

2025-05.daily_overview: On his day off, Ye Mingxuan enjoyed a relatively relaxed morning and engaged in online communication with several important contacts: he inquired about his childhood friend's recent situation and discussed car purchase intentions, received a community volunteer admission notice, and continued to deepen his personal car purchase needs analysis. However, he postponed his exercise in the afternoon due to physical discomfort.

events.name: Online communication with childhood friend Zhang Wei
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan chatted with his childhood friend Zhang Wei on WeChat. He inquired about Zhang Wei's recovery after his previous illness and learned that Zhang Wei had fully recovered and was planning to purchase a house. As a car sales consultant, Zhang Wei proactively offered to provide car-buying advice to Ye Mingxuan. During their conversation, they initially discussed Ye Mingxuan's needs for an SUV model, focusing on space and reliability, with a general budget of around 200,000 to 250,000 yuan. They agreed to meet at a later time for a more detailed discussion.

events.name: Receive Community Volunteer Notification
events.description: In the afternoon, community staff contacted Ye Mingxuan by phone to inform him that his application to become a volunteer supervisor for garbage classification had been approved. They invited him to join the "Zhongbei Avenue Community Garbage Classification Volunteers" WeChat work group to receive subsequent online training and scheduling notifications. Ye Mingxuan gladly agreed and immediately joined the group chat.

events.name: Learning Volunteer Work Guide
events.description: After joining the work group, Ye Mingxuan carefully studied the electronic version of the "Garbage Classification Guide" posted in the group. Through the training video materials in the group files, he gained a preliminary understanding of the specific workflow of a supervisor, communication skills with residents, and safety precautions. His ISTJ meticulous personality enabled him to study the rules with great attention to detail.

events.name: Clarify Personal Vehicle Purchase Requirements and Budget
events.description: In the morning, in his study, Ye Mingxuan, considering his annual salary of 200,000 yuan and his family's solid financial situation (debt-free with savings), meticulously outlined his car purchase budget (either in full payment or through a loan, targeting an on-road price of 200,000 to 250,000 yuan) in his notebook. He clearly listed his core requirements: a joint-venture brand SUV, with sufficient space to accommodate future family needs, high reliability, suitable for daily urban commuting and occasional road trips, and fuel-efficient.

events.name: Resting due to a cold without exercising.
events.description: Since his cold symptoms have not completely subsided, Ye Mingxuan decided to rest today and skip the planned aerobic exercise to facilitate a faster recovery.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, leisurely weekend but feeling slightly unwell.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Anticipation for volunteer activities, clearer plans for car purchase.

2025-05.daily_overview: A fulfilling Sunday saw Ye Mingxuan participate in community volunteer service for the first time in the morning. In the afternoon, he had an in-depth gathering with his old classmate Zhao Xiaofeng, where they exchanged insights on work and life, strengthening their friendship. However, the dining during the gathering led to a slight weight gain.

events.name: First Community Volunteer Service
events.description: From 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM, according to the schedule, Ye Mingxuan arrived at the designated garbage sorting station on Zhongbei Avenue Community. Wearing his volunteer armband, he guided residents who came to dispose of their waste to sort it correctly, patiently explaining the proper classification of commonly confused items, such as large bones and used tissues. During this time, he also assisted an elderly person carrying a heavy garbage bag by helping them deposit it into the correct bin. This first service experience provided him with a new opportunity to engage with the neighborhood community.

events.name: Screening of Working Drawing Cases
events.description: After returning home from volunteer service, Ye Mingxuan took a brief rest and began preparing for the new employee training scheduled for the following week. He systematically searched and selected some typical mechanical drawing cases from his personal work computer and the company server’s historical projects. These included excellent examples that adhered to design standards, as well as cases featuring typical errors such as incorrect annotations and disorganized layers encountered in past work. He then categorized and briefly annotated these materials.

events.name: Online preliminary screening of vehicle models of interest
events.description: Before his lunch break, Ye Mingxuan used the Autohome App to preliminarily browse and filter several potential car models based on the budget and needs he had outlined the previous day. He focused on joint-venture SUV models such as the Toyota RAV4 Rongfang Hybrid, Honda CR-V Sharp Hybrid, and Volkswagen Tiguan L. In a spreadsheet, he recorded the core parameters, suggested retail prices, and approximate local discount information for each model.

events.name: Dining with university classmate Zhao Xiaofeng
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan took the subway to the Hunan restaurant where he had arranged to meet Zhao Xiaofeng. The two met at the restaurant and, while enjoying the spicy and flavorful dishes, engaged in a lively discussion about the recent project developments in their respective companies and emerging trends in industry technologies, such as the impact of new energy vehicles on traditional automotive supply chains and the deepening application of industrial robots. They shared technical challenges encountered in their work and insights into solutions, with the conversation being highly engaging.

events.name: A deep conversation during a post-meal walk in the park.
events.description: After lunch, the two continued their conversation, strolling from the restaurant to the nearby Xiqing Suburban Park. Amidst the lush, shaded surroundings, their discussion naturally shifted from work to personal life. Ye Mingxuan talked about his recent weight-loss plan and smart home renovation, while Zhao Xiaofeng shared details of his ongoing research project on lightweight automotive materials. They also exchanged updates on personal hobbies such as fitness and woodworking.

events.name: Agree to exercise together
events.description: As their walk in the park was coming to an end, Ye Mingxuan and Zhao Xiaofeng agreed to find time next month to work out together at a gym near Zhao Xiaofeng’s company, where they could supervise and encourage each other to maintain their exercise habits. Both of them felt very pleased with this in-depth conversation.

events.name: Reflecting on the Journey Home
events.description: After the gathering, Ye Mingxuan returned home. Reflecting on the pleasant exchanges with his old classmates, he felt a sense of joy that friendships could still be strengthened and deepened in adulthood. In the evening, he briefly organized some of the technical viewpoints discussed during the gathering.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of anticipation for the first volunteer service.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home
结束状态.心情: Pleasant, social needs are met but with a slight weight gain.

state.今日运动: Volunteer service involved standing and walking for approximately 2 hours, and strolling for about 40 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast with a slight drop in temperature

2025-05.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Ye Mingxuan received new recognition at work—being appointed as a training instructor for new employees, which filled him with a sense of responsibility and motivation. At the same time, he steadily advanced his personal plans, such as purchasing a car and planning a trip, but he stayed up late at night preparing for the training.

events.name: Arranged a detailed discussion with a childhood friend about purchasing a car.
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan further communicated with his childhood friend Zhang Wei via WeChat and confirmed a dinner gathering on Saturday evening (May 17) to discuss the car purchase matters in detail face-to-face. Both parties agreed on the specific time and location (a barbecue restaurant not far from Zhang Wei's 4S dealership).

events.name: Accept the new employee training task
events.description: On Monday morning, Ye Mingxuan was called into the office by his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, who assigned him the task of conducting internal training for two newly hired mechanical engineering graduates on the company's mechanical drawing standards and CAD software usage techniques. Engineer Gao acknowledged his solid professional skills and rigorous work ethic, believing that this training would not only help the newcomers get up to speed quickly but also enhance Ye Mingxuan's communication and summarization abilities. Feeling trusted and recognized, Ye Mingxuan gladly accepted the assignment and had a preliminary discussion with Engineer Gao regarding the general direction of the training and the backgrounds of the two new employees.

events.name: Organize the company's cartographic standards and specifications
events.description: During work breaks in the afternoon and after returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan, in his home study, reviewed the company's internal "Mechanical Design and Drafting Standards," past project templates, and national standards. He systematically organized and summarized the key points applicable to new employee training, including layer naming and management rules, dimension and tolerance annotation styles, technical requirement writing specifications, and standard parts library usage procedures, ultimately compiling a clear checklist.

events.name: Analyze Common Operational Difficulties for New Employees
events.description: Based on his own experience as a new employee and the complaints he often heard from colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang during daily conversations, Ye Mingxuan analyzed and compiled a list of the most common and error-prone operational difficulties encountered by new employees when using the company's customized CAD software. Examples include: lightweight display and operation of complex assemblies, introductory applications of parametric design functions, and error-prone steps in generating 3D models from 2D sketches.

events.name: Staying up late to prepare training materials
events.description: To improve the training materials, Ye Mingxuan worked late into the night, which delayed his sleep schedule, but he was satisfied with the progress.

起始状态.心情: The usual busyness of Monday

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: A sense of responsibility and motivation from being entrusted with important tasks, but slightly fatigued.

2025-05.daily_overview: On weekdays, Ye Mingxuan's core task is to meticulously prepare training materials for new employees. Meanwhile, he resumed planning the self-driving tour around Qinghai Lake and conducted preliminary communication with fellow travel enthusiasts. However, due to work pressure, his emotions fluctuated during the daytime.

events.name: Drafting the Initial Training PPT
events.description: Ye Mingxuan began creating the training PPT during work breaks and in the evenings. He structured the content in the logical sequence of "Explanation of Company Standard Specifications" → "Efficient Software Operation Techniques" → "Analysis of Typical Error Cases." He meticulously designed the layout of each slide, incorporating clear screenshots of specifications, comparative diagrams, and operation flowcharts to ensure the content was both rigorous and easy to understand.

events.name: Create CAD Practical Demonstration Files
events.description: To align with the hands-on demonstration segment in the PPT, Ye Mingxuan created a new project in his CAD software, specifically designing several typical parts (such as a perforated plate and a shaft sleeve) and a simple assembly example file. He set up step-by-step instructional layers within the file to facilitate the training process, allowing the instructions to be displayed progressively during the explanation and enabling new employees to learn intuitively.

events.name: Design Post-Class Practice Assignments
events.description: Ye Mingxuan designed a set of post-training exercises closely aligned with the training content, consisting of five questions. The first three assess the understanding and application of the company's drafting standards, while the last two are specific CAD modeling and drawing tasks. He also prepared detailed reference answers and scoring guidelines to reinforce the training outcomes.

events.name: Restart self-driving travel planning and contact travel companions
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan proactively contacted the experienced backpacker Wu Bin via WeChat, expressing his intention to restart the previously postponed self-driving tour around Qinghai Lake, which had been delayed due to health issues. The two briefly exchanged updates on their recent work and personal lives, with Wu Bin showing great enthusiasm for reviving the plan.

events.name: Conduct in-depth research on the reputation of the intended vehicle model.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan conducted in-depth research on car forums (such as Xcar and Dongchedi) and Bilibili, studying the long-term owner feedback, quality reports, and professional media review videos of the initially shortlisted Toyota RAV4 Hybrid and Honda CR-V Hybrid. He paid particular attention to the reliability of the hybrid systems, the actual performance of rear-seat space, and the vehicles' off-road capability on unpaved roads, in preparation for his meeting with Zhang Wei over the weekend.

events.name: Work pressure leads to emotional tension.
events.description: During the day, Ye Mingxuan felt somewhat anxious due to the dual pressures of project progress and training preparation, but this was alleviated through communication with fellow travelers.

起始状态.心情: Focus, with a clear task but slightly tense.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled from completing the first draft of the training materials and restarting travel plans.

2025-05.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan officially notified the new employees of the training arrangements and, in the evening, took up the role of community waste sorting supervisor for the first time, experiencing a new social responsibility. He also completed the final polishing of the training course materials, but his exercise routine was postponed due to volunteer service.

events.name: Notification of New Employee Training Arrangement
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan contacted two newly hired mechanical engineers (Zhang Lin and Li Hua) via the company's internal communication software. He conducted a brief online exchange to learn about their alma maters and basic experience with CAD software. He formally notified them of the specific training time (Friday afternoon this week), location (Company's Third Training Room), and the software that needs to be pre-installed on their computers. He also sent out preparatory materials.

events.name: First Community Volunteer Service Onboarding
events.description: From 7:00 PM to 8:30 PM, Ye Mingxuan, according to the duty roster, arrived at the community's waste sorting and disposal point for the first time to serve as an evening supervisor. Wearing the volunteer vest provided by the community, he familiarized himself with the surroundings. During his one-and-a-half-hour shift, he gently reminded several neighbors to sort their waste correctly and assisted an elderly person carrying kitchen waste and recyclables by helping them deposit the waste bags into the corresponding bins. This experience gave him a more direct sense of involvement in community life.

events.name: Finalize and Complete the Training Course Materials
events.description: After returning home from volunteer service, Ye Mingxuan conducted a thorough review of the completed PPT courseware, verifying all technical details and referenced regulatory clauses. He optimized the layout and animation transition effects of certain slides to enhance their smoothness. Simultaneously, he completed the final drafting and labeling of the accompanying practice drawings, ensuring they were of moderate difficulty and closely aligned with the content of the courseware.

events.name: Debugging robotic arm simulation code
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan attempted to run the forward kinematics module code from the previously downloaded robotic arm simulation project. He encountered an error due to version incompatibility with Python third-party libraries. By consulting the project Wiki and using search engines, he adjusted the version of the numpy library and modified parts of the code syntax to adapt to the new version. Ultimately, he successfully got the basic module running and obtained preliminary simulation results.

events.name: Sports Activities Suspended Due to Volunteer Service
events.description: The originally scheduled evening exercise was canceled due to volunteer service, leaving Ye Mingxuan with a slight sense of regret, but he believed that volunteer service held greater significance.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, with a slight curiosity about the evening's volunteer service.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, the volunteer service proceeded smoothly, and the successful debugging of the code brought a small sense of accomplishment.

state.今日运动: Volunteer service involved standing and walking for approximately 1.5 hours.

2025-05.daily_overview: A busy and fruitful day. In the morning, Ye Mingxuan organized fitness data. In the afternoon, he successfully completed the new employee training task. After work, he thoroughly planned a trip with his hiking friends and consulted his childhood friend about car purchasing trends. He also strictly achieved his half-month weight loss goal.

events.name: Organize Half-Month Fitness Data
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan systematically organized his fitness data from May 1st to 15th in his home study, using the statistical functions of a fitness app and his own record book. The data showed that his weight had decreased from 71.5 kg to 72.8 kg, his body fat percentage had initially dropped, and various strength training exercises were largely completed as planned. However, the progress in increasing the weight for squats was slightly slower than expected. He saved screenshots of this data, preparing to conduct a biweekly review with Coach Wang Jian the following day.

events.name: Conduct internal training for new employees
events.description: From 2:00 PM to 5:30 PM, Ye Mingxuan conducted an internal training session on mechanical drawing and CAD software for two new employees, Zhang Lin and Li Hua, in the company's training room. In the morning, he had already set up the projector and computer in advance. During the training, he clearly explained the company's drawing standards and efficient operation techniques by combining PowerPoint presentations with live CAD demonstrations, and also showcased typical error cases. The new employees actively participated in the interaction, with their questions mainly focusing on tolerance annotation and assembly constraints, which Ye Mingxuan patiently addressed one by one. After the training, he sent follow-up exercises via email.

events.name: Discuss in-depth the details of the self-driving trip
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan received the latest self-driving travel guide for the Qinghai Lake loop (including detailed daily itineraries, attractions, and accommodation recommendations) and a professional outdoor gear checklist from his travel companion Wu Bin via WeChat. After the afternoon training session, he had a roughly 30-minute phone call with Wu Bin, during which they thoroughly discussed the feasibility of the trip in August, the duration of the journey (tentatively set at 7-8 days), vehicle preparation (Ye Mingxuan preferred renting a high-altitude-suitable SUV in Xining), as well as precautions for high-altitude driving and managing mild altitude sickness.

events.name: Consulting a childhood friend about the car market situation.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan contacted his childhood friend Zhang Wei, who works at a Toyota 4S store, via WeChat. He inquired about the current end-market discounts for the Toyota RAV4 Rongfang Hybrid version, the specific configuration differences, the approximate delivery period, and, from the perspective of a frontline salesperson, the main advantages, disadvantages, and customer feedback for this vehicle. Zhang Wei provided very detailed and internal information.

events.name: Form a preliminary draft of the self-driving itinerary.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan compiled all the information from his communication with Wu Bin that day, along with the materials he had researched, into a preliminary draft of a self-driving itinerary around Qinghai Lake, which he recorded in his cloud notes. He confirmed the next steps with Wu Bin via WeChat: each would refine their personal equipment preparation list, and they would communicate again in early June to finalize the plan and begin booking accommodations and vehicles.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly nervous and somewhat pressured about the afternoon training.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: With a sense of relief and accomplishment, the training has been successfully completed, and both the travel and car purchase plans have made significant progress.
