2025-05.daily_overview: This was a fulfilling and well-structured workday. The morning was dedicated to finalizing project designs, the afternoon involved conducting training for new employees, and the evening was spent reviewing fitness progress and setting new goals. However, mild work-related stress led to a brief period of anxiety.

events.name: Handled the finalization of project design in the morning.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan focused intently at his workstation, completing the final proofreading and detailed annotation of the design drawings for a sub-module of the automated production line he was responsible for this week, ensuring all parameters complied with the project standards.

events.name: Conduct technical training for new employees in the afternoon.
events.description: In the company's small meeting room, Ye Mingxuan conducted a half-day intensive training session for two new employees, Zhang Lin and Li Hua. Following a meticulously prepared PowerPoint presentation, he systematically explained the national standards for mechanical drawing, efficient drafting techniques and shortcuts for CAD software. He also provided an in-depth analysis of view representation and annotation key points for complex assembly drawings, using a recent actual project drawing from the company as a case study. His presentation was logically rigorous, and he patiently guided the trainees through the material. Additionally, he incorporated in-class exercises to effectively reinforce the learning outcomes for the new employees.

events.name: Post-Training Summary and Archiving
events.description: After the training session, Ye Mingxuan proactively collected on-site feedback and questions from the two new employees. Utilizing the half-hour before the end of the workday, he compiled the training materials—including the PowerPoint presentation, sample drawings, practice exercises, and reference answers—into a comprehensive electronic learning package. This package was then uploaded to the department's shared knowledge base for future reference and self-study by new staff.

events.name: Report Training Status to Immediate Supervisor
events.description: After organizing the materials, Ye Mingxuan went to Engineer Gao Zhiyuan's workstation and provided a brief report on the implementation of the afternoon training, feedback from the new employees, and the learning difficulties he had observed. Engineer Gao acknowledged his organizational skills and professional explanations.

events.name: Contact childhood friend to arrange weekend discussion on car purchase.
events.description: On his way home from work, Ye Mingxuan contacted his childhood friend Zhang Wei (an automotive sales consultant) via WeChat voice message, revealing his recent plan to purchase an SUV and hoping for professional advice. After a brief discussion, the two agreed to meet for a detailed conversation at a quiet restaurant familiar to Zhang Wei on the evening of May 18th (Sunday).

events.name: Monthly Fitness Review and Plan Update
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened the fitness app in his study and carefully organized his weight (72.8 kg), body fat percentage (23.5%), training completion rate, and dietary records from the past half month. Based on the advice from his coach Wang Jian, he adjusted his goals for the second half of the month to reduce his weight to 72 kg, lower his body fat percentage to 23%, and increase his squat weight to 85 kg. He then synchronized the updated training plan and dietary record template into the app, completing the closed-loop management of his monthly fitness routine. However, due to work pressure, he briefly experienced anxiety during this period, which he managed by practicing deep breathing exercises.

events.name: Light Learning Before Sleep
events.description: Half an hour before bedtime, Ye Mingxuan opened a Python learning website, reviewed a previously studied chapter on data visualization, and briefly ran several example codes.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, looking forward to the afternoon training and the evening plans.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat rewarding, with a slight lingering sense of work-related pressure.

2025-05.daily_overview: Today is a rest day for relaxation and recharging. I did strength training in the morning, reviewed for the Soft Exam in the afternoon, and had dinner with my childhood friend in the evening to discuss car purchases. The higher calorie intake led to a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Strength Training on Saturday Morning
events.description: At ten o'clock in the morning, Ye Mingxuan went to the Lamei Fitness Center and completed his second strength training session of the week under the guidance of Coach Wang Jian, with a focus on strengthening the lower body and back muscle groups. He felt in good condition and successfully completed the newly added weighted squat sets.

events.name: Review knowledge for the Soft Exam.
events.description: In the afternoon at home, Ye Mingxuan tidied up his desk and focused on reviewing materials for the Soft Exam. He concentrated on revisiting challenging topics such as software design patterns, principles of database systems, and algorithm complexity analysis, and worked on several past exam questions to reinforce his understanding.

events.name: Purchase weekend ingredients
events.description: During a study break in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan went downstairs to the supermarket near his residential community. He purchased fresh vegetables, fruits, and meat to prepare for the family meal over the weekend, and also took the opportunity to replenish household supplies.

events.name: Preliminary discussion on car purchase intentions with childhood friends
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan drove to the restaurant where he had arranged to meet Zhang Wei. After they met, Ye Mingxuan detailed his car purchase requirements: a budget of 150,000 to 200,000 yuan, primarily for commuting and occasional road trips, with a preference for SUV models. He also expressed concerns about space, fuel consumption, and long-term maintenance costs. Based on these needs, Zhang Wei recommended several hybrid and traditional fuel-powered SUVs with good market reputations on the spot, providing a preliminary analysis of their respective strengths and weaknesses. This discussion laid the groundwork for a more in-depth conversation the following day. However, the meal involved consuming a considerable amount of food, which might have an impact on his weight.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the leisurely weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, as I have exercised, reviewed my studies, and taken a practical step forward in my car purchase plan, though I feel I may have overeaten slightly.

state.今日运动: 60-minute strength training at the gym

2025-05.daily_overview: Sunday's schedule was well-balanced. In the morning, I focused on programming and reviewing for the software qualification exam. In the afternoon, I spent time with my parents. In the evening, I had an in-depth discussion with my childhood friend about car purchases. The conversation was so engaging that I stayed up late, but I managed to slightly reduce my weight by controlling my diet.

events.name: Programming and Soft Exam Review in the Morning
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan was in his home study. He first debugged the unfinished robotic arm kinematics simulation project from the previous week, successfully integrating the forward and inverse kinematics modules with the visual simulation framework. This allowed the robotic arm to complete a preset simple grasping trajectory in the virtual environment. Afterward, he took out his notes for the Software Qualification Exam and conducted a final review to address any weak areas.

events.name: Ancient Coin Collection Course Study
events.description: Before the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan utilized fragmented time to watch the first and second unit videos of an online ancient coin appreciation course on his tablet. He focused on studying the variant characteristics and casting backgrounds of major silver coins from the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China period, such as the "Yuan Datou" (Silver Dollar with Yuan Shikai's Portrait) and "Sun Xiaotou" (Silver Dollar with Sun Yat-sen's Portrait), and took electronic notes.

events.name: Spend the afternoon accompanying parents.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan did not schedule any outings. Instead, he stayed at home to chat with his parents. His father, Ye Jianguo, shared several practical life tips he had recently learned from short video platforms, while his mother, Wang Xiulan, was preparing ingredients for dinner. The family enjoyed a harmonious and joyful time together.

events.name: In-depth discussion on financial planning for car purchase with childhood friend
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan and Zhang Wei engaged in a two-hour practical discussion at a restaurant. Ye Mingxuan candidly disclosed his annual salary, current savings, and monthly saving capacity. Zhang Wei brought detailed specification sheets, quotation lists, and financing plans (including a two-year interest-free installment option) for the intended models, such as the Toyota RAV4 Rongfang Hybrid and the Honda CR-V. The two focused on analyzing the impact of full payment versus installment payments on Ye Mingxuan's cash flow and roughly estimated the annual costs of insurance, fuel, and maintenance at approximately 15,000 yuan after purchasing the car. This discussion transformed Ye Mingxuan's car purchase intention into a financial decision requiring meticulous calculation.

events.name: Summarize the key discussion points of the day
events.description: After returning home from the discussion, Ye Mingxuan did not rest immediately. Instead, he briefly recorded the key points from the materials provided by Zhang Wei and the core conclusions of their discussion (such as the budget ceiling, priority vehicle models, and the pros and cons of installment payments) in his phone's memo app, preparing for subsequent decision-making. Excited from the discussion, he read for a while before falling asleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a clear plan

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: With an active mind, the car purchase plan has become very specific, bringing both pressure and excitement.

2025-05.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, the work pace resumed, involving follow-up on training and engagement in new design tasks. In the evening, I organized the outcomes of car shopping and formulated plans. Due to receiving an urgent work revision request, I worked slightly overtime and experienced some stress, resulting in a slight weight loss.

events.name: Handling Follow-up Issues for New Employee Training
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxiao proactively inquired with the two new employees, Zhang Lin and Li Hua, about any new issues they encountered during their weekend self-study and patiently provided explanations. He resent them the final version of the training materials from last Friday and reminded them that they could consult the knowledge base at any time.

events.name: Report training work to the project manager.
events.description: In the late morning, before the project weekly meeting, Ye Mingxuan provided a brief report to Project Manager Wang Peng on the completion of last week's new employee training, the feedback from the new employees, and the subsequent self-study support arrangements. Manager Wang commended him for his initiative.

events.name: Embark on a new week of design work
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan refocused on his work and began preliminary design and feasibility analysis for the next mechanical component based on the project schedule. However, he received an urgent modification request from the client midway, requiring him to work overtime to optimize the design.

events.name: Summary of Vehicle Purchase Research Findings
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened his computer in the study and systematically organized all the information discussed with Zhang Wei over the weekend. He created a detailed Excel comparison table listing the core parameters, estimated final prices, and analyses of the strengths and weaknesses of three target models, including the Toyota RAV4 Hybrid and Honda CR-V. He also outlined key points for on-site inspections (such as interior quality and trunk space) and compiled a list of remaining questions to be addressed.

events.name: Develop a follow-up action plan for vehicle purchase
events.description: After organizing the materials, Ye Mingxuan proceeded to formulate a clear action plan: 1. Continuously monitor the price trends of the target vehicle models; 2. Schedule an in-person visit to the 4S dealership for a test drive next weekend; 3. Ask Zhang Wei to notify him promptly in case of significant discounts or test drive events. He updated these plans in his phone's memo.

events.name: Initial discussion with parents about the idea of purchasing a car
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan briefly mentioned to his parents in the living room that he was seriously considering buying a car. He outlined his budget range and the type of vehicle he was considering (SUV), hoping to hear their opinions. His parents expressed their support, with his mother paying more attention to safety and comfort.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous on Monday, but with clear objectives.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Everything seems to be under control, and the car purchase plan is gradually taking shape, but work pressure still lingers.

state.今日运动: Perform a 20-minute core muscle training session at home in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: Today focused on technological breakthroughs and family decision-making. Resolved design challenges, held a family meeting in the evening, and consulted a financial manager. Weight decreased slightly due to controlled diet.

events.name: Resolving Interference Issues in Project Design
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan identified a potential spatial interference risk between two moving components during the design process. He engaged in multiple rounds of communication and model adjustments with his colleague Li Xiang, who is responsible for simulation. Ultimately, by optimizing the contour shape of one component, they successfully avoided interference, ensuring the reliability of the design.

events.name: Family Dinner Meeting to Discuss Car Purchase
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan printed out the car purchase comparison table he had organized the previous night and engaged in a more formal discussion with his parents (Ye Jianguo and Wang Xiulan). He provided a detailed explanation of the various car models, his budget (150,000–180,000 yuan), and his inclination toward opting for installment payments. After fully understanding all the information, his parents expressed their complete support for his independent decision-making and inquired whether he needed any financial assistance from the family for the down payment. Ye Mingxuan thanked his parents for their kindness but stated that he preferred to use his own funds and installment payments to complete the purchase, aiming to develop his financial planning skills.

events.name: Consult a financial manager for financial advice.
events.description: After communicating with his parents, Ye Mingxuan returned to his study and contacted his financial manager, Zhang Wei (at the bank), via WeChat. He briefly outlined his car purchase plan and the potential amount of savings to be used, inquiring about the impact of this move on his existing fund portfolio and monthly cash flow. Manager Zhang replied that he would provide a brief assessment and recommendation by the weekend, taking into account Ye’s overall financial situation.

events.name: Continue the robotic arm simulation project
events.description: After finishing his official duties, Ye Mingxuan spent an hour continuing his personal project on robotic arm simulation. He ran the simulation program integrated with grasping actions, carefully observing the motion fluency and accuracy of the robotic arm in the virtual environment. He compared the results with the expected outcomes documented and recorded some minor trajectory deviations for subsequent optimization.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Stay focused and be prepared to tackle work challenges and family discussions.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief has set in as consensus has been reached within the family, and external professional consultation has also been initiated, bringing a feeling of reassurance.

2025-05.daily_overview: Work proceeded steadily on Wednesday with progress made on design tasks. After work, I engaged in volunteer service and had in-depth conversations with neighbors. In the evening, I prepared for weekend activities. My weight remained stable due to a regular routine.

events.name: Handling daily design drawings
events.description: Today, Ye Mingxuan's main task is to complete detailed engineering drawings of several standard components and add annotations. Although the process is somewhat tedious, he maintains his usual rigor, ensuring that every dimension and tolerance is accurate.

events.name: Community Waste Sorting Volunteer Service
events.description: From 7:00 to 8:00 p.m., Ye Mingxuan, wearing his volunteer armband, arrived punctually at the community's waste sorting station. He proactively observed and tried to remember the faces of several regular neighbors, patiently answered an aunt's question about whether [food waste should be disposed of without the bag], and helped an elderly man complete a bulky waste removal reservation on his mobile phone. He also exchanged fitness tips with an elderly neighbor who shared his interest in exercise.

events.name: Schedule a Colleague Dinner for Tomorrow
events.description: After returning home from volunteer service, Ye Mingxuan confirmed with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang via WeChat about their willingness to have dinner together after work the next day (Thursday). The three quickly reached an agreement and decided to go directly to the spicy dry pot restaurant they frequented near the company after work.

events.name: Preparing for the Weekend Activities
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan retrieved professional tools for antique coin appraisal, such as a magnifying glass, soft brush, and gloves, from the storage cabinet to inspect and clean them, ensuring they would be ready for use over the weekend. Meanwhile, he contacted the carpenter Qian Jianguo via WeChat to confirm his availability for a learning session on Saturday afternoon. He also contemplated in advance the mortise and tenon joint structure he intended to practice during the session.

events.name: View this month's household expenses.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan briefly checked the family shared budgeting app, confirming that the daily expenses for the month were within the budget. He also added notes for several potential large expenditures in the near future, such as the car purchase reserve fund.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Steady, proceed according to plan

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilling, having fulfilled social responsibilities and arranged upcoming social and interest activities.

2025-05.daily_overview: Handled urgent design modifications during the day, had dinner with colleagues in the evening, discussing topics ranging from technical matters to personal hobbies. Gained a slight amount of weight due to the high-calorie meal, and stayed up late.

events.name: Handling Urgent Design Modifications
events.description: In the afternoon, project manager Wang Peng forwarded a minor modification request from the client regarding a delivered component. After an urgent discussion with engineer Gao Zhiyuan, Ye Mingxuan quickly optimized the design based on the original version. They worked an extra half hour to update the drawings and models, ensuring timely feedback to the client.

events.name: Colleagues dining together after work.
events.description: After finishing their overtime work, Ye Mingxuan, Zhou Tao, and Li Xiang left the company together and walked to a nearby mala xiangguo restaurant. On the way, they continued discussing several possible solutions for the design modification they had just been working on.

events.name: Communication at a Spicy Pot Restaurant
events.description: During the meal, the three of them ordered a sumptuous hot pot. The conversation naturally shifted from the project challenges discussed in the afternoon to Zhou Tao’s recent study of a Python data analysis library, while Li Xiang showcased a well-preserved copper coin he had recently acquired at an antique market over the weekend. Ye Mingxuan also shared updates on his in-depth discussions with his childhood friend Zhang Wei regarding car purchases and financial considerations. Laughter filled the table as technology, hobbies, and daily life intertwined, though they consumed a considerable amount of spicy food.

events.name: Financial Manager Responds to Inquiry
events.description: Near the end of the dinner gathering, Ye Mingxuan received a WeChat reply from Zhang Wei, his financial manager at the bank. After a brief analysis, Manager Zhang suggested that, given Ye Mingxuan’s current savings and income, using part of his deposit for the down payment and opting for an installment loan would have a manageable impact on his overall asset allocation. However, he advised appropriately reducing the amount of the monthly fund investment plan for the following month to smooth out the cash flow changes caused by the mortgage payments. After reading the message, Ye Mingxuan replied with thanks, feeling more assured.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Slightly busy, with some temporary tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and joyful, I enjoyed delicious food and high-quality exchanges with colleagues, while also having my financial concerns addressed.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Friday, I completed the wrap-up of work and made final preparations for the weekend exam. Encouraged by positive feedback from my supervisor, I engaged in an intensive review session in the evening. Due to nervousness, my sleep quality declined, and I experienced a slight weight loss.

events.name: Complete the week's work wrap-up and reporting
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan organized the design drawings and model files completed this week, submitted them to the project management system, and sent a brief weekly work report to Engineer Gao Zhiyuan via email. In his reply, Engineer Gao specifically mentioned that his new employee training last week was [well done and well-organized], and encouraged him to participate more in such knowledge-sharing activities in the future.

events.name: Schedule weekend time to accompany mother
events.description: During the lunch break, considering the exam on Sunday and his plan to visit Master Qian on Saturday afternoon, Ye Mingxuan decided to dedicate Saturday morning to accompanying his mother. He communicated with his mother, Wang Xiulan, via WeChat and arranged to go shopping together on Saturday morning, initially deciding to visit the Wanda Plaza in Xiqing District.

events.name: The Final Sprint Before the Soft Exam
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan canceled all entertainment activities and shut himself in his study. He no longer focused on acquiring new knowledge but instead repeatedly reviewed his collection of incorrect questions and notes on core knowledge points, particularly those concepts and formulas that were easily confused. Due to nervousness, he experienced mild insomnia.

events.name: Organizing Exam Materials and Confirming Information
events.description: After finishing his review, Ye Mingxuan printed out his admission ticket and carefully confirmed the specific location and transportation route (accessible by subway) of the test center at Tianjin University. He neatly placed the necessary items for the exam—such as his ID card, admission ticket, 2B pencils, and black pens—into a transparent document folder and set an alarm for an early start the next morning.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, yet also feeling a bit of pre-exam nervousness.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fully prepared, yet with a slightly fluctuating state of mind, feeling both pressure and confidence for tomorrow's exam.

2025-05.daily_overview: I participated in the Software Designer Qualification Examination throughout the day and performed smoothly. After the exam, I felt a great sense of relief. I had dinner and exchanged ideas with my university classmates, followed by light entertainment and relaxation in the evening. Due to the release of exam stress, my weight decreased slightly.

events.name: Participate in the Software Designer (Intermediate Level) National Computer Technology and Software Professional Qualification Examination
events.description: From 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Ye Mingxuan took the one-day Software Designer (Intermediate Level) Qualification Examination at the test center of Tianjin University. The exam consisted of the comprehensive knowledge section (multiple-choice questions) in the morning and the case analysis section (subjective questions) in the afternoon. He remained focused and performed smoothly throughout the test, particularly in the system design and database-related questions in the case analysis section, where he felt he had performed well. The entire examination served as an effective assessment of his efforts over the past few months, during which he had dedicated his spare time to studying programming and software engineering knowledge.

events.name: Relaxation After the Exam
events.description: Stepping out of the examination hall, Ye Mingxuan let out a long sigh of relief, feeling the pressure of the past few months suddenly lift. He took a brief walk near the test center, reviewing a few questions he had been uncertain about, but overall, he felt satisfied with his performance.

events.name: Dining with university classmate Zhao Xiaofeng
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan invited his university classmate Zhao Xiaofeng, who also worked in Tianjin, to have dinner together. The two ordered a few dishes at a small restaurant and chatted while eating. Ye Mingxuan shared his experiences from the exam, while Zhao Xiaofeng talked about the technical challenges he recently encountered in an automotive project. They also casually discussed a coordinate transformation issue Ye Mingxuan had encountered in the robotic arm simulation project he was currently researching.

events.name: Light evening entertainment
events.description: After returning home, Ye Mingxuan did not look at any study materials. He turned on his computer and teamed up with his online gaming partner Zheng Kai to play two rounds of "League of Legends," completely relaxing his nerves that had been tense all day.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focus and slight tension before the exam

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and joyful, having completed an important task with a strong sense of accomplishment.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the Sunday after the exam, it was a time for rest and family. In the morning, I accompanied my mother for shopping, followed by a shared lunch at noon. In the afternoon, I attended to personal matters. In the evening, I watched a variety show with my father. Due to dietary control, my weight remained stable.

events.name: Driving my mother to go shopping
events.description: At ten o'clock in the morning, Ye Mingxuan drove to pick up his mother, Wang Xiulan, and together they headed to the Wanda Plaza in Xiqing District. They spent most of their time browsing in the women's shoe section and the middle-aged women's clothing section of the mall. Ye Mingxuan patiently accompanied his mother as she tried on various items, offering his opinions. In the end, he helped her select and purchase a pair of flat shoes with soft leather and flexible soles. His mother was very satisfied after trying them on.

events.name: Lunch with Mother
events.description: After finishing their shopping, Ye Mingxuan and his mother had lunch at a Shanghainese restaurant in the mall. His mother specifically ordered braised pork and stir-fried seasonal vegetables, both of which Ye Mingxuan loved. As they ate, they chatted warmly. His mother inquired about his recent exams and work, while Ye Mingxuan asked about his parents' health and daily activities. The atmosphere was cozy and harmonious.

events.name: Accompanying mother home and tidying up
events.description: After lunch, Ye Mingxuan drove his mother safely back home. His mother happily tried on the new shoes once more and carefully stored them away. Ye Mingxuan then organized the shopping receipt and shoebox, placing them in his mother's room.

events.name: Personal Affairs in the Afternoon
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan tidied up his study at home, temporarily archiving the materials he had used for his exams. He then went online to look up the addresses of several car dealerships he planned to visit for on-site inspections next week, as well as the methods for scheduling test drives. He also briefly outlined the key tasks for his work in the coming week.

events.name: Watch competitive variety shows
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan and his father Ye Jianguo watched the latest robot competition variety show together in the living room. The father and son discussed the mechanical structures and control strategies featured in the program while watching, which is a shared leisure activity they both enjoy.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy your leisurely weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling content and relaxed, I enjoyed warm family time, allowing both body and mind to be fully rested.

2025-05.daily_overview: A new week begins, with life's focus returning to work and personal development. During the day, I am busy with tasks for new projects, while in the evenings, I restart programming projects and study workstation setups. Due to the complexity of the projects, I stay up late, resulting in a slight weight loss.

events.name: Start New Project Module Design
events.description: This week, Ye Mingxuan was assigned to participate in a newly acquired precision testing equipment R&D project at the company. In the morning, he attended a kick-off meeting with the project team members. In the afternoon, he began reviewing technical materials and proceeded with the preliminary conceptualization and schematic sketching of the transmission module under his responsibility.

events.name: Restart Personal Programming Project
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened his computer in the study and continued working on his robotic arm simulation project. He attempted to modify the default motion trajectory of the robotic arm, changing a linear motion to an arc motion that better aligned with real-world grasping scenarios, and adjusted the coordinates of key path points.

events.name: Debugging and Integration of Simulation Functions
events.description: After successfully modifying the trajectory, he integrated the previously designed simple grasping action logic with the new motion trajectory into a coherent simulation process. Through multiple test runs, he resolved minor logical conflicts caused by code modifications, ultimately enabling the robotic arm to smoothly complete the full sequence of [move-grasp-place] actions in the virtual environment. However, due to the complexity of debugging, he worked late into the night.

events.name: Research on High-Performance Workstations
events.description: Considering the increasing demands for programming learning, CAD design, and occasional gaming, the old computer at home was struggling to keep up. Ye Mingxuan took advantage of his rest time in the evening to begin researching professional workstations. Based on his requirements for CPU core count, graphics card performance, memory capacity, and stability, he initially established a budget range in mind and focused on reviewing the configurations and user evaluations of Dell's Precision series on JD.com.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Energy restored, ready to tackle the new work week.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment, progress made on personal projects, while beginning to plan for new equipment upgrades, but feeling slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Perform a 30-minute dumbbell circuit training at home in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Tuesday, detailed design for the new project was advanced, volunteer service was conducted in the evening, and multiple preparations were made for subsequent activities. Due to a busy workload, evening study was briefly skipped, and body weight slightly decreased.

events.name: Detailed Design of the New Project
events.description: Ye Mingxuan spent the entire day today deepening the design of the transmission module for the precision inspection equipment. He used CAD software to create more detailed part drawings and preliminary assembly drawings, and communicated interface requirements with colleagues responsible for the control system.

events.name: Community Waste Sorting Supervision
events.description: At 7 p.m., Ye Mingxuan arrived punctually at the community waste sorting station. Today, an elderly neighbor wanted to discard an old bedside table. Ye Mingxuan proactively approached him, explained in detail the regulation that bulky waste requires advance booking for removal, and used his own mobile phone to help the elderly man complete the online reservation registration on the community app.

events.name: Contact fellow Tibetan art enthusiasts to schedule an online appreciation session.
events.description: After returning home from volunteer work, Ye Mingxuan contacted his fellow coin collector Zhao Jianguo in Xi'an via WeChat. He informed Zhao that he had recently observed a new Yuan Datou silver coin and had several details he wished to discuss. They agreed to have a video call the following evening (Wednesday) to jointly appreciate and discuss the coin.

events.name: Preparing for Woodworking Studies
events.description: After finalizing the arrangement with his fellow collector, Ye Mingxuan retrieved several personal tools (such as a marking gauge and chisels) and the prepared wood samples from the tool cabinet, which he would need for his visit to Master Qian’s home that Saturday. He then inspected and performed light polishing on them to ensure they were in good condition.

events.name: Understanding Family Law Procedures
events.description: During dinner, the parents formally entrusted Ye Mingxuan with the task of looking into the procedures for notarizing a declaration of renunciation of inheritance rights (related to an old family property). In the evening, Ye Mingxuan searched online for the relevant requirements and the list of necessary materials from the Tianjin Notary Office. He took notes and planned to visit the office in person over the weekend to make inquiries.

events.name: Continue comparing workstation models
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan spent some more time researching the HP Z series workstations, comparing their differences with Dell products in the same price range in terms of cooling design, expansion slots, and after-sales service policies. He was increasingly leaning toward choosing a model that prioritized stability and long-term reliability.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Steady, focused on design tasks

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Efficient and well-organized, with multiple concurrent matters properly arranged.

2025-05.daily_overview: Today was driven by personal interests and deep engagement. During the day, I focused on tolerance analysis, while in the evening, I immersed myself in the appreciation of ancient coins, connecting with fellow collectors via video call. Prolonged sitting resulted in mild back discomfort. I stayed up late and experienced a slight weight loss.

events.name: Handling tolerance analysis in project design
events.description: Today, Ye Mingxuan's primary focus is on conducting tolerance analysis and allocation for key components of the transmission module to ensure the overall assembly accuracy and motion smoothness of the equipment. This task requires immense patience and meticulous attention to detail.

events.name: Appreciating Ancient Coins Alone
events.description: At eight o'clock in the evening, Ye Mingxuan put on white gloves in his study and laid a soft pad on the workbench. He took out the Yuan Datou silver coin, first carefully brushed away surface dust with a soft brush, and then, under a professional LED magnifying glass, meticulously examined the details of the pattern, style of inscriptions, signs of wear, and natural patina from both the obverse and reverse sides to the reeded edges. He cross-referenced the findings with reference materials for preliminary identification of the coin's variety and documentation. Due to prolonged sitting, he felt a slight stiffness in his back.

events.name: In-depth appreciation through video call with fellow collectors
events.description: After the appreciation session concluded, Ye Mingxuan promptly contacted Zhao Jianguo via WeChat video call. He positioned his phone camera to show the details of the silver coin under the magnifying glass in real time. The two engaged in an hour-long in-depth discussion covering the coin's potential minting year, variant characteristics (such as differences in pattern details), key points for authenticity verification, and the current market valuation of coins in similar condition. Ye Mingxuan greatly benefited from Zhao Jianguo's extensive knowledge of history.

events.name: Share interesting anecdotes about the history of local currencies
events.description: After the technical discussion, their conversation shifted to a more relaxed cultural level. Ye Mingxuan shared some stories he had learned locally in Tianjin about the Beiyang Mint, while Zhao Jianguo supplemented with the history of modern currency circulation in the Xi'an area. This cross-regional cultural exchange delighted them both.

events.name: Agree to meet offline for treasure hunting in the future
events.description: As the video call was nearing its end, the two enthusiastically agreed to find an opportunity in the future to visit Tianjin's Ancient Culture Street or Xi'an's antique market for a hands-on treasure hunt. They also exchanged ideas on their respective key areas of focus for future collections.

events.name: Organizing Appreciation Notes and Concluding
events.description: After the video ended, Ye Mingxuan was in high spirits. He recorded the insights from tonight's appreciation, the technical points discussed with Zhao Jianguo, and summaries of interesting anecdotes in his dedicated electronic collection notebook. Then, he carefully cleaned the magnifying glass and tray, returned the silver coins to their storage box, and completed this immersive hobby practice.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the evening interest activity.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied and delighted, I enjoyed a high-quality intellectual exchange and knowledge collision, though with slight discomfort in the back.

2025-05.daily_overview: Thursday is a day for summarization and preparation. During the day, I prepared materials for the design review. In the evening, I reviewed the programming project and studied ancient coin techniques. However, after the HIIT workout, I felt a slight stinging pain in the sole of my foot and decided to rest, go to bed early, and noted a slight decrease in weight.

events.name: Prepare project design review materials
events.description: Ye Mingxuan's main task today is to prepare for tomorrow's internal design review within the team. He organized all the design drawings, calculation documents, and simulation reports for the transmission module he is responsible for, and created a concise outline for the presentation PPT.

events.name: Review and organize the simulation project
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan conducted a systematic review of the recently completed robotic arm simulation function extension project. He added detailed comments to key code files (such as motion planning and grasping control modules) and wrote a concise technical summary report. The report documented the project objectives, implementation process, encountered issues and their solutions, as well as his personal insights on robot control logic and the use of PyBullet/MoveIt simulation software. This summary will serve as a valuable technical reference for his future work.

events.name: Learn the skills to identify the authenticity of ancient coins.
events.description: After the review session, Ye Mingxuan opened the third unit video of the ancient coin appreciation course, focusing on practical techniques for authenticating coins through comprehensive methods such as observing the edge serration patterns, patina layers, pressure marks from minting, and even listening to the sound. He took notes while watching, finding the content highly practical.

events.name: HIIT Training Leads to Plantar Discomfort
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan completed a 30-minute HIIT workout following a fitness app. However, after the high-intensity running and jumping, he felt a slight stinging and tightness in the sole of his left foot, which he identified as early symptoms of plantar fasciitis caused by overuse. He decided to immediately reduce his exercise over the next few days and increase stretching.

events.name: Preparing for Woodworking Class
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan organized the tools needed for his Saturday visit to Master Qian's house (chisel, hammer, and try square), the practice wood materials preliminarily cut according to the blueprint, and his woodworking study notebook. He placed them all into a dedicated canvas tool bag and set it in a conspicuous spot by the door to avoid forgetting it the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focused, under the pressure of evaluation yet confident and well-prepared.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Steadfast, having completed a full cycle of the learning phase, but concerns arise due to discomfort in the soles of the feet.

2025-05.daily_overview: The design review passed in the morning, miscellaneous tasks were handled in the afternoon, and ingredients for the Dragon Boat Festival were purchased after work. In the evening, woodworking studies provided an appreciation of traditional craftsmanship. Due to foot discomfort, standing time was reduced, resulting in a significant weight loss.

events.name: Participate in internal project design review
events.description: In the morning, the project team held an internal design review meeting for the transmission module. Ye Mingxuan clearly presented his design proposal, calculation basis, and simulation results using a PowerPoint presentation. Engineer Gao Zhiyuan and several colleagues raised a few suggestions for improvement, but the overall design was approved and can proceed to the next stage of detailed design.

events.name: Purchasing ingredients for the Dragon Boat Festival after work.
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan did not go directly home. Instead, he first went to the supermarket and the wet market to purchase the core ingredients for making zongzi for the family gathering on the upcoming Dragon Boat Festival, including bamboo leaves, glutinous rice, red dates, red bean paste, and pork belly, as well as several fresh vegetables and seasonings his mother had asked him to buy.

events.name: Go to the carpenter's house to learn.
events.description: After completing the procurement, Ye Mingxuan drove to the home of Master Qian Jianguo, located in Yangliuqing Town, Xiqing District. Upon arrival, he first spent over an hour practicing the routine making of mortise and tenon joints in Master Qian's backyard workshop. This time, he focused on the more complex [zongjiao tenon], but due to discomfort in his feet, he tried to operate while seated as much as possible.

events.name: Experience Traditional Tools and the Spirit of Craftsmanship
events.description: After the practice session, Master Qian carefully carried out a wooden box from the inner room, containing a meticulously maintained German-made "Double Arrow" brand bench plane from the Republican era. As he demonstrated its exquisite brass adjustment mechanism and high-carbon steel blade, Master Qian explained with emotion: "Three parts skill, seven parts tools." He spoke of how veteran craftsmen care for their tools as if they were partners, and how the tools, in return, offer precision and durability. He also shared the story of how this plane had accompanied his master for decades.

events.name: Exchanging Insights with the Master
events.description: With Master Qian's permission, Ye Mingxuan personally touched and attempted to adjust the old hand plane, experiencing its substantial weight and still-smooth mechanism. He shared with Master Qian his understanding, as a modern engineer, of the commonalities between precision instruments and traditional hand tools, as well as his reflections on the concept of "craftsmanship."

events.name: Bid farewell and return home
events.description: As dusk fell, this fruitful session of learning and exchange came to a close. After expressing sincere gratitude to Master Qian, Ye Mingxuan packed up his tools and unfinished practice pieces, then drove back home.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom, 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous (due to the review), but well-prepared.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Deeply moved and enriched, the review was smoothly passed, and the study of woodworking has even ascended to the level of cultural insight, with slight relief from foot discomfort.

state.今日运动: Rest due to plantar discomfort

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a strong festive atmosphere
date_attribute.holiday: Dragon Boat Festival

2025-05.daily_overview: Dragon Boat Festival Family Reunion Day. In the morning, I made zongzi with my parents. In the afternoon, my mother prepared the reunion dinner. In the evening, we shared the family feast. At night, I watched variety shows and recorded reflections on woodworking. Due to holiday dietary control and foot recovery, my weight reached the target of 71.0 kg, and my sleep pattern was regular.

events.name: Family Casual Conversation on the Morning of the Dragon Boat Festival
events.description: In the morning, after a simple breakfast, the family of three rested in the living room. Father Ye Jianguo, holding his new smartphone, enthusiastically showed Ye Mingxuan the skills he had recently learned—playing chess using a short video app and controlling the smart light bulbs at home via his phone. Ye Mingxuan patiently acted as the "technical advisor" and praised his father for learning quickly.

events.name: Making zongzi with parents
events.description: In the morning, Wang Xiulan brought the glutinous rice that had been soaked overnight, the cleaned zongzi leaves, and the prepared fillings (red dates, red bean paste, and marinated pork belly) to the dining room. Ye Mingxuan and his father washed their hands and, under Wang Xiulan's guidance, learned to wrap zongzi. Although the shapes of the zongzi made by the father and son varied and were not as neat as those made by Wang Xiulan, the process was filled with joy. Everyone chatted and laughed, reminiscing about the fun moments of past Dragon Boat Festivals.

events.name: Mother prepares the Dragon Boat Festival reunion dinner.
events.description: In the afternoon, Mother Wang Xiulan began bustling in the kitchen, meticulously preparing a lavish Dragon Boat Festival dinner. In addition to the zongzi she had wrapped in the morning, she also made Ye Mingxuan's favorite braised pork, steamed perch, cold tossed vegetables, and several stir-fried seasonal greens. The kitchen was filled with an enticing aroma.

events.name: Sharing the Dragon Boat Festival Family Feast
events.description: In the evening, the family of three gathered around the dining table to enjoy a sumptuous Dragon Boat Festival family dinner. They savored the zongzi they had made themselves (which, though not particularly attractive in appearance, tasted delicious), praised the mother’s cooking skills, and shared updates about their recent work, daily lives, and interesting happenings in the community. The atmosphere was warm and harmonious. Ye Mingxuan paid attention to controlling his diet to avoid overeating.

events.name: Post-Meal Cleanup and Leisure
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan proactively stood up to help clear the dishes and cleaned the kitchen together with his father. Afterwards, the family moved to the living room, where they enjoyed some fruit while watching the latest robot combat competition variety show—a shared interest of theirs. The intense confrontations and intricate designs in the program often sparked discussions among them.

events.name: Recording Reflections on Woodworking Studies
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan opened his woodworking study notes in the study. Not only did he record the steps of the mortise and tenon joint practice from Saturday, but he also wrote a detailed passage about the profound impact Master Qian’s demonstration of traditional tools had on him, as well as his reflections on the [craftsmanship spirit], [skill inheritance], and the [relationship between tools and people]. He felt that this learning experience went beyond merely acquiring a skill—it was more like an immersion into culture.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom, Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: The relaxation and joy brought by the holiday, and the anticipation of family reunion.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Warm, happy, and fulfilling, I deeply felt the warmth and support of family during the traditional festival, which nourished my soul, and the discomfort in my feet has largely subsided.

2025-06.daily_overview: On a typical day off, Ye Mingxuan balances studying, financial management, and light exercise at home, maintaining a relaxed yet fulfilling pace to prepare for the upcoming workweek.

events.name: Deepen the study of knowledge on ancient coin collection
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan opened the fourth unit of the online course on ancient coin collection in his home study. He systematically studied the specific factors affecting the price of ancient coins, compared the characteristics of mainstream online and offline trading platforms, and attempted to apply the methods provided in the course to analyze recent market trends, while taking notes.

events.name: Tidying up potted plants at home, contemplating balance
events.description: During a break from his studies, Ye Mingxuan walked to the balcony to water and loosen the soil for his collection of succulent plants. While tending to these resilient plants, he contemplated the balance between risk and value in market analysis, which resonated subtly with his prudent investment philosophy.

events.name: Light Home Stretching Exercises
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan performed a 15-minute full-body stretch in his living room, focusing on relaxing the leg muscles that had become tense from last week's training, as part of active recovery on his rest day.

events.name: Review Annual Individual Income Tax Information
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan logged into the Individual Income Tax APP and meticulously cross-checked the automatically aggregated comprehensive income data for the 2024 fiscal year against his payslip and bank statements. He focused on verifying the accuracy of the special additional deduction information for supporting his parents, ensuring the smooth progress of the subsequent annual tax reconciliation.

events.name: Handling Financial Manager Contacts
events.description: In the evening, he received an email from Zhang Wei, a wealth management manager at China Merchants Bank, containing a summary of the quarterly asset report and an invitation for a meeting. Ye Mingxuan carefully read the report summary and was satisfied that the overall performance of the funds met expectations. He then replied to Manager Zhang via WeChat to confirm the meeting time for Saturday afternoon this week.

events.name: Evening Light Programming Practice
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan turned on his computer and attempted to write an automated script in Python to address a minor data processing issue he had recently encountered at work. Although it was only a preliminary attempt, the process of applying what he had learned to a real-world problem gave him a strong sense of accomplishment.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, relaxed

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Well-prepared and ready for the upcoming week

2025-06.daily_overview: During the Dragon Boat Festival holiday, Ye Mingxuan worked remotely from home and enjoyed family time, with a slight weight gain due to festive gatherings.

events.name: Handling Remote Technical Support Requests
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan received a message from his colleague Zhou Tao, inquiring about details of a design drawing. He logged into the company's internal network via his home computer, reviewed the relevant documents, and clearly explained the key parameters and design intent through voice communication, helping his colleague resolve the confusion.

events.name: Father demonstrates the smart home application.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Jianguo invited two former colleagues from the factory to his home as guests. With great enthusiasm, he demonstrated to his old friends how to use a smart speaker to play selected comedy skits and showed them how to control the living room lights and air conditioning using a mobile app. Seeing the astonished expressions on his colleagues' faces, Ye Jianguo beamed with pride. Ye Mingxuan, standing nearby, added further explanations, feeling pleased with his father's progress.

events.name: Tasting the Zongzi Made by Mother
events.description: In the evening, Mother Wang Xiulan brought out the honey date zongzi and savory pork zongzi she had made herself. The family gathered around to eat zongzi and chat, discussing the customs of the Dragon Boat Festival. Ye Mingxuan felt slightly full after having one more zongzi than usual.

events.name: Plan the key tasks for next week
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan sorted out several project milestones to be followed up this week in his study, including a review meeting for an automated component design and the drafting of a technical document, marking them on the calendar.

events.name: Brief online communication with game teammate Zheng Kai
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan received game update information sent by Zheng Kai. The two briefly discussed the changes in the new version and agreed to team up again over the weekend.

起始状态.心情: The relaxed and joyful atmosphere brought by festivals

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Satisfied with the warmth of family and the efficiency of remote work, yet slightly concerned about overeating.

events.name: Attend the project design review meeting

He provided a detailed presentation on the design of the transmission components under his responsibility, took note of the modification suggestions raised by colleagues and superiors, and prepared to make optimizations after the meeting.

events.name: Determine the Topic for the Ancient Coin Course Assignment
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan, drawing on the course content and his personal interests, finalized the topic for his final assignment: "Analysis of Characteristics and Comparison of Market Values Among Different Variants of the Yuan Datou Silver Coin from the Third Year of the Republic of China."

events.name: Evening Strength Training
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to Lamei Fitness Center for his weekly Tuesday upper body and back strength training session, focusing on exercises such as bench press and rowing. The one-hour workout left him with a satisfying muscle soreness and a sense of effectiveness.

events.name: Research on New Workstation Configuration
events.description: After returning home from training, Ye Mingxuan searched for user feedback on the target workstation model on professional forums, paying special attention to hardware compatibility and thermal performance, and excerpted useful information into his notebook.

events.name: Staying up late to optimize the design
events.description: Due to urgent feedback from the review meeting, Ye Mingxuan stayed up until 23:30 to make preliminary adjustments to the transmission component design in CAD software, resulting in a delay in his sleep time.

events.name: Optimize the Design of Transmission Components
events.description: In accordance with the review comments, Ye Mingxuan spent the entire day working diligently in front of CAD software, repeatedly adjusting the key dimensions and tolerance fits of the transmission components. He conducted simulation analyses to ensure that the optimized design met the performance requirements.

events.name: Participate in community waste sorting supervision
events.description: After work in the evening, Ye Mingxuan went to the community waste sorting station to volunteer, patiently guiding residents in correctly sorting and disposing of garbage while wearing a volunteer vest.

events.name: Post-Volunteering Specialized Stretching
events.description: After the service concluded, Ye Mingxuan performed a 10-minute targeted stretching routine at home, focusing on relaxing his legs which were fatigued from standing and walking, as part of his regular Wednesday habit.

events.name: Exchange Experiences with Volunteers
events.description: During the volunteer service, he discussed with two retired volunteer aunts about the improvement in the accuracy of residents' waste sorting and learned from their experiences in dealing with uncooperative residents, finding it highly beneficial.

events.name: Online communication with colleague Li Xiang
events.description: In the evening, he sent the optimized 3D model to his colleague Li Xiang, who was responsible for simulation, and briefly explained the key modifications on WeChat, requesting assistance with strength verification.

The process was conducted in a solemn and formal manner.

events.name: Handling Urgent Customer Inquiries
events.description: After returning to the company in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan immediately held a nearly one-hour phone call with the technical personnel of the client in Langfang, Hebei. events.name: Evening Strength Training
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to Lamei Fitness Center for his weekly Thursday lower body strength training, focusing on squats and leg presses for one hour, and felt an improvement in his lower body strength.

events.name: Update Parents on Notarization Progress
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan explained the notarization process to his parents, informing them that the notarized document would take several working days to complete. His father nodded in acknowledgment, and his mother remarked, "Once it's done, we can set our minds at ease."

events.name: Woodworking Project Details Conception
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan sketched a simple draft of a portable toolbox on paper, contemplating the mortise and tenon structure and compartmentalized design to relax his mind.

2025-06.daily_overview: A busy Saturday packed with commitments: a financial meeting in the morning, repairing window screens with my father in the afternoon, and a late return from a gathering with friends in the evening. My weight has been steadily increasing due to consecutive dinner parties.

events.name: Variable Pace Running in the Morning Park
events.description: At 6:00 in the morning, Ye Mingxuan went to the greenway of Hebin Park in Xiqing District for his weekly Saturday variable-speed run, which lasted 40 minutes. He enjoyed the tranquility of the outdoors and maintained good aerobic endurance.

events.name: Meeting with a Financial Manager
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan drove to the Private Banking Department of China Merchants Bank to discuss fund performance and asset allocation with his financial manager Zhang Wei. Regarding the car purchase plan, he adopted the suggestion to increase liquidity.

events.name: Determine the Direction of Financial Adjustment
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan decided to increase the proportion of money market funds to reserve funds for car purchases and transfer part of the returns from general funds into more stable products.

events.name: Repairing the screen window together with my father
events.description: In the evening, the father and son repaired the screen window. The father guided the disassembly, while Ye Mingxuan was responsible for stretching the new screen mesh flat and pressing it into the spline. During the process, they shared factory maintenance experience.

events.name: Inspect Maintenance Results
events.description: After installation, Ye Mingxuan trimmed the edges and corners, and checked with his father that the screen was flat and slid smoothly. His father patted him on the shoulder and said, "Good craftsmanship."

events.name: Dining with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan gathered with his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang at a mala xiangguo restaurant to discuss work anecdotes and cycling plans. They indulged in the delicious food a bit more than intended, leading to a late return home.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: The satisfaction and slight fatigue after completing multiple tasks, made pleasant by a gathering meal.

events.name: Staying up late to study German.
events.description: Due to his strong interest in German, Ye Mingxuan studied German pronunciation rules until 23:30 before going to bed, slightly exceeding the planned time, which resulted in him staying up late.

events.description: Due to project launch pressure and lack of sleep, Ye Mingxuan felt slightly irritable during work breaks, and adjusted by taking deep breaths and going for short walks.

events.name: Evening Strength Training
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to the LIMEI Fitness Center for upper body and back strength training, which lasted for one hour. He felt a good muscle pump sensation.

events.description: After the service concluded, Ye Mingxuan performed a 10-minute targeted stretching routine at home to relax his legs.

events.name: Evening Strength Training

2025-06.daily_overview: On Sunday, immersed in personal hobbies and the bond between master and apprentice, Ye Mingxuan completed the sanding and oiling of his woodworking project. He received high praise from his master, who gifted him the finished piece. They then shared tea and conversation, after which he returned home to share his joy.

events.name: Go to Master Qian's Workshop
events.description: In the morning, drive to the workshop in the backyard of Master Qian's house in Yangliuqing Town, carrying the semi-finished storage boxes and tools.

events.name: Final polishing completed under the guidance of the master
events.description: In the workshop, hand-sanding a storage box, Master Qian instructed to follow the direction of the wood grain to remove burrs and achieve a smooth, warm surface.

events.name: Apply wood wax oil to the workpiece
events.description: Apply a thin layer of walnut wood wax oil to the box body. Master Qian explains the advantages of wood wax oil, paying attention to its penetration at the seams.

events.name: The work received high praise from the master.
events.description: Master Qian carefully inspected the finished product, praising the tightness of the mortise and tenon joints and the straightness of the lines, and acknowledging Ye Mingxuan's patience and craftsmanship.

events.name: Presenting the work to the master as a token of gratitude.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan presented the storage box to Master Qian as a token of learning and commemoration, which Master Qian gladly accepted.

events.name: Enjoying tea and exchanging insights with the master.
events.description: While drinking Pu'er tea and chatting, Master Qian shared his experience of learning craftsmanship at a woodworking factory, and Ye Mingxuan discussed the challenges he faced at work, drawing inspiration from the artisan spirit.

events.name: Sharing Joy After Returning Home
events.description: In the evening after returning home, I shared the finished product photos and the master's praise via WeChat, receiving likes from my parents and colleagues.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Eager and slightly excited, ready to present the results.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Full of a sense of achievement, joy, and fulfillment

2025-06.daily_overview: On the first day of an urgent business trip, Ye Mingxuan set off early in the morning for Langfang. Upon arrival, he conducted an in-depth on-site investigation of the fault. In the evening, he discussed with the senior engineer back at headquarters to prepare for the diagnosis the following day.

events.name: Depart for Langfang in the early morning.
events.description: Early in the morning, I took the high-speed train to Langfang with my belongings. During the journey, I called Engineer Gao to inquire about the details of the malfunction.

events.name: Arrive at the scene and conduct preliminary diagnosis.
events.description: Arrived at the factory in the morning, met with the technical lead, observed the operational status of the equipment, and retrieved sensor data for preliminary analysis.

events.name: Initial determination of the fault direction
events.description: The issue is confined to the linear module system, with suspicion directed toward mechanical fit tolerances or servo drive parameters, requiring further investigation.

events.name: Evening discussion with Senior Engineer Gao
events.description: In the evening, organize the report at the hotel and send it to Gao Zhiyuan, conduct a video call to discuss possibilities, with a focus on inspecting vulnerable parts and assembly accuracy.

events.name: Irregular eating habits due to business trips
events.description: Meals at the factory were taken late throughout the day, consisting mainly of fast food, which caused slight discomfort, but work was continued.

起始状态.心情: Nervous yet goal-oriented, ready to embrace challenges.

结束状态.心情: Highly focused with a slight sense of pressure, the troubleshooting approach gradually becomes clear.

2025-06.daily_overview: A day of overcoming challenges and showcasing technical prowess, Ye Mingxuan identified the root cause of the fault, creatively designed a fine-tuning shim solution, guided the machining process, and successfully conducted tests, earning gratitude from the client.

events.name: Conduct in-depth investigation to identify the root cause of the issue
events.description: The transmission components were re-measured using a micrometer, confirming that machining deviations in the bore of the purchased coupling caused abnormal clearance and sticking in the fit.

events.name: Devise creative solutions
events.description: To avoid a week-long wait for new parts, Inspiration Design uses precision shims to compensate for gaps, calculating thickness and tolerance requirements.

events.name: Prepare drawings and guide machining.
events.description: Utilize CAD to create the machining drawing for the gasket, deliver it to the machining workshop, and personally explain the key points to the experienced master to ensure high-precision machining.

events.name: Supervise installation and complete testing.
events.description: The gasket processing was completed in the afternoon, followed by supervision of the installation and multiple rounds of testing. The equipment operated smoothly without any lag, earning applause and gratitude from the client.

events.name: Going to bed early due to a sense of accomplishment and fatigue.
events.description: Feeling a great sense of accomplishment and relief in the evening, but due to fatigue from continuous work, I decided to go to bed early to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: The decision has been made, and a solution must be found.

结束状态.所处地点: A hotel room in Langfang City, Hebei Province
结束状态.心情: A profound sense of accomplishment and relief, with creative problem-solving bringing satisfaction.

events.description: Transfer 60% of the bonus to the index fund regular investment account, 20% to the car purchase fund, and retain 20% as personal rewards for travel or tools.

2025-06.daily_overview: At the company's annual team-building day, Ye Mingxuan participated in ice-breaking activities, demonstrated planning skills during the orienteering event and gained recognition, contributed practically during the barbecue session, and politely declined the invitation for further socializing to maintain appropriate social boundaries.

events.name: Participate in the company's annual team-building event
events.description: In the early morning, I met up with colleagues and took a bus to the Jizhou Outdoor Training Base. On the bus, I chatted with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang about games and interesting anecdotes from business trips.

events.name: Participate in Ice-breaking and Team-building Games
events.description: Upon arrival, I participated in team challenges such as "Falling Forest," and despite limited personal interest, I engaged earnestly, demonstrating a spirit of collaboration.

events.name: Demonstrate Planning Skills in Orienteering
events.description: In the afternoon, teaming up with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, Ye Mingxuan quickly studied the map to plan an efficient route, directed the squad to complete the task ahead of others, and received praise from colleagues.

events.name: Actively participate in the barbecue session.
events.description: In the evening, I proactively helped organize and skewer the ingredients, turned the grill, and enjoyed participating in a way that involved specific tasks.

events.name: Declining a Colleague's Invitation for Further Socializing After Work
events.description: After the event ended, colleagues invited him to KTV. Ye Mingxuan politely declined due to depleted social energy and chose to go home to rest.

events.name: Reflecting on Social Boundaries
events.description: On the way home alone, I reflected on the rejection and felt it was necessary. As an ISTJ, I need solitude to recharge and maintain a balance between work and life.

He worked with his coach to develop a fitness plan for an upcoming trip to Qinghai Lake and installed smart home devices for his family.

events.name: Conduct monthly physical fitness tests and achieve positive results
events.description: Measured with a smart body fat scale in the morning, weight is 70.3kg, body fat percentage has decreased, muscle mass remains stable, confirming the effectiveness of the fat loss plan.

events.name: Review the weight loss plan and formulate fine-tuning adjustments.
events.description: Review the APP and dietary journal to develop a fine-tuning plan for the next month: increase high-quality protein, alternate exercise types, control weekend gatherings, and send the plan to the coach for feedback.

events.name: Develop a physical fitness plan for Qinghai Lake travel with the coach.
events.description: In the afternoon, I went to the fitness center, where Wang Jian assessed my physical fitness and together we developed a four-week progressive plan to strengthen cardiovascular endurance, core stability, and leg endurance.

events.name: First Attempt at Swimming Training
events.description: In the evening, I went to the community swimming pool and tried swimming for 30 minutes as a low-impact cardio exercise. Feeling well-adapted, I plan to incorporate it into my routine.

events.name: Installing Smart Home Devices for Households
events.description: After returning home, install the smart door lock and smart light bulbs, register fingerprints, and configure the network and scene modes.

events.name: Patiently teach parents how to use new devices.
events.description: Teaching my mother step by step how to use the voice assistant to turn the lights on and off, after repeated practice, she mastered it and showed a satisfied smile.

events.description: Summarized the June project progress during the day, planned the key tasks for July, and the successful Langfang project made the reporting more confident.

events.name: Monthly Fitness Summary with Coach

2025-07.daily_overview: On the first day of July, Ye Mingxuan embarked on his busy workweek with a pragmatic and efficient mindset. During the day, he devoted himself entirely to the meticulous design optimization of the project. After work, he methodically attended to personal matters, from arranging household services to planning trips and implementing fitness routines, reflecting the strong planning skills and attention to detail characteristic of his ISTJ personality.

events.name: Optimize the design of key components
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan immediately immersed himself in intense CAD design upon arriving at the company. Using the new version of SolidWorks software, which the company had recently provided unified training on, he refined the details of the three-dimensional model for the key transmission components of the automated production line renovation project. He repeatedly checked the dimensional tolerances, fit requirements, and surface treatment annotations on the engineering drawings to ensure all technical details were accurate and met the client's high-precision demands. Throughout the morning, he remained absorbed in the world of data and lines, occasionally engaging in low-voiced discussions with his colleague Zhou Tao seated nearby about the rationality of certain annotations.

events.name: Cardiorespiratory Endurance Training (Phase I)
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went directly to Lemei Fitness Center. Under the guidance of Coach Wang Jian, he began a two-week foundational cardiopulmonary endurance enhancement training. Today’s session focused on adaptive training: he started with a 10-minute warm-up to activate his body, followed by a 30-minute jog on the treadmill at a speed of 6.5 km/h, with his heart rate strictly maintained within the range of 140–150 beats per minute. Coach Wang observed his running posture and breathing rhythm, offering timely adjustments and suggestions. After the training, Ye Mingxuan meticulously recorded the running distance (approximately 3.2 km), duration, average heart rate (146), and post-training sensations (steady breathing, slight soreness in the legs) in his fitness app.

events.name: Check Project Bonus Arrival
events.description: On his way home from the gym, Ye Mingxuan received a text message notification from China Merchants Bank on his phone, indicating that the second-quarter project bonus had been deposited. He opened the mobile banking app to confirm the exact amount. This additional income made him feel more at ease about the upcoming major expenses, such as the self-driving tour to Qinghai Lake.

events.name: Research on Air Conditioning Cleaning Services
events.description: At home in the evening, thinking about the humidity of Tianjin's summer and his parents' concern for air quality, Ye Mingxuan decided to have the two air conditioners in the house professionally cleaned. Sitting at the computer in his study, he carefully compared the prices, service content, and user reviews of three or four well-regarded service providers through local lifestyle service platforms and community owner groups, and noted the two initially selected ones in his memo.

events.name: Communicating self-driving travel plans with travel companions
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan contacted his hiking friend Wu Bin in Chengdu via WeChat. He formally proposed the idea of a self-driving trip around Qinghai Lake in early August and sent a preliminary itinerary framework he had drafted. Through a brief voice conversation, the two confirmed the general timing of the trip (departing around August 8), the budget cap, and the number of days each could commit (approximately eight days). They agreed that Ye Mingxuan would take primary responsibility for vehicle and route planning, while Wu Bin would be in charge of the equipment and emergency supplies checklist.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the work motivation at the beginning of the month and the focus on planning new tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment and orderliness neutralizes the slight fatigue after a workout.

state.今日运动: Jogged on a treadmill at the gym for 30 minutes, heart rate 146 bpm.
