2025-08.daily_overview: Departure Day. Ye Mingxuan's entire day revolved around the central theme of [departure]. He meticulously packed his luggage, checked his equipment, bid farewell to family and friends, and made final confirmations for his itinerary. Transforming from a meticulous engineer into an explorer about to embark on a journey, his excitement and anticipation grew steadily as his luggage filled up.

events.name: Packing clothing and personal items
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan, considering the significant temperature difference between day and night at Qinghai Lake in August, layered and packed items such as a windbreaker, fleece liner, quick-drying clothes, and thermal underwear into his suitcase. He also organized his personal toiletry bag, common medications, and a laptop (in case of urgent work needs).

events.name: Having a farewell dinner with family
events.description: In the evening, the mother prepared a lavish dinner. Ye Mingxuan once again explained his travel plans and emergency contact information to his parents. His father, a man of few words, simply added another reminder to "drive slowly," while his mother kept putting food into his bowl.

events.name: Inspection and Cleaning of Photographic Equipment
events.description: Ye Mingxuan took out his DSLR camera, two lenses, and tripod, carefully cleaning the lenses and image sensor with professional tools, and checking the shutter and aperture functions. He also fully charged all his equipment, including the camera, drone, and GoPro, and cleared the memory cards.

events.name: Final pre-trip confirmation with travel companions
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin conducted their final video call before departure. They verified the flight times, the meeting point at Xining Airport, the car rental contract number, and reconfirmed the driving route and contingency plan for the first day.

events.name: Electronic Devices and Vehicle Preparation
events.description: Ye Mingxuan gathered all electronic devices (mobile phone, power bank, camera battery, car inverter) for centralized charging. He downloaded offline maps of the Qinghai Lake area, along with several movies and audiobooks, onto his tablet. At the same time, he formatted the memory card of the dashcam and checked the car air pump and emergency power supply.

events.name: Packing Luggage and Planning Vehicle Space
events.description: He neatly arranged the packed suitcase, camera equipment bag, outdoor gear storage box, and food box (containing water, snacks, and self-heating meals) by the door, mentally rehearsing how to organize them properly in the trunk to ensure stability during the drive and easy access when needed.

events.name: New Noise Incident: Insomnia Due to Excitement
events.description: Due to his anticipation for the trip, Ye Mingxuan found it difficult to fall asleep at night, staying up later than usual with an excited mood.

起始状态.心情: Unable to contain the excitement, starting to get into travel mode.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home
结束状态.心情: A sense of anticipation that everything is ready, tinged with a hint of reluctance before leaving home, but more so a longing for the distant horizon.

state.今日运动: Carrying and arranging luggage (light physical activity)

2025-08.daily_overview: The journey of dreams officially commenced. Shifting from the work-life setting in Tianjin to the starting point of the trip in Xining, Ye Mingxuan went through a day of travel transitions. A late-night flight carried him to the highlands, where he successfully met up with Wu Bin, a fellow traveler who shared his aspirations. Though physically somewhat fatigued, the novelty of being in an unfamiliar place and the upcoming journey around the lake filled him with excitement.

events.name: Final Check and Departure
events.description: During the day, I worked normally, handling some miscellaneous tasks and completing the final handover. After work, Ye Mingxuan returned home to pick up his luggage, checked the water, electricity, gas, doors, and windows once again, and then took a taxi to Tianjin Binhai International Airport.

events.name: Arriving in Xining to meet up with fellow backpackers.
events.description: After several hours of flight, Ye Mingxuan arrived at Xining Caojiabao International Airport. He turned on his phone and soon met Wu Bin, who had flown in from Chengdu, in the arrival hall. Although they frequently communicated online, they had not met in person many times, making this reunion particularly joyful. They patted each other on the shoulder in greeting.

events.name: Hotel Check-in and Pre-trip Briefing
events.description: The two of them took a taxi together to the reserved hotel. After settling their luggage in the room, they took out their itinerary and, using the Xining map provided by the hotel, briefly checked the location for picking up the car the next day, the route, and possible supply points along the way. Wu Bin also shared the spicy beef jerky he had brought from Chengdu. As they ate and chatted, they were filled with anticipation for the official start of their journey the next day.

events.name: New Cross-Day Event Continuation: Plateau Acclimatization Discussion
events.description: Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin began discussing specific strategies for high-altitude adaptation, planning to continuously monitor their physical reactions over the next few days.

起始状态.心情: The excitement of the departure day, tinged with a sense of urgency from the rush.

结束状态.所处地点: A hotel in Xining, Qinghai Province
结束状态.心情: The excitement and freshness of arriving at the destination, with the body feeling slightly tired but the spirit remaining high.

state.今日运动: Walking and Carrying Luggage Inside the Airport

2025-08.daily_overview: Day One of the self-driving tour around Qinghai Lake. Departing from Xining, we passed through Riyue Mountain and arrived at the shore of Qinghai Lake. Along the way, the magnificent plateau scenery continuously captivated our vision. The two of us worked together, handling car rental, purchasing supplies, and driving across the vast landscape. In the evening, we checked into a lakeside inn and experienced the azure waters up close for the first time. The fatigue of the journey was swept away by the breathtaking beauty and the sense of freedom.

events.name: Handling Car Rental Procedures and Inspecting Vehicle Conditions
events.description: In the early morning, Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin headed to the car rental location. With the professional eye of a mechanical engineer, Ye Mingxuan meticulously inspected the pre-rented off-road vehicle, checking the tire wear, oil dipstick, brake pad thickness, as well as the functionality of the lights, wipers, and other features. He also walked around the vehicle to examine the body for any scratches. Meanwhile, Wu Bin verified the details of the rental contract. After confirming everything was in order, the two officially picked up the vehicle.

events.name: Procurement of Self-Driving Trip Supplies
events.description: They purchased cartons of bottled water, instant food, fruit, tissues, and two portable oxygen canisters at a supermarket in Xining's urban area. Ye Mingxuan also specifically bought an atlas as a backup to electronic navigation.

events.name: Drive to Qinghai Lake and acclimatize to the high altitude.
events.description: The two of them set off from Xining by car, heading toward Qinghai Lake. As they crossed the Riyue Mountain, the altitude noticeably increased, and Ye Mingxuan felt a slight pressure in his ears, which he adjusted to by taking deep breaths. They stopped at a scenic overlook on the mountain pass and caught their first distant glimpse of Qinghai Lake, which resembled a sapphire. Excitedly, they took photos to commemorate the moment.

events.name: Short-distance Cycling Experience on East Ring Lake Road
events.description: After arriving in the East Lake area in the afternoon, they rented two bicycles by the roadside and cycled approximately 10 kilometers along the dedicated bike path. With a gentle breeze brushing their faces and the lake water rippling beside them, this slower-paced way of connecting with nature brought Ye Mingxuan a profound sense of contentment.

events.name: Check in at the Lakeside Inn
events.description: In the evening, they checked into the lakeside inn they had booked in advance. The window of their room faced the lake directly. After setting down their luggage, the two walked to the lakeside and quietly watched as the sunset painted the water and sky in shades of gold and crimson. The only sounds were the wind and the lapping of the waves, as if everything from the city had faded into the distance.

events.name: New Random Event: Mild Altitude Sickness
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan experienced a mild headache, which was alleviated through rest and hydration, while maintaining an optimistic mood.

起始状态.心情: Filled with curiosity and motivation for the new day

结束状态.所处地点: Lakeside Inn at Qinghai Lake
结束状态.心情: Awe and tranquility interweave, deeply moved by the beauty of nature, with the body gradually acclimating to the high altitude.

state.今日运动: Driving, approximately 1-hour short cycling trip around the lake.

date_attribute.weather: Qinghai Lake, partly cloudy with sunny intervals

2025-08.daily_overview: On the second day of the journey, we explored the diverse landscapes of Qinghai Lake. In the morning, we experienced the wonder of the desert and lake coexisting at Sand Island, while in the afternoon, we leisurely drove along the southern shore of the lake. Without a tight schedule, the two of us stopped, took photos, and daydreamed more freely, fully enjoying the relaxed feeling of the journey itself.

events.name: Sand Island Scenic Area Tour and Photography
events.description: In the morning, they drove to the Sand Island scenic area. On one side were the rolling golden sand dunes, and on the other was the azure lake water. This peculiar combination prompted Ye Mingxuan to frequently raise his camera. He even attempted to use a slow shutter speed to capture the contrast between the movement of the lake water and the flowing sand. Wu Bin, on the other hand, was in high spirits and tried sandboarding.

events.name: Drive along the southern shore of the lake
events.description: The afternoon itinerary was relatively relaxed, primarily involving driving along the South Ring Road of the lake. They occasionally stopped at scenic spots—sometimes to photograph flocks of waterbirds on the lake, and other times simply to sit by the roadside, gazing at the blue sky, white clouds, and the vast expanse of the lake without a single thought in mind. Ye Mingxuan also captured many wonderful moments using the car's dashcam.

events.name: An Evening Lakeside Stroll and the First Appearance of Stars
events.description: After checking into their accommodation near Heima River, the two took a stroll by the lake before dinner. As night fell, stars gradually began to appear in the sky. Ye Mingxuan adjusted the camera settings and attempted to capture a few shots of the lakeshore under the starry sky. Although the results were not as expected, he found the process deeply engaging.

events.name: Add cross-day event: Three consecutive days of light hiking
events.description: Ye Mingxuan began a three-day light hiking plan, gradually increasing the hiking distance each day to enhance high-altitude acclimatization.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy a slow-paced journey.

结束状态.所处地点: Accommodation options near Heima River
结束状态.心情: Leisurely and content, fully experiencing the delights of nature, and having largely adapted to the highland environment.

state.今日运动: Dune hiking, lakeside walking

date_attribute.weather: Heima River, clear weather, extremely cold in the early morning

2025-08.daily_overview: In pursuit of the legendary sunrise over Heihe River, the two rose early in the morning. Despite the biting cold, the magnificent sunrise made the wait worthwhile. The day continued with a journey around the lake, and by afternoon, they arrived at Chaka Salt Lake, leaving unforgettable reflections in the "Mirror of the Sky." It was a day filled with visual feasts and extraordinary experiences.

events.name: Witness the Magnificent Sunrise at Heima River
events.description: Before dawn broke, the two of them bundled up in their thickest clothes and made their way to the Heima River viewing platform. After waiting for a long time in the near-freezing wind, the horizon finally began to glow red. The sun leaped out, dyeing the lake, sky, and clouds in a brilliant golden-red hue. The sight before him made Ye Mingxuan forget the cold, leaving only the click of the camera shutter and a sense of awe in his heart.

events.name: From Heima River to Chaka Salt Lake
events.description: After watching the sunrise, they returned to their accommodation for breakfast and checked out before driving to the famous Chaka Salt Lake. Along the way, they passed through vast grasslands and distant snow-capped mountains, with the scenery constantly changing.

events.name: Experience the [Sky Mirror]
events.description: In the afternoon at Chaka Salt Lake, the two took a small train deep into the heart of the lake. Walking barefoot into the salt lake, the clear saltwater submerged their ankles. Looking down, they saw pure white salt crystals; looking up, they beheld the azure sky. The perfect reflections made it difficult to distinguish between the sky and the earth. Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin took many interesting [mirror] photos of each other.

events.name: Return to accommodation on West Lake Ring Road
events.description: We returned from Chaka in the evening and checked into a homestay on the West Ring Road of the lake. Having walked quite a distance in the salt lake during the day, both of us felt somewhat exhausted by nightfall. We rested early to conserve energy for the next day's itinerary.

events.name: New Cross-Day Event Continuation: Light Hiking Day Two
events.description: While walking in the salt lake, Ye Mingxuan increased his hiking distance to continue his high-altitude acclimatization training.

起始状态.心情: With a strong anticipation for the sunrise, undeterred by the bitter cold.

结束状态.所处地点: West Lakeside Road Homestay
结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment and tranquility following immense visual and spiritual impact, accompanied by slight physical fatigue.

state.今日运动: Walking in the salt lake, walking within the scenic area

2025-08.daily_overview: A small incident during the journey made today particularly memorable. While exploring unpaved roads, the vehicle suddenly produced an unusual noise. Relying on his mechanical knowledge, Ye Mingxuan calmly diagnosed the issue and successfully resolved the fault. This unexpected challenge of solving a problem together not only failed to dampen their spirits but also strengthened the sense of trust and security between them during the trip. It has since become a story they can fondly recount in the future.

events.name: Drive onto unpaved roads for exploration
events.description: In the morning, following the plan, they left the main road and turned onto a gravel dirt road leading to a lesser-known scenic spot. The path was bumpy, but the scenery was more pristine and magnificent, as the vehicle advanced through the swirling dust.

events.name: Sudden abnormal noise from the vehicle chassis.
events.description: After driving for about half an hour, a continuous [clanking] metal scraping sound suddenly came from under the vehicle. Ye Mingxuan immediately became alert, slowed down steadily, and pulled over to a relatively safe and spacious area by the roadside.

events.name: Preliminary Examination and Assessment
events.description: After parking the car, Ye Mingxuan bent down and crawled under the vehicle to inspect it. Wu Bin turned on his phone's flashlight to provide illumination. Ye Mingxuan quickly discovered that several fixing screws on the chassis guard plate had loosened due to severe jolting, causing the guard plate to sag and rub against protruding objects on the ground. [It's a minor issue—the screws are loose. Tightening them will fix it.] He calmly explained the situation to Wu Bin.

events.name: Collaborative Troubleshooting
events.description: Wu Bin retrieved the vehicle tool kit from the trunk. Ye Mingxuan selected the appropriate wrench and, with Wu Bin providing illumination and assistance, tightened each loose screw securely. The two worked in seamless coordination, resolving the issue within ten minutes.

events.name: Continue the journey after troubleshooting.
events.description: After getting back in the car, the strange noise disappeared. The two exchanged a knowing smile, and Wu Bin joked, "As expected of Engineer Ye—having a mechanic along on the trip really puts one at ease." Ye Mingxuan also breathed a sigh of relief and continued driving, but from then on, he became more cautious in his choice of road conditions.

events.name: Short-distance birdwatching hike in the afternoon
events.description: In the afternoon, they arrived near Bird Island (access to the island may be restricted depending on the season) and took a short hike in the ecological observation area along the West Ring Road of the lake. Using binoculars, they observed birds such as bar-headed geese and brown-headed gulls, experiencing the ecological beauty of Qinghai Lake.

events.name: End of New Cross-Day Event: Light Hiking Day Three
events.description: Ye Mingxuan completed three consecutive days of light hiking, demonstrating a significant improvement in high-altitude adaptation and a confident mood.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, ready to embrace a new day of exploration.

结束状态.所处地点: A Certain Hotel in Gangcha County
结束状态.心情: The sense of accomplishment and reassurance after overcoming minor challenges, along with the significantly enhanced rapport with companions.

state.今日运动: Drive, followed by a short hike of approximately 5 kilometers.

2025-08.daily_overview: The journey entered its latter half, transitioning from the main scenic area around the lake to the depths of the grasslands. We took a break in Gangcha County, sampling authentic local cuisine and conducting a vehicle inspection. In the afternoon, we drove into the Qilian Mountain grasslands, where the boundless green fields and herds of cattle and sheep offered a sense of vastness distinctly different from that of the lake. A visit to the Atomic City Memorial Museum added a touch of historical depth to the trip.

events.name: Rest and Vehicle Inspection in Gangcha County Town
events.description: In the morning at Gangcha County, Ye Mingxuan found a car wash to clean the dust-covered vehicle and had the staff check the tire pressure and chassis again (especially the screws tightened yesterday). Meanwhile, Wu Bin went to replenish some fruits and snacks.

events.name: Taste local specialty cuisine
events.description: For lunch, the two found a well-reputed Tibetan restaurant in the county town, where they sampled tsampa, yak yogurt, and hand-grabbed mutton. Ye Mingxuan was not quite accustomed to the texture of tsampa but praised the delicious mutton highly.

events.name: Driving into the Qilian Mountain Grassland
events.description: In the afternoon, they left the main area of Qinghai Lake and drove north into the Qilian Mountain grasslands. The straight road stretched toward the horizon, flanked by rolling green hills and leisurely grazing livestock, creating a vast and awe-inspiring landscape. They stopped multiple times, simply to immerse themselves in the boundless expanse of greenery.

events.name: Visit the Atomic City Memorial Museum in Xihai Town
events.description: Before evening, they arrived at Xihai Town and visited the Atomic City Memorial Museum. Learning about that secret yet great history and witnessing the achievements made by the older generation of researchers under such harsh conditions, Ye Mingxuan, as an engineer, felt deeply moved and inspired.

events.name: Return to Xining
events.description: After the visit concluded, the two drove back to Xining City. As the journey neared its end, they spent the entire trip reflecting on the sights and experiences of the past few days.

events.name: New Random Event: Slight Weight Gain Due to Grassland Cuisine
events.description: Due to consuming a considerable amount of beef and lamb during lunch, Ye Mingxuan experienced a slight increase in weight, but remained in high spirits.

起始状态.心情: Composure, enjoy the relaxation of the latter part of the journey.

结束状态.所处地点: Hotels in Xining City
结束状态.心情: The sense of fulfillment after taking in diverse landscapes, and the inner tranquility gained from being touched by history.

state.今日运动: Drive to the memorial, and walk for the visit inside.

2025-08.daily_overview: The final night of the lakeside journey was also the night of the most profound conversation. During the day, they leisurely completed the remaining stretch of the lakeside route and checked into a lakeside homestay in the evening. As night fell, under the clear and brilliant Milky Way, the two let down their guard and engaged in a deep conversation like never before. The starry sky, the lake, and the sincere dialogue elevated their friendship to a new height.

events.name: Complete the remaining section of the lakeside route.
events.description: During the day, they drove leisurely, completing the final stretch of the lakeside road. Without any specific scenic spots in mind, they simply enjoyed the feeling of cruising through the last moments amid the lake and mountains, occasionally stopping to capture the beautiful moments they encountered through their lenses.

events.name: Check in at the lakeside homestay and enjoy dinner.
events.description: In the evening, they checked into the last pre-booked guesthouse on the southern shore of Qinghai Lake. The guesthouse had a small courtyard facing the lake. Dinner was served in the courtyard, where they enjoyed a simple hotpot meal as the sky gradually darkened and a cool breeze blew from the lake.

events.name: Deep Night Conversation Under the Starry Sky
events.description: After nightfall, the Milky Way became clearly visible, stretching across the sky. The two of them, wrapped in their coats, sat on reclining chairs in the courtyard. Against such a magnificent and tranquil backdrop, their conversation gradually shifted from travel anecdotes to deeper topics such as work pressures, career uncertainties, family expectations, and their confusion and dreams for the future. Ye Mingxuan rarely opened up to others about the stress of his promotion to senior engineer and his anxiety over purchasing a property, while Wu Bin also shared the adventures and uncertainties of his career in the outdoor industry. This conversation transformed them from mere [playmates] into genuine [confidants] who truly understood each other.

events.name: Added status change event: Planning future cooperation
events.description: Based on in-depth discussions, Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin began exploring potential collaborative projects in the fields of machinery and outdoor equipment, feeling hopeful about the future.

起始状态.心情: Cherish the final stop of the journey.

结束状态.所处地点: South Shore Homestays of Qinghai Lake
结束状态.心情: The clarity and tranquility after the soul is cleansed, the acquisition of a deep friendship worth cherishing, and a heart filled with profound emotion.

state.今日运动: Driving, lakeside stroll

2025-08.daily_overview: The journey concluded, returning to daily life. After watching the final sunrise over Qinghai Lake in the early morning, the two embarked on their return trip. The plane carried Ye Mingxuan from the vast plateau back to the familiar city. Upon returning home, while unpacking his luggage and sharing his experiences, he had already begun planning for his future career development—outlining a German language learning plan. This marked a smooth transition in his life focus from travel and exploration back to personal growth and professional advancement.

events.name: Watching the Sunrise at Dawn and Bidding Farewell
events.description: In the early morning, the two rose early once again and quietly watched their final sunrise over Qinghai Lake by the lakeside near the homestay. Unlike the liveliness of Heima River, the morning here was more serene, with only the calls of waterfowl. In this way, they bid a quiet farewell to Qinghai Lake.

events.name: Return Trip: Return the Car and Fly Back to Tianjin
events.description: In the morning, we returned to Xining to complete the car return procedures. After verifying that everything was in order, we settled the payment. We then headed to the airport to catch the afternoon flight back to Tianjin. Upon landing, the familiar, warm and humid air greeted us, signaling the complete end of the journey.

events.name: Home Organization and Sharing
events.description: Returning home in the evening, his parents prepared his favorite dishes to welcome him back. While eating, Ye Mingxuan excitedly showed his parents photos and videos from his phone, sharing amusing and thrilling stories from his journey (such as when the car's chassis screws came loose). His mother expressed concern over his sun-tanned skin, while his father was particularly interested in the details of how the vehicle malfunction was handled.

events.name: Plan a German Learning Schedule
events.description: After the excitement of the journey gradually subsided, Ye Mingxuan sat down at his desk. Considering the long-term development of his career, he decided to start learning German so that he could directly read German technical materials in the future. He searched online for German courses and textbooks suitable for engineers and initially formulated a six-month part-time study plan, clearly defining weekly study hours and phased goals.

events.name: New Event: Check Health Status and Record
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan measured his weight and recorded it as 71.5kg, confirming that it was consistent with his condition at the end of the trip. He felt satisfied and was ready to return to a regular routine.

起始状态.所处地点: South Shore Homestays of Qinghai Lake
起始状态.心情: Reluctance at the end of the journey, and the complex emotions about returning home.

结束状态.所处地点: Tianjin Home
结束状态.心情: A sense of groundedness from returning intertwines with the immense satisfaction of achieving goals; the body and mind are slightly weary yet brimming with energy, and planning for the next phase has already begun.

state.今日运动: Airport Commute Walk

2025-08.daily_overview: Today marks Ye Mingxuan's 26th birthday and the final day of the self-driving tour around Qinghai Lake. The day began with the magnificent sunrise at Heima River, and during the journey, he received a surprise birthday greeting from fellow traveler Wu Bin. They then completed the tour along the western and northern routes of the lake, arriving at Gangcha County in the evening. The trip concluded with a simple Tibetan-style dinner. That night, they began packing their belongings in preparation for the return journey the following day.

events.name: Sunrise at Heima River and Qinghai Lake Circuit Itinerary
events.description: In the early morning, Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin, at the Heima River viewing spot they had selected the previous day, were fortunate enough to witness the magnificent sunrise over Qinghai Lake. They then continued driving along the West Lake Road and the northwestern shore, with the scenery outside the car window gradually transitioning from grasslands to sand dunes and mountains. During a rest stop along the way, Wu Bin magically produced a small custom-made birthday cake ordered in advance in Xining and a packaged custom car fragrance gift from a thermal box. Against the backdrop of the blue sky, white clouds, and rolling mountains of the plateau, they celebrated Ye Mingxuan’s birthday with a touch of wilderness and heartfelt sincerity. In the evening, the two arrived in Gangcha County, where they enjoyed dinner at a cozy Tibetan-style restaurant. They toasted with butter tea instead of wine, exchanged blessings, and spent a simple, natural, yet memorable birthday.

events.name: Pack your bags and check the vehicle.
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan returned to the hotel and methodically packed all his personal belongings and self-driving equipment in the room, storing valuable items such as cameras and telescopes separately. Following his routine, he then went to the parking lot and used his own portable tools to recheck the tire pressure, oil dipstick, and brake fluid level of the rented off-road vehicle, ensuring safety for the long return journey the next day.

events.name: Mild altitude sickness affects sleep.
events.description: Due to the high altitude and travel fatigue, Ye Mingxuan experienced mild headaches when falling asleep at night, resulting in average sleep quality and a later bedtime than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: In a hotel room in Heimahe Township, Hainan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province
起始状态.心情: Anticipation, tranquility

结束状态.所处地点: In a hotel room in Gangcha County, Haibei Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, fulfilled, with a faint sense of melancholy before parting and a slight weariness.

state.今日运动: Mild (Driving around the lake with brief stops for short walks)

date_attribute.weather: Sunny. Clear weather in the Qinghai Lake area, with favorable conditions in Xining and along the return route.

2025-08.daily_overview: The return day of the self-driving tour around Qinghai Lake. Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin set off early from Gangcha County back to Xining. After completing the car rental return procedures, they had lunch together and reflected on their journey. Subsequently, they bid farewell at the airport and took their respective flights back to Tianjin and Chengdu. Ye Mingxuan experienced a long-haul flight and ground transportation, safely returning to his home in Tianjin in the evening. He shared travel stories with his parents and began handling post-trip chores.

events.name: Return to Xining and return the rental car.
events.description: After breakfast, Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin departed from Gangcha County by car, returning to Xining City via National Highway G315 and the Jingzang Expressway. Upon arriving in Xining, they proceeded directly to the car rental company's branch. Accompanied by staff, they carefully inspected the vehicle's exterior and interior conditions. After confirming there was no new damage, they smoothly completed the return and payment settlement procedures. The entire process reflected Ye Mingxuan's meticulousness and sense of responsibility as an engineer.

events.name: Farewell at Lunch, Parting Ways at the Airport
events.description: The two found a well-reviewed local specialty restaurant in Xining city for lunch. At the table, they browsed through photos and videos on their phones, reminiscing about the highlights, amusing anecdotes, and thrilling moments from their ten-day journey (such as dealing with the abnormal noise from the chassis). Ye Mingxuan once again thanked Wu Bin for the carefully prepared birthday surprise. After the meal, they headed together to Xining Caojiapu Airport. In the parking lot, they shook hands and bid farewell, promising to stay in touch and plan their next road trip. After watching Wu Bin walk toward the domestic departure hall, Ye Mingxuan proceeded to his own flight counter to check in.

events.name: Take a flight back to Tianjin.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan took the afternoon flight to Tianjin. On the plane, he put on noise-canceling headphones, gathered his thoughts, and began a preliminary selection of some of the best photos from his camera and phone, preparing to share them with his family after returning home.

events.name: Return home for reunion, share the journey
events.description: The flight arrived at Tianjin Binhai International Airport in the evening. Ye Mingxuan took the airport shuttle bus back to Xiqing District and then hailed a taxi home. As soon as he entered the door, his parents, who had been waiting for a long time, greeted him. He took out souvenirs brought back from Qinghai Lake—several uniquely shaped lakeside stones and postcards—and eagerly used his tablet to show his parents photos and videos from the journey. He shared experiences such as the sunrise at Heima River, starlit night conversations, and a high-altitude birthday celebration. The house was filled with the warmth of reunion and joyful laughter.

events.name: Vehicle Cleaning and Preliminary Arrangement
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan first drove his private car to a familiar car wash near the residential area for a thorough interior and exterior cleaning, removing the dust accumulated during the trip. Upon returning home, he sorted out the dirty clothes from his suitcase and placed them in the washing machine, while organizing photography equipment, hiking shoes, and other items back into the study or storage room.

起始状态.所处地点: In a hotel room in Gangcha County, Qinghai Province
起始状态.心情: Eager to return home, yet somewhat reluctant to see the journey end.

结束状态.所处地点: In my own bedroom at home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Relaxed, grounded, immersed in the warmth of family and travel memories, yet slightly weary from the journey.

state.今日运动: Light (primarily walking and carrying luggage)

date_attribute.weather: Tianjin, sunny turning to cloudy, with muggy weather.

2025-08.daily_overview: The first workday after returning from a trip. Ye Mingxuan quickly switched back to work mode. In the morning, he reported to his supervisor and handled the backlog of emails. In the afternoon, he held a meeting with his project team colleagues to kick off the execution tasks for the new phase. Outside of work, he observed and contemplated ways to optimize the care of the succulent plants on his balcony and began developing an interest in 3D printers. In the evening, he attended an online technical sharing session within the industry to continue his learning.

events.name: Return to work
events.description: On Monday morning, Ye Mingxuan returned to Tianjin Haitai Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. on time. He first went to the office of his direct supervisor, Engineer Gao Zhiyuan, to briefly report that he had safely returned from the self-driving trip to Qinghai Lake and expressed gratitude to his colleagues for covering his duties during the vacation. Subsequently, he also provided the same notification to Project Manager Wang Peng, indicating that he had fully resumed his work responsibilities.

events.name: Address backlogged work
events.description: Ye Mingxuan opened his work email and the company's internal communication software, carefully reviewing and handling dozens of work emails and project group messages that had accumulated during his trip. He was pleased to confirm that the "AGV Chassis Drive System Optimization Proposal," which he had drafted before departure, had been officially approved during the review meeting. This cleared the most significant obstacle for subsequent implementation.

events.name: Project Kick-off Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan, as a core design engineer, held a small technical meeting with his colleagues Zhou Tao (responsible for standard component selection) and Li Xiang (responsible for simulation analysis). Based on the approved optimization plan, the three of them jointly refined the specific execution task list for the next two weeks, clarifying their respective responsibilities, deliverables, and timelines. Ye Mingxuan was primarily responsible for 3D model modifications and engineering drawing output.

events.name: Exchanging Safety Updates with Fellow Travelers
events.description: During a work break, Ye Mingxuan contacted Wu Bin via WeChat, and they confirmed to each other that they had safely returned to their respective cities. Wu Bin sent several photos of eating hotpot in Chengdu, while Ye Mingxuan shared a group photo of his parents looking at his travel pictures at home. They briefly exchanged information about the road conditions on their return journeys and agreed to explore new self-driving routes together when they have time in the future.

events.name: Observing the balcony plants, an idea for renovation emerged.
events.description: After returning home from work in the evening, Ye Mingxuan went to the balcony to carefully observe the growth of his succulent plants after being away for ten days. He noticed that several pots were in poor condition due to lack of precise watering. He recorded the current light exposure duration and watering situation, and as he looked at the slightly messy plant stand, he began to conceptualize a more scientific, aesthetically pleasing, and easily expandable modular plant stand solution.

events.name: Participate in an online technical sharing session
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan logged into the online meeting platform on time, as per the notification received the previous week, to attend a sharing session on the "Application Trends of Advanced Connection Technologies in Automated Equipment," which was led by an industry veteran. He listened attentively throughout the session, carefully taking notes on the technical highlights and application cases of new quick-change connectors and maintenance-free bearings. During the Q&A segment, he posed a practical selection question to the expert and received valuable advice.

events.name: Working overtime temporarily to handle urgent emails
events.description: After the sharing session, Ye Mingxuan received an urgent email from a client requesting minor adjustments to the details of the proposal. He had to work until 23:30 to handle it, which delayed his sleep time.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a residence in Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Adjust and adapt, ready to get to work.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled yet slightly fatigued, learning brings a sense of satisfaction, and work pressure begins to emerge.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day of comprehensive work. Ye Mingxuan began revising the three-dimensional model and collaborated closely with his colleagues. The physical fatigue from traveling started to surface, prompting him to schedule a private training session for recovery exercises and assessment. In the evening, based on the assessment results, he and the coach developed a new fitness plan, gradually bringing his daily rhythm back on track.

events.name: Initiate 3D model modification
events.description: In SolidWorks, Ye Mingxuan opened the original 3D model of the AGV chassis transmission components. Following the optimization plan, he began preliminary dimensional modifications and topological optimization of key connecting rods and support structures. In the afternoon, he held a brief online meeting with his direct supervisor, Engineer Gao Zhiyuan, to discuss the feasibility of the modification plan and several technical details, ensuring the design direction remained correct.

events.name: Assign the task of standard component selection
events.description: Ye Mingxuan sent the preliminary revised partial screenshots of the model and the design requirements document to his colleague Zhou Tao. He walked over to Zhou Tao's workstation and provided a detailed face-to-face explanation of the functional requirements, working loads, rotational speeds, and installation space constraints for several key bearings and fasteners that needed to be reselected in the new design. This ensured that Zhou Tao fully understood the design intent and could conduct accurate market research.

events.name: Establishment of Simulation Analysis Environment
events.description: Colleague Li Xiang received the optimized preliminary 3D model file from Ye Mingxuan. He established a new simulation analysis project on the company's high-performance workstation, imported the model, and began setting material properties (alloy steel), defining constraint conditions, and performing preliminary meshing in preparation for subsequent strength analysis.

events.name: Book a Fitness Assessment
events.description: Feeling some muscle stiffness and slight fatigue after the long journey, Ye Mingxuan contacted Wang Jian, a personal trainer at Lamei Fitness Center via WeChat, booked a training session for that evening, and expressed the desire for a recovery workout and a physical condition assessment.

events.name: Restorative Training and Physical Assessment
events.description: In the evening at Limei Fitness Center, Coach Wang Jian guided Ye Mingxuan through a comprehensive full-body dynamic stretching routine and 20 minutes of low-intensity elliptical cardio to alleviate muscle fatigue and promote blood circulation. Subsequently, Coach Wang conducted measurements for Ye Mingxuan using a body fat scale and a measuring tape. The results showed a weight of 71.5 kg (a decrease attributed to dietary changes and hydration fluctuations during travel) and a body fat percentage of 19%. Coach Wang acknowledged and commended his ability to maintain this condition during his travels.

events.name: Develop a recovery and consolidation plan
events.description: Based on the evaluation results, Coach Wang Jian and Ye Mingxuan discussed and formulated a one-month "Post-Travel Recovery and Consolidation Plan." The plan includes: adjusting dietary structure to increase protein intake; gradually resuming strength training twice a week; with the goal of stabilizing body weight and body fat percentage at the favorable pre-travel levels (approximately 70 kg, 18% body fat) and improving endurance.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focused on work, with slight physical fatigue.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: The body is relaxed after exercise, with confidence in the recovery plan.

state.今日运动: Low-intensity aerobic exercise for 20 minutes, full-body stretching

2025-08.daily_overview: The project design work advanced further, with Ye Mingxuan optimizing model details and conducting interference checks. Concurrently, his personal interest project—the design of a balcony succulent plant stand—officially commenced on paper. In the evening, he planned a weekend hiking and camping trip with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, adding a new sense of anticipation to his leisure life.

events.name: Deepening Model Design and Inspection
events.description: Ye Mingxuan continued to refine the details of the three-dimensional model, including adjusting the layout of reinforcing ribs and optimizing load paths to reduce weight. Using the software's interference check function, he repeatedly verified that the newly designed components had no conflicts with surrounding parts such as motors and sensors throughout the entire range of motion. Upon completion, he generated a preliminary Bill of Materials (BOM), listing all custom-manufactured parts required.

events.name: Standard Parts Market Research
events.description: Following Ye Mingxuan's request, Zhou Tao reviewed product manuals and industry selection databases of brands such as SKF and NSK, conducting a preliminary screening of key bearings. He compiled several brands and models that met the technical requirements and offered good cost-effectiveness. Through internal communication software, he conducted an initial discussion with Ye Mingxuan, who provided feedback from a design perspective.

events.name: Static Analysis of Core Components
events.description: Li Xiang completed a finite element static analysis on the core transmission component optimized by Ye Mingxuan. He simulated the stress conditions of the component under maximum working load and generated stress contour plots and strain distribution diagrams. Preliminary results indicate that the structural strength meets the requirements, but stress concentration was observed at certain connection points. He marked these areas for feedback.

events.name: Design a Succulent Plant Stand Plan
events.description: At home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan took out a drawing pad in his study. He first measured the available space on the balcony, then researched the specific requirements of succulent plants regarding sunlight, ventilation, and drainage. Drawing on his woodworking experience, he began sketching the preliminary structural design of a modular, tiered plant stand on paper, contemplating how to achieve flexible combination and expansion, as well as how to ingeniously integrate the piping and connections for an automatic drip irrigation system.

events.name: Plan a weekend hiking and camping trip
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan proposed in the WeChat group "Tech Geeks Also Have Spring" (members: Ye Mingxuan, Zhou Tao, Li Xiang) to organize a short-distance hiking and camping trip over the weekend. The suggestion received an immediate response. After a lively discussion, the three finally decided to go to the southern foothills of Haituo Mountain in Yanqing, Beijing, on August 23–24 (Saturday and Sunday). They also clarified the division of responsibilities: Ye Mingxuan would be responsible for planning the detailed route, navigation, and preparing communal cooking utensils; Zhou Tao would handle purchasing and preparing food; and Li Xiang would bring his telescope and emergency medical supplies.

events.name: Video gathering with university classmates
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan was invited to a video call with his high school classmate Chen Hao and university roommate Liu Yang to celebrate their return from a trip. They discussed their recent updates, played games for half an hour, which caused Ye Mingxuan to stay up late and gain a slight amount of weight due to snacking.

起始状态.心情: Methodical and full of drive

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Looking forward to weekend activities and social engagements, but feeling slightly fatigued.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day of collaboration at work. Ye Mingxuan finalized the selection of standard components with colleagues and received preliminary simulation feedback. On his personal project, he transformed the flower stand sketch into a precise CAD digital model. During the lunch break, he discussed the idea of purchasing a 3D printer with colleagues and began researching it seriously. In the evening, he strictly followed a new fitness and diet plan and participated in an online technical sharing session.

events.name: Complete the engineering drawing template and main views
events.description: Based on the optimized and finalized 3D model, Ye Mingxuan created an engineering drawing template in CAD software that complies with the company's drafting standards. He drafted the front view, top view, and left view of the assembly drawing, and annotated the main contour dimensions and assembly relationships, laying the foundation for subsequent detailed annotations.

events.name: Finalize the selection of standard components
events.description: In the morning, Zhou Tao held a detailed face-to-face discussion with Ye Mingxuan regarding the preliminary screening results. Based on factors such as cost, supply cycle, and brand reputation, the two finalized the specific models, specifications, and quantities of all standard parts to be procured. Subsequently, Zhou Tao compiled a detailed "Procurement Technical Specification List" and submitted it to Ye Mingxuan for final review.

events.name: Motion Simulation and Issue Feedback
events.description: Li Xiang utilized multi-body dynamics software to simulate the motion process of the entire transmission mechanism over one working cycle. He analyzed the motion smoothness, velocity, and acceleration curves of the optimized mechanism. The simulation revealed a slight risk of motion interference at the extreme positions. He compiled the simulation results and identified risk points into a concise report, which he then sent to engineers Ye Mingxuan and Gao Zhiyuan.

events.name: CAD Modeling of Succulent Plant Stand
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan transformed the hand-drawn sketches into precise CAD digital models on the computer. Using design software, he meticulously drafted each module of the flower stand, the tiered shelves at varying heights, and specifically designed channels and interfaces to conceal the drip irrigation piping. He repeatedly adjusted the dimensions and structure to ensure reasonable load-bearing capacity, high space utilization, and a harmonious appearance.

events.name: Research on 3D Printer Selection
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan chatted with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang in the company lounge, mentioning his interest in purchasing a 3D printer for printing mechanical prototypes and flower stand parts. Zhou Tao shared the experience of a friend in product design who used a certain domestic brand. This prompted Ye Mingxuan to systematically browse Zhihu, Bilibili, and 3D printing forums at home after work, where he began to seriously research the differences between FDM and SLA technologies, the pros and cons of various brands, and initially set his budget at around 4,000 yuan.

events.name: Implement a Healthy Diet and Training Regimen
events.description: Ye Mingxuan brought his pre-prepared chicken breast salad bento to the office for lunch. After work, he went to the gym and completed his first strength training session of the week with Coach Wang Jian as part of his recovery plan. The session focused on moderate-intensity adaptive exercises for the upper body and core.

events.name: Organize Technical Sharing Session Notes
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan digitized the notes from the previous night's online technical sharing session, summarized the core knowledge points, and archived the reference material links shared by the expert into his personal knowledge base.

events.name: Staying up late to modify designs to address simulation issues.
events.description: After receiving the simulation feedback, Ye Mingxuan felt pressured and decided to stay up late to modify the model in order to address the risk of motion interference, not going to bed until 1 a.m.

起始状态.心情: Focused, clear about the upcoming task, but slightly under pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet exhausting, the satisfaction of learning and planning in parallel, and the alleviation of work pressure.

2025-08.daily_overview: The workday was drawing to a close. Ye Mingxuan dedicated his full effort to completing the detailed annotations of the engineering drawings and packaged them for review. Meanwhile, after synthesizing information from various sources, he finalized the model of the 3D printer to purchase. In the evening, he conducted a final check of his personal equipment for the weekend's hiking and camping trip and looked up information about the meditation class in Jizhou.

events.name: Completion of Engineering Drawing Details and Submission
events.description: Ye Mingxuan focused on completing all the detailed annotations of the engineering drawing, including the tolerances of key dimensions, the surface roughness of mating faces, necessary welding symbols, and technical requirement descriptions. After completing all tasks, he packaged all relevant design documents (3D models, engineering drawings, bill of materials) and formally submitted them to the project team, awaiting the next round of design review.

events.name: Receive and study the simulation report
events.description: Ye Mingxuan carefully reviewed the simulation report sent by Li Xiang, focusing on stress concentration points and motion interference risks. He initially considered possible solutions for structural fine-tuning and planned to discuss them with Li Xiang and Senior Engineer Gao during the review meeting.

events.name: Materials List for Making a Flower Stand
events.description: Based on the CAD model, Ye Mingxuan generated a detailed bill of materials for the flower stand, including the specifications, dimensions, and quantities of the required pine and oak wood, as well as the models of various connectors, drip irrigation hoses, and fittings. He began preliminary procurement inquiries by comparing prices on e-commerce platforms and offline building materials markets.

events.name: Determine the 3D printer model
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan synthesized the research from the past few days, suggestions from colleagues, and online reviews, narrowing his focus to two domestic FDM printers. After a detailed comparison of build volume, printing accuracy, community support, and long-term consumable costs, he ultimately decided to purchase the model with a better reputation, greater suitability for printing engineering plastics (such as ABS), and a price within his budget.

events.name: Inquire about weekend meditation class information
events.description: Upon a friend's recommendation, Ye Mingxuan, out of curiosity, searched online and learned in detail about the weekend meditation retreat held at a temple in the mountainous area of Jizhou. He reviewed the schedule (morning chanting, seated meditation, walking meditation, Dharma talks by the master) and the guidelines (such as the requirement to hand in mobile phones and wear loose clothing), and made initial inquiries through the contact information provided on the website.

events.name: Check Hiking and Camping Equipment
events.description: For tomorrow's hiking and camping trip, Ye Mingxuan took out his backpack, tent, sleeping bag, cooking utensils, headlamp, and other gear at home to inspect them one by one. He tested whether the stove could ignite properly, fully charged the headlamp and power bank, and cleaned and packed the shared cooking utensils.

events.name: Family gatherings lead to staying up late.
events.description: His parents prepared a lavish dinner to celebrate his return from the trip. Ye Mingxuan enjoyed dishes like braised pork, which led to a slight weight gain, and he stayed up late chatting.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, focusing on wrapping up work.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room in a home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Ready to relax and filled with anticipation, yet slightly satiated from the meal.

2025-08.daily_overview: A delightful weekend team-building day. Ye Mingxuan, along with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, drove to Haituo Mountain in Yanqing, Beijing, for a hiking and camping activity. They arrived in the afternoon and set up camp. In the evening, they cooked together, stargazed, and engaged in deep conversations, significantly enhancing their mutual understanding and friendship beyond work in the natural surroundings.

events.name: Drive to Yanqing and set up camp
events.description: After work on Friday, Ye Mingxuan drove his own car, picked up Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, and headed towards Yanqing, Beijing. They had a simple dinner at a service area along the way. Before dark, they arrived at a pre-selected legal campsite on the southern slope of Haituo Mountain. The three of them worked together in a coordinated manner: Ye Mingxuan and Li Xiang were responsible for setting up two tents, while Zhou Tao cleared the campsite and prepared firewood for the campfire (using a gas stove for cooking, with the firewood intended for the bonfire).

events.name: Outdoor Collaborative Dinner
events.description: After setting up the camp, Ye Mingxue boiled water using his portable gas stove and nested cookware, while Zhou Tao prepared the ingredients they had brought (steak, vegetables, and instant noodles), with Li Xiang assisting nearby. Under the illumination of starlight and headlamps, the three collaborated to prepare a simple yet aromatic outdoor dinner. Sitting around the folding table, they chatted while eating, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. The conversation gradually shifted from venting about work to discussing hobbies and interests.

events.name: Stargazing and Campfire Conversations
events.description: After dinner, Li Xiang enthusiastically set up his astronomical telescope, and the three took turns observing the summer night sky, identifying Vega, Altair, and the constellation Cygnus. Later, they lit a small campfire (with attention to fire safety) and gathered around it. In the valley far from the city's light pollution, the conversation grew deeper. They shared amusing stories from their university days, plans for the future, and even some workplace concerns they wouldn't easily mention otherwise. Ye Mingxuan felt that his relationship with these two colleagues had transcended that of ordinary work partners tonight.

events.name: Family Movie Night Proposal
events.description: Before setting out in the evening, Ye Mingxuan suggested to his parents during dinner at home that they could watch the live broadcast of the finale of his favorite competitive variety show, "Extreme Manufacturing," together. His father, Ye Jianguo, showed interest, and his mother, Wang Xiulan, also gladly agreed, setting a time for the evening viewing.

events.name: Mother prepares tea and snacks.
events.description: After dinner, Wang Xiulan, the mother, specially prepared a platter of cut fruit and brewed chrysanthemum tea for the family movie night, neatly arranged on the living room coffee table.

events.name: Watch the Finals of "Extreme Manufacturing" Together
events.description: In the evening, the family of three sat in front of the television in the living room on time to watch the program. In the show, the contestants faced complex mechanical manufacturing challenges. Ye Mingxuan and his father, Ye Jianguo, naturally engaged in professional commentary and discussion on the contestants' design plans, process flows, and operational details. Occasionally, the father would interject with stories about similar technical challenges he encountered while working at the machine tool factory. Although Wang Xiulan, the mother, did not fully understand the technical aspects, she watched with great interest, occasionally inquiring about the competition rules and enjoying the warm family atmosphere.

events.name: Post-Match Family Casual Conversation
events.description: After the program ended, the family did not disperse immediately. They continued discussing the competition results and the contestants' performances for a while. The conversation then extended to Ye Mingxuan's upcoming weekend camping trip and the parents' recent community activities, among other everyday topics, extending the warm family time.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and full of anticipation for outdoor activities

结束状态.所处地点: Inside the camping tent at Haituo Mountain, Yanqing, Beijing
结束状态.心情: Pleasure, relaxation, and the satisfaction of building closer relationships with colleagues.

2025-08.daily_overview: Day two of the hiking and camping trip. In the early morning, we completed a roughly 10-kilometer mountain hike, enjoying the natural scenery. In the afternoon, we packed up the campsite and began the return journey. In the evening, back in Tianjin, Ye Mingxuan sent the vehicle for a comprehensive maintenance check and organized the photos from this camping trip to share with colleagues.

events.name: Hiking on the Southern Foot of Haituo Mountain
events.description: In the early morning, the three woke to the sound of birdsong. After a simple breakfast and packing up all personal belongings and trash, they began a roughly 10-kilometer trek through the southern foothills of Haituo Mountain, following the route planned by Ye Mingxuan. Along the way, they enjoyed views of alpine meadows, birch forests, and distant mountain ranges. Ye Mingxuan served as the team leader, responsible for checking the route and maintaining the pace, while Zhou Tao and Li Xiang followed closely behind. During the hike, they encouraged one another, shared water and snacks, and despite the physical exertion, their spirits remained high.

events.name: Return Trip and Activity Summary
events.description: After the afternoon hike, the three of them drove back to Tianjin. During the journey, they took a break at a service area and briefly summarized the gains from this team-building activity. They unanimously agreed that the event was highly successful, as it not only helped them relax but also enhanced mutual understanding and off-work rapport. They agreed to organize similar activities more frequently in the future.

events.name: Vehicle Post-Trip Maintenance
events.description: Upon returning to Tianjin, Ye Mingxuan drove directly to the familiar auto repair shop. He informed the mechanic that the vehicle had just completed a long-distance journey (including some off-road sections) and requested a comprehensive inspection and maintenance service. He specifically emphasized the need to check all chassis fasteners, the braking system, and tire wear, and also asked for a thorough cleaning.

events.name: Organize and Share Activity Footage
events.description: In the evening at home, Ye Mingxuan exported the photos and videos from the hiking and camping trip from his sports camera and phone, selected the highlights, and shared them in the three-person WeChat group. Everyone reminisced about the fun moments of the journey in the group, and Li Xiang shared several photos of the starry sky he had taken. This team-building activity effectively deepened the friendship among the three.

起始状态.所处地点: Inside the camping tent at Haituo Mountain in Yanqing, Beijing
起始状态.心情: Refreshed and energetic

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet physically and mentally refreshed, feeling highly satisfied with the weekend activities.

state.今日运动: Approximately 10 kilometers of hiking, moderate intensity.

2025-08.daily_overview: A new week of workdays begins. Ye Mingxuan starts optimizing the design model based on simulation feedback. Meanwhile, he receives the 3D printer he purchased online. In the afternoon, he rationally declines the premium credit card recommended by his financial manager, adhering to his prudent spending philosophy. In the evening, he begins learning 3D printing slicing software.

events.name: Optimized Design Model
events.description: In response to the issues highlighted in Li Xiang’s simulation report last Friday, Ye Mingxuan made targeted structural adjustments in the 3D model, such as adding fillet transitions in stress concentration areas and fine-tuning the dimensions of components that may potentially interfere. After the modifications, he sent the updated model back to Li Xiang for further review.

events.name: Decline Premium Credit Card Promotion
events.description: In the afternoon, Zhang Wei, a wealth management manager at China Merchants Bank, made a routine quarterly service call. After exchanging pleasantries, Manager Zhang highlighted a premium credit card designed for high-net-worth clients, detailing its benefits such as airport lounge access, discounts at luxury hotels, and high-value point redemption options. Ye Mingxuan listened patiently and then inquired specifically about details such as the annual fee policy (whether it could be waived), cash advance fees, and the validity period of reward points. Considering his low frequency of business travel, practical spending habits, and the fact that his current payment methods already fully met his needs, he quickly assessed that applying for this card did not align with his principles of rational consumption and prudent savings. Therefore, he politely and clearly expressed his gratitude to Manager Zhang while declining the offer, reiterating his emphasis on financial stability. After the call, he felt satisfied with his financial discipline.

events.name: Received the 3D printer.
events.description: After returning home from work, Ye Mingxuan received a large cardboard box delivered by courier, which contained the FDM 3D printer he had ordered. After confirming that the outer packaging was intact, he signed for the delivery, carried the box into his study, and planned to unpack and assemble it over the weekend when he had time.

events.name: Establish Learning Objectives for Slicing Software
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan clarified that his next goal was to learn how to use slicing software to print the flower stand connectors he had designed. He searched online and decided to focus on learning the popular open-source software Cura. He bookmarked several tutorial series on Bilibili, ranging from beginner to advanced levels, and also downloaded the official Cura user manual (PDF) to prepare for systematic learning.

events.name: Slight headache due to work pressure, going to bed early.
events.description: Due to fatigue from continuous work, Ye Mingxuan experienced a mild headache and decided to rest early to improve his sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a residence in Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to tackle the new work week.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in the home, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Curious and well-planned about learning new skills, but feeling slightly unwell physically.

2025-08.daily_overview: Work proceeded in an orderly manner, with Ye Mingxuan communicating with colleagues about model modifications. On the personal project front, he began systematically learning the basic operations of the 3D printing slicing software Cura in the evening, taking a crucial step from digital design to physical printing.

events.name: Results of Communication Model Modification
events.description: Ye Mingxuan informed Li Xiang about the updates to the optimized model and inquired whether another simulation verification was needed. Li Xiang suggested that minor modifications could be observed first, and a comprehensive review could be conducted after the overall assembly model was finalized. Ye Mingxuan also updated his direct superior, Senior Engineer Gao, on the progress of the modifications.

events.name: Systematic Learning of Cura Basics
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan turned on his computer and began systematically learning Cura software by following tutorials on Bilibili. Starting with the interface layout, he learned how to import STL model files and move, rotate, and scale models on the virtual print bed. Next, he gained a preliminary understanding of the meanings of basic slicing parameters, such as layer height (affecting print accuracy and speed), wall thickness (affecting strength), and infill density (affecting strength and weight). He also experimented with adjusting these parameters to observe changes in the preview effects.

events.name: Adjusting the Plan with the Fitness Coach
events.description: Ye Mingxuan reported his recovery progress to Coach Wang Jian via WeChat. The coach suggested increasing the frequency of aerobic exercise, and he began planning to start morning runs.

起始状态.心情: Focus, the beginning of learning new things.

2025-08.daily_overview: Final preparations before the design review at work. In the evening, Ye Mingxuan delved into the advanced settings for PLA material printing and support structures in the slicing software to prepare for solving practical printing issues. He also provided feedback to the fitness coach on his recovery progress over the past week.

events.name: Prepare design review materials
events.description: Ye Mingxuan began organizing the materials required for the upcoming design review meeting, including comparison diagrams of the models before and after optimization, explanations of major technical changes, and updated versions of the bill of materials, ensuring that the design proposal could be presented clearly and systematically during the review.

events.name: Deep Dive into Advanced Slice Parameters
events.description: Regarding the potential overhang structure issues with the PLA material he plans to primarily print and the flower stand parts, Ye Mingxuan focused on learning about the support structure settings in Cura tonight. He studied the advantages and disadvantages of different types of supports (linear, tree-like), their generation rules, and techniques for post-printing removal. Additionally, he researched the principles for setting advanced parameters such as printing temperature, printing speed, and cooling fan speed specifically for PLA material. He also consulted official documentation to understand the underlying principles and took detailed electronic notes.

events.name: Report recovery progress to the coach.
events.description: One week after implementing the recovery plan, Ye Mingxuan provided brief feedback to Coach Wang Jian via WeChat regarding his initial impressions: dietary control was progressing smoothly, muscle soreness after strength training was normal, but sleep quality was occasionally average. Based on the feedback, Coach Wang suggested that he could perform simple stretching exercises before bedtime and continue maintaining the current pace.

events.name: Start a morning running routine
events.description: To adapt to the autumn exercise routine, Ye Mingxuan tried a morning run at 06:30 today and felt good, planning to stick with it.

起始状态.心情: Detailed, in preparation for review

2025-08.daily_overview: As the end of the month approached, Ye Mingxuan conducted his routine monthly financial review, carefully analyzing the income and expenditures for August and drafting a budget plan for September accordingly. In the evening, he successfully generated the first set of optimized slicing configuration files for the parts of the flower stand he designed. At the same time, he also began preparing for the Zen meditation experience scheduled for the weekend.

events.name: Conduct monthly financial review
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan conducted a financial review for August in his home study. He opened mobile banking, Alipay, and other apps to export all income and expenditure details for the month, and categorized paper receipts such as those for travel and shopping. He focused on verifying major expenses, such as the self-driving trip to Qinghai Lake (actual spending was slightly below budget) and the purchase of a 3D printer (funded by the July project bonus, which was a planned investment), analyzing the reasons for any discrepancies. Next, he entered the actual data into the monthly budget spreadsheet for comparison and summarized the budget execution: travel and hobby-related expenses were the main costs for the month, while daily spending was well-controlled. Finally, based on August’s situation and September’s plans (with travel concluded and new expenses for 3D printing materials added), he adjusted the budget template to create a preliminary draft for September’s budget and archived all receipts and electronic bills.

events.name: Generate Optimized Slice Configuration
events.description: Ye Mingxuan imported the model of the flower stand connector he designed into Cura and began the "virtual printing" process based on his learning from the previous days. He experimented with different combinations of parameters, such as layer height, infill patterns, and support settings, repeatedly observing the slicing preview effects to evaluate printing time and material consumption. After multiple rounds of debugging, he finally generated a set of configuration files that he believed achieved a balance among print quality, strength, and efficiency. He saved and named it "Flower Stand Parts-PLA-Optimized V1."

events.name: Check Fund Fixed Investment
events.description: During a break in the review session, Ye Mingxuan logged into the fund investment platform and confirmed that the scheduled monthly fixed-amount investment had been successfully deducted. He checked the net asset value changes and overall returns of his held funds over the past month, confirming that the investment plan was being executed step by step and that market fluctuations were within the expected range.

events.name: Prepare Items for Zen Meditation Class
events.description: Based on the confirmation email and guidelines received for the meditation retreat, Ye Mingxuan began preparing the personal items he would need for his weekend trip to Jizhou. He gathered loose-fitting cotton clothing, a towel, toiletries, and a water cup, and made a point to pack a small notebook and pen. He also consciously set his phone to silent mode, mentally preparing himself to temporarily disconnect from daily electronic devices and the hectic pace of life.

events.name: Discussing 3D Printing with Programming Study Partners
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan exchanged insights on learning slicing software with Xu Ming via WeChat. Xu Ming shared some programming techniques to help him automate the configuration.

起始状态.心情: A well-organized mindset for month-end inventory.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: The sense of fulfillment from completing reviews and learning, and a calm curiosity towards unknown experiences.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last workday, Ye Mingxuan successfully passed the design review. He compiled the 3D printing knowledge he had learned over the past few days into notes. In the evening, he resolved his father's mobile phone issue and confirmed the final arrangements for the weekend meditation class.

events.name: Attend the design review meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, the project team held a design review meeting for the AGV chassis optimization plan. As the primary designer, Ye Mingxuan clearly presented the modifications, resolved technical issues, and the updated bill of materials. Engineer Gao Zhiyuan, Project Manager Wang Peng, and colleagues including Li Xiang and Zhou Tao participated in the review. The meeting acknowledged Ye Mingxuan's design work, and the plan was approved, allowing it to proceed to the next stage of procurement and trial production preparation.

events.name: Organize 3D Printing Study Notes
events.description: Ye Mingxuan systematically compiled a clear electronic note summarizing the key parameters of the Cura slicing software he had studied over the past few days, along with setup techniques, precautions for PLA materials, and his insights from debugging the configuration for the "flower stand parts." He intended this note to serve both as a personal knowledge archive and as a resource to share with colleagues or friends in need in the future (such as Zhou Tao).

events.name: Help father with mobile phone issues
events.description: During dinner, Father Ye Jianguo mentioned that his phone kept popping up with unfamiliar advertisements. After the meal, Ye Mingxuan helped his father check the phone, uninstalled two suspicious applications, adjusted the notification permission settings, and patiently explained to his father how to identify and avoid clicking on such ads.

events.name: Confirm the Meditation Retreat Schedule
events.description: Ye Mingxuan reviewed the registration notice sent by the temple once again, confirming the assembly location, time, and transportation arrangements. He planned to drive to Jizhou early the next morning and sent a message to his mother on WeChat, informing her of his weekend plans and reassuring his parents not to worry.

events.name: Small Gathering to Celebrate the Approval of the Review
events.description: After work, I had a casual dinner with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, enjoying a spicy dry pot. We chatted about amusing work anecdotes, which led to staying up late and a slight stabilization in weight.

2025-08.daily_overview: Experience a day away from the ordinary. Ye Mingxuan traveled to the mountainous area of Jizhou to attend a weekend meditation retreat, where he surrendered his phone, followed the temple’s daily schedule, and participated in activities such as morning chanting, seated meditation, and walking meditation. Initially, he felt discomfort and mental restlessness, but amidst the tranquility of the mountain forest, he gradually relaxed and unexpectedly attained a moment of inner peace.

events.name: Arriving at the temple, beginning meditation practice
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan drove himself to the temple located in the mountainous area of Jizhou. After completing the check-in procedures in the guest hall, he handed over his electronic devices such as his mobile phone and smartwatch as required, received a set of gray meditation robes, and settled into a simple four-person dormitory. Gazing out the window at the lush green mountain forest, he took a deep breath and began to adapt to this 'isolated' and tranquil environment.

events.name: Zen Meditation Schedule Experience
events.description: Ye Mingxuan strictly adhered to the temple's schedule: in the early morning, he attended the morning chanting session. Although he did not understand the meaning of the scriptures, he felt a sense of solemnity by following the rhythm of the recitation. Throughout the day, he practiced seated meditation multiple times in the meditation hall. He found his legs aching, and his thoughts, like wild horses running free, constantly surfaced with fragments of work, travel, unfinished trellis designs, and various other distractions, making it difficult to focus. In the afternoon, guided by the monk, he practiced walking meditation (slowly walking while observing his footsteps), which he found slightly easier than seated meditation. In the evening, he listened to the monk's teachings on "focusing on the present moment." Although he found the teachings reasonable, putting them into practice proved exceptionally challenging. By the end of the first day, what he felt most was physical discomfort and inner restlessness.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a mindset of observation and experience.

结束状态.所处地点: In the monastic quarters of a temple in the Jizhou mountainous area
结束状态.心情: Fatigued, with scattered thoughts, feeling slightly frustrated but still persevering.
