2025-08.daily_overview: The second and final day of the meditation retreat. Ye Mingxuan gradually adapted to the rhythm and experienced a brief moment of inner peace during a sitting meditation session. After the retreat concluded in the afternoon and he returned home, he spent the rest of the day and evening successfully assembling, calibrating, and completing the first test print of his new 3D printer, marking the beginning of a new phase in his personal creative journey.

events.name: Adaptation and Moments of Tranquility
events.description: After a night's rest and the initial day of acclimatization, the meditation on the second day seemed to flow more smoothly for Ye Mingxuan. The morning air in the mountain forest was exceptionally crisp, and the regular routine gradually synchronized his body with his biological clock. During a morning sitting session, as the soreness in his legs became less acute, he attempted to follow the guidance and count his breaths. For a few minutes, the chirping of insects and birds outside, along with the chaotic thoughts in his mind, seemed to recede into the distance. He experienced an unprecedented sense of inner peace and emptiness. Though brief, and soon followed by a resurgence of thoughts, this moment left a profound impression on him.

events.name: End of Meditation Session and Return Journey
events.description: In the afternoon, the weekend meditation retreat officially concluded. Ye Mingxuan retrieved his personal belongings and mobile phone, bid brief farewells to the monastic teacher and a few familiar roommates, and set off on his journey back to Tianjin. Driving along the winding mountain road, he reflected on the unique experiences of the past two days, contemplating the stark contrast between this extremely simple, introspective way of life and his own efficient, pragmatic daily routine, as well as the insights brought by those moments of tranquility.

events.name: Assembling a 3D Printer
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan eagerly began unboxing and assembling his newly purchased 3D printer. He spread a plastic sheet over the work corner in his study, meticulously followed the instructions step by step, and assembled each component—including the aluminum alloy frame, stepper motors, extruder head, and heated bed—one by one. Using the included hex key, he carefully tightened every screw.

events.name: Leveling the Platform and the First Test Print
events.description: After assembly, Ye Mingxuan proceeded to the most crucial step: leveling the print bed. He repeatedly adjusted the screws at the four corners of the platform using an A4 sheet of paper, ensuring the distance between the nozzle and the bed was just right at any position. Next, he loaded a roll of white PLA filament that came with the printer, selected the test model file (a small boat) pre-installed on the machine, and initiated the first print. He watched nervously as the extruder heated up, extruded filament, and the heated bed moved to begin printing the first layer... The entire process went smoothly. After about an hour, a small boat model with clear layer lines and accurate dimensions was completed. Ye Mingxuan carefully removed it from the platform, inspected it closely, and a satisfied smile appeared on his face—this marked a solid first step in his personal DIY creative journey, officially transitioning from traditional craftsmanship to digital rapid prototyping.

events.name: Practice bedtime meditation
events.description: Inspired by meditation, Ye Mingxuan tried five minutes of breathing meditation before bed to help relax his body and mind.

起始状态.心情: Calmer than yesterday, with a hint of anticipation

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment and the excitement of exploring new fields, mingled with a touch of contemplation from returning from meditation, bring inner peace.

2025-09.daily_overview: After returning to work following a meditation weekend, Ye Mingxuan began his autumn morning running routine. He efficiently handled projects during the day and shared his experiences in the evening, transitioning through the day with regularity and tranquility.

events.name: Autumn Morning Running Program Launch
events.description: At 06:30 in the morning, Ye Mingxuan engaged in a 30-minute recovery jog along the Riverside Greenway in Xiqing District. Maintaining a relaxed pace, he enjoyed the cool autumn breeze as part of his autumn exercise routine.

events.name: Returning to workday, handling backlog emails
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan arrived at the company on time and spent nearly an hour dealing with the backlog of emails from the weekend. He focused on responding to inquiries about the design progress of the automated feeding mechanism and updated the task status accordingly.

events.name: Technical Discussion Meeting of the Project Team
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan attended the project weekly meeting chaired by Gao Zhiyuan, where he engaged in in-depth discussions with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang regarding the design optimization of transmission components. He proposed adding local reinforcing ribs, and the suggestion was approved.

events.name: Sharing Meditation Experiences with Friends
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan communicated with Zhou Tao via WeChat voice call for half an hour, sharing from a practical perspective the mental clarity brought by meditation and the novel associations it inspired regarding mechanical structures.

2025-09.daily_overview: On weekdays, the routine was orderly. Ye Mingxuan advanced design tasks during the day and stayed up late at night assembling a 3D printer, embarking on a new chapter of hands-on practice. Each day passed with efficiency and focus.

events.name: Listening to tech podcasts during the commute
events.description: During his morning commute, Ye Mingxuan listened to a podcast about Industry 4.0 and additive manufacturing technology, envisioning more application scenarios for 3D printers.

events.name: Improve the design drawings
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan focused on refining the CAD drawings of the robotic arm's end effector, adjusted the tolerance annotations based on review feedback, and uploaded the final version.

events.name: Lunch Exchange and Python Learning
events.description: At noon in the company cafeteria, Ye Mingxuan and Zhou Tao discussed the application techniques of the Python data analysis library pandas and agreed to debug the code together over the weekend.

events.name: Unboxing and Inventory of the 3D Printer
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan received a package containing a 3D printer. He unpacked it in the study, meticulously checked all the components, and sorted the screws according to their models.

events.name: Basic Assembly and Overnight Debugging
events.description: Following the instruction manual, Ye Mingxuan spent over two hours completing the assembly of the printer's main body and wiring. However, during the power-on test, he discovered abnormal movement of the print head and stayed up until 00:30 troubleshooting the issue.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the printer that will arrive tonight.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Focused yet fatigued, the issue remains not fully resolved.

2025-09.daily_overview: Technical breakthroughs and interest-driven exploration proceed in parallel. During the day, simulation challenges at work are tackled, while in the evening, the printer is repaired and the first component is successfully printed. The process was arduous, but the outcome is satisfying.

events.name: Collaboratively Resolve Simulation Issues
events.description: In the morning, a stress concentration warning appeared during the finite element analysis of the component under Ye Mingxuan's responsibility. After communicating with Li Xiang, he promptly modified the fillet radius of the model, and the subsequent simulation verification passed successfully.

events.name: Remote Project Communication Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan communicated with engineers from the Suzhou supplier via video conference to discuss the technical parameters and delivery timeline of custom cylinders, clarifying the interface standards.

events.name: Fix Printer Malfunction
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan inspected and found that the wiring of the printer nozzle's stepper motor was loose. After re-securing it, the equipment returned to normal operation and completed calibration.

events.name: Design and print succulent plant stand connectors
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan used SolidWorks to design a snap-fit connector for a succulent plant stand, considering the printing support structure, and imported it into slicing software to generate G-code.

events.name: First Successful Printing and Parameter Optimization
events.description: After starting the printer, Ye Mingxuan observed the entire process. The surface of the printed connecting piece was smooth and its dimensions were precise. He adjusted the parameters by increasing the nozzle temperature to 210°C and reducing the printing speed by 15%, successfully completing the task.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to face the day's work

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Excited and with a sense of accomplishment, the technical issue has been resolved.

2025-09.daily_overview: The joy of transforming digital models into tangible objects continues. The day was spent passing project design reviews, while the evening involved assembling a flower stand and starting a new project design, though work emails led to a slightly later finish.

events.name: Project Design Review
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan attended the design review meeting organized by Wang Peng, clearly presented the proposal and simulation results, passed the review, and documented the optimization suggestions.

events.name: Urgent Work Email Processing
events.description: In the afternoon, due to a last-minute change in client requirements, Ye Mingxuan worked an extra hour to revise the design document, ensuring that the project timeline remained unaffected.

events.name: Assembling a Succulent Plant Stand
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan assembled a two-tier flower stand using the printed connectors, placed it on the balcony, and transplanted some succulent plants, feeling quite content.

events.name: Design Router Heat Dissipation Bracket
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan measured the dimensions of the router and began designing a bracket model with heat dissipation grilles and cable management channels in CAD software.

events.name: Online Communication with Programming Classmate Xu Ming
events.description: Late at night, Ye Mingxuan discussed learning insights about 3D printing slicing software with Xu Ming via WeChat and sought advice on Python data visualization techniques.

起始状态.心情: Good, looking forward to continuing the hands-on work tonight.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, but with a slight sense of work fatigue.

2025-09.daily_overview: Friday was spent on technical coordination. In the evening, I completed the German learning challenge and installed the router bracket. Although the gathering with colleagues ran slightly late, the family atmosphere remained warm on the eve of the weekend.

events.name: Cross-Departmental Technical Coordination
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan held a meeting with colleagues from the electrical department to coordinate the mechanical structure and electrical cabinet layout. A 3D-printed model was used to assist in the explanation, ensuring efficient communication.

events.name: Try reading German technical documentation
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan practiced German by reading the instruction manual of a German motor product, using a dictionary to understand the technical parameters and taking notes on complex vocabulary.

events.name: Print and install the router bracket
events.description: After slicing the designed bracket model, printing was initiated and continued for over three hours. Upon completion, support materials were removed and the bracket was installed, resulting in a tidy desktop.

events.name: Explaining 3D Printing to Father
events.description: Father Ye Jianguo inquired curiously. Ye Mingxuan used scrap materials and finished products to explain the principles and application prospects of FDM technology, leading to a discussion between father and son on precision and material strength.

events.name: Gathering with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan had spicy hot pot with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, chatting about interesting work stories and games, and returned home late at 23:50.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, approaching the weekend

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Pleasure, enjoying moments of technology sharing and social interaction with family.

2025-09.daily_overview: A typical ISTJ-style weekend: systematically conducting a mid-term review and planning for German language studies, engaging in brief social activities and household chores in the afternoon, and staying up slightly late at night due to immersion in 3D design, balancing study and life.

events.name: Mid-term Assessment of German Language Learning
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan assessed his self-study progress in German in the study. He checked his Duolingo level, recorded approximately 800 vocabulary words, and tested his ability to read simple technical sentences. He identified listening skills and professional vocabulary as areas needing improvement.

events.name: Adjust the Study Plan
events.description: According to the assessment, Ye Mingxuan revised the plan for the next three months: increase extensive listening to German podcasts, systematically organize a glossary of mechanical engineering German vocabulary, and record it in the electronic schedule.

events.name: Memorize Professional German Vocabulary
events.description: After the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan used the Anki flashcard software to memorize 50 German professional vocabulary words related to mechanical design and attempted to construct sentences with them.

events.name: Chatting online with childhood friend Zhang Wei
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan chatted with Zhang Wei on WeChat, analyzing SUV purchasing suggestions, and they agreed to have barbecue together next month.

events.name: Household Cleaning and Shopping
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan assisted his mother in a thorough cleaning, tidying up the study and the balcony, and then went to the supermarket to purchase ingredients and daily necessities.

events.name: Design 3D Printing Tools
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan was engrossed in designing a 3D-printed caliper attachment for woodworking measurements, and it was not until 23:45 that he completed the preliminary model.

起始状态.心情: Relax and get ready to enjoy the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Calm and methodical, yet slightly fatigued from staying up late.

2025-09.daily_overview: The tranquil Sunday afternoon was completely shattered by my father's sudden cerebral infarction. Life plummeted from order into chaos and anxiety, with the entire afternoon and evening spent in the hospital's emergency care, communication, and waiting.

events.name: Sudden Change in the Afternoon: Father Suffers a Cerebral Infarction
events.description: Around three o'clock in the afternoon, Ye Jianguo suddenly became slurred in speech and experienced weakness on the right side of his body, causing him to collapse in the living room. His wife panicked and cried out for help. Ye Mingxuan rushed out of his study, and upon seeing the situation, he forced himself to remain calm.

events.name: Emergency Call 120
events.description: Ye Mingxuan immediately had his mother support his father to lie flat, called 120 to accurately report their address and describe the symptoms, emphasizing that it might be a stroke.

events.name: Hospital Admission and Preliminary Diagnosis
events.description: The ambulance arrived, and Ye Mingxuan and his mother accompanied it to the nearest tertiary hospital. His father was admitted through the emergency green channel, and a CT scan confirmed an acute ischemic stroke.

events.name: Diagnosis and Thrombolytic Therapy
events.description: The doctor urgently communicated the need for intravenous thrombolysis, and Ye Mingxuan quickly read and signed the informed consent form under pressure.

events.name: Transferred to ICU for observation
events.description: After thrombolysis, the father was transferred to the Neurology ICU for close observation, while Ye Mingxuan and his mother anxiously waited outside the door.

events.name: Initial Communication with the Attending Physician
events.description: In the evening, the attending physician in the ICU explained the current condition, the effectiveness of thrombolysis, subsequent risks, and the treatment plan. Ye Mingxuan made every effort to memorize the medical terminology.

events.name: Hospitalization Procedures and Arrangements
events.description: After his condition stabilized somewhat, Ye Mingxuan completed the hospitalization procedures and paid the deposit. It was agreed that he would stay on standby at a nearby hotel that night, while his mother returned home to pack necessities.

events.name: Notify Close Relatives
events.description: In the hospital corridor, Ye Mingxuan informed relatives such as his cousin Ye Mingyuan and aunt Wang Xiufang about the patient's condition via phone and WeChat, indicating that visits were not necessary for the time being.

起始状态.心情: Lazy and relaxed, a typical Sunday morning.

结束状态.所处地点: Express hotel room near the hospital
结束状态.心情: Highly anxious, deeply worried, physically and mentally exhausted, yet forcing oneself to remain alert.

state.今日运动: None, extensive travel and mental stress

2025-09.daily_overview: On the second day of the crisis response, the father was transferred to a general ward but was diagnosed with sequelae. Ye Mingxuan comforted his mother, established a division of responsibilities, and requested leave from work. On the eve of Teachers' Day, the mentor's care brought warmth.

events.name: Father was transferred to the neurology ward.
events.description: In the morning, my father was transferred to the general ward with stable vital signs. However, the doctor explicitly informed us that he would be left with sequelae of right-sided hemiplegia and expressive aphasia.

events.name: Mother and Son Have a Heart-to-Heart Talk to Establish Division of Labor
events.description: In the corridor outside the hospital room, Ye Mingxuan put his arm around his mother's shoulders and said softly, "Mom, don't be afraid. We'll get through this together." He proposed that he would take charge of external communication and decision-making, while his mother would focus on accompanying and caring for the patient.

events.name: Urgent Leave Application to the Company
events.description: After settling in, Ye Mingxuan called Gao Zhiyuan and Wang Peng to explain the situation and requested leave starting this week. Both supervisors expressed their understanding.

events.name: Participate in the collective blessing for Teachers' Day
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan saw Sun Jing's proposal in the WeChat group to celebrate Teacher's Day for their mentor Chen Jianguo. He replied with "[I'm in, count me in]" and transferred the fee.

events.name: Confide in the mentor and obtain support
events.description: After the transfer, Ye Mingxuan sent a separate WeChat message to Professor Chen to convey his blessings and inform him of his father's critical illness. Professor Chen replied with concern and proactively offered to help connect with medical resources.

起始状态.心情: Fatigued, anxious, and filled with uncertainty.

结束状态.所处地点: Neurology Ward of the Hospital
结束状态.心情: Heavy yet with a slight sense of support, it clarified the formidable task ahead.

2025-09.daily_overview: Systematically addressing the chain reaction of the family crisis, applying for remote work, handing over tasks, responding to concerns from classmates, and establishing a new balance at the bedside, though anxiety-induced insomnia caused slight delays.

events.name: Application for Remote Work and Work Handover
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan submitted a work-from-home application through the OA system and provided a detailed handover of urgent tasks to his colleague Zhou Tao.

events.name: Remote processing of backlog work
events.description: In the afternoon, while his father was asleep, Ye Mingxuan used his laptop to handle the backlog of emails and respond to urgent technical inquiries, ensuring that the project did not stall.

events.name: Response of the Peer Support Network
events.description: After Sun Jing inquired via private message, she explained the situation in the group chat. Classmates such as Zhao Xiaofeng and Liu Yang left messages offering blessings and assistance, making Ye Mingxuan feel supported.

events.name: Learn basic nursing knowledge
events.description: Learn from the nurse how to properly turn over, pat the back, and perform passive limb exercises for the bedridden father. Record medication times and key nursing points in the phone memo.

events.name: Anxiety keeps one awake late at night.
events.description: Worried about his father's recovery and financial pressure, Ye Mingxuan tossed and turned until the early hours of the morning, taking deep breaths to relieve the stress.

起始状态.心情: Tired, yet with a clear mind, thinking about the day's arrangements.

结束状态.所处地点: Hospital Ward Companion Bed
结束状态.心情: Physically and mentally exhausted, yet feeling a sense of control from advancing practical matters.

2025-09.daily_overview: During a brief period of stability in my father's condition, the pressures of reality set in. On Teacher's Day, I contemplated the tightening of family finances, received a caring phone call from a childhood friend, and made plans for post-discharge rehabilitation. My weight had slightly increased due to reliance on takeout meals.

events.name: Pay monthly household bills
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan paid his utility bills and property management fees via mobile banking, realizing that his cash flow had become tight due to medical expenses.

events.name: Set aside personal plans
events.description: While organizing the memo, he came across the road trip guide for driving around Qinghai Lake and the Bilibili video script, and he filed the documents into the [Indefinitely Postponed] folder.

events.name: Contact for Aging-Friendly Renovation Consultation
events.description: Ye Mingxuan inquired about and contacted local aging-in-place renovation companies to ask about the cost of installing handrails in the bathroom and applying anti-slip floor treatments, while calculating the additional expenses.

events.name: Childhood friend Zhang Wei called late at night.
events.description: Late at night, Zhang Wei called and straightforwardly said to ask for help anytime if needed. He shared his own experience of his father's illness, reminding to pay attention to medical insurance reimbursement and caregiver channels.

events.name: Stress eating
events.description: Due to anxiety, Ye Mingxuan ordered a high-calorie takeout rice bowl for dinner, which briefly alleviated his emotions but left him feeling guilty.

起始状态.心情: Feeling depressed and worried about economic pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Hospital Ward
结束状态.心情: Complex, encompassing both financial pressures and the warmth of being supported by friends.

2025-09.daily_overview: Engage in in-depth communication with the attending physician regarding the rehabilitation plan, weigh professional advice, financial circumstances, and the father's wishes, decide on home care, begin contacting community resources, and pave the way for a long-term model.

events.name: Engage in in-depth communication with the attending physician regarding the rehabilitation plan.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan held a 40-minute meeting with the doctor, during which the principles of post-stroke rehabilitation, functional recovery curves, medication therapy, and physical therapy were explained in detail.

events.name: Decided to adopt the home care model
events.description: Considering the high costs of rehabilitation institutions and the need to use family savings, Ye Mingxuan decisively opted for a home care plan combined with community rehabilitation support.

events.name: Contact the community family doctor
events.description: After leaving the doctor's office, Ye Mingxuan contacted Dr. Liu Wentao via WeChat to relay the decision. Dr. Liu agreed to assist in contacting the rehabilitation therapist at the community health service center.

events.name: Discussing division of labor with mother
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan conveyed the doctor's opinion and decision to his mother, alleviated her fears, and promised to take responsibility for external communications and learning nursing knowledge, ensuring that he would be on night duty every week.

events.name: Urgent Email Handling for Temporary Work
events.description: Late at night, Ye Mingxuan received an urgent email from the company regarding the project progress and replied to it on his mobile phone in a corner of the ward until 23:45.

起始状态.心情: Solemn, preparing for significant medical decisions.

结束状态.所处地点: Hospital Ward
结束状态.心情: Resolute and of great responsibility, the path ahead is clear yet arduous.

2025-09.daily_overview: Father's condition has entered a stable phase, and the family's operations have shifted from emergency response to a long-term battle. A family meeting was held in the evening to plan for the future, followed by a round of games to briefly detach from the high-pressure situation.

events.name: Learn rehabilitation nursing knowledge
events.description: During the day at the hospital, Ye Mingxuan searched for authoritative information on stroke rehabilitation via his phone, followed rehabilitation medicine public accounts, and downloaded rehabilitation guidance apps to browse the family learning modules.

events.name: Family Meeting to Plan for the Future
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan held a family meeting with his mother via WeChat voice call to discuss home environment modifications, financial budget adjustments, methods for relatives to assist, and long-term rehabilitation goals, while recording key points.

events.name: A brief late-night gaming session for relaxation.
events.description: Late at night after his father fell asleep, Ye Mingxuan logged into "League of Legends" and teamed up with his teammate Zheng Kai for a ranked match, immersing himself in the game's strategies to temporarily forget the pressure.

events.name: Post-Game Reflection
events.description: The game was over. Ye Mingxuan sat quietly in the darkness, realizing the necessity of a temporary escape, and thought about using 3D printing to create rehabilitation training aids.

起始状态.心情: Numbness under sustained high pressure

结束状态.所处地点: Hospital Ward
结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted, yet gaining a sense of control from planning and a brief mental respite.

2025-09.daily_overview: The weekend family support was made concrete, with the aunt's visit and assistance helping to alleviate psychological burdens. Meanwhile, Ye Mingxuan put the family meeting resolutions into action by conducting on-site inspections and purchasing nursing supplies.

events.name: Aunt Wang Xiufang came to visit.
events.description: In the morning, my aunt brought braised pork, steamed perch, and fruit to the hospital, comforting the mother and child while practically offering to help with caregiving or household chores once or twice a week as a replacement.

events.name: On-site procurement of nursing supplies
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan visited large pharmacies and medical equipment stores to inquire about types of anti-decubitus air mattresses, purchased nursing pads, straw cups, and thermometers, and recorded the models and prices of walkers and commode chairs.

events.name: Online Price Comparison and Ordering
events.description: Returning to the hospital in the evening, Ye Mingxuan compared prices and delivery times on an e-commerce platform, placed online orders for an anti-decubitus air mattress and an adjustable walker, and used credit card installment payments to alleviate cash flow pressure.

events.name: Briefly return home to handle emails.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan took an hour to return home, quickly handled work emails from the company, and replied to a message of concern from his colleague Zhou Tao.

起始状态.心情: Slightly eased, looking forward to the arrival of my aunt.

结束状态.所处地点: My own bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat more grounded, sensing the family support network in effect, and having advanced practical matters.

events.name: Receive and install nursing equipment
events.description: In the afternoon, the air mattress and walker purchased online were delivered. Ye Mingxuan unpacked them, skillfully inflated and tested the air mattress, then installed the bedside guardrail and checked the walker's locking mechanism.

events.name: Demonstrating Device Usage to Mother
events.description: After the equipment was properly set up, Ye Mingxuan patiently demonstrated to his mother how to operate the air mattress switch, switch modes, and adjust the height of the walker until she had fully mastered the procedures.

events.name: Preliminary Organization of Financial Inventory
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan created a new Excel spreadsheet on his computer to organize the payment receipts and expense records since his hospitalization, and estimated the costs for medication, nursing, and rehabilitation over the next three months.

2025-09.daily_overview: A new week brings a new rhythm. Ye Mingxuan balances remote work with hospital affairs, studies nursing in the evenings, and refines financial adjustments, transitioning into the role of the family pillar and care coordinator.

events.name: Remote Work and Project Communication
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan logged into the company system via VPN at home to handle emails and participated in a brief conference call to report progress. Project manager Wang Peng agreed to postpone the design review meeting.

events.name: Connect with community rehabilitation resources
events.description: Before going to the hospital in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan called the community health service center to inquire about the appointment process, service content, and fees for home-based rehabilitation therapists, and registered to wait for an assessment time.

events.name: Learning Vital Signs Monitoring
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan continued studying the vital signs monitoring section of the online course, delving into the normal ranges of blood pressure, heart rate, and respiration, and practicing the use of an electronic blood pressure monitor for measurement and recording.

events.name: Fine-tune the monthly budget
events.description: At the computer, Ye Mingxuan refined the financial data into a new monthly budget sheet, significantly cutting entertainment and hobby expenses. He established a sub-account labeled [Father's Rehabilitation Medical Care] in the money market fund account and set up an automatic transfer.

events.name: Short-Distance Walking Escort Service in Hospitals
events.description: In the evening at the hospital, Ye Mingxuan accompanied his mother for a 10-minute walk in the small garden as a minimalist exercise to relieve stress.

起始状态.心情: Stay calm and be prepared to handle the multi-threaded tasks of the new week.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Exhausted yet methodical, feeling life being reconstructed, and knowing one must become the architect.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the first workday after his father's hospitalization, Ye Mingxuan handled work remotely from the hospital, studied nursing knowledge, and managed the family crisis. In the evening, he took a walk with his mother and tended to the succulents, finding a moment of respite.

events.name: Weekly Project Meeting Communication on Schedule Extension and Remote Collaboration Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan participated in the project weekly meeting via his laptop in the corridor outside his father's hospital room. He explained his father's condition and proposed postponing the critical design review meeting by two weeks. The team confirmed the new schedule, clarified his remote tasks and Zhou Tao's assistance responsibilities, and expressed understanding and support.

events.name: Follow-up and Task Confirmation After the Meeting
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan organized the minutes in the hallway, sent them via email to the attendees, confirmed the new schedule and division of labor, copied the leadership, and ensured no misunderstandings regarding the details.

events.name: Actively learn basic nursing knowledge.
events.description: Shuttling between the hospital subway and the bedside, Ye Mingxuan used a mobile app to learn about bedridden care knowledge such as pressure sore prevention and turning techniques. He observed nurses' operations and practiced simulations, demonstrating the transfer of his problem-solving traits to the family context.

events.name: Communicate with the financial manager regarding the medical special fund.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan contacted financial manager Zhang Wei via WeChat to inquire whether placing medical special funds in a money market fund is the optimal choice, and to explore options such as stable short-term financial products or insurance supplements to address future medical expenses.

events.name: Synchronization of Family Financial Arrangements
events.description: At home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan shared the detailed monthly budget sheet and medical fund information with his parents, verbally explained the new financial arrangements, and established family consensus.

events.name: Maternal Care and Evening Strolls
events.description: Wang Xiulan suggested that Ye Mingxuan take a walk outside. He strolled alone along Zhongbei Avenue in the residential area, sorting out his thoughts and temporarily escaping from the pressure.

events.name: Tending to Succulents for a Moment of Tranquility
events.description: After his walk, Ye Mingxuan watered the succulents on the balcony. The focused activity brought him a sense of calm and helped relieve stress.

events.name: Simple Dinner and Family Communication
events.description: Before taking a walk, Ye Mingxuan and his mother ate leftover dishes for dinner while synchronizing work adjustments and financial arrangements. His mother shared details from her hospital visit, and the mother and son calmly exchanged information.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to handle work emails.
events.description: At 22:30 in the evening, Ye Mingxuan received an urgent email from Gao Zhiyuan requesting additional design parameters. He stayed up until 23:50 to complete the reply, which resulted in a delay in his sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Tired but focused, ready to tackle a busy day.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A slight sense of relief, with pressure still present but a feeling of control gained through action.

events.name: Systematically learn rehabilitation training methods
events.description: During breaks in hospital caregiving and in the evenings, Ye Mingxuan studied rehabilitation-phase limb training methods through online courses, documenting joint range of motion maintenance, muscle strength training, and other aspects in detailed electronic notes.

events.name: Pay attention to changes in the father's emotional state.
events.description: In the hospital room, Ye Mingxuan noticed his father's low spirits. He silently adjusted the IV tube, mentioned the weather, and contemplated ways to provide emotional support.

events.name: Temporary change of dietary plan
events.description: Due to time constraints at noon, Ye Mingxuan bought high-calorie steamed buns from a convenience store near the hospital to satisfy his hunger, temporarily setting aside his healthy eating plan, which reflects irregular eating habits under pressure.

events.name: Brief call with childhood friend Zhang Wei
events.description: In the afternoon, Zhang Wei called to extend his greetings. Ye Mingxuan briefly shared his recent situation, accepted the comfort offered, and agreed to continue their conversation over the weekend, thereby maintaining their social connection.

events.description: Ye Mingxuan sorted out the design document list in his home study, clarified priorities and time requirements, synchronized the work plan with Gao Zhiyuan, and received approval.

events.name: Learning Communication Skills with Speech-Impaired Individuals
events.description: In the afternoon, he studied materials on communication techniques for aphasia patients, such as picture cards, gestures, and patient listening, and considered how to apply them in communicating with his father.

events.name: Accepting a colleague's invitation to a leisure activity
events.description: Zhou Tao recommended the immersive weekend play "Beiyang Past." After some hesitation, Ye Mingxuan agreed to attend, inquired about the gathering details, and decided to try this new cultural activity.

events.name: Attempts at Emotional Interaction in the Ward
events.description: During the night shift, Ye Mingxiao communicated using slow speech and simple words. He brought up amusing anecdotes from his father's work and watched competitive variety shows together. His father's eyes brightened, and he occasionally gestured.

events.name: Handover and Brief Planning with Mother
events.description: In the evening, I picked up my mother and brought her home. We prepared a simple meal, discussed my father's condition, arranged the caregiving schedule, and encouraged each other.

events.name: Insomnia caused by anxiety
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan, troubled by concerns over his father's recovery and work-related stress, tossed and turned, unable to fall asleep until the early hours of the morning, resulting in poor sleep quality.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Saturday, the focus was on rehabilitation training, play viewing, and social activities. Ye Mingxuan learned nursing skills, attended a play but left early, and received an invitation to be a groomsman.

events.name: Participate in hospital rehabilitation nursing training
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan attended rehabilitation department training, learning passive joint mobilization, safe transfer techniques, and key points for pressure ulcer prevention, while taking careful notes.

events.name: Practical Operation Exercises and Consultations
events.description: After the theoretical session, he practiced turning over and back-patting techniques using simulation equipment under the therapist's guidance, and consulted on household issues such as the selection of anti-slip mats.

events.name: Nursing Knowledge Practice and Communication Attempts
events.description: In the morning, practical limb activities were conducted in the ward, guiding my father through grasping movements. Attempts were made to communicate using slow speech and gestures, and effective communication methods were reviewed.

events.name: Engage in in-depth communication with the attending physician regarding discharge matters.
events.description: During the training break, communicate with the doctor about the recovery progress, rehabilitation plan, and medication regimen. The doctor also reminds about adjustments to the home environment.

events.name: Meet up with Zhou Tao to watch an immersive theater performance.
events.description: In the evening, I met Zhou Tao at the Five Great Avenues. Zhou Tao introduced the unique aspects of the play, while Ye Mingxuan listened but remained preoccupied with thoughts of his family.

events.name: Leaving Midway and Returning Home Early
events.description: When the performance was two-thirds through, Ye Mingxuan, concerned about his father, signaled to Zhou Tao that he would leave early and took the subway home.

events.name: Received a best man invitation from childhood friend Zhang Wei.
events.description: After the training, I received a call from Zhang Wei, inviting me to be the best man at his wedding next month. We discussed the preparations for the ceremony, and I gladly accepted the joyful occasion.

events.name: Brief Communication with Programming Study Partners
events.description: Before going to bed, I exchanged messages with Xu Ming on WeChat about slowing down the pace of learning, encouraging each other to maintain our skills and preserve our sense of professional identity.

events.name: Weight gain after gatherings
events.description: After a simple post-training meal outside, the consumption of high-calorie foods led to a slight increase in body weight.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Complexity, grounded in skills, apologetic for departure, warm with good news.

events.name: Explain and discuss the viewing experience of the drama with colleague Zhou Tao.
events.description: In the morning, Zhou Tao inquired via WeChat. Ye Mingxuan candidly explained his concerns about his father, sharing that the first half of his experience felt novel. They agreed to try again, and Zhou Tao expressed understanding.

events.name: Taking my father home from the hospital after his discharge.
events.description: I went through the procedures with my mother to bring my father home, carefully assisted him to settle in the bedroom, and my father felt relieved upon seeing the room.

events.description: In the afternoon, organize medical expense receipts and future expenditure budgets, input them into spreadsheets, and prepare data for financial planning discussions.

events.description: After days of traveling, Ye Mingxuan felt exhausted and went to bed early at 22:00 to try to regain his energy.

events.name: Application for Long-Term Remote Work Arrangement
events.description: In the morning, I communicated with Gao Zhiyuan about the need for long-term care for my father and requested a remote work arrangement with flexible hours. Gao Zhiyuan supported a trial implementation.

events.name: Accompanying father for the initial rehabilitation assessment
events.description: Take half a day off to accompany my father for a hospital rehabilitation assessment, documenting functional outcomes and the frequency of home rehabilitation plan training items.

events.name: Advance the core design work
events.description: During his lunch break, Father used his laptop to refine the 3D model, adding tolerance annotations and material specifications, making the most of fragmented time.

events.name: Learn long-term health management knowledge for cerebral infarction
events.description: In the evening, study recurrence risks and secondary prevention, organize medication precautions, rehabilitation exercise progression, and principles of a low-salt diet, and establish a management framework.

events.name: Voice communication with financial manager regarding financial adjustments
events.description: Contact Zhang Wei via WeChat voice call at 8 p.m. to explain the financial changes and anticipated medical expenses, and to seek advice on asset allocation.

events.name: Mild discomfort in the lower back
events.description: Due to continuously bending over to move nursing supplies, Ye Mingxuan felt a soreness in his lower back and began paying attention to adjusting his posture.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the day of transaction closure planning, Ye Mingxuan completed the optimization of the rehabilitation course care plan, collaborated with colleagues to design issues, contemplated work-life balance, and planned for the acquisition of new skills.

events.name: Complete Rehabilitation Courses and Optimize Care Plans
events.description: After completing the online course "Home Rehabilitation and Care for Stroke Patients" and obtaining the certificate, I optimized the daily care and training plan to be more scientific and personalized, based on my father's specific condition.

events.name: Collaborate online with Zhou Tao to resolve design issues.
events.description: After Zhou Tao's inspection, an online meeting was held to discuss the ambiguity in assembly interference dimension labeling. Screen sharing was used to adjust and verify the dimensions, enabling quick modification decisions to ensure feasibility.

events.name: Integrate and update the final design document
events.description: Based on the discussions, revise the model drawings, fully update the document package, upload the final version to the cloud drive submission subdirectory, and mark the design as ready for the review meeting.

events.name: Consider long-term work-life balance solutions.
events.description: Review the company's flexible work arrangement policy in the evening, conceptualize a hybrid work plan for in-office attendance on Tuesdays and Thursdays with remote work on other days, and assess the feasibility of remote collaboration in preparation for a proposal.

events.name: Plan new skill acquisition to address project challenges
events.description: Upon learning that he might take over the composite materials project, Gao Zhiyuan searched for ANSYS ACP module tutorials and developed a one-and-a-half-month self-study plan outline to address the professional challenge.

events.name: Accompanying father for standing exercises after dinner.
events.description: After dinner, assist father in standing with a walker in the living room for five minutes to practice rehabilitation training.

2025-09.daily_overview: Work Report, Deep Learning, and the Germination of Innovative Ideas Day. Ye Mingxuan reported on design progress, studied complication prevention, conceived the idea of 3D-printed assistive devices, and researched insurance.

events.name: Reporting Mid-term Work Progress to Direct Supervisor
events.description: In the morning remote meeting, I reported the progress of the design documentation to Gao Zhiyuan, shared the drawings and calculation sheets via screen sharing. Gao Zhiyuan expressed satisfaction and raised suggestions on optimizing material cost control through tolerance and fit, followed by a discussion on solutions.

events.name: Systematic Study on the Prevention of Stroke Complications
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time to study online courses on complications such as pulmonary infections, deep vein thrombosis, and pressure sores—focusing on their causes, identification, and prevention—while incorporating the practice of examining skin areas and massage techniques based on records of my father's hemiplegia.

events.name: The idea of 3D printed assistive devices was conceived.
events.description: While assisting with my father's hand rehabilitation exercises, I observed that he struggled to use chopsticks and spoons, and the commercially available utensils did not fit his needs. This led to the idea of using a 3D printer to customize thickened, non-slip handles for utensils or adaptive tools.

events.name: Commence research on supplementary medical insurance.
events.description: In the evening, I researched commercial supplementary medical insurance, checked the scope of medical insurance reimbursement, considered coverage for out-of-directory medications and hospitalization allowances, and conducted platform searches and comparisons.

events.name: Weekend Family Cleaning and Organizing
events.description: After dinner, vacuum and clean the floors in the living room and the father's bedroom, and dispose of the cardboard boxes and miscellaneous items from express deliveries to maintain a tidy and restful atmosphere.

events.name: Playing online games with teammate Zheng Kai.
events.description: After work, I played a round of "League of Legends" online with Zheng Kai, discussing tactics via voice chat as an emotional outlet.

起始状态.心情: Routine, Friday work wrap-up

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Emergent creative excitement in 3D printing ideas, thorough in risk management.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the last day of September, summarizing and planning: Ye Mingxuan submitted work results in preparation for reporting, deepened the 3D printing plan, archived insurance documents, improved the family system, and formulated a self-study plan.

events.name: Submit the design document and prepare for the review presentation.
events.description: In the morning, submit the complete set of detailed design documents through the project management system, and begin preparing the review presentation PPT to outline the logical framework, technical highlights, potential issues, and response strategies.

events.name: Plan the Development Steps for 3D Printed Rehabilitation Devices
events.description: Based on a comprehensive evaluation of the father's feedback, priority is given to developing a prototype of the tableware handle. The plan involves refining the three-dimensional model, conducting finite element analysis, consulting Li Xiang, procuring TPU materials, and arranging for printing and testing within one week.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, a typical pleasant autumn day in Tianjin with comfortable temperatures.
date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first day of the National Day holiday, Ye Mingxuan temporarily set aside the recent family pressures and threw himself wholeheartedly into the wedding of his childhood friend Zhang Wei as a groomsman. During the day, he assisted meticulously and efficiently with the bridal pickup and participated in the ceremony. In the evening, he reunited with old friends at the wedding banquet, soaking in the long-lost liveliness and joy. Only after returning home from the wedding did he face reality again, briefly discussing his father’s condition with his mother. Amid the exhaustion, there was a hint of satisfaction from fulfilling an important social responsibility.

events.name: Serving as a groomsman (morning)
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Ye Mingxuan, adhering to the meticulous habits of his ISTJ personality, got up early and carefully washed up. He put on his crisply ironed groomsman suit and repeatedly checked his bow tie and cuffs. At 7:00, he set off on time from his home in Xiqing District, arriving half an hour early at the home of his childhood friend Zhang Wei in Hedong District. Upon arrival, he proactively assisted the groom Zhang Wei and the other groomsmen in counting and verifying the items for the wedding procession (red envelopes, hand-held bouquet, celebratory cannons, etc.). Like managing a work project, he confirmed the fleet route and timeline with an engineer's logical thinking to ensure a flawless process. During the waiting period before departure, he patted Zhang Wei on the shoulder and calmly said, "Relax, everything is in order."

events.name: Participate in the bride welcoming ceremony
events.description: Ye Mingxuan followed the wedding procession to the bride's home. During the lively bridal games, he was not the most active participant but consistently provided support from behind the groom. When faced with games that required puzzle-solving or involved delicate tasks, such as picking up smooth marbles with chopsticks, his ISTJ traits of meticulousness and hands-on ability came into play, calmly helping the groom overcome challenges. His execution of the "red envelope strategy" was also carried out in an orderly manner, maintaining the festive atmosphere without letting the situation get out of control.

events.name: Wedding Ceremony and Reception
events.description: At the wedding ceremony held in the hotel, Ye Mingxuan, as one of the groomsmen, stood upright behind the groom throughout the event. During the ring exchange, he calmly retrieved the ring box from the inner pocket of his suit and handed it to the groom accurately. Throughout the wedding banquet, in addition to assisting the newlyweds in toasting some guests, he proactively helped coordinate seating arrangements and addressed a minor issue of temporary insufficient beverages. He also chatted with several high school classmates he hadn’t seen in a long time, catching up on recent developments. The conversation occasionally shifted from work to family matters, and when mentioning his father, he only briefly touched upon the topic without elaborating on the illness.

events.name: Wedding Conclusion and Return Home
events.description: After the wedding banquet, Ye Mingxuan did not leave immediately. Instead, he stayed behind to assist Zhang Wei's family in tallying the gifts and organizing the remaining cigarettes and alcohol. He loaded some of the items onto a designated vehicle and once again bid farewell to Zhang Wei and the bride, who were filled with happiness but visibly exhausted, offering his sincere blessings: "From now on, we are family. May you have steady happiness." A little after ten in the evening, he returned home in Xiqing District by taxi, weary but in a cheerful mood.

events.name: Nighttime Communication with Mother
events.description: Upon returning home, his mother Wang Xiulan was still awake, waiting for him in the living room. Ye Mingxuan took off his suit, changed into casual home clothes, and briefly shared with his mother some observations from the wedding to lift her spirits. The conversation naturally shifted to his father Ye Jianguo. His mother informed him that his father’s condition remained stable today, though he had been somewhat downcast during his rehabilitation exercises. Ye Mingxuan took note of this silently and made plans with his mother to discuss detailed care arrangements together the following morning (October 2).

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of anticipation for the happiness of a friend, while a concern for the father weighs in the depths of the heart.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled, the sense of social pleasure gradually fades, replaced by a rational mindset for planning tomorrow's family affairs.

state.今日运动: Standing and walking for extended periods throughout the day, but without deliberate exercise.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to overcast, with a slight drop in temperature.
date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: On the second day of the National Day holiday, Ye Mingxuan fully embraced his role as the "family project manager." Instead of resting, he held a formal family meeting with his mother, applying project management principles to break down, assign, and create a visual chart for the caregiving tasks after his father's discharge from the hospital. This process was both rational and emotionally interactive, as the mother and son found a shared rhythm and approach to tackle challenges through planning. The family's operations began to shift from chaos to order.

events.name: Develop a Draft for Family Caregiving Task Allocation
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan opened his computer in the study and created a new Excel spreadsheet. Based on his mother’s feedback from the previous night and his father’s potential rehabilitation needs, he began to list in detail the tasks to be completed over the next two weeks or even a month. These included preparing three daily meals (distinguishing between regular meals and his father’s special patient meals), scheduling and accompanying him to hospital follow-up appointments, assisting with rehabilitation exercises, purchasing and managing medications, household cleaning, and preparing contingency plans for emergencies. Taking into account his own work schedule (considering regular office hours and possible flexible adjustments) and his mother’s energy levels, he preliminarily outlined the division of responsibilities.

events.name: Family Meeting: Confirming Division of Labor and Emotional Communication
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan brought the printed draft of the division of labor to the living room and formally discussed it with his mother, Wang Xiulan. Like presiding over a meeting, he explained the content, frequency, and estimated time required for each task one by one. His mother, Wang Xiulan, added many details, such as his father’s taste preferences and which rehabilitation exercises required collaboration between the two of them. During the discussion, Wang Xiulan choked up at one point due to worries about the future. Instead of offering excessive words of comfort, Ye Mingxuan pointed to the table and said, "Mom, look, we’ll take things one step at a time, and we’ll get through this. I’ll handle the heavy work and errands, and you’ll take care of the nursing and cooking, which you’re good at. We’ll work together well." This pragmatic attitude, in turn, gave his mother confidence.

events.name: Refine the division of labor table and develop contingency plans.
events.description: Based on the discussion results, Ye Mingxuan revised the division of labor chart on his computer, incorporating time milestones and responsible persons to create a clear "Family Care Coordination Plan V1.0." He also prepared an additional simplified 'Emergency Response Plan' checklist, outlining emergency contacts (such as family doctor Liu Wentao and colleague Zhou Tao for covering shifts) and handling procedures for situations like sudden discomfort of his father or temporary physical issues of his mother. He printed two copies of the final version, posting one on the refrigerator and keeping the other for himself.

events.name: Reporting the Progress of the 'Family Project' to Father
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan video-called his father, Ye Jianguo, in the hospital ward with his mother. Instead of expressing many sentimental words, Ye Mingxuan simply showed a photo of the task allocation chart and told his father, "Dad, Mom and I have arranged everything at home. Just focus on cooperating with the treatment. We've also discussed the rehabilitation plan, and we'll follow the steps once you're back." His father nodded silently on the other end of the video, his eyes revealing a hint of relief.

events.name: Working overtime temporarily to handle work emails
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan received a WeChat message from his colleague Zhou Tao, reminding him to confirm a design parameter in the project. He opened his computer, quickly reviewed the relevant documents, and replied to the email to ensure that the work was not delayed, which caused him to go to bed later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, goal-oriented, and ready to tackle household organization issues.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Slightly relaxed, with a sense of controllability arising from the completion of important planning work, yet fully aware that the challenges have only just begun.

date_attribute.holiday: National Day

2025-10.daily_overview: On the third day of the holiday, the autumn rain brought a chill. Ye Mingxuan began making practical preparations for balancing work and family life after the long break. At home, he sorted through his work responsibilities, gathering "data support" for applying for work adjustments. In the afternoon, he went to the hospital, where he engaged in in-depth discussions with the attending physician with the meticulousness of an engineer handling technical parameters, obtaining firsthand "technical data" on his father's condition and care. On this day, he simultaneously advanced the preparations for his "project" on two fronts: externally (at the hospital) and internally (at work).

events.name: Balancing Personal Work and Family Responsibilities
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan was in his study, opening his work schedule and project management system. He carefully reviewed the key milestones of the automation production line renovation project he was responsible for, along with upcoming business trip arrangements (which originally included a short-term technical support visit to a partner factory), and assessed the urgency and flexibility of each task. At the same time, he referred to the family task division plan he had made the day before, estimating the time slots he would need to allocate. In his notebook, he listed several adjustment options that might require discussion with his supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, such as postponing a business trip, shifting some design reviews to online formats, or applying for a fixed weekly remote workday.

events.name: In-depth hospital communication: Obtain 'Nursing Technical Parameters'
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan made his way to the hospital where his father was staying, braving the light rain. In the doctor’s office, rather than asking general questions, he took out his phone’s memo app and engaged in nearly an hour of discussion with the attending physician, focusing on several key issues: 1. The specific changes in his father’s latest imaging results compared to previous ones; 2. The mechanism of the current medication plan and potential side effects to watch for; 3. The approximate timeline and criteria for discharge evaluation; 4. Specific techniques, frequency, intensity, and contraindications for passive limb exercises during home rehabilitation; 5. Key points for nutritional support (with specific examples of low-salt, low-fat, and high-protein foods). He listened and took notes simultaneously, asking the doctor to explain any unfamiliar medical terms in simpler language.

events.name: Integrate information and update the family plan
events.description: After returning home from the hospital, Ye Mingxuan immediately organized the doctor's recommendations into key points and updated them into the family task distribution chart and future rehabilitation plan. For instance, he added the doctor's emphasized instruction of "performing ankle pump exercises at fixed times daily to prevent deep vein thrombosis" as a fixed task to his mother's daytime care checklist. At the same time, he gained a clearer understanding that his father would require intensive care during the initial period after returning home, which strengthened his determination and sense of urgency to apply for work adjustments.

events.name: Early bedtime due to discomfort from lumbar muscle strain.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan felt an intensifying ache in his lower back, a lingering effect from his previous lumbar muscle strain. To avoid aggravating the injury, he decided to rest early, canceled his originally scheduled study plan, and applied a warm compress.

起始状态.心情: Focus, with a problem-solving purpose.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: A slight weariness after information overload, yet the mind is clearer for having grasped more key information, and there is greater confidence in the next steps.

2025-10.daily_overview: As the National Day holiday reached its midpoint on an ordinary Sunday, the mother went to the hospital for her daily caregiving duties during the day. Meanwhile, Ye Mingxuan stayed home and entered a "multitasking" mode: on one hand, he remotely handled an unexpected technical issue related to a project, demonstrating his professional competence; on the other hand, he began preparing in advance for upcoming work challenges (composite material analysis) by self-learning new software. In the evening, he experienced his first full night of hospital caregiving, gaining firsthand insight into the physical and mental demands of caregiving work.

events.name: Remotely Resolving Urgent Technical Issues in Projects
events.description: Around ten in the morning, Ye Mingxuan was in his study when he suddenly received an urgent call from his colleague Zhou Tao, who reported abnormal vibration data during the testing of a transmission component by the project team. Ye Mingxuan immediately turned on his home computer, remotely accessed the company's work system via VPN, and reviewed the test logs and 3D models. Subsequently, he established a three-way video conference with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, who was responsible for simulation. During the nearly two-hour discussion, drawing on his design experience, Ye Mingxuan guided the team in troubleshooting potential causes, analyzing everything from assembly tolerances to material properties. Ultimately, they identified a potential issue of insufficient stiffness in a connecting component and proposed directions for temporary reinforcement and subsequent design modifications.

events.name: Initiate self-study of ANSYS ACP software
events.description: In the afternoon, after handling work-related matters, Ye Mingxuan decided to use his vacation time to start learning. He recalled Li Xiang mentioning the application of ANSYS in composite material analysis. He downloaded the ANSYS Student Version (or the company license file) on his computer and installed the ACP module following the official website instructions. After the installation was complete, he did not rush to operate the software. Instead, he first opened the official help documentation and user manual PDFs, quickly browsing the table of contents, the positioning of the ACP module (used for composite material structure modeling and analysis), and a simple workflow example (geometry-material-layup-analysis-results). He took a few lines of simple notes, marking several core concepts such as "layup sequence" and "anisotropic materials" for further understanding later.

events.name: First Night Hospital Accompaniment
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan arrived at the hospital to relieve his mother. After she briefed him on his father's daytime diet, bowel movements, and the precautions noted by the nurses, she left. Nighttime caregiving proved far more tedious and draining than he had imagined: he needed to assist his father with using a bedpan, help him turn over every two hours, record his blood pressure and heart rate, and provide water at regular intervals. Due to illness and the hospital environment, his father slept lightly and was irritable, requiring constant reassurance from Ye Mingxuan. He hardly slept the entire night, gaining a profound understanding of his mother's exhaustion over the past days and a direct sense of the immense toll long-term caregiving takes on one's energy.

events.name: Temporary Adjustment of Dietary Plan
events.description: Due to accompanying a patient in the hospital, Ye Mingxuan had to rely on boxed meals from the hospital cafeteria for dinner. He opted for light dishes, but found the taste rather ordinary, which made him cherish his mother's home-cooked meals even more.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle potential multithreading tasks.

state.睡觉时间: (Not sleeping deeply in the hospital in the early hours of the next morning)

结束状态.所处地点: Hospital Ward
结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted and mentally strained, I have gained a profound understanding of the practical pressures of long-term care, and my resolve has grown even firmer.

state.今日运动: Frequent nighttime rising and assisting with father's mobility entail significant physical exertion.
