2025-10.daily_overview: On the last day of the holiday, Ye Mingxuan returned home exhausted from the hospital. Together with his mother, he prepared for the upcoming Mid-Autumn Festival hospital visit, supporting each other through the mundane household chores. At the same time, he proactively began drafting written materials for the formal communication with his supervisor after the long holiday, transforming family needs into a well-structured proposal for work adjustments. The holiday drew to a close amid the tension and fulfillment of family responsibilities.

events.name: Preparing Mid-Autumn Festival visiting items with mother
events.description: In the morning, after returning home from the hospital to catch up on three hours of sleep, Ye Mingxuan busied himself with his mother, Wang Xiulan, in the kitchen and living room. His mother insisted on personally preparing a few light hometown dishes that his father loved: steamed perch (with less salt) and winter melon spare rib soup (with the surface oil skimmed off). Ye Mingxuan assisted by washing the ingredients and going out to purchase a box of branded mooncakes (choosing the low-sugar variety) and some fresh fruits. As the mother and son worked, they discussed his father’s mental state and appetite from the previous day. His mother repeatedly checked the seal of the insulated lunchbox, while Ye Mingxuan reminded her not to forget his father’s reading glasses and a mechanical magazine he often read.

events.name: Drafting an Application for Flexible Working Arrangements
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan was alone in his study, beginning to draft an application for a work adjustment to his superior, Gao Zhiyuan. He did not write it as a simple plea for help but approached it like preparing a project report: the opening briefly outlined the objective circumstances—his father’s sudden cerebral infarction requiring long-term family care. The main body detailed the adjustment plan he proposed: applying for a flexible work arrangement lasting three months (with subsequent evaluation), specifically working remotely on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, and being present in the office on Tuesdays and Thursdays. Next, he analyzed the specific impact of this plan on the projects he was currently responsible for (listing key tasks, parts that could be completed remotely, and points requiring in-person communication), and committed to ensuring project progress and quality by strengthening online communication and delivering work outcomes in advance. Finally, he attached a preliminary schedule of his family caregiving and hospital follow-up appointments for the next month to demonstrate the necessity of the adjustment.

events.name: Initial Communication and Preliminary Plan Discussion
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan discussed the core content of the application draft with his mother, ensuring she understood the potential changes in his future work arrangements. He also reconfirmed with her how household chores and caregiving time could be reasonably scheduled to avoid mutual interference if his application was approved, particularly during his remote work days at home. For example, they agreed that when Ye Mingxuan attends important online meetings, his mother would try to keep his father occupied in the living room to maintain relative quiet in the study area.

events.name: Abandoning exercise routines due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to fatigue from overnight caregiving, Ye Mingxuan did not engage in any exercise today. Instead, he opted for adequate rest to conserve energy for tomorrow's work and family responsibilities.

state.起床时间: 10:00 (due to compensatory sleep after overnight caregiving)

起始状态.所处地点: Hospital Ward (Returning Home After Morning Handover)
起始状态.心情: Physically exhausted, yet the mind is already contemplating the multiple tasks ahead.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: A sense of grounded readiness. Although the holiday was busy, multiple objectives such as information gathering, plan formulation, and communication preparation were accomplished, providing a clearer approach to tackling the challenges of the new week starting tomorrow.

state.今日运动: Light household chores

date_attribute.weather: Clear sky, bright moon and sparse stars.
date_attribute.holiday: Mid-Autumn Festival

2025-10.daily_overview: Mid-Autumn Festival, a reunion day destined to be different. Ye Mingxuan and his mother brought carefully prepared meals and mooncakes to the hospital, where they shared a simple yet heartwarming gathering with his father. There was no lively family feast, only quiet words of reassurance and encouraging glances exchanged in the hospital room. The festive atmosphere dispelled the gloom of illness, drawing the family’s hearts even closer in the face of hardship. In the evening, mother and son admired the bright moon together in the quiet of their home, emotions flowing silently in the stillness.

events.name: The Mid-Autumn Journey to the Hospital
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan and his mother, carrying large and small bags, took the subway to the hospital. The carriage was filled with people heading out for trips or returning home, filled with a festive atmosphere, which created a subtle contrast with their destination—the hospital. His mother looked out the window and said softly, "At this time in previous years, your father would have already been preparing the crabs for the evening." Ye Mingxuan squeezed his mother's hand, said nothing, and only held the insulated bag containing the meal more securely.

events.name: Mid-Autumn Festival Lunch in the Hospital Ward
events.description: With the doctor's permission, they laid out the food they had brought on the mobile dining table in the hospital room. There was steamed perch, winter melon soup, rice, and sliced mooncakes. Father Ye Jianguo still struggled a bit to sit up, but his spirits were better than in the previous days. Ye Mingxuan carefully picked out the fish bones for his father, while his mother fed him soup, murmuring, "Drink slowly." The three of them spoke little, only occasionally commenting on the taste of the dishes or discussing the preview of the Mid-Autumn Festival gala in the news. The atmosphere was simple and quiet, yet carried a sense of cherishing life after surviving a crisis. The mother turned away, pretending to tidy up the dishes, and discreetly wiped the corner of her eye.

events.name: Brief companionship and communication
events.description: After lunch, Ye Mingxuan slowly wheeled his father down the corridor of the rehabilitation department, allowing him to enjoy the sunlight outside the window. Meanwhile, his mother went to find the duty nurse to reconfirm the treatment and nursing arrangements for the following days. Back in the ward, Ye Mingxuan took out the mechanical magazine he had brought and read an article about a new type of CNC machine tool to his father. His father listened attentively, occasionally interjecting with professional comments, as if they had returned to the days when they used to discuss technology at home.

events.name: The Silent Mid-Autumn Night After Returning Home
events.description: The afternoon visiting hours ended, and mother and son returned home. In the evening, they reheated the leftovers from lunch, shared mooncakes together, and sat in the living room watching the Mid-Autumn Festival gala for a while. On television, there were songs and dances celebrating peace and prosperity, but the house was unusually quiet. Suddenly, the mother said while watching the show, "Your father seemed to have a better appetite today." Ye Mingxuan nodded, "Yes, he seemed more energetic too." No more words were spoken, but a sense of mutual reliance and shared resilience permeated the air. Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan sent brief holiday greetings via WeChat to a few out-of-town friends (such as Liu Yang and Wang Lei).

events.name: Weight slightly increased due to relaxed diet during the holidays.
events.description: During the Mid-Autumn Festival dinner, Ye Mingxuan ate more mooncakes and dishes than usual. Although he had chosen low-sugar options, his dietary control slightly relaxed in the festive atmosphere.

起始状态.心情: With the solemnity of completing an important family ritual and the anticipation for the father's condition

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Amidst the calmness, there is a touch of faint melancholy and solace. Melancholy arises from the father's absence from the family during the holiday, while solace comes from the family's hearts being together and the father's improving condition.

state.今日运动: Walking (round trips to the hospital and activities within the hospital)

date_attribute.holiday: Rest Day (Adjusted Work Schedule)

2025-10.daily_overview: It was a workday adjusted for the holiday, yet Ye Mingxuan took a day off. He and his mother engaged in a special activity—sorting through old belongings in his father’s study and bedroom. This was more than just a thorough cleaning; it was a journey through time, a family history lesson. As his mother rummaged through the items and recounted past stories, Ye Mingxuan listened and rediscovered his father. The dusty certificates of merit and old tools connected the family’s craftsmanship heritage with emotional ties, providing him with deeper motivation and meaning amidst the pressures of caregiving.

events.name: Tidying Up the Study: Discovering Father's 'Technical Archives'
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan and his mother put on masks and gloves and began sorting through his father Ye Jianguo’s study. From the bottom layer of the bookshelf, they pulled out a kraft paper bag, inside which were neatly stored various certificates of merit and "Technical Expert" awards his father had received at the Tianjin First Machine Tool Plant, their pages already yellowed with age. His mother picked up a certificate from 1988 and said with a smile, "Look, your persistence is exactly like your father’s when he was young. To solve a gear precision issue, he could spend days on end in the workshop." Ye Mingxuan also found several well-worn copies of the *Mechanical Design Handbook*, their corners dog-eared and filled with notes, along with some old-fashioned drafting tools.

events.name: Organizing the Bedroom and Clothing
events.description: In the afternoon, they turned to the bedroom. While organizing the wardrobe, the mother took out a few of the father's work clothes, which were washed to a pale color but neatly pressed. "Your father is frugal; these clothes can still be worn for work." While tidying the bedside table, the mother discovered an iron box containing several of Ye Mingxuan's childhood certificates, a roughly made wooden bird from his first woodworking project, and old photographs of the family of three. Looking at the photos, the mother recounted how, when Ye Mingxuan was young, his father had used factory scraps to make him a toy car.

events.name: Cleaning, Sorting, and Preliminary Planning
events.description: Ye Mingxuan was responsible for the physical tasks, sorting the organized books, tools, and clothing into categories: frequently used tools and books were returned to their original places for easy access; old work clothes and unworn garments were packed for donation; while meaningful certificates, photos, and old toys were carefully cleaned and placed into dedicated storage boxes. He discussed with his mother that after his father recovered and returned home, they would select one or two of the most representative certificates to frame and hang on the wall in the study or living room.

events.name: In-depth Conversation During the Break
events.description: During a break from tidying up, the mother and son sat in the living room, resting and drinking tea. The mother opened up and shared more stories about the father's youth: how he started as an apprentice, how he earned respect through his exceptional skills, and how he secretly felt proud of Ye Mingxuan's choice to pursue mechanical engineering. Ye Mingxuan also shared the challenges he encountered in his work and the sense of accomplishment after overcoming them, admitting that his father's rigorous and pragmatic attitude had profoundly influenced him.

events.name: Slight weight loss due to labor exertion
events.description: The all-day physical labor consumed a significant amount of calories, leaving Ye Mingxuan feeling physically exhausted yet refreshed, with a slight decrease in weight as a result.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit curious and expectant about the upcoming home organization activity.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet tinged with a sense of reflection. The body is weary from labor, but the spirit is enriched and strengthened by a deeper understanding of my father and family history.

state.今日运动: Moderate physical labor (carrying, cleaning, organizing)

date_attribute.holiday: Day Off (Make-up Work Day)

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first workday after the National Day holiday (a make-up workday), Ye Mingxuan officially returned to work and simultaneously launched multiple "projects" to address changes in his life. He first finalized the application plan for a flexible work schedule with his family, then proactively sought advice from colleagues to clarify his new learning direction (ANSYS ACP), and began systematic theoretical study in the evening. On this day, he made progress simultaneously on three fronts—work, family, and personal development—with a tight yet clear and purposeful pace.

events.name: Finalize the flexible work schedule plan
events.description: During breakfast, Ye Mingxuan had a final family discussion with his parents (connecting with his father via video call). He presented the revised and refined application plan and explained the rationale for choosing the "remote work on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, and on-site attendance on Tuesday and Thursday" model: it would ensure two days of deep involvement in team collaboration and handling tasks that required physical presence each week, while also providing three full days free from commuting time for family care and managing unexpected situations. His father nodded in agreement over the video call, and his mother also expressed her support. Ye Mingxuan then finalized the plan and prepared to submit it formally.

events.name: Consult with colleagues to clarify the learning path.
events.description: At noon in the company cafeteria, Ye Mingxuan deliberately sat next to his colleague Li Xiang, who was in charge of simulation. Instead of directly asking about software operations, he first inquired, "Engineer Li, regarding the carbon fiber reinforced components mentioned in our new project, what are the main differences in analysis compared to traditional metal parts? If using ANSYS, which module is most suitable?" Li Xiang adjusted his glasses and provided a detailed explanation of the anisotropic characteristics of composite materials, as well as the advantages of the ACP module in defining and analyzing layups. He also recommended several official introductory tutorials and a classic textbook on composite material mechanics. Ye Mingxuan carefully took notes.

events.name: Submit a formal application for flexible working arrangements
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan formally submitted a written application through the company's OA system to his direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan and the Human Resources Department, attaching a detailed plan explanation and a brief overview of his family situation. After submission, he proactively walked over to Gao Zhiyuan's workstation to briefly explain the situation orally and expressed his readiness to further discuss the details of the plan at any time. Gao Zhiyuan acknowledged receipt and indicated that he would review it as soon as possible.

events.name: Systematically study the theoretical foundations of composite materials.
events.description: In the evening at home, Ye Mingxuan did not rush to open the ANSYS software. Instead, following Li Xiang's suggestion, he first found a PPT on the fundamentals of composite material mechanics online and the electronic version of the first chapter of the recommended textbook. He spent over two hours systematically studying the roles of fibers and matrices, the macroscopic mechanical properties of single-layer plates, and the concepts of ply theory and classical laminate theory. As he read, he sketched diagrams in his notebook, comparing the stress-strain curves of carbon fiber composites with those of steel to understand the meaning of "anisotropy."

events.name: Staying up late until dawn for studying.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan was captivated by the theory of composite materials and studied late into the night, losing track of time, which resulted in him going to bed much later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Post-holiday work resumption mindset, with a clear to-do list and focused concentration.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled from completing multiple 'start-up' actions, and finding the learning of new knowledge somewhat challenging yet highly motivating.

2025-10.daily_overview: A day of returning to the normal work rhythm. Ye Mingxuan encountered a new challenge at work (the composite materials project), which validated the foresight of his prior learning. He attempted to engage in preliminary informal communication with his superior to lay the groundwork for a formal application. At the same time, he also made efforts to find moments of respite for both his mother and himself amid the high-pressure life, planning a weekend outing that catered to his mother's preferences while aligning with his personal interests. The technical foreign language exchange with colleagues during lunch remained a steadfast personal commitment.

events.name: Assigned to participate in the new composite materials project.
events.description: During the morning project team weekly meeting, project manager Wang Peng officially announced the launch of a project to develop lightweight battery brackets for new energy vehicle companies, with key components to be made of carbon fiber composite materials. Ye Mingxuan, as one of the main structural designers, was included in the project team. Wang Peng specifically mentioned that the team lacked experience in composite material analysis and processing, and everyone needed to quickly learn and fill the knowledge gap. Ye Mingxuan felt a surge of excitement, grateful that he had already started preparing relevant knowledge a few days earlier.

events.name: Informal Communication with Superior Gao Zhiyuan
events.description: During a free period after the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan walked to Gao Zhiyuan’s office door, knocked, and entered. Instead of directly submitting a request, he used a recent work report as an opening, briefly mentioning that his father’s condition was stable but required long-term recovery, and that he was striving to maintain a balance. He tactfully expressed his hope for some flexibility in his work schedule in the coming period and probed for Gao’s reaction. After listening, Gao Zhiyuan expressed understanding and inquired about the progress of Ye’s current projects. Ye Mingxuan provided an honest update and assured him that key milestones would not be affected.

events.name: Plan to accompany my mother to the antique market this weekend.
events.description: On his way home from work, Ye Mingxuan recalled that his mother, Wang Xiulan, had been shuttling between home and the hospital recently, feeling somewhat downcast. Knowing that his mother enjoyed strolling through markets and soaking up the lively atmosphere, and having long wanted to visit the Shenyangdao Antique Market to look at coins himself, he took the initiative during dinner to suggest, "Mom, I'm free this Saturday morning. How about we go to Shenyangdao for a walk? You can browse the old curios, and I'll check out the coins—it'll be a nice way to unwind." Initially, his mother Wang Xiulan hesitated, worried about taking up his time, but after Ye Mingxuan insisted, she finally agreed with a smile.

events.name: German Language Learning Exchange during Lunch
events.description: During lunch, Ye Mingxuan chatted with his colleague Zhou Tao about the topic of learning. Zhou Tao asked him how his German studies were progressing. Ye Mingxuan admitted that his progress had been slow recently, but he persisted in listening to German news during his commute and had started to specifically memorize German technical vocabulary in the field of mechanical engineering, such as "Lager" (bearing) and "Toleranz" (tolerance). Zhou Tao shared his own experience of learning vocabulary by watching English technical documentaries. The two agreed to hold each other accountable by checking in on their progress.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work pressure
events.description: The pressure from the new project made Ye Mingxuan feel somewhat anxious. He occasionally found himself distracted at work, thinking about family matters, which led to a slight decline in efficiency. When he returned home in the evening, he felt somewhat irritable.

起始状态.心情: Focus on work and look forward to the challenges of new projects.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling a slight sense of relief from effectively advancing work communication and family planning, there is both pressure and eagerness for the new project.

2025-10.daily_overview: This was a day of turning significance. Ye Mingxuan's application for a flexible work schedule received preliminary approval during the formal meeting in the morning. His efficient and pragmatic communication style, along with his reliable track record, played a crucial role. In the afternoon, he promptly adjusted his subsequent work plans and began contemplating the ripple effects of this significant lifestyle change. The first consideration was how to adapt his fitness routine to accommodate the new, fragmented schedule. A new chapter of life commenced amidst methodical planning.

events.name: Formal Meeting: Flexible Work Schedule Application Approved
events.description: In the morning, Gao Zhiyuan, the direct supervisor, convened a brief meeting with Ye Mingxuan and project manager Wang Peng. Ye Mingxuan brought prepared materials and once again clearly outlined his family situation, the specific adjustment plan (remote work on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays), and detailed work assurance measures. Gao Zhiyuan and Wang Peng inquired about collaboration details at several key project milestones, to which Ye Mingxuan responded point by point, proposing specific methods to enhance remote collaboration using tools such as WeCom and Tencent Meeting. Given Ye Mingxuan’s consistently rigorous and responsible performance and the feasibility of the plan, the two leaders, after discussion, granted preliminary approval to his application on the spot and informed him that the matter would be reported to HR through an expedited process. The meeting was pragmatic and efficient.

events.name: Submit a written application and obtain rapid approval.
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan immediately submitted the formal electronic application via the OA system. Thanks to the thorough prior communication, the electronic approvals from Gao Zhiyuan and Wang Peng were completed before the lunch break. The Human Resources Department issued the approval notification as soon as work resumed in the afternoon, agreeing to allow Ye Mingxuan to trial a flexible working system starting from next week (October 13) for three months, with monthly evaluations. Ye Mingxuan received the official approval email.

events.name: Adjust Work Plan and Prepare for Team Communication
events.description: Upon receiving the approval, Ye Mingxuan immediately updated his schedule, marking the days for remote work and on-site attendance. He reviewed the tasks that required handover or rescheduling with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, and drafted a simple "Remote Collaboration Communication Guide." He planned to share it with the team members during the meeting next Monday to clarify online contact methods and expected response times.

events.name: Consider Adjusting the Fitness Plan
events.description: On his way home from work, Ye Mingxuan realized that his previous routine of going to the gym at fixed times each week would inevitably be disrupted. During the three days at home, his time might be fragmented by caregiving, household chores, and remote work. He began to ponder: Could he still maintain a regular exercise routine? Perhaps he needed a more flexible, efficient, and quick home workout method? He decided to contact his fitness coach, Wang Jian, over the weekend to consult on how to tailor a training plan according to his new schedule.

events.name: Dinner to relax in celebration of the approval of the application.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan and his mother briefly celebrated the approval of the application, indulging in extra servings of braised pork, which resulted in a slight increase in his weight.

起始状态.心情: I feel a bit nervous about the upcoming important meeting, but I am well-prepared and confident.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Relieved and hopeful. The approval of the application has resolved the most significant structural challenge, bringing a stronger sense of control over life in the coming period, even though it is understood that implementation will still be full of challenges.

2025-10.daily_overview: A Saturday filled with pleasant surprises. Ye Mingxuan fulfilled his promise to accompany his mother to the antique market, which in itself was a successful family bonding experience. His successful "bargain hunt" for a rare copper coin at the market, thanks to his professional knowledge and keen observation, served as a powerful stimulant to his high-pressure life. The entire process—from discovery and purchase to cleaning and authentication—perfectly combined his passion for collecting, meticulous personality, and the precision of an engineer, bringing immense satisfaction and spiritual solace.

events.name: Accompanying Mother to Shenyangdao Antique Market
events.description: At nine in the morning, Ye Mingxuan accompanied his mother, Wang Xiulan, on the subway to the bustling Shenyangdao Antique Market. The market was bustling with crowds, and a wide array of antiques and vintage items were on display. His mother showed great interest in old clocks, embroidered works, and some folk handicrafts, stopping at each stall to examine them carefully. Ye Mingxuan patiently accompanied her, occasionally explaining the uses of certain items. Meanwhile, he discreetly kept an eye on the various coin stalls, his sharp gaze sweeping over piles of copper and silver coins.

events.name: Spotting the pearl and successfully 'snagging a bargain'
events.description: At a stall run by an elderly man selling miscellaneous items, Ye Mingxuan was drawn to a pile of mixed copper coins from the late Qing and early Republican periods. He crouched down and quickly sifted through them, relying on his years of collecting experience. Suddenly, a "Hubei Province-made Guangxu Yuanbao Ten Cash Copper Coin" caught his eye. The coin was deeply struck, with clear dragon scales, a clean surface, minimal circulation wear, and its variant features matched a relatively rare type he recalled from memory. Suppressing his excitement, he calmly mixed this coin with several other ordinary ones and inquired about the price from the stall owner. The owner, clearly unaware of its value, quoted a low bulk price. Ye Mingxuan promptly paid and purchased all the copper coins together.

events.name: Preliminary Cleaning and Authentication After Returning Home
events.description: Upon returning home, Ye Mingxuan eagerly entered his study, put on white gloves, and took out professional soft brushes, a magnifying glass, and a silicone pad. He carefully removed the surface dust and slight patina from the copper coin, then examined every detail under the desk lamp with the magnifying glass: the strokes of the characters, the form of the dragon pattern, and the integrity of the edge serrations. His preliminary assessment was that this was a rare variety in extremely fine condition. He took photos from multiple angles and sent them via WeChat to his senior collector friend Zhao Jianguo in Xi’an, along with his initial judgment and questions.

events.name: Receiving Confirmation and Sharing Joy
events.description: Soon, Zhao Jianguo replied with a long voice message, his tone brimming with excitement. He confirmed Ye Mingxuan's assessment, pointing out that this copper coin was not only in excellent condition but also indeed a relatively rare variant within its series. Its market value was conservatively estimated to be dozens of times the price Ye Mingxuan had paid. He congratulated Ye Mingxuan on having "struck a great bargain." Looking at his phone, Ye Mingxuan couldn't help but smile. He walked out of his study and showed the polished copper coin to his mother, who was preparing lunch, briefly explaining its value. Though she didn't fully understand, seeing her son's genuine, long-absent smile, she happily repeated, "Good, good." Ye Mingxuan then solemnly entered the information of this new collectible into his electronic spreadsheet for ancient coin collection.

events.name: Staying up late due to excitement to study ancient coin materials.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan immersed himself in the pleasure of studying ancient coins, consulting online materials until late at night, which resulted in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Relax, with a faint expectation of accompanying my mother for a leisurely stroll and perhaps stumbling upon something worthwhile.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Exceptionally excited and satisfied, I have received a rare high-intensity positive mental stimulation recently, which has significantly diluted the sense of fatigue.

2025-10.daily_overview: Sunday is a time for adjustment and preparation. Ye Mingxuan began earnestly implementing his new lifestyle routine: in the morning, he continued self-studying the operation of ANSYS ACP software; in the afternoon, he proactively contacted a fitness coach to develop a brand-new "micro-workout" home fitness plan, tailored to the upcoming flexible work schedule and fragmented time. Simultaneously, he made psychological and environmental preparations for the new work model set to be implemented. Everything was paving the way for the new rhythm of the upcoming week.

events.name: Learning the ANSYS ACP Graphical Interface and Basic Operations
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan turned on his computer, launched ANSYS Workbench, and located the ACP module. Instead of reviewing theoretical concepts, he followed a beginner video tutorial to gradually familiarize himself with the software interface: identifying where the Material Data panel was to create composite materials, finding the Ply Modeling toolbar, learning how to define ply orientations (0°, 90°, ±45°, etc.), and understanding how to map ply regions onto geometry. He attempted to open a built-in composite flat plate example provided by the software and followed the steps to assign materials, define plies, and perform simple meshing. Although the result was crude, he successfully completed the basic workflow once.

events.name: Contact the fitness coach to develop a new plan.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan contacted fitness coach Wang Jian via WeChat voice message. He elaborated on the current situation of family care after his father fell ill, and explained that the newly approved flexible work schedule would result in fragmented daily routines, making it difficult to guarantee fixed time slots for gym visits. He inquired about the possibility of designing a training program that could primarily be performed at home, with short sessions (10-15 minutes each), yet capable of maintaining basic physical fitness and muscle mass. After listening, Wang Jian expressed full understanding and agreed to tailor a plan specifically for him.

events.name: Receive and confirm the new fitness plan
events.description: One hour later, Wang Jian sent a detailed "Home Micro-Exercise Plan" via WeChat. The plan included multiple modules: 5 minutes of dynamic stretching after waking up in the morning; 3 minutes of shoulder and neck relaxation and wall squats during work breaks (every hour of sitting); 12 minutes of high-intensity interval training (such as jumping jacks, burpees, and plank combinations) during lunch breaks or in the evening; and 5 minutes of static stretching before bed. Each exercise came with illustrations and recommendations for sets and repetitions. After reading it carefully, Ye Mingxuan found it perfectly suited to his needs. He replied with gratitude and decided to print it out and post it in his study.

events.name: Preparing for the new week's flexible work schedule
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan checked the home network status and tested the speed of remotely connecting to his office computer via remote desktop. He tidied up the desk in his study to ensure a clean working environment. He also printed out the new fitness plan sent by Wang Jian and posted it on the wall next to his desk. He briefly planned his work schedule for the next day (Monday, the first day of remote work): handling emails and design documents in the morning, and attending an online project review meeting in the afternoon.

events.name: Go to bed early due to study fatigue
events.description: A full day of studying and preparation left Ye Mingxuan feeling mentally drained, so he decided to retire early to ensure he would have ample energy for the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to utilize the weekend to continue advancing studies and resolve the adaptability challenges of fitness.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: A sense of poised readiness. Progress is being made in studies, a new fitness plan is in place, and there is confidence in facing the challenges of the upcoming week.

state.今日运动: Tried a 12-minute home HIIT session from Coach Wang's plan, slightly out of breath but completed it.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first day of implementing the flexible work arrangement, Ye Mingxuan began working remotely from his home study. During the morning team meeting, he officially informed his colleagues of the new work arrangements via video conference and efficiently completed part of the handover tasks. Throughout the day, he experienced both the conveniences (no commuting, flexible time) and challenges (requiring stronger self-discipline, slightly increased communication costs) brought by this new model. For the first attempt, the overall transition was smooth.

events.name: First Remote Work Morning Kick-off
events.description: At 7:30 a.m., Ye Mingxuan woke up slightly later than usual (saving commuting time). After washing up and having breakfast, he logged into the company system in his study at 8:30 sharp to check emails and work group messages. Following his plan, he first handled several design drawings that required revisions and quickly communicated with his colleague Zhou Tao via instant messaging software regarding a dimension labeling issue. The work-from-home environment made him feel quiet and focused.

events.name: Team Meeting Announces Work Mode Adjustments
events.description: The 10 a.m. team weekly meeting was conducted via video conference. When it was Ye Mingxuan's turn to speak, he clearly informed everyone that his application for a flexible work arrangement had been approved. Moving forward, he would work remotely on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, and come into the office on Tuesdays and Thursdays. He briefly explained the reason (family needs) and emphasized the subsequent collaboration approach: he would ensure his online availability, and important matters should be communicated via WeChat Work or phone calls, while design files would be promptly updated to the shared server. Colleagues expressed their understanding, and project manager Wang Peng added that everyone should adapt to the new collaboration rhythm.

events.name: Work Handover and Schedule Adjustment
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan had a separate discussion with his colleague Zhou Tao, providing a detailed handover of the task that required him to travel to an out-of-town partner factory for technical support this week. He shared all relevant technical documents and contact information. At the same time, he confirmed with Li Xiang the components requiring simulation analysis this week and adjusted the timeline for delivering feedback to accommodate his absence from the office. The entire process was efficient and well-organized.

events.name: The Interweaving and Intermittence of Remote Work
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan attended an online project review meeting. During a break in the meeting, he followed the new fitness plan posted on the wall and performed two sets of three-minute wall sits and neck-and-shoulder stretches. His mother was taking care of his father in the living room, occasionally moving around softly, but overall, they did not disturb each other. He realized that these fragmented micro-exercises indeed helped alleviate the stiffness from prolonged sitting. In the evening, he submitted his daily work log on the system on time.

events.name: Temporarily adjusting posture due to lower back pain caused by prolonged sitting.
events.description: Sitting in front of the computer for extended periods caused Ye Mingxuan's lower back to ache again, forcing him to frequently adjust his posture and perform additional stretches during work breaks.

起始状态.心情: Feeling a mix of novelty and caution on the first day of the new work mode, determined to make a good start.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study (After Work)
结束状态.心情: Generally satisfied. The first day of remote work went smoothly, with tasks completed efficiently and team communication flowing well. However, there was a faint sense that screen time was excessive throughout the day, leaving the eyes feeling somewhat dry.

state.今日运动: Performed multiple short-duration (3-5 minutes) "micro-exercises" (stretching, wall sits).

2025-10.daily_overview: A day at the office under the flexible work schedule. Ye Mingxuan experienced the efficiency of face-to-face collaboration with the team. During his lunch break, he efficiently handled the household task of paying the winter heating fee, demonstrating his engineering mindset. Meanwhile, he continued advancing his study of ANSYS software, entering the practical operation phase. In the evening, he prioritized his health management by ensuring adequate sleep and proper nutrition, and studied home care knowledge for stroke patients to prepare for his father's potential discharge from the hospital. Life gradually found its rhythm in this new mode.

events.name: Efficient Collaboration on the First Day of Work
events.description: Ye Mingxuan resumed commuting and arrived at the company on time. He found that discussing technical issues face-to-face with colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang in the office was indeed more efficient than doing so online, as some complex three-dimensional structures could be clarified with just a few hand gestures. He and Li Xiang engaged in an in-depth discussion on the preliminary design plan for composite material components and agreed to provide several key parameters within the week for Li Xiang to conduct simulation analysis.

events.name: Handle household affairs (pay heating fees) during the lunch break.
events.description: After lunch, Ye Mingxuan received a property heating fee payment notification text message forwarded by his mother. He immediately used his mobile banking app, entered the account number, verified the amount, and quickly completed the online payment. The entire process took less than five minutes. He did not choose to queue at the bank, nor did he delay, handling it swiftly like a pending work task. Afterwards, he sent a WeChat message to his mother: "Mom, the heating fee has been paid. Just keep an eye out at home when they test the water supply."

events.name: Continue ANSYS ACP hands-on practice
events.description: At home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan continued studying ANSYS ACP. He attempted to set aside the tutorial and independently create a simple L-shaped corner geometry model. He then recalled the steps: creating a unidirectional carbon fiber material in Engineering Data (inputting typical elastic modulus, Poisson's ratio, and other parameters he had found from reference materials); importing the geometry into the ACP module and defining the layup surfaces; then trying to create two plies, one oriented at 0° and the other at 90°, while setting their thicknesses. Although he failed several times in the process due to selecting incorrect surfaces, he ultimately succeeded in generating the composite layup model and completed a simple meshing operation.

events.name: Focus on personal health and learn nursing knowledge
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan deliberately put down his phone and computer half an hour earlier than usual. He realized he had been overusing his eyes recently and applied some eye drops. At the same time, he reminded his mother to rest early as well. Together, they prepared the ingredients for the next day's breakfast (oats, eggs, milk) to ensure proper nutrition. Afterward, he searched on his phone and read an article about home care considerations for stroke patients after discharge, focusing on fall prevention, dietary nutrition, and emotional support, in order to build knowledge for his father's possible discharge in the near future.

events.name: Feeling slightly down due to slow learning progress.
events.description: The setbacks in learning ANSYS left Ye Mingxuan feeling somewhat frustrated. He realized the difficulty of acquiring new skills under high pressure, and his mood was somewhat low in the evening.

起始状态.心情: Returning to the familiar office environment, ready to efficiently handle accumulated collaborative tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Calm and with a slight sense of accomplishment. Work is efficient during the day, progress is made in evening studies, and family matters are handled swiftly. It feels as though a sense of control is gradually being regained under this new rhythm.

state.今日运动: Commuting on foot, and a 10-minute set of home bodyweight exercises in the evening (squats, push-ups, planks).

2025-10.daily_overview: Father Ye Jianguo was discharged from the hospital and returned home, marking a new phase of family caregiving. Ye Mingxuan took a day off to assist his mother in handling the complex discharge procedures and safely brought his father home. In the afternoon, he systematically assisted his father with rehabilitation exercises at home for the first time. Meanwhile, he resumed remote work, addressing some urgent tasks and communicating with the financial manager to adjust the family's financial plan. In the evening, he also made a reservation for a short hiking trip over the weekend to relieve stress. Throughout the day, Ye Mingxuan skillfully managed multiple aspects of life—family, work, health, finances, and personal social activities—demonstrating strong organizational and execution skills as the new normal of life fully unfolded.

events.name: Handling the discharge procedures for my father
events.description: Full-day leave. In the morning, Ye Mingxuan and his mother arrived at the hospital early. He was responsible for running various counters: printing the expense list at the settlement office, handling reimbursement procedures at the medical insurance office, and picking up medications for long-term use (such as aspirin and statins) at the pharmacy. Meanwhile, his mother stayed in the ward, helping his father change clothes, packing personal belongings, and carefully listening to the nurse’s final discharge instructions and the rehabilitation therapist’s key points for home exercises. Ye Mingxuan meticulously checked all documents and medications to ensure accuracy. The entire process took nearly three hours—tedious but well-organized.

events.name: Pick up my father and settle him back home.
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan wheeled his father to the hospital entrance in a wheelchair and took a taxi home. After arriving, he and his mother carefully helped his father onto the prepared bed in the master bedroom, which was close to the bathroom. His mother immediately began preparing lunch, while Ye Mingxuan arranged his father’s frequently used items within easy reach by the bedside and checked whether the anti-slip mats and handrails at home were secure. The familiar home environment visibly relaxed his father, Ye Jianguo.

events.name: First-time Assistance with Home-based Rehabilitation Training
events.description: In the afternoon, after his father had rested, Ye Mingxuan systematically assisted his father with rehabilitation exercises at home for the first time, following the guidance of the physiotherapist. The activities included: passive joint movements (shoulder, elbow, wrist, hip, knee, ankle), with each movement performed slowly 10–15 times; attempts at balance exercises transitioning from lying to sitting; and simple grip strength training using a rolled towel. Ye Mingxuan carried out the movements gently but firmly, encouraging his father as he worked: "Very good, this angle shows improvement compared to yesterday at the hospital." His mother recorded the duration of the exercises and her husband’s responses.

events.name: Handling Urgent Work Remotely and Financial Communication
events.description: During a break in training, Ye Mingxuan took a moment to log into his work computer in the study, where he handled several urgent emails and responded to a colleague, Zhou Tao, regarding a design modification inquiry. Meanwhile, he used WeChat to schedule a face-to-face meeting with his financial manager, Zhang Wei, for after the weekend. He briefly explained that his family’s long-term expenses might increase following his father’s hospital discharge and expressed the need to reassess his investment portfolio and emergency fund reserves. Zhang Wei indicated that he would prepare a plan in advance.

events.name: Finalized weekend hiking plans with fellow traveler Wu Bin.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan felt physically and mentally exhausted, but he thought about the need to relieve stress. Recalling his previous discussion with Wu Bin, he proactively sent a WeChat message asking, "Wu Bin, is the plan for a suburban hike this Saturday (the 18th) still feasible? I need to get out for some fresh air." Wu Bin quickly replied, suggesting two one-day hiking routes in the Jizhou mountainous area on the outskirts of Tianjin. After a brief discussion, the two settled on a route of moderate difficulty with beautiful scenery, agreeing on a meeting time and location. Ye Mingxuan put down his phone, filled with anticipation for the upcoming brief escape.

events.name: Late to bed due to exhaustion from the day's work.
events.description: The physical and mental exertion throughout the day left Ye Mingxuan utterly exhausted, yet he persisted in handling all matters and did not rest until very late, going to bed later than usual.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today marks the third day of implementing the flexible work arrangement (a work-from-home day). Amidst a tight schedule of remote work, Ye Mingxuan efficiently managed essential household tasks, reflecting a new rhythm gradually established under the pressure of family responsibilities. The bill payment during the lunch break demonstrated his engineer-like rigor and efficiency, yet it also revealed the helplessness of tending toward a "passive response" in managing household affairs under the current lifestyle.

events.name: Centralized Processing of Design Documents and Online Meetings
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan worked in his home study, taking advantage of a rare period of focus to concentrate on revising some of the design documents for the automated production line project. He also participated in the team's technical coordination meeting via WeCom. As part of the flexible working arrangement, he felt his work efficiency was acceptable, though occasional distractions from the home environment would sometimes interrupt his train of thought.

events.name: Pay Winter Heating Fees via Mobile Phone
events.description: During his lunch break, Ye Mingxuan opened his mobile banking app, skillfully entered his household's payment account number, verified the amount, and quickly completed the online payment for the winter centralized heating fee. He habitually took a screenshot of the electronic receipt confirming the successful payment and saved it in a categorized folder on his cloud drive as a family financial record.

events.name: Family WeChat Group Reminder
events.description: After completing the payment, Ye Mingxuan immediately sent a message in the family WeChat group "Warm Little Home": "Mom, the heating fee has been paid. During the pressure testing and the initial days of the heating season, please keep an eye on those old radiators in the living room and bedrooms to check for any leaks or if they are not heating up properly. If there are any issues, let me know anytime, and I will contact maintenance." He adopted a response strategy based on problem feedback rather than proactive inspection.

events.name: Afternoon Simulation Analysis and Data Interface
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan primarily engaged in online communication with his colleague Li Xiang, who is responsible for simulation, to exchange data and requirements regarding the preliminary design scheme of composite material components. He utilized this time to attempt running a simple Abaqus analysis model on his own computer to verify some basic parameter settings.

events.name: Simple household chores and accompanying my father after dinner.
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan helped his mother clear the dishes, then accompanied his father in the living room to watch the television news for half an hour. During this time, he observed his father using a walker to move from the sofa to the bathroom, mentally noting the areas that needed adjustment.

events.name: Mild headache at night, rest early.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan experienced a mild headache, likely due to accumulated stress from recent times. He ended his work early, performed some simple shoulder and neck stretches, and went to bed early in an attempt to alleviate his fatigue.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Steady but fatigued, with anticipated pressure from multitasking throughout the day.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet satisfied with completing tasks, feeling a hint of helplessness over still needing to attend to trivial matters like family finances, with a slight relief from the headache.

2025-10.daily_overview: Friday is the company's in-office day. During the day, Ye Mingxuan focuses on his work, utilizing gaps in his schedule to advance his self-study projects. After work, he shifts his attention to planning weekend leisure activities, preparing for a hiking trip with fellow outdoor enthusiasts. This demonstrates his proactive effort to seek respite and balance under high pressure. His learning process reflects the systematic nature of the ISTJ personality type.

events.name: Company on-site duty for handling urgent matters
events.description: Ye Mingxuan drove to the company. As it was an in-office workday, he handled several tasks that required face-to-face communication or the use of internal systems, including a brief progress report on the project to his direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan and a quick discussion with his colleague Zhou Tao regarding a design detail.

events.name: Search for composite material learning cases during the lunch break.
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan did not rest. Instead, he opened the official Abaqus documentation and several frequently visited technical forums on his office computer. He spent about 40 minutes searching for and filtering composite laminate analysis cases suitable for beginners. Eventually, he downloaded a complete tutorial package covering modeling, layup, and static loading, and saved it to his work drive for future use.

events.name: Consolidate learning content before leaving work.
events.description: As the workday drew to a close, after completing his main tasks, Ye Mingxuan took a moment to review his notes from this week's self-study of the ACP module. He opened the software and attempted to independently complete a minimalist workflow—from importing geometry, defining materials, and meshing to submitting calculations and reviewing results. Although he encountered some stumbling blocks along the way, the process deepened his understanding of the fundamental operational logic.

events.name: Finalize hiking details with fellow travelers
events.description: On his way home from work, Ye Mingxuan communicated with his hiking friend Wu Bin via WeChat voice message and finalized the plan for hiking at Panshan in Jizhou tomorrow, agreeing on the meeting time and location. Wu Bin also shared the latest road condition information for the scenic area.

events.name: Evening check of hiking equipment preparation
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan took out a hiking backpack from the storage room. He carefully checked the wear on the soles of his hiking boots and added bottled water, energy bars, chocolate, and a simple first aid kit to the bag. As an engineer accustomed to thorough preparation, he also checked the weather forecast and reminded Wu Bin to bring a windproof jacket.

events.name: Temporarily working overtime to handle project emails.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan received an urgent email from the project manager requesting an early review of some drawings. He had to spend an hour handling work at home, delaying his rest time.

起始状态.心情: There is a mild anticipation for the weekend, but daytime work tasks still dominate, accompanied by slight pressure.

2025-10.daily_overview: A completely personal stress-relief day. Ye Mingxuan temporarily set aside the pressures of work and family care, embarking on a day of hiking with like-minded travel companions. Walking through the mountain forests and engaging in free-flowing conversations provided him with long-awaited mental relaxation and an energy recharge, which also served as an active strategy for coping with long-term stress.

events.name: Drive to Panshan to meet up with friends.
events.description: In the early morning, Ye Mingxuan got up early. After having the simple breakfast prepared by his mother, he drove his family's SUV to the designated highway entrance to meet up with Wu Bin. Once they joined up, Ye Mingxuan took the wheel, and as they drove toward the Panshan Scenic Area in Jizhou, they listened to music and chatted along the way.

events.name: Autumn Hiking in the Pan Mountains
events.description: Upon arriving at the scenic area, Ye Mingxuan and Wu Bin began hiking along a moderately challenging mountain trail. In October, the layered forests of Panshan Mountain were ablaze with autumn colors, and the air was crisp and fresh. As they walked, they chatted about topics ranging from their respective work pressures and recent industry insights to self-driving travel route planning and performance evaluations of outdoor gear, temporarily leaving behind the hustle and bustle of the city and the trivialities of family life.

events.name: Lunch and Rest in the Mountains
events.description: After hiking for about two hours, the two stopped to rest at a scenic overlook with an expansive view. They took out their own bread, fruit, and energy bars, enjoying lunch with warm water. During this time, Wu Bin used a drone to capture some landscape shots, while Ye Mingxuan took several close-up photos of autumn leaves with his phone.

events.name: Complete the return journey on foot
events.description: In the afternoon, they completed the loop hike and returned to the parking lot. On the way back, the two were still immersed in the joy of the hike, discussing the muscle soreness and the satisfaction of seeing the beautiful scenery. They also made plans to try longer self-driving hiking routes in the future, such as Ye Mingxuan's goal of circumnavigating Qinghai Lake.

events.name: Home Organization and Restoration
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan returned home. He cleaned his mud-stained hiking boots and set them out to dry, then put away the items from his backpack. Though physically exhausted with sore calves, he felt exceptionally relaxed and content in spirit. He had dinner with his parents and shared the scenery he had seen during the day.

events.name: Mild muscle soreness, rest early.
events.description: Due to muscle soreness after hiking, Ye Mingxuan decided to go to bed early to facilitate recovery, abandoning his evening study plan.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Filled with anticipation, eager to give it a try.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and content, the body and mind have effectively 'rebooted', weary yet joyful, with a distinct sense of muscle soreness.

2025-10.daily_overview: On Sunday, he returned to his family role. In the morning, he assisted his mother with routine care and household chores. In the afternoon, prompted by his mother, he became aware of his tense state and proactively took a brief, completely unplugged break. By handling his cherished ancient coins, he achieved mental detachment, reserving energy for the challenges of the upcoming week.

events.name: Assisting with Household Chores and Father's Rehabilitation Training
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan was primarily at home. He assisted his mother with household chores such as hanging laundry to dry and tidying up the rooms. Following the rehabilitation plan, he then accompanied and assisted his father in performing half an hour of standing balance and fine motor skills training for the hands. He also documented the training progress in his dedicated Excel spreadsheet.

events.name: The mother reminded her to rest.
events.description: During lunch, Wang Xiulan noticed that her son, despite having just returned from a hike, still carried a lingering weariness between his brows. Concerned, she said, "Mingxuan, I can see you haven’t truly relaxed lately. There’s nothing urgent this afternoon, so don’t keep yourself so tense. Go back to your room and rest for a while, or play with your 'treasures' if you like."

events.name: Immersive Ancient Coin Appreciation and Relaxation
events.description: Ye Mingxuan heeded his mother's advice. In the afternoon, he returned to his room, closed the door, and deliberately set his phone to silent mode. He retrieved the Hubei Province copper coin he had acquired through a "lucky find" at Shenyang Dao not long ago from the safe, gently wiped it with a soft chamois cloth, and then carefully examined every detail under the desk lamp with a magnifying glass. For that half hour, he was completely immersed in the beauty of history and craftsmanship, his mind emptied, thinking of nothing.

events.name: Adjusting State and Planning
events.description: After the brief moment of relaxation, Ye Mingxuan carefully put away the ancient coin. He took several deep breaths, feeling his mind clear up a bit. He then opened the calendar on his computer and roughly planned the work tasks (especially the project review) and family matters (his father's follow-up appointment) that needed priority attention for the upcoming week, giving him a clearer picture in his mind.

events.name: Providing Feedback on the Micro-Workout Plan to the Fitness Coach
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan briefly reported his initial feelings after over a week of following the "micro-exercise" plan to Coach Wang Jian via WeChat: "Coach Wang, I've been following the new plan for over a week now. Doing a few sets of squats and push-ups during the lunch break is manageable, but I sometimes forget when I get too busy. I feel less stiff, but the fatigue is still quite heavy." Wang Jian quickly replied, encouraging him to persist and suggesting that he could combine a few exercises into shorter "routines" to complete during any three-to-five-minute gaps.

events.name: Review composite materials study content in the evening.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan spent over an hour systematically reviewing the notes he had taken while self-studying Abaqus ACP over the past two weeks. He revisited the official help documentation to address several operational challenges, such as defining angles for complex layups and setting up result coordinate systems. He also searched for related discussions on technical forums and supplemented his notes with the solutions he found.

events.name: Late return from an impromptu gathering with friends.
events.description: In the evening, childhood friend Zhang Wei spontaneously invited Ye Mingxuan for barbecue. Considering recent stress, Ye Mingxuan decided to unwind and stayed out rather late at the gathering, slightly disrupting his daily routine.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of fatigue and muscle soreness from yesterday's hike.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilling, brief moments of solitude and engaging in personal interests effectively alleviated inner anxiety, providing a clearer mindset for tackling the upcoming week, while social gatherings brought mild pleasure.

state.今日运动: No systematic exercise, only includes light activities during the assistance of father's rehabilitation training.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning to overcast, with chilly weather.

2025-10.daily_overview: A work-from-home day under a flexible work arrangement. While handling his professional duties, Ye Mingxuan interspersed his time with several long-term family planning tasks (adjusting rehabilitation plans, contemplating home modifications, scheduling his father's follow-up appointments) and found moments to advance personal interests (monitoring auctions, planning a gathering with classmates). This demonstrates his ability to maintain organization amidst multitasking, though it comes with a significant mental load.

events.name: Core Design for Remote Work Processing
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan focused on handling the design documentation for the automated production line at home. He synchronized progress with team members through an online meeting and efficiently completed modifications to some 3D models and drawing annotations using remote desktop, ensuring that core tasks remained unaffected by location.

events.name: Focus on Online Ancient Coin Auctions
events.description: Before his midday break, Ye Mingxuan logged into the collection app on his phone and carefully studied the electronic catalog of the "China's Rare Coins" large-scale online auction. He focused on a well-preserved Republic of China Year 3 Yuan Shikai One Dollar Silver Coin with a signature version (labeled as a replica but with exquisite craftsmanship), added it to his watchlist, and set an auction reminder, feeling full of anticipation.

events.name: Discussing a local gathering with university classmates
events.description: During a break in the afternoon work, Ye Mingxuan received a WeChat message from his university classmate Zhao Xiaofeng, suggesting that the two of them, both based in Tianjin, take the lead in organizing a small gathering for local classmates to share the organizational burden usually shouldered by Sun Jing, who is often in Beijing. Ye Mingxuan thought this was a good idea and replied in support, then began considering possible dates and formats for the gathering.

events.name: Consider home modifications for aging in place
events.description: In the evening, while assisting his mother with dinner preparations, Ye Mingxuan observed the layout of the home. Considering his father’s recovery progress, he began to systematically analyze potential needs for age-friendly home modifications from an engineer’s perspective, such as whether handrails should be installed in the bathroom or if anti-slip treatments were needed for the floors. He then mentally compiled a preliminary checklist.

events.name: Schedule a follow-up appointment for my father next week.
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan successfully booked an expert appointment in the neurology department for November 6 through the hospital's official app, following his father's discharge instructions. He then reported his leave arrangement for that day to his direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan via the corporate WeChat platform and coordinated his work schedule in advance.

events.name: Complete the Introductory Case Study on Composite Materials Independently
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan spent approximately two hours independently completing a comprehensive introductory case study of a composite laminate in Abaqus, following a downloaded tutorial. From creating geometry, defining layups, meshing, applying loads and constraints, to submitting the job and viewing stress contour plots, he proceeded step by step. Although the process was slow, it effectively reinforced his learning outcomes.

events.name: Online technical discussion with programming classmate Xu Ming
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan discussed a difficulty in Python data cleaning with Xu Ming via WeChat and received some practical suggestions, which alleviated his study pressure.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, aware of the heavy workload this week, feeling slightly pressured.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, handling multiple planning tasks has brought a greater sense of control, but there is nervousness about the upcoming project review, while technical discussions have generated positive emotions.

state.今日运动: Completed the midday 'micro-workout' routine: 3 sets of wall sits (45 seconds per set) + 3 sets of kneeling push-ups (12 reps per set), approximately 12 minutes.

2025-10.daily_overview: A regular workday at the office. During the day, the work pace was intense, and Ye Mingxuan utilized fragmented time to advance his self-study. In the evening, an emotional spending spree ensued—he participated in an online ancient coin auction and successfully won a coveted collectible. This significant investment served both as an outlet for long-term stress and a major affirmation of his personal hobby, resulting in a rollercoaster of emotions.

events.name: The company handles project coordination matters.
events.description: On his office day, Ye Mingxuan attended the project team's regular meeting and communicated with project manager Wang Peng regarding project milestones. He also discussed some initial boundary conditions for composite material analysis in person with his simulation colleague Li Xiang, which proved to be significantly more efficient than online communication.

events.name: Search and download composite material case files.
events.description: During work breaks, Ye Mingxuan continued searching for learning resources on the official forum of the simulation software and GitHub. He found a more detailed case study on the static analysis of composite laminate plates, which included complete model files and step-by-step documentation. He immediately downloaded it to a USB drive, planning to study it at home.

events.name: Participate in Online Ancient Coin Auctions
events.description: At 8 p.m., Ye Mingxuan logged into the auction platform on time. The bidding for the target silver coin was exceptionally fierce, with the price rising rapidly. Ye Mingxuan entered amounts several times that exceeded his psychological price limit, ultimately securing the winning bid at the last moment for approximately 55,000 yuan (equivalent to more than three months of his after-tax salary). The moment he clicked to confirm, his palms were sweaty, and his heart raced—filled with the exhilaration of winning the bid, yet also tinged with a hint of "spending pain" from the substantial expense.

events.name: Emotional Calm-down and Preliminary Inspection After Auction
events.description: After the auction concluded, Ye Mingxuan completed the preliminary confirmation on the platform. Leaning back in his chair, he let out a long sigh of relief and repeatedly examined the high-definition image of the silver coin on the screen. A profound sense of satisfaction gradually overwhelmed the slight guilt brought by the expenditure. He began to imagine what the physical object would look like once it arrived.

events.name: Staying up late browsing ancient coin forums out of excitement.
events.description: After the auction, Ye Mingxuan was in high spirits and found it difficult to fall asleep. He stayed up late browsing related discussions on the ancient coin collecting forum, further researching the background of this silver coin until late into the night.

起始状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Maintaining a normal commuting mindset, with a slight anticipation for the evening auction.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Excitement and satisfaction, mingled with the complex emotions that follow a somewhat extravagant purchase, overall conveying a sense of pleasure and release, accompanied by mild fatigue from staying up late.

2025-10.daily_overview: A work-from-home day. In the morning, Ye Mingxuan focused on technical learning, and in the afternoon, he purchased practical equipment for his father's rehabilitation. In the evening, he completed a large payment, and the tangible reality of spending set in. Today's events reflect his navigation between personal interests, family responsibilities, and career development, with the spiritual comfort brought by consumption coexisting with financial pressure.

events.name: Learning Composite Material Meshing and Submitting Calculations
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan continued studying the cases downloaded the previous night. He focused on learning how to use structured meshing techniques in Abaqus to mesh composite material models, set appropriate continuum shell element types, and check mesh quality. Subsequently, following the tutorial steps, he submitted the analysis job for computation and watched as the progress bar slowly advanced.

events.name: Purchasing rehabilitation assistive devices for my father
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan drove to a professional medical equipment store. Following the recommendations of the rehabilitation therapist, he carefully compared several models of walkers and resistance bands with different levels of tension. Eventually, he selected a walker with good stability and adjustable height, along with a set of progressive resistance bands, to prepare for his father’s next phase of home-based training.

events.name: Complete the final payment for the antique coin auction.
events.description: In the evening, after receiving the payment reminder from the platform, Ye Mingxuan logged into his account and completed the full payment of the auction balance using his savings card. Looking at the deduction notification sent by the bank, the amount of 55,000 yuan made him genuinely feel a sense of "heartache." However, thinking about the long-desired collectible that was soon to be in his hands, this heartache transformed into a strong sense of ownership and anticipation. He repeatedly verified the delivery address to ensure everything was in order.

events.name: Trying Out the Newly Purchased Equipment with Mother
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan showed his parents the newly purchased walker and resistance bands. Together with his mother, he assisted his father in taking a few steps around the living room using the new walker. His father, Ye Jianguo, expressed satisfaction with the stability of the new equipment, which made Ye Mingxuan feel that this household expense was well worth it.

events.name: Canceling exercise plans due to financial pressure
events.description: Due to the psychological pressure from the large payment, Ye Mingxuan postponed his midday micro-exercise plan and chose to rest to adjust his mood.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with the lingering afterglow of yesterday's successful auction, yet tinged with a slight sense of financial pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: The experience is complex, encompassing both the grounded satisfaction of resolving family issues and the slight financial pressure following a substantial expenditure. Overall, however, it leans toward the positive, with a mild sense of guilt arising from the postponement of exercise.

2025-10.daily_overview: A typical day at the office. Work pressure continued to build up, and his colleagues keenly noticed his state, offering their care and concern. Technical learning entered a deepening phase, and he began attempting to analyze calculation results. A dinner invitation from his colleagues came like a timely dose of relief, allowing him to glimpse human warmth amidst the tight schedule.

events.name: Receive urgent project review task
events.description: In the morning, during the project weekly meeting, project manager Wang Peng emphasized with a serious expression that the review of the detailed design drawings for the automated production line project must be completed and the report submitted by October 31st, as any delay would affect the overall project delivery. As one of the primary reviewers, Ye Mingxuan felt immense time pressure and a significant sense of responsibility.

events.name: Colleagues initiated a caring dinner gathering.
events.description: During the lunch break, colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang, whose workstations were adjacent, noticed that Ye Mingxuan had been frowning and keeping to himself lately. Zhou Tao patted him on the shoulder and said, "Mingxuan, you look exhausted lately. Don’t make any plans after work on Friday. Let’s meet up at our usual spot, have a good meal, and relax." Li Xiang nodded in agreement and added that they could discuss the composite material analysis Ye Mingxuan was studying, as they might be able to help. Touched by their concern, Ye Mingxuan nodded and agreed.

events.name: Learning Post-Processing of Composite Material Results
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan took some time to review the calculation results submitted the previous day. He opened the stress contour and deformation plots in the Abaqus Visualization module and compared them with the expected results from the tutorial. He made an effort to understand the differences in stress distribution of the composite material under various ply angles and noted down several points that he found unclear.

events.name: Case Study on Shell Buckling Analysis
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan found an advanced case study on buckling analysis of composite shells from a technical blog. He downloaded the file package and skimmed through the tutorial at home in the evening. He learned that shell modeling and analysis required more complex setups, which made him feel both challenged and intrigued. He decided to delve deeper into it after the project review was completed.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle urgent modifications
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan received an urgent revision request from a design colleague, which compelled him to spend two hours working from home, thereby delaying his rest time.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Slightly tense due to urgent work pressure, with a slight reduction in the sense of economic pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: The sense of pressure is significant, but the care from colleagues brings a touch of warmth. There is mild anticipation for tomorrow evening's dinner gathering, while the unexpected overtime work adds to the fatigue.
