2025-10.daily_overview: A week of intense work concluded with a warm dinner gathering among colleagues. There were no heavy discussions about work at the table, only light-hearted jokes and sincere support. This dinner not only alleviated the pressure Ye Mingxuan had felt over the past few days but also allowed him to experience the precious human connection in the workplace, which became an important emotional support for him during challenging times.

events.name: Fully committed to the preliminary review of project drawings.
events.description: During the day, Ye Mingxuan devoted all his energy to the urgent task of reviewing drawings. He organized all the drawing documents and technical standards that required review, began a first round of rapid scanning, and marked areas that were clearly questionable or needed focused verification, preparing for an intensive effort over the weekend.

events.name: Colleagues dining together after work
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan, Zhou Tao, and Li Xiang walked together to the Sichuan restaurant they often visited near the company. Along the way, Zhou Tao and Li Xiang deliberately chatted about light topics such as game updates and weekend plans.

events.name: Relaxed Communication and Stress Relief During the Gathering
events.description: At the restaurant, the three of them ordered several hearty dishes such as spicy stir-fry pot and Maoxuewang. Zhou Tao shared some bizarre client requests he encountered in his project, which made everyone burst into laughter. Li Xiang proactively offered some tips on simulation analysis and said, "Mingxuan, if you run into any roadblocks in your composite materials study, feel free to ask me anytime. I have plenty of materials on hand." Ye Mingxuan nodded gratefully. He felt particularly relaxed during this meal and hardly mentioned his own stress.

events.name: Conclusion of the Gathering and Reflections
events.description: After the meal, the three bid farewell at the restaurant entrance and headed home. As Ye Mingxuan walked back, the evening breeze brushed against his face. Recalling the laughter at the dinner table and the sincere concern from his colleagues, the tension that had built up over the past few days seemed to ease slightly. He realized that work was not just about tasks—it also involved the mutual support among colleagues.

events.name: Returned late due to a dinner gathering and overate.
events.description: The dinner gathering lasted until quite late. After returning home, Ye Mingxuan felt discomfort from overeating. He simply washed up and then rested, without engaging in any evening study.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focus on work tasks with a strong sense of pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and warm, the stress has been effectively alleviated, and there is a sense of gratitude toward colleagues, but overeating has caused slight discomfort.

2025-10.daily_overview: It was the weekend, yet it was filled with work and family matters. In the morning, I handled the administrative procedures for my father's medical reimbursement, reflecting the role of the family's "external liaison officer." In the afternoon, I applied the rigor of an engineer to family management (creating a rehabilitation tracking sheet) and to my hobby of collecting (authenticating ancient coins). In the evening, I also conducted an on-site inspection of a gathering location with classmates. The pace of life was compact and pragmatic.

events.name: Go to the social security center to handle reimbursement.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan drove to the Xiqing District Social Security Center with the sorted invoices for his father's hospitalization and rehabilitation treatment expenses. He queued at the window, submitted the materials, and carefully reviewed the reimbursement process and estimated payment timeline with the staff to ensure the smooth return of this substantial family expenditure.

events.name: Create a Father's Recovery Progress Tracking Excel Spreadsheet
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan opened his computer in the study. Drawing on his meticulous skills as an engineer, he created a detailed Excel spreadsheet. It listed his father's daily medication times, dosages, blood pressure/blood sugar measurements, rehabilitation training items and durations, as well as notes on diet and sleep. He set up automatic calculation formulas and color-coded indicators to facilitate joint recording and tracking of his father's recovery progress with his mother, and shared a copy with his mother's mobile phone.

events.name: Receive and conduct preliminary inspection of the auctioned ancient coins.
events.description: In the evening, the long-awaited package finally arrived. Ye Mingxuan carefully unwrapped the layers of packaging and took out the silver coin. Under the desk lamp, he used a magnifying glass to compare it with the auction catalog, meticulously examining the coin's condition, pattern details, and edge serrations, and verified its weight with an electronic scale. After initially confirming that it was largely consistent with the description and had suffered no damage during transit, he breathed a sigh of relief, his heart filled with joy.

events.name: Conducting an on-site inspection of the party restaurant with Zhao Xiaofeng.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan and Zhao Xiaofeng arranged to visit several candidate restaurants in Nankai District and Xiqing District for on-site inspections. They examined the ambiance, inquired about private rooms and per capita consumption, and ultimately jointly selected an elegantly decorated, authentic Tianjin private kitchen restaurant in Nankai District. They reserved a private room and tentatively scheduled the gathering for the following weekend.

events.name: Postponing exercise plans due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to consecutive days of busy work, Ye Mingxuan felt physically fatigued and decided to temporarily suspend his midday micro-exercises to focus on rest and handling affairs.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Preparing for the many tasks of the weekend with a pragmatic mindset, feeling somewhat fatigued.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat rewarding, having handled multiple substantive tasks, especially receiving beloved collectibles which brought strong pleasure, but fatigue has accumulated.

2025-10.daily_overview: Sunday continued to be dominated by project review tasks. Ye Mingxuan gave up his rest and devoted the entire day to the tedious work of reviewing blueprints, repeatedly communicating and confirming details with design colleagues while maintaining a state of high mental tension. The only respite came when he asked a fellow collector to remotely appraise a newly acquired ancient coin, which received professional recognition. This brief moment of joy served as a precious solace amid his high-pressure work.

events.name: Dedicated the entire day to reviewing project drawings.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan gave up his Sunday rest, spending the entire day from morning till night reviewing blueprints in his study. To address the issues he had marked the previous day, he consulted mechanical design manuals, performed simple stress calculations for verification, and repeatedly communicated with his design colleague Zhou Tao via WeChat and phone calls to confirm the modification plans. At the same time, he continued reviewing the remaining large volume of blueprints, his nerves remaining tense throughout.

events.name: Invite fellow collectors to remotely appraise ancient coins.
events.description: During a break in the appraisal process, Ye Mingxuan contacted Zhao Jianguo, a senior collector based in Xi'an, via WeChat video call. He placed the silver coin on a specialized shooting stand and displayed its details from multiple angles through the camera. After careful observation, Zhao Jianguo affirmed the coin's craftsmanship and condition, noting that although it was a replica, it was a high-quality "old reproduction" with considerable collectible value. Receiving professional recognition, Ye Mingxuan was delighted.

events.name: Continuous review until late at night
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan returned to his study to continue reviewing the blueprints. The house was exceptionally quiet at night, with only the sounds of his mouse clicks, the rustling of paper blueprints being turned, and the tapping of his keyboard as he recorded his review comments. His eyes felt dry, and his neck was stiff, but with the final deadline in mind, he could only push himself to stay focused.

events.name: Staying up late temporarily due to audit pressure.
events.description: In order to meet the deadline, Ye Mingxuan worked late into the early morning, completing most of the review work, but this resulted in severe sleep deprivation.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit weary and helpless due to the necessity of working overtime, but the goal remains clear.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Extremely fatigued, the mind somewhat numb from prolonged concentration, yet the pressure of completing most of the review progress has eased somewhat, with staying up late exacerbating the exhaustion.

2025-10.daily_overview: A work-from-home day under the flexible work arrangement, yet the core task remains sprinting toward project review. Under high pressure, Ye Mingxuan efficiently utilized resources by consulting programming peers on technical issues and properly arranging his cherished collection. The review work is nearing completion, but the sense of physical and mental exhaustion is becoming increasingly evident.

events.name: Seeking advice from programming peers on data processing issues
events.description: In the morning, during a break from reviewing blueprints, Ye Mingxuan recalled the difficulties he had encountered while using Python to analyze project data. He reached out to his programming friend Xu Ming in Shenzhen via WeChat, asking several questions about Pandas data cleaning and Matplotlib chart customization. Xu Ming quickly replied, sharing a few code snippets and debugging ideas, and they agreed to have a detailed online discussion over the weekend.

events.name: Treasure the silver coin obtained through auction bidding.
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan temporarily stepped away from the blueprints. He took out the prepared acrylic sealed collection box and carefully placed the silver coin bearing the portrait of Yuan Shikai inside, attaching a self-printed label with the collection information. He then solemnly placed the box into the moisture-proof safe in his study's bookshelf, alongside other precious ancient coins, completing the final step of preservation. His heart was filled with a sense of ritual and satisfaction.

events.name: Review and Summarize Audit Findings
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, Ye Mingxuan devoted his main efforts to reviewing the audit records from the previous two days. He compiled, categorized, and summarized all identified issues, proposed modifications, and remaining questions, and began drafting the preliminary audit report. This process required strong logical thinking and meticulous attention to detail, leaving him with a faint ache in his temples.

events.name: Rest early due to headache.
events.description: In the evening, the persistent headache led Ye Mingxuan to decide to end work early. After performing some simple stretches, he went to bed early in an attempt to alleviate the symptoms.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Fatigue persists, but aware that it's the final sprint, I grit my teeth and persevere, despite the headache and discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Exhausted both mentally and physically, with a dull ache from an overloaded brain, yet there is a faint sense of accomplishment as the report gradually takes shape. Going to bed early brings slight relief.

state.今日运动: Simple stretching for 10 minutes

2025-10.daily_overview: On a regular workday at the office, facing deadline pressure from the project manager, Ye Mingxuan struggled to balance family responsibilities (accompanying his father for rehabilitation training) with intense work demands. He officially entered "sprint mode," striving to adjust his state, plan the final three-day "critical battle," and informed his family and colleagues of his need for uninterrupted focus.

events.name: Accompanying my father for community-based rehabilitation training
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan did not go directly home. Instead, he first met his mother at the community rehabilitation center to accompany his father for his twice-weekly equipment training. Under the guidance of the rehabilitation therapist, he learned how to properly assist his father in using the lower limb training device and noted the key points in his phone's memo, intending to teach them to his mother later.

events.name: Received the final deadline instruction from the project manager.
events.description: At the rehabilitation center, Ye Mingxuan received an urgent call from project manager Wang Peng. Over the phone, Wang Peng once again sternly emphasized that all audit reports must be formally submitted to the system by the end of the workday on October 31, with no room for extension. He also hinted that this was related to project bonuses and subsequent task assignments. Ye Mingxuan felt the pressure on his shoulders suddenly intensify to its maximum.

events.name: Plan the sprint period and adjust the state
events.description: After arriving home in the evening, despite being physically and mentally exhausted, Ye Mingxuan mustered his energy. He organized all the review-related materials on his desk and planned a detailed work schedule for the next three days, particularly for the 29th and 30th. He informed his parents that he might need to work late for the next two nights and asked his mother to prepare some late-night snacks. He also notified his colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang via WeChat, requesting that they leave messages for non-urgent matters over the next few days.

events.name: Stomach discomfort due to stress
events.description: During the planning process, Ye Mingxuan felt a dull pain in his stomach, which might be a precursor to stress-induced gastritis. He drank some warm water to alleviate the discomfort but did not seek medical attention.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Persistent fatigue, accompanied by anxiety over impending deadlines and mild gastric discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Extremely tense, with stress levels peaking, yet actions have entered a desperate "wartime state." The objective is exceptionally clear, while worsening stomach discomfort heightens concerns.

2025-10.daily_overview: The first late night of the audit campaign. Taking advantage of the convenience of working from home, Ye Mingxuan efficiently completed the first round of systematic drawing review in the quiet of the night, marking a large number of issues. The high-intensity, highly focused mental work was immensely draining, but he persevered through a sense of responsibility and determination, with the support of his family (the late-night snack prepared by his mother) serving as a warm source of strength behind him.

events.name: Handling necessary work communications during the day
events.description: During the day, Ye Mingxuan worked from home, handling emails and online communications that required same-day responses to free up a large block of time for concentrated review in the evening. He informed his family not to wait for him for dinner.

events.name: Conducting the first round of systematic drawing review late at night.
events.description: Starting at 8 p.m., Ye Mingxuan turned off all notifications from social media applications and devoted himself entirely to reviewing blueprints. He meticulously examined the drawings of key components such as the core transmission parts, pneumatic circuits, and safety protections, cross-referencing them with technical standards and design specifications. Using red electronic annotations, he marked over a dozen issues, including unreasonable dimensional tolerances, questionable assembly relationships, and missing essential views. In the study, only the sounds of mouse clicks and keyboard strokes could be heard, and time quietly slipped past until the early hours of the morning.

events.name: Mother brings midnight snack and care.
events.description: As midnight approached, Mother Wang Xiulan gently pushed open the study door, bringing in a bowl of steaming wontons and a plate of fruit. Softly, she said, "Mingxuan, take a break. Have something to eat before you continue." Only then did Ye Mingxuan realize how hungry he was and how tired his eyes felt. This simple late-night snack provided him with immense comfort and energy.

events.name: Stayed up late until dawn due to review work.
events.description: To complete the review, Ye Mingxuan persisted in working until the early hours of the morning, severely sacrificing sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Fully focused and entering a 'combat' state, the stomach discomfort has slightly eased.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Extreme fatigue accompanied by a slight sense of relief from phased completion, the brain both excited and numb from overuse, with severe sleep deprivation due to staying up late.

2025-10.daily_overview: This day was critical in the audit campaign and also the most stressful one. Ye Mingxuan gave up his Saturday rest, communicating, verifying, and revising with design colleagues throughout the day while continuously reviewing new drawings. At the same time, he had to divert his attention to handle a family meeting before his father's hospital discharge and confirm follow-up appointments, struggling forward under the dual pressures of professional demands and family responsibilities.

events.name: Communicated with colleagues throughout the day to confirm the modification plan.
events.description: On Saturday, Ye Mingxuan started working early in the morning. He addressed the issues marked the previous night one by one through phone calls or online meetings with his design colleague Zhou Tao. For some problems, he performed simple stress calculations on the spot to verify his judgment. His tone was firm yet professional, ensuring that every modification suggestion was well-founded and reasonable.

events.name: Hold a family meeting to discuss home renovation
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan temporarily stepped away from his computer and held a brief meeting with his parents in the living room. He guided his parents to analyze the potential risks in various areas of the house for his father's recovery from the perspectives of safety and convenience, such as slippery bathroom floors and narrow passageways. They also compiled a list of renovation needs, including installing handrails and replacing anti-slip mats.

events.name: Continuously review and identify new issues
events.description: In the afternoon and evening, during breaks in communication, Ye Mingxuan continued reviewing the remaining electrical layout diagrams and piping drawings. As the review progressed, he discovered more detailed issues, such as unclear wire number labeling and potential pipeline interferences. While documenting these findings, he felt the pressure mounting with the increasing number of problems, yet he also grew more convinced of the value of the review work.

events.name: Confirm Father's Follow-up Appointment and Request Leave
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan logged into the hospital app again to confirm that the specialist appointment for his father on November 6th was correctly scheduled. He also reconfirmed with his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, that his leave request for that day had been approved and prepared a list of work handover tasks for his absence.

events.name: Migraine symptoms due to stress
events.description: In the evening, plagued by a persistent migraine attack, Ye Mingxuan had to take over-the-counter medication for relief and decided to retire early. However, with unfinished work weighing on his mind, he felt deeply anxious.

起始状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued from staying up late the previous night, yet driven by the urgency of the task to maintain intense focus, with the initial signs of a migraine emerging.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Severely physically and mentally exhausted, with bloodshot eyes and stiff, painful shoulders and neck. Under immense pressure, there is a mix of an urgent sense of "almost reaching the finish line" and anxiety stemming from continuously discovering problems. The migraine has slightly eased but has not been completely eradicated.

2025-10.daily_overview: The end of the high-pressure period. At the last moment, Ye Mingxuan completed the review of all drawings and submitted a rigorous and detailed report, upholding professional integrity. Simultaneously, he conducted a systematic review and adjustment of his family and personal circumstances over the past month—particularly during his father's recovery period—striving to find a more sustainable new balance for his future life after the storm.

events.name: Complete the final review and report writing
events.description: During the day, Ye Mingxuan worked at the company office. He utilized the final hours to conduct a final review, organize, and consolidate all audit findings. In the afternoon, he focused on drafting the audit report, ensuring its logic was clear, the descriptions of issues were accurate, and the modification suggestions were actionable. Before leaving work, he solemnly submitted this meticulously prepared report to Project Manager Wang Peng and his direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan through the company's project management system. The moment he clicked "Submit," he felt the immense weight on his shoulders suddenly lift.

events.name: Reviewing the Monthly Care System with Mother
events.description: In the evening after returning home and having dinner, Ye Mingxuan sat down with his mother to review the operation of the care system over the past month since his father began home-based rehabilitation. They summarized effective practices (such as clear division of responsibilities and tracking with forms) and openly discussed the difficulties encountered (such as Ye Mingxuan’s personal time being severely squeezed and occasional emotional exhaustion). Based on his father’s rehabilitation progress, they made minor adjustments to the division of responsibilities for the next month, such as increasing the frequency of visits from community rehabilitation therapists for guidance.

events.name: Evaluate and formulate a new personal health management plan
events.description: Late at night, in the brief moment of tranquility that finally belonged to him, Ye Mingxuan reflected on his fitness plan, which had been completely disrupted over the past two months due to family changes. Assessing the current time constraints, he decided to no longer force himself into a rigid, systematic fitness routine. Instead, he formulated a more flexible "micro-health management" plan for November, which included short strength training sessions during lunch breaks, trying cycling for part of his commute, and scheduling an outdoor activity on weekends.

events.name: Summarize the self-study progress for this month.
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan briefly organized his self-study notes from October on Abaqus composite material analysis and Python data analysis. He documented the main technical challenges he encountered and his approaches to solving them, realizing that although his self-study progress had slowed during a significant family event, it had not been interrupted, which in itself was a form of perseverance. He plans to gradually resume his learning pace next month.

events.name: Went to bed early due to exhaustion but suffered from insomnia.
events.description: Despite his exhaustion, Ye Mingxuan suffered from insomnia due to post-stress relaxation, tossing and turning until late at night before finally falling asleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: With the determination to complete the final task and the tension of the final sprint, a slight residue of migraine and stomach discomfort remained.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief washed over me, followed by immense exhaustion that swept through my entire body. Yet, my heart was filled with a calm and grounded feeling after completing such a challenging task. I began to think more realistically about how to balance work, family, and personal life in the future, while the insomnia led to mild irritability.

state.今日运动: No systematic exercise was performed, only 5 minutes of shoulder and neck stretching were conducted.

2025-11.daily_overview: A weekend for wrapping up tasks and planning for the future, yet the body and mind remain in recovery. Ye Mingxuan conducts a review and family planning, but fatigue persists, and sleep quality is poor.

events.name: Monthly German Learning Review and Planning
events.description: Utilizing the quiet morning hours over the weekend, Ye Mingxuan, who has an ISTJ personality, conducted a structured review of his German studies from the past month in his study. He used an Excel spreadsheet to tally the newly acquired mechanical engineering vocabulary, organized commonly mistaken grammar points, and evaluated the improvement in his speed when reading technical documents. Based on the review results, he formulated a study plan for the next phase: adding 15 minutes of German news listening practice daily and attempting to write brief summaries of the key technical points from his work this week in German to strengthen his application skills.

events.name: Research on Dietary Regimen for Father's Recovery Period
events.description: After lunch, Ye Mingxuan sat in the living room with his mother, Wang Xiulan, carefully reviewing his father Ye Jianguo’s medical examination report. He had downloaded several low-salt, low-fat recipes suitable for patients in the recovery phase of hypertension and cerebral infarction, based on authoritative medical information he found online. The mother and son discussed modifying their family’s daily dishes according to the father’s dietary habits and taste preferences—such as replacing part of the salt with spices, increasing the proportion of steamed fish and vegetables—and preliminarily finalized the menu for the upcoming week.

events.name: Physical and Mental Recovery After High-Intensity Work
events.description: After the intensive project efforts of the previous period, Ye Mingxuan indeed felt a noticeable depletion of energy. In the afternoon, he deliberately reduced all mentally demanding activities. First, he took a nearly two-hour nap, and upon waking, only took a half-hour light walk within the residential complex. For dinner, he followed a newly researched healthy diet plan, keeping the meal light. In the evening, he attempted to rest early but struggled to fall asleep due to excessive thoughts.

events.name: Practice reading German technical documents
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Ye Mingxuan deliberately retrieved a simplified sensor product manual (PDF) from the German company Bosch to verify the results of his daytime review. With the help of an electronic dictionary, he attempted to read the technical parameter table and usage precautions. Although his reading speed was not fast, he could roughly grasp the core information, which gave him more direct confidence in the practicality of persisting with learning German.

events.name: Finalize the details of the university classmates reunion.
events.description: As one of the main organizers of the gathering, Ye Mingxuan finalized the restaurant private room and dishes for the evening of November 8 with Zhao Xiaofeng via WeChat. Subsequently, the two posted an official notice in the university classmates' group chat to confirm the participation intentions of several classmates in Tianjin. Being meticulous in his work, Ye Mingxuan also listed the restaurant address, parking information, and estimated per capita cost.

events.name: Routine payment at the beginning of the month
events.description: As one of the primary managers of the family finances, Ye Mingxuan paid this month's utility and property management fees through the mobile banking app. He habitually saved screenshots of the electronic receipts to a dedicated cloud drive folder and set a reminder for the next month's payments on the same date.

events.name: Staying up late due to stress and overthinking.
events.description: Despite attempting to go to bed early, Ye Mingxuan lay in bed with thoughts of his father's recovery, family renovations, and work pressures swirling in his mind, causing him to toss and turn until he finally managed to fall asleep in the early hours of the morning.

起始状态.心情: Fatigued yet attempting to relax, during an intermission between tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Calm but still contemplative, with poor sleep quality.

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute walk within the residential community.

2025-11.daily_overview: A Sunday focused on family matters and skill enhancement, but insufficient sleep the previous night led to low energy. Ye Mingxuan concluded his study phase and sought renovation advice, staying up slightly later in the evening due to immersion in learning.

events.name: Completion of the ANSYS Foundation Learning Phase Summary
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan organized his study notes from the past few weeks on ANSYS static analysis in his study. He systematically reviewed the meshing techniques, boundary condition settings, and post-processing methods he had mastered, and marked several challenging points that still required repeated practice (such as contact nonlinear settings). He compiled these into an electronic document, preparing himself both intellectually and mentally for the upcoming study of the more complex composite material analysis module (ACP).

events.name: Consult a Carpenter on the Feasibility of Renovation
events.description: Considering that his father might need some custom-made, sturdy assistive furniture (such as bedside tables and stools with armrests), Ye Mingxuan contacted his carpenter, Qian Jianguo, via WeChat. He not only described his father's situation and initial ideas but also sent several hand-drawn sketches. Master Qian responded quickly, offering valuable suggestions from a practical perspective: he recommended using beechwood for its high hardness and resistance to deformation, reminded him to ensure smooth, rounded edges on the furniture to prevent bumps and injuries, and agreed to provide guidance on key construction steps if needed.

events.name: Start the First Lesson on Composite Materials Simulation Learning
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan followed his study plan and began learning the ANSYS ACP module. Following the introductory tutorial, he step-by-step created a simplified cylindrical shell geometry model in the software. He also learned how to generate specialized shell element meshes for such thin-walled structures, as well as how to define the layup properties and material orientation for composite laminate materials. This marked his first step toward the more advanced field of lightweight design.

events.name: Refine Home Renovation Plan and Budget
events.description: Based on the data measured yesterday, the opinions of family members, and the suggestions from Master Qian, Ye Mingxuan further refined the renovation plan in his study that evening. Using CAD software, he drew a more precise floor plan, clearly categorizing the renovation projects into "urgent safety items" (such as bathroom handrails and anti-slip mats) and "comfort optimization items" (such as whole-house motion-activated night lights). Subsequently, he checked prices on e-commerce platforms to make a preliminary budget estimate for the "urgent safety items," ensuring he had a clear understanding of the costs.

events.name: Staying up late due to academic commitments
events.description: While refining the plan, Ye Mingxuan became so engrossed in the details that he inadvertently worked past midnight, resulting in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Focused yet slightly drowsy.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Enrichment, with progress made both in academic pursuits and in resolving family matters.

2025-11.daily_overview: A hectic Monday with multiple tasks progressing simultaneously. Ye Mingxuan handled family matters and wrapped up work, then consolidated information in the evening. Due to the numerous tasks, he went to bed relatively early but slept poorly.

events.name: Accompanying father for rehabilitation assessment
events.description: Ye Mingxuan took half a day off to accompany his father, Ye Jianguo, to the community rehabilitation center. In front of the therapist, he provided a detailed account of his father's physical condition and daily activity abilities after being discharged from the hospital. The therapist conducted a professional assessment and developed a preliminary home-based rehabilitation training plan, while also explaining precautions for fall prevention and assisted mobility in daily care. Ye Mingxuan carefully recorded the key points on his phone.

events.name: Handling Reimbursement of Father's Medical Expenses
events.description: After leaving the rehabilitation center, Ye Mingxuan immediately headed to the Xiqing District Social Security Center. He organized all the expense receipts from his father's earlier hospitalization and queued up at the window to handle the medical insurance reimbursement procedures. He carefully reviewed the list of documents, inquired with the staff about the reimbursement ratio and the approximate time for the funds to be credited, ensuring the process was clear and error-free.

events.name: Closed-loop Project Review Task
events.description: Returning to the company in the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan immediately immersed himself in his work. He participated in a brief review meeting chaired by Project Manager Wang Peng, where he provided explanations and clarifications to colleagues from the procurement and quality inspection departments regarding several detailed issues raised in the third-party audit report. Under his coordination, all issues were assigned clear responsibilities and rectification deadlines, thereby completing the final closure of this critical project. Gao Zhiyuan nodded in approval of his meticulous wrap-up work during the meeting.

events.name: Family Meeting Finalizes Renovation Plan
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan called a brief family meeting with his parents. He used the television screen to display CAD-drawn renovation floor plans, categorized project lists, and a preliminary budget. He explained the necessity and expected outcomes of each renovation to his parents, and specifically inquired about his father's personal preferences regarding handrail height and shower stool comfort. After discussion, the family unanimously decided to prioritize the bathroom safety renovations.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue but experiencing shallow sleep.
events.description: After a busy day, Ye Mingxuan felt extremely exhausted and went to bed early, but his sleep was light and easily disturbed.

起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, with a slight sense of busy urgency.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with a strong sense of accomplishment, multiple key issues were resolved within a single day.

2025-11.daily_overview: Returning to the regular work routine, Ye Mingxuan concurrently advances both learning and family procurement planning. At work, he deepens simulation learning and conducts material research. In the evening, he goes to bed slightly later due to contemplating emails from headhunters.

events.name: Advance Composite Material Simulation Exercises
events.description: During work breaks and a bit of time after lunch, Ye Mingxuan continued yesterday's ACP module practice. He applied an axial pressure load to the cylindrical shell model and set up an eigenvalue buckling analysis step to calculate the critical load for structural instability. After a successful run, he extracted the deformation contour plots of the first few buckling modes, compared and verified them with the tutorial results, and gained a preliminary understanding of the buckling characteristics of composite structures.

events.name: Develop a procurement list for renovation materials
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan began compiling a detailed procurement list based on the finalized renovation plan. He not only listed items such as anti-slip flooring, L-shaped handrails, foldable shower stools, and motion-sensor nightlights of different wattages, but also meticulously noted the required installation accessories (e.g., expansion screws of specific specifications, waterproof sealant). He simultaneously compared prices across multiple e-commerce platforms and local building material market websites, recording links and store addresses for products with high cost-effectiveness.

events.name: Handling Minor Household Heating System Malfunctions
events.description: In the evening, Wang Xiulan, the mother, noticed that one of the radiators in the living room was partially warm and partially cool. After inspecting it, Ye Mingxuan concluded that it was due to an airlock. He initially considered attempting to bleed the radiator himself, but considering his father's need for a stable room temperature and the risk of water leakage due to his lack of professional expertise, he decided to contact a professional. He found the maintenance contact for the heating company in the neighborhood's resident group and successfully scheduled an on-site visit for the following morning.

events.name: Receiving a headhunter's email and conducting a preliminary evaluation
events.description: While checking his work email before bed, Ye Mingxuan discovered a message from a well-known headhunting company recommending senior positions at two foreign enterprises in Beijing and Suzhou, offering a salary nearly 50% higher than his current job. He quickly skimmed through the job descriptions, feeling a momentary stir of excitement, but soon regained his composure. Considering his father was in a critical phase of recovery, relocating for work was completely out of the question, and the flexible work arrangement at his current company was of utmost importance to him. He did not reply immediately, planning to give it more careful thought the next day.

events.name: Stayed up late due to career decision contemplation.
events.description: While contemplating the headhunting opportunity, Ye Mingxuan weighed the pros and cons, which led to a delay in his bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Steady, returning to the rhythm of the workday.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Rationality, capable of thinking calmly in the face of temptation and focusing on the present priorities.

2025-11.daily_overview: A day of deep contemplation and crucial decisions. Ye Mingxuan declined a headhunter's opportunity and advanced home renovations, going to bed early after an emotional release.

events.name: Remote Supervision Solves Heating Issues
events.description: Today is Ye Mingxuan's remote work day. In the morning, while handling work emails, he waited at home for the repair technician. The technician arrived on time and skillfully bled the air from the faulty radiator and cleaned it. Ye Mingxuan was present throughout the process and took the opportunity to ask the technician for some daily maintenance tips. After the issue was resolved, considering his father's need for a stable recovery environment, he noted down a to-do item in his work notebook: [Before the start of the winter heating season, preventive inspection and cleaning of all radiators in the house are required.]

events.name: Politely declining a headhunter's offer after careful consideration
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan opened the headhunter's email again and conducted a more objective assessment. He listed the core disadvantages, such as [being unable to care for his father due to the relocation], [losing the current flexible work arrangement], and [the risks of adapting to a new environment], as well as the advantages, including [a salary increase] and [a potentially better platform]. Ultimately, his ISTJ risk aversion and sense of family responsibility prevailed. He drafted a polite and professional reply, thanking the headhunter for their interest, candidly explaining that he could not consider relocation opportunities at the moment due to family reasons, but expressing his willingness to stay in touch for the future. After clicking "send," he felt a grounded sense of relief.

events.name: Select a construction team for elderly-friendly home modifications.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan contacted three local construction teams through online platforms and personal referrals. He communicated with them via phone calls and WeChat, focusing on whether they had experience in renovating homes for the elderly, whether their quotations were clear and transparent, and whether the materials used were environmentally friendly and safe. After comprehensive comparison, he selected a team with a good reputation and smooth communication, and tentatively scheduled a site survey and final quotation for the weekend.

events.name: Communicating Career Choices with Family
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan casually mentioned to his parents that he had turned down a job opportunity in another city, as he felt his current job was stable and allowed him to balance work with family responsibilities. His father, Ye Jianguo, listened without saying much, simply nodding in response. His mother, Wang Xiulan, patted his hand and said, "With things as they are at home, having you nearby gives your father and me peace of mind." Their understanding further reassured him that his decision was the right one.

events.name: Quarterly Financial Review Appointment
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan remembered that the end of the quarter was approaching again. He sent a WeChat message to his financial manager, Zhang Wei, to schedule a brief quarterly financial review call for the following week. He also sent an overview of recent major expenses and income in advance to facilitate preparation.

events.name: Early bedtime due to post-decision relaxation.
events.description: After declining the headhunter's offer, Ye Mingxuan felt relieved and went to bed early to regain his energy.

起始状态.心情: Calmly, start the day with a to-do list.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Firm and steadfast, the direction becomes clearer after major decisions, and family matters are progressing smoothly.

2025-11.daily_overview: The hospital follow-up brought reassuring news, yet multitasking pressures led to the first bout of insomnia. Ye Mingxuan accompanied his father for the reexamination and updated the health records, but found it difficult to fall asleep at night due to excessive overthinking.

events.name: Accompanying father for his first follow-up appointment after hospital discharge.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan took a leave in the morning and drove his father to a tertiary hospital in Tianjin for a follow-up appointment in the neurology department. At the hospital, he skillfully assisted his father with registration and check-in. When meeting with the attending physician, he provided a clear and organized report on his father’s condition over the past month since discharge: medication reactions, changes in limb mobility, sleep and dietary habits, and presented home-recorded blood pressure data. After listening, the doctor conducted an examination and indicated that the recovery progress was as expected, which finally put everyone’s minds at ease.

events.name: Obtain and implement new rehabilitation medical orders
events.description: Based on the review results, the doctor adjusted the dosage of some medications and emphasized the key points for the next phase of home rehabilitation training (such as fine motor skills exercises). Ye Mingxuan carefully noted down all the key points, then proceeded to make the payment and collect the medications. After obtaining the medications, he returned to the consultation room once more to confirm several details regarding home care (such as how to assist with finger exercises) with the doctor, ensuring that everything was properly addressed.

events.name: Update family with positive follow-up results.
events.description: After the follow-up appointment, Ye Mingxuan drove his father home, stopping on the way to buy some soft pastries from the bakery his father often visited. During dinner, he relayed to his mother in detail the doctor's positive evaluation, the new medication plan, and the recommended training regimen. The entire family felt uplifted by the good news, and the atmosphere at dinner became noticeably lighter. His mother smiled and remarked that it seemed their previous dietary adjustments and care had been on the right track.

events.name: Update Family Health Records and Planning
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan scanned and archived all the medical records from the follow-up visit, the new prescription, and the doctor's verbal recommendations in his study, updating the electronic health record he had established for his father. Based on the new medical instructions, he set up medication reminders and rehabilitation training schedules for the next two weeks in his phone calendar. He also discussed the division of responsibilities with his mother: she would be responsible for daily medication supervision, while he would assist with more challenging training sessions on weekends.

events.name: First-time insomnia due to multithreading pressure
events.description: Perhaps due to the exhaustion from running around the hospital during the day, coupled with thoughts swirling in his mind about his father’s follow-up rehabilitation plan, the upcoming home renovation, and the work tasks that needed to be handled the next day, Ye Mingxuan found it difficult to fall asleep at night. Lying in bed with a jumble of thoughts, he barely managed to drift off after 1 a.m., only to wake up again around 4 a.m. It took him quite some time to fall back asleep. This reminded him that even when matters are handled in an orderly manner, the ongoing pressure of multitasking can still manifest physically.

起始状态.心情: With the caution and a touch of apprehension from the mission period

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Comfort and pressure coexist. I am relieved by my father's improvement, but my body is sounding alarms due to exhaustion and excessive worry.

state.今日运动: Accompanying my father for a walk in the hospital, covering approximately 8,000 steps.

2025-11.daily_overview: Returned to work to handle backlogged tasks, prepared for weekend gatherings and family activities, and went to bed early after having a creative idea in the evening.

events.name: Handle backlog work and report to superiors.
events.description: Upon returning to the company, Ye Mingxuan first addressed the backlog of emails and design drawing review tasks that had accumulated due to his leave the previous day. He utilized the efficient morning hours to complete them in a focused manner. Subsequently, he provided a brief update to his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, explaining that his father’s follow-up medical examination had gone well and expressing gratitude for the understanding shown in work arrangements. Engineer Gao acknowledged the situation with understanding and advised him to maintain a balance, noting that he could continue to apply for flexible work arrangements if needed.

events.name: Final Confirmation of Class Reunion Arrangements
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan contacted the restaurant manager again to confirm the private room, menu, and reserved parking space for the gathering the following evening. He then communicated with Zhao Xiaofeng via WeChat to finalize their division of responsibilities: Zhao Xiaofeng would be in charge of ordering dishes and opening the event, while Ye Mingxuan prepared some industry-related topics that might interest everyone, to guide the discussion in case of awkward silences.

events.name: Purchasing initial rehabilitation aids for father
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan did not go directly home but made a detour to a medical equipment store. Based on the doctor’s recommendations after the follow-up consultation and his father’s actual condition, he purchased a bathroom-specific stool with a non-slip base pad and a set of simple upper limb rehabilitation training devices (such as a grip ball and finger separator). He intended to have his father start using these basic safety devices before the formal renovation was completed.

events.name: The idea of designing rehabilitation tableware emerged.
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan observed that his father, whose left hand was still somewhat weak and trembling, struggled greatly when using a regular spoon to scoop food and bring it to his mouth, with the spoon slipping several times. This detail deeply moved him. An idea suddenly crossed his mind: perhaps he could design a spoon that is easy to grip, slip-resistant, and even capable of assisting in stabilizing the wrist? After the meal, in his study, he took out a draft paper and, combining his knowledge of mechanical engineering and ergonomics, sketched the first conceptual draft of a rehabilitation training spoon. He considered key aspects such as the angle of the spoon head, a thickened anti-slip handle, and an adjustable wrist strap.

events.name: Proactively plan to spend the weekend with mother.
events.description: Before going to bed, thinking about his mother's hard work during this period and to make up for any possible neglect on his part due to his busy schedule, Ye Mingxuan decided not to sleep in the next morning. Instead, he would get up early to accompany his mother to her favorite time-honored breakfast shop and have a good chat with her. He set an alarm on his phone.

events.name: Going to bed early after being excited by creativity.
events.description: New ideas bring excitement, but Ye Mingxuan restrained himself and went to bed early to conserve energy for the weekend.

起始状态.心情: Slightly drowsy but still in good spirits, ready to get to work.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Feeling a flicker of creative excitement (stemming from new ideas) amidst the fatigue, and looking forward to family time tomorrow.

2025-11.daily_overview: A fulfilling and warm Saturday. Fulfilling family responsibilities, skill enhancement, and a successful class reunion, staying up slightly late in the evening due to the gathering.

events.name: Accompanying mother for breakfast on a weekend morning
events.description: As planned, Ye Mingxuan got up early and walked with his mother, Wang Xiulan, to the nearby breakfast shop she often visited. He took the initiative to order two bowls of the crispy rice soup his mother loved, along with freshly fried dough sticks. While waiting and during the meal, he was no longer the busy son but a focused listener, attentively hearing his mother’s chatter about family matters and her worries over the trivialities of caring for his father, offering comfort and support. After the meal, he insisted on paying the bill and accompanied his mother on a walk home, brightening her mood considerably.

events.name: Taking father for rehabilitation training and learning assistive techniques
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan drove his father to the community rehabilitation center for the weekly limb function training. Under the guidance of the therapist, he learned how to safely assist his father in performing simple home-based rehabilitation exercises, such as wall-supported walking and passive joint movements, and took notes on the key points.

events.name: Take on the heavy physical labor of weekend household cleaning.
events.description: After returning home from the rehabilitation center, Ye Mingxuan took the initiative to handle the physically demanding tasks of this week's thorough cleaning: moving the living room furniture for a complete cleaning, scrubbing the high windows and light fixtures, and clearing the clutter accumulated on the balcony. At the same time, he organized and placed his father's newly purchased rehabilitation equipment and commonly used medications, ensuring a tidy and safe living space.

events.name: Compensatory Afternoon Rest and Relaxation
events.description: After a busy morning, Ye Mingxuan felt somewhat sleep-deprived. Following lunch, he took a deep two-hour nap, effectively making up for the sleep deficit from the previous few days. Upon waking, he felt refreshed and clear-headed.

events.name: Procurement of Age-Friendly Renovation Materials
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan drove alone to the building materials market and hardware store according to the list, purchasing the first batch of renovation materials: non-slip floor mats specifically for bathrooms, L-shaped safety handrails compliant with national standards, thickened bedside bumper strips, and more. He carefully inspected the quality and safety certifications of the products.

events.name: Complete the composite material simulation case study exercise
events.description: After returning home from shopping, Ye Mingxuan took advantage of the time before dinner to complete the second case study in the ANSYS ACP introductory tutorial in his study. He meticulously documented the entire operation process, including any software error messages encountered and their solutions, in electronic notes to consolidate his learning outcomes.

events.name: Successfully Organized University Alumni Gathering in Tianjin
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan and Zhao Xiaofeng, as hosts, arrived at the reserved restaurant in advance to arrange seating and check the dishes. During the gathering, six or seven old classmates who have been developing their careers in Tianjin reunited joyfully. Although Ye Mingxuan was not the most talkative, with Zhao Xiaofeng's encouragement, he was able to naturally share updates about his life and occasionally introduced industry-related topics to guide the discussion. Everyone reminisced about campus anecdotes, vented about work pressures, and the atmosphere remained relaxed and lively. As one of the main organizers, Ye Mingxuan gained a long-lost sense of social accomplishment and emotional support from the event.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to social dining events.
events.description: Consuming excessive greasy food at the party resulted in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a sense of responsibility to fulfill the plan.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and relaxed, family responsibilities are well fulfilled, social activities are enjoyable, and both body and mind are well balanced.

2025-11.daily_overview: Home renovation project commenced, enjoy warm family interactions, and retire early after evening movie viewing.

events.name: Home Renovation Project Officially Commences
events.description: The construction crew arrived on site early Sunday morning as scheduled. Ye Mingxuan, serving as the site supervisor, reconfirmed the detailed procedures for the bathroom renovation with the foreman, particularly emphasizing the quality standards for concealed works such as the routing of water and electrical lines and waterproofing treatment. In the morning, the workers began removing the old bathroom fixtures and clearing the walls and floors, marking the orderly commencement of the renovation project.

events.name: Deepen the Design Concept of Rehabilitation Tableware
events.description: During a break in the construction work, Ye Mingxuan returned to his study to further develop the idea for a rehabilitation training spoon that had occurred to him the previous Friday. He opened the SolidWorks software on his computer and began transforming his hand-drawn sketches into preliminary 3D models. He carefully considered the connection method between the spoon body and the handle, the placement of the counterweight compartment to achieve balance in the center of gravity, and the user-friendliness of the wrist strap slot.

events.name: Exchange insights on gathering experiences with classmates
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan thanked the classmates who attended the gathering last night on WeChat and shared several photos of the event in a small group chat. He also had a private conversation with Zhao Xiaofeng, and both agreed that the organization was very successful. They agreed to take turns hosting in the future to maintain the small circle of classmates in Tianjin.

events.name: Propose and prepare for a family movie night.
events.description: During dinner, noticing his father was in good spirits, Ye Mingxuan suggested they watch the latest episode of "Street Dance of China"—a competitive variety show they both enjoyed. His father happily agreed. After the meal, Ye Mingxuan checked the TV and internet connection, adjusted the living room lighting and sofa arrangement, while his mother washed some fruit and brewed tea. Ye Mingxuan specifically prepared the most comfortable seat and cushions for his father.

events.name: Enjoy a Warm Family Movie Night
events.description: In the evening, the family gathered in the living room, immersed in the thrilling competition of the show. Ye Mingxuan and his father occasionally exchanged brief comments on the dancers' technical moves, while his mother offered her thoughts on the costumes and stage effects. The familiar mentors and intense competition in the program brought a long-lost, focused, and joyful smile to his father's face. After the show ended, the family sat together chatting for a while before retiring for the night. The evening was filled with a relaxed and warm family atmosphere.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to snacking.
events.description: I ate some snacks while watching the movie, which led to a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to new changes at home.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, family interactions bring a strong sense of belonging and happiness.

2025-11.daily_overview: The new week begins with work and family matters intertwined. For the first time, I received feedback on my use of German, and after confiding in my childhood friend, I experienced an emotional release.

events.name: Used German actively in work for the first time
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan received a task requiring him to communicate with a German supplier regarding the precision compensation parameters for imported machine tools. While drafting the English email, he recalled the relevant terminology he had self-studied and decided to attempt adding the original German terms in parentheses at several key technical confirmation points for precise expression (e.g., [Spiel (clearance)], [Vorschub (feed)]). This was the first time he had proactively used German in his work, and he felt somewhat uneasy, but he believed it would help reduce ambiguity.

events.name: Having a meal with childhood friend Zhang Wei to confide stress
events.description: The constant pressure of caregiving, the supervision of renovation projects, and the accumulation of work tasks left Ye Mingxuan feeling physically and mentally exhausted. During his lunch break, he took the initiative to invite his childhood friend Zhang Wei to dinner near the company that evening. After work, the two met at their usual barbecue restaurant, where Ye Mingxuan, for once, opened up and poured out the various pressures and worries he faced as the family's pillar. Although Zhang Wei could not offer specific solutions, his patient listening and lighthearted banter provided Ye Mingxuan with a much-needed emotional release.

events.name: Obtaining positive feedback on German language application
events.description: Shortly after returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan received a reply email from the German engineer. The engineer not only provided a detailed answer to the question but also specifically wrote in English at the beginning of the email: "Thank you for using German terminology for confirmation—it is very accurate and helpful for understanding." This small compliment greatly encouraged Ye Mingxuan, making him deeply appreciate the value of continuous learning. He decided to invest more effort in deepening this skill in the future.

events.name: Cancelled monthly gathering with Zhang Wei due to family matters.
events.description: While having dinner with Zhang Wei, Ye Mingxuan mentioned that the home renovation would enter a critical phase in the coming weeks, requiring more time for supervision and assistance. The monthly gathering originally scheduled for the end of this month might have to be canceled. Zhang Wei expressed complete understanding and suggested that he prioritize taking care of his home first.

events.name: Try midday stretching to alleviate fatigue.
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan performed a 10-minute shoulder and neck stretch, which alleviated some of the stiffness in his body.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, welcoming a new week

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: The pressure has somewhat eased, and a sense of accomplishment has been added due to a minor breakthrough at work (German language application).

2025-11.daily_overview: The project work has entered a new phase. Ye Mingxuan leads the task force, gaining trust, and receives online support from classmates in the evening.

events.name: Prepare project meeting presentation materials
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan prepared for the afternoon's monthly project meeting. He compiled the latest progress report on the design of the precision transmission components under his responsibility and focused on summarizing the technical bottleneck encountered while attempting to adopt a composite material weight reduction solution—stress concentration was observed in the connection areas during simulation. He prepared clear charts and data, intending to present the issue and seek support during the meeting.

events.name: Raise technical bottlenecks during regular meetings and lead the task force to tackle them.
events.description: At the afternoon routine meeting, Ye Mingxuan truthfully reported the progress and issues encountered. He engaged in an in-depth discussion with his colleague Li Xiang, who is responsible for simulation, regarding the preliminary simulation results, exploring several potential solutions such as local reinforcement and altering the layup angles. After listening to the discussion, project manager Wang Peng concluded that this issue required concentrated efforts to achieve a breakthrough. He made an on-the-spot decision to form a temporary task force, appointing Ye Mingxuan, who raised the issue, to lead the group with Li Xiang's assistance. They were tasked with submitting a feasibility report within one week. This arrangement made Ye Mingxuan feel a significant sense of responsibility, but also viewed it as a mark of trust.

events.name: Gain online support from the alumni network.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan briefly mentioned in his university classmates' WeChat group that his family had been quite busy lately due to his father's illness. Sun Jing, who was in Beijing, saw the message and immediately reached out to him privately for more details. After learning about the situation, the warm-hearted Sun Jing promptly suggested organizing an online video gathering, inviting several old classmates scattered across different locations to offer him encouragement. Touched by the gesture, Ye Mingxuan accepted the kindness without hesitation.

events.name: Review and fine-tune the division of household labor.
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan sat down with his mother to review the operation of their new family division of labor over the past few weeks. They discussed minor difficulties encountered (such as the inconvenience of moving the wheelchair when his mother took his father to the community for physiotherapy alone) and made slight adjustments to the process (agreeing to schedule such outings as much as possible on days when Ye Mingxuan could take leave or work remotely). Both acknowledged the sense of stability brought by the new arrangement.

events.name: Slight weight loss due to stress.
events.description: Work pressure leads to irregular eating habits, resulting in a slight weight loss.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to tackle work challenges

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Feeling a sense of responsibility and pressure, yet simultaneously inspired by the trust received and the care from friends.

2025-11.daily_overview: Supervising home renovations, receiving online virtual visits from classmates, initiating technical research, and beginning to experience discomfort in the lower back.

events.name: On-site supervision of renovation construction quality
events.description: Ye Mingxuan utilized his morning off-duty time to conduct key supervision at the construction site. He meticulously inspected the flatness and gaps of the newly laid wall tiles in the bathroom, as well as the wiring of the newly added power outlets in the bedrooms. As expected, he discovered a deviation of several centimeters in the position of one outlet compared to the design drawings. He immediately called over the construction foreman, presented the drawings, and demanded rectification according to the original plan. After verifying the issue, the foreman apologized and promptly arranged for workers to make the adjustment. Ye Mingxuan’s rigorous attitude ensured the project proceeded with quality.

events.name: Receiving online "cloud visits" from university classmates
events.description: In the evening, at the time coordinated by Sun Jing, Ye Mingxuan connected via video conferencing software from home with Sun Jing, Liu Yang, Zhao Xiaofeng, Chen Hao, and four or five other old classmates. They did not dwell too much on the illness but instead took turns sharing recent anecdotes, venting about work, and Liu Yang even recounted an embarrassing story from their university days that made everyone burst into laughter. The classmates also sincerely expressed their concern and shared links to high-quality articles they had found on topics such as rehabilitation nutrition, home care, and psychological adjustment. The brief call, lasting just over forty minutes, was filled with laughter and warmth.

events.name: Comfort the father's adjustment to the new environment
events.description: The environmental changes brought about by the construction made Ye Jianguo, the father, feel somewhat uncomfortable and irritable. In between supervising the construction and working remotely, Ye Mingxuan patiently explained to his father that every modification was intended to make his life safer and more convenient, promising that normal daily routines would soon be restored. His explanations and reassurance proved effective.

events.name: Convene the first meeting of the task force
events.description: In the afternoon, upon returning to the company, Ye Mingxuan and Li Xiang convened the first meeting of the task force. They clarified the objective: to complete the feasibility report on optimizing the composite material connection structure within one week. A detailed plan was formulated with clear division of responsibilities: Ye Mingxuan would lead the structural optimization design and propose specific solutions, while Li Xiang would conduct rapid simulation verification for each solution to identify the optimal one.

events.name: Conduct the first simulation analysis
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan immediately got to work. He opened the problematic connection structure model in the finite element analysis software, set the extreme load conditions, and ran the simulation. He focused on analyzing the location and magnitude of stress concentration areas to identify precise data points for subsequent optimization design.

events.name: Discomfort and soreness begin in the lumbar region.
events.description: While supervising construction, Ye Mingxuan frequently bent over, and combined with prolonged sitting at work, he felt soreness in his lower back muscles, which is an early sign of lumbar muscle strain.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle multithreading tasks

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Though physically exhausted, my heart was deeply warmed by the profound friendship of my old classmates, alleviating the sense of pressure and enhancing my motivation.

2025-11.daily_overview: Focus on tackling technical challenges, complete the design of optimization solutions, with persistent lower back discomfort.

events.name: Organize Rehabilitation Resources Shared by Classmates
events.description: Before heading to work in the morning, Ye Mingxuan took some time to organize the links and article summaries shared by his classmates the previous night regarding stroke rehabilitation, home care, and psychological support. He filed them into the health information folder he had created for his father. Some practical care techniques were specifically printed out and given to his mother for reference.

events.name: Develop an optimization plan for composite material connections.
events.description: In the office, based on the stress concentration areas identified through yesterday's simulation analysis, Ye Mingxuan conceptualized three different local reinforcement solutions on the whiteboard and draft paper: Option A involved adding composite material stiffeners at the connection points; Option B entailed adjusting the fiber layup angles near the connection area to alter the load path; and Option C involved embedding a small titanium alloy metal insert to bear the concentrated stress. He conducted a preliminary assessment of the process feasibility, potential weight increase, and cost implications for each option.

events.name: Complete Detailed Design of the Optimization Plan
events.description: After preliminary discussions with Li Xiang, they tend to favor Option A (adding reinforcement ribs), which has a relatively simple process and minimal weight increase, as the primary direction for in-depth exploration. In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan used CAD software to create detailed 3D models and 2D engineering drawings of the specific structure of Option A, including the geometry, dimensions, and connection methods of the reinforcement ribs to the main structure. All key dimensions, tolerances, and material requirements were clearly annotated.

events.name: Deliver the design proposal to the partner.
events.description: Before leaving work, Ye Mingxuan packaged and sent the optimized design proposal electronic files and design documentation to Li Xiang. After receiving them, Li Xiang indicated that he would promptly establish a simulation model for verification and analysis. Their collaboration was efficient and smooth.

events.name: Thank you for your virtual support, classmates.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan sent a long message in the university classmates' group chat, sincerely expressing his gratitude to Sun Jing for her organization and to each classmate who participated in the "virtual visit" for their care and encouragement. He mentioned that the shared resources and everyone's laughter had been of great help to him. Since then, his connection with this core circle of classmates has noticeably become closer and more natural.

events.name: Apply a warm compress to the lower back to alleviate discomfort.
events.description: Due to soreness and distension in his lower back, Ye Mingxuan applied a hot water bottle to his lower back at night, which provided slight relief.

起始状态.心情: Fresh, the fine weather after the rain brings a good mood.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Enriched, substantial progress has been made in tackling technical challenges, and the focus on work brings a sense of fulfillment.

2025-11.daily_overview: The pace eases on Friday, follow up on work progress, schedule financial planning, relax with online games, and pay attention to lower back discomfort.

events.name: Follow up on the progress of the simulation for the breakthrough plan.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan briefly communicated with Li Xiang, inquiring about his progress on the simulation verification of Plan A. Li Xiang reported that the preliminary results were optimistic, with the stiffeners effectively dispersing stress, and that sensitivity analysis on different dimensional parameters was currently underway. Based on this feedback, Ye Mingxuan considered whether any fine-tuning of the design was necessary.

events.name: Handle routine design tasks
events.description: While tackling parallel critical tasks, Ye Mingxuan also needed to handle routine design assignments for other projects. During the afternoon, he reviewed several newly received component drawings and responded to several consultation emails regarding technical standards.

events.name: Confirm the quarterly financial review schedule
events.description: Ye Mingxuan received a WeChat reply from his financial manager, Zhang Wei, confirming that the previously scheduled quarterly financial review conference call is set for next Monday (November 17th) in the afternoon. He replied to confirm and began organizing the major income and expenditure records for his household over the past three months.

events.name: Online Gaming for Relaxation
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan felt the need to unwind from a week of tension. He logged online and contacted his gaming teammate Zheng Kai in Shenzhen and his cousin Ye Mingyuan. The three formed a team and played several rounds of "League of Legends." Through the competition and teamwork in the game, he temporarily set aside the pressures of work and family, achieving pure relaxation.

events.name: Check the completion status of the renovation work.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan checked the progress of the house renovation. The main renovations in the bathroom and bedroom were largely completed, with workers carrying out the final trimming and cleaning. He discussed with the construction foreman the schedule for finishing all remaining tasks and clearing the site by the weekend.

events.name: Stayed up late due to gaming.
events.description: Post-game excitement leads to a slightly later bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, the arrival of Friday brings the anticipation of unwinding.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and content, making progress at work, looking forward to the weekend, and relieving stress through gaming.
