2025-11.daily_overview: The home renovation project has been completed, with final inspection and thorough cleaning carried out. Minor exercises were performed to alleviate lower back discomfort, and a new health schedule has been planned.

events.name: Final Completion and Acceptance of Supervision and Renovation Project
events.description: Ye Mingxuan supervised the finishing work of the construction at home throughout the day. In the morning, he confirmed that the custom wardrobe in the bedroom was securely installed and the wall surfaces were smoothly treated. In the afternoon, he followed up on the completion of the living room feature wall and the cleaning of the flooring throughout the entire house. He tested the newly installed safety handrails, motion-activated night lights, and other facilities one by one to ensure their proper functionality. Finally, he reviewed all the items with the construction foreman and settled the final payment after confirming everything was correct. The over-a-week-long home aging-in-place renovation project was officially completed.

events.name: Purchasing household supplies independently
events.description: While his mother stayed at home to look after his father and tidy up the renovated room, Ye Mingxuan drove alone to a large supermarket. He purchased a week’s worth of groceries, daily necessities, and the nutritional supplements his father needed. Following the shopping list strictly, he completed the task efficiently.

events.name: Deep cleaning after renovation
events.description: After the construction team left, there was still some dust in the house. In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan put on a mask and carried out a thorough cleaning: wiping all the newly installed furniture and handrails, mopping the floors throughout the house, and cleaning the windows. He also took the opportunity to fix a slightly loose faucet in the kitchen, replacing it with a new sealing washer.

events.name: Weekend Relaxation Through Woodworking and Gaming
events.description: After completing the heavy household chores, Ye Mingxuan finally had some time to himself. He first went to his home workshop and used sandpaper to polish an unfinished wooden toolbox, finding peace of mind in this repetitive manual work. In the evening, he invited his childhood friend Zhang Wei and colleague Zhou Tao to team up online for a few rounds of gaming. Laughing and chatting, they thoroughly relaxed both body and mind.

events.name: Replanning Fragmented Fitness
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan realized that his frequency of going to the gym had dropped sharply in recent weeks. He checked the fitness app on his phone and re-planned his exercise routine for the upcoming week: instead of insisting on a full one-hour gym session, he decided to do several sets of push-ups and squats during work breaks, along with two 30-minute home fitness ring workouts on weekends, to better adapt to his current fragmented schedule.

events.name: Commence preparations for the monthly financial review.
events.description: Before going to bed, with the end of the month approaching and in preparation for Monday's financial planning meeting, Ye Mingxuan opened the bookkeeping software to conduct a preliminary review of the household and personal expenditure records for November, laying the groundwork for a detailed follow-up analysis and adjustments to the December budget.

events.name: Engage in weekend brisk walking to alleviate lower back discomfort.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan engaged in a 30-minute brisk walk within the residential community, aiming to alleviate symptoms of lumbar muscle strain and as a practice of micro-exercise.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to preparing for a brand-new home.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Tired yet immensely accomplished. The major task of home renovation has been successfully completed, while personal relaxation has been achieved through hobbies and social activities, along with new fine-tuning plans for future life.

state.今日运动: 30 minutes of brisk walking in the residential community, 2 hours of household chores.

2025-11.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan welcomed a Sunday centered around family matters. The focus of the entire day was the final inspection and financial review of the home aging-in-place renovations. Drawing on his engineer's meticulousness, he examined the construction quality item by item. As the family's financial pillar, he systematically organized recent major expenses and initiated preliminary consultations for purchasing supplementary medical insurance for his father. In the evening, he began experimenting with integrating fitness into fragmented pockets of time.

events.name: Quality Acceptance for Home Renovation
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan took out a tape measure and a level, conducting a systematic inspection of the renovated bathroom, bedroom, and living room as if handling a work project. He tested the sturdiness of the installed handrails, the evenness of the tiles, and the responsiveness of the switches one by one. He also inspected the delivered bathroom fixtures and lighting fixtures, signing for them only after confirming everything was in order. The entire process was efficient and meticulous. His father, Ye Jianguo, watched from the side, expressing approval of his son's thoroughness.

events.name: Summary and Organization of Financial Vouchers
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan focused on organizing various expenditure vouchers from the past month in his study, including his father's medical bills, payment records for renovation projects, and a small expense incurred to enrich his collection of ancient coins. By cross-referencing his mobile banking statements, he updated the family's monthly income and expenditure spreadsheet as well as the asset allocation table in Excel on his computer. He clearly marked all non-routine expenses, thereby preparing the necessary data for his meeting with the financial advisor the following day.

events.name: Consultation on Supplementary Medical Insurance
events.description: Considering his father Ye Jianguo's recovery period and potential future medical needs, Ye Mingxuan contacted financial manager Zhang Wei via WeChat. He briefly explained his father's situation and his own insurance needs. After understanding the circumstances, Manager Zhang provided a preliminary introduction to several hospitalization and cancer medical insurance products suitable for middle-aged and elderly individuals available on the market. He also suggested that Ye Mingxuan first conduct his own research, with the possibility of further in-depth discussions later.

events.name: Try Home Core Training
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan recalled the advice from his fitness coach, Wang Jian, last week about utilizing fragmented time for exercise. He spread out a yoga mat in the living room and attempted a 15-minute routine based on memory, including variations of planks, glute bridges, and stretches. Although his movements were not entirely standard, and he was interrupted once when his mother asked if he wanted some fruit, he felt the slight soreness of his muscles being activated after prolonged sitting and decided to persist.

events.name: Preliminary Review of Insurance Products
events.description: After training, Ye Mingxuan did not rest. Instead, he opened his computer and began browsing medical insurance plans for middle-aged and elderly individuals on the official websites of major insurance companies and third-party evaluation platforms. He recorded the names and initial impressions of several products with comprehensive coverage and reputable companies in his memo, planning to conduct a detailed comparison later.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm and focused, with a sense of responsibility to complete the finishing work.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled yet slightly fatigued, having completed multiple planned tasks, with a clear understanding of tomorrow's arrangements.

state.今日运动: Try a 15-minute core workout at home.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Monday, Ye Mingxuan resumed his rhythm of balancing work and family affairs. During the day, he inspected the renovation details with his father and made minor adjustments. At work, he collaborated with Li Xiang to advance the project simulation but was unexpectedly assigned an urgent modification task. In the afternoon, he conducted an important quarterly financial review with his financial manager. The entire day was efficient and multi-threaded, showcasing his strong execution capabilities.

events.name: Collaborate with Father for Acceptance and Fine-tuning
events.description: Before going to work, Ye Mingxuan invited his father Ye Jianguo to conduct a "user experience test" on the newly installed facilities, such as handrails and anti-slip flooring. Based on his actual usage experience, his father pointed out that the bedside lamp switch was slightly out of reach and suggested a minor adjustment to the angle of a handrail in the bathroom. Ye Mingxuan immediately contacted the construction team and coordinated a final round of detailed adjustments in the afternoon to ensure the facilities fully met his father's needs.

events.name: Quarterly Financial Review and Adjustment
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan held a WeChat voice conference with his financial manager, Zhang Wei. He provided a detailed explanation of the significant expenses incurred over the past two months due to his father's medical treatments and home renovations, as well as the resulting changes in cash flow. Manager Zhang analyzed the current performance of the funds and, considering that the family's emergency funds had been depleted, recommended that Ye Mingxuan suspend some non-essential fund investments. He advised prioritizing the replenishment of living expenses for 3-6 months as an emergency reserve and reminded him to pay attention to a bank wealth management product that is about to mature.

events.name: Urgent Project Modification Task
events.description: During the morning work, Gao Zhiyuan, the direct supervisor, temporarily requested Ye Mingxuan to urgently revise the composite materials project report to accommodate the client's early review. Ye Mingxuan had to adjust his schedule, utilizing his lunch break to work overtime in organizing the data, which increased his work pressure.

events.name: Organize Financial Action Checklist
events.description: After the meeting, Ye Mingxuan promptly translated Manager Zhang's suggestions into actionable items. He suspended the scheduled investment plan for the specified fund on the financial management app, marked the maturity date of the financial product in his phone calendar, and set a goal to transfer funds to replenish the emergency reserve as soon as his salary for the month was credited. The clear checklist provided him with a well-defined priority for his financial arrangements over the following month.

events.name: Project Simulation Analysis and Collaboration
events.description: During a work break, Ye Mingxuan held an online discussion with his colleague Li Xiang regarding the optimization plan for composite material components. Li Xiang submitted the first-round simulation comparison report of different schemes. Drawing on his own design experience, Ye Mingxuan collaborated with Li Xiang to screen out the two most promising directions and finalized the working condition requirements for the final verification.

events.name: Dinner Conversation with Family
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan briefly explained to his parents the discussion he had with the financial manager earlier that day, mentioning that he would prioritize ensuring emergency funds for the family and reassuring them not to worry. His mother, Wang Xiulan, prepared his favorite steamed perch, while his father inquired about the progress of the company's projects. The family atmosphere was warm and pragmatic.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Awake, yet with a slight sense of pressure, ready to tackle the various tasks of a busy Monday.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Feeling accomplished yet somewhat fatigued, having completed multiple key decisions and collaborative tasks. There is an increased sense of control over both family and work, but with a slight rise in pressure.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a day filled with emotional support and profound exchanges. During the day, Ye Mingxuan focused on his work and shared his learning achievements from the previous week with his colleagues. In the evening, he met with Professor Zhao Jianguo, a fellow collector who had made a special trip to Tianjin. The meeting brought him precious book gifts and valuable life guidance. This in-depth conversation, transitioning from online to offline, provided a crucial emotional outlet and spiritual comfort for the pressure he had been under recently.

events.name: Sharing Technical Progress with Colleagues
events.description: During lunch, Ye Mingxuan sat with his close colleagues Zhou Tao and Li Xiang in the company cafeteria. He shared his experience of successfully using ANSYS ACP to complete a composite material simulation over the previous weekend and showed several rendered images on his phone. Zhou Tao showed great interest and discussed the possibility of applying it to other company projects, while Li Xiang offered several optimization suggestions from a simulation professional's perspective, creating a lively atmosphere for the exchange.

events.name: Mid-term Discussion on Project Proposal
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan and Li Xiang formally discussed the core conclusions of the simulation analysis report. The two integrated the results of design optimization and simulation verification, jointly determined the recommended plan and main arguments for the technical feasibility report, and unified the approach for the subsequent report writing.

events.name: Going to an appointment after work
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan drove to the teahouse where he had arranged to meet Professor Zhao Jianguo. The sky had darkened, and a light rain made the road surface reflect the halos of streetlights. His emotions were complex—he felt both anticipation for the meeting and a faint hope that this elder, who was both a mentor and a friend, could offer some guidance regarding the heavy responsibilities he had recently shouldered.

events.name: Meeting at the Teahouse and the Gift of Books
events.description: In a quaint and tranquil private room of a teahouse, Ye Mingxuan met with Professor Zhao Jianguo. The professor, appearing spirited and vigorous, warmly exchanged greetings before presenting Ye Mingxuan with his latest compiled work, "An Illustrated Catalog and Study of Modern Chinese Machine-Struck Coins," along with an encouraging inscription. The two first engaged in a professional discussion centered on several rare coin varieties featured in the book, in a relaxed atmosphere.

events.name: Sharing and Receiving Guidance
events.description: Amidst the lingering aroma of tea, the conversation gradually deepened. Ye Mingxuan confided in Professor Zhao about the pressures he had faced in work, family, and finances since his father fell ill, as well as the constant tension that left no room for relaxation. With the wisdom of an elder, Professor Zhao listened patiently, sharing his own experiences of balancing academic pursuits and family responsibilities in his youth. He encouraged Ye Mingxuan, saying, "The difficulties before you are a test of your abilities. Applying engineering thinking to solve family problems is itself an act of creation and growth." He also advised Ye Mingxuan to set aside some "moments of mental relaxation" for himself, such as focusing solely on the act of collecting and organizing.

events.name: Farewell and Homecoming
events.description: As night deepened, the two concluded their nearly two-hour in-depth conversation. Ye Mingxuan sincerely thanked Professor Zhao for his care and the gift of the book, and Professor Zhao patted his shoulder, offering further encouragement. After bidding farewell at the entrance of the teahouse, Ye Mingxuan drove home, feeling as though a weight that had been pressing on his chest had somewhat eased.

events.name: Late Night Contemplation and Reading
events.description: Returning home, he found his parents had already retired for the night. Under the warm glow of the desk lamp in his study, Ye Mingxuan gently leafed through the new book gifted by Professor Zhao. The exquisite illustrations and meticulous research immersed him completely. Reflecting on the conversation from earlier that evening, he felt a warmth of being understood and accepted, gaining new strength within. He decided to set aside time this weekend to organize his collection of ancient coins.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: With a hint of anticipation, I worked during the day, as there was an important meeting in the evening.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: With a sense of relief and warmth, they gained valuable emotional support and spiritual guidance, leading to some alleviation of pressure.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Ye Mingxuan's work and life rhythm returned to a steady progression. During the day, he and his mother completed the final cleaning for the home renovation and consolidated reports at the company. In the evening, due to discomfort from lumbar muscle strain, he rested early and was unable to delve into insurance products.

events.name: Household Cleaning and Organization
events.description: In the morning, the construction crew officially withdrew from the site. Ye Mingxuan and his mother, Wang Xiulan, wearing masks and gloves, cleaned up the residual construction dust and small amounts of debris left in the renovated room. They also wiped down the newly installed fixtures and furniture with clean water. Looking at the refreshed, safer, and more comfortable home, both mother and son felt a sense of relief.

events.name: Thank you, Professor Zhao.
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan sent another thank-you message to Professor Zhao Jianguo via WeChat, expressing that he would carefully read the gifted book and often reflect on his advice. Shortly after, he received encouraging words and a scenic photo taken in Tianjin from Professor Zhao in reply. The two agreed to stay in touch.

events.name: Write and Submit Technical Report
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan compiled the explanations for his design optimization plan. Integrating the simulation data and analysis conclusions provided by Li Xiang, he began drafting the "Feasibility Report on Structural Optimization and Technical Breakthrough of Composite Material Components." He focused on articulating the issues, comparing different solutions, outlining the recommended rationale, and detailing the follow-up plan using the precise language of an engineer. Before the end of the workday, he submitted the initial draft of the report to Project Manager Wang Peng and his direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan for review.

events.name: Rest early if you experience discomfort from lumbar muscle strain.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan felt an increased soreness and distension in his lower back, likely due to prolonged sitting and fatigue from recent cleaning activities. He decided to heed his body's signals, went to bed early, applied a warm compress to his lower back, and temporarily set aside his research on insurance products.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a day of both harvest and observation. The good news is that Ye Mingxuan has learned that he successfully passed the Intermediate Level of the Computer Technology and Software Professional Qualification Exam, thereby enhancing his professional credentials. His father was also discharged from the hospital today and returned home, beginning to adapt to the newly renovated environment. While assisting his father with his meal, an observation struck a chord with his engineer's instincts, sparking an idea to apply his professional skills to address a specific family difficulty.

events.name: Query the Soft Examination Results
events.description: During a break in the morning work, Ye Mingxuan logged into the China Computer Technology Vocational Qualification Website, entered his personal information, and checked the results of the Software Designer (Intermediate) exam he had taken in early November. The page showed that he had passed both the morning and afternoon sections, succeeding in one attempt. He calmly took a screenshot, feeling a sense of relief in his heart, as this added a significant credential to his professional development.

events.name: Sharing Joy and Bringing Father Home
events.description: He first shared a screenshot of his grades with his parents and several colleagues who cared about his studies (such as Zhou Tao and Li Xiang) via WeChat, receiving many congratulations. In the afternoon, he took leave to leave work early and went with his mother to the hospital to pick up his father, Ye Jianguo, upon his discharge. Upon returning home, he patiently guided his father in trying out the new handrails in the bathroom and adjusting the height of the bed, ensuring that his father could begin his recovery life safely and comfortably in the "new home."

events.name: Observing Father's Difficulty in Eating
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan noticed that his father's left hand had limited mobility, with weakened strength and control, causing the ordinary ceramic spoon to frequently slip from his grasp. Food often fell back into the bowl before it could reach his mouth. His father appeared frustrated and struggled visibly. This specific scene deeply moved Ye Mingxuan. As he helped his father with the dishes, he instinctively began to ponder: Could something be designed to solve this problem?

events.name: Documenting Requirements and Preliminary Conceptualization
events.description: After the meal, Ye Mingxuan did not immediately return to his study as usual. Instead, he sat in the living room, carefully observing and asking his father about the specific sensations when holding a spoon—where he felt weak, which angles felt awkward. He briefly noted down core requirements such as "anti-slip, thickened, lightweight, and easy to grip" in his phone's memo. The idea of "designing customized assistive utensils for his father" became clear in his mind.

events.name: Small Celebration Dinner
events.description: To celebrate passing the soft exam and his father's discharge from the hospital, Ye Mingxuan's mother prepared a sumptuous dinner, including braised pork and steamed perch. In high spirits, Ye Mingxuan ate a bit more than usual, leading to a slight increase in his weight.

events.name: Discussing Insurance Intentions with Father
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan took a tablet computer to his father's room and presented two to three insurance plans he had researched and selected over several days. He explained the key coverage points and approximate costs of each. His father, Ye Jianguo, listened carefully, chose the plan with more comprehensive coverage and a reputable company service, and mentioned that part of the cost could be covered by his pension. Together, the father and son finalized their purchase intention.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a hint of anticipation for the results.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Complex yet driven, it encompasses both the relief of passing the exam and the reassurance of my father's return home, while also igniting a strong desire to solve problems and generate innovative ideas upon observing specific issues.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Friday, while working, Ye Mingxuan efficiently advanced two important family matters. During the day, he finalized the decision and completed the enrollment for purchasing supplementary medical insurance for his father. In the evening, he put his emerging idea of "rehabilitation tableware" into preliminary practice by starting the sketch design and discussing the initial concept with his father to gather feedback. His execution was highly effective.

events.name: Draw a sketch of assistive eating utensils
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan took out a sketchbook and pencil in the study. Drawing on his observations from the previous day and ergonomic references, he began designing a spoon assistive device for his father that would be easy to grip. He experimented with various handle shapes: some thickened in the middle like a spindle, some with finger grooves, and others featuring a gentle S-shaped curve. He also noted down ideas for anti-slip textures (such as raised dots or stripes) alongside the sketches. He then showed his father several of the most promising designs, asking him to mimic holding them to gauge their feel.

events.name: Finally selected and insured
events.description: In the afternoon, after conducting a final comprehensive evaluation of the product terms and user reviews, Ye Mingxuan selected a million-yuan medical insurance policy with high cost-effectiveness and clear renewal conditions. Through the insurance company's official online platform, he carefully filled in his father's identity information and health declaration (truthfully disclosing the history of hypertension). After confirming the accuracy of the details, he made the online payment for the first-year premium and successfully completed the insurance application.

events.name: Inform family members of the insurance application outcome.
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan announced to his parents the successful purchase of the insurance policy. He briefly explained the main coverage of the policy and the subsequent claims process, particularly emphasizing how to access the electronic policy. Upon hearing this, his mother Wang Xiulan repeatedly expressed her approval, feeling more at ease in her heart; his father Ye Jianguo also nodded, appreciating his son's thoroughness.

events.name: Receive Project Feedback
events.description: During the day, project managers Wang Peng and Gao Zhiyuan provided feedback on the initial draft of the feasibility report submitted by Ye Mingxuan. They generally affirmed the technical approach but requested more detailed risk assessments and cost estimates. Ye Mingxuan took notes on the key points and plans to refine the report next week.

events.name: Relaxing by playing online games with friends
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan teamed up with his online gaming teammate Zheng Kai to play a round of "League of Legends" to relax his mind, but as a result, he stayed up later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, we are prepared to handle insurance matters and advance new ideas.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and full of creativity, an important family safeguard has been accomplished, taking a substantial first step toward the "integration goal."

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday is designated for family collaboration and emotional companionship. Ye Mingxuan spent the entire day with his parents. In the morning, he counseled his father, who was feeling down due to slow recovery, and in the afternoon, he systematically shopped for winter household supplies with his mother. From creating a shopping list and selecting items at the mall to purchasing goods at the supermarket and organizing them at home, the entire process demonstrated the planning skills characteristic of an ISTJ personality and his meticulous care for his family.

events.name: Accompanying and Counseling Father
events.description: During breakfast, Ye Mingxuan noticed that his father seemed somewhat silent and downcast due to the slower-than-expected progress in his recovery. Instead of lecturing him directly, he spent the evening watching an episode of "Street Dance of China" with his father in the living room. When they reached an exciting part, he reminisced about the time when his father took him to watch a technical skills competition at the factory during his childhood. He said, "Dad, I still learn from the dedication you showed in mastering your skills back then. Recovery is like fine-tuning a machine—it takes time, but once you find the trick, it gets easier." Hearing this, his father's expression softened noticeably.

events.name: Create a Household Procurement List
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan and his mother sat in the living room, taking out paper and pen to discuss the family's winter needs together. Considering his father's need for warmth, the replenishment of household medicines, and some daily necessities, they carefully compiled a shopping list that included a thick down quilt, warm homewear, hand cream, a family first-aid kit supplement (cold medicine, blood pressure monitor batteries), red dates, Chinese yam, and lamb. Ye Mingxuan guided his mother to recall if anything had been overlooked, ensuring thoroughness.

events.name: Shopping for Warmth Supplies at the Mall
events.description: Ye Mingxuan drove his mother to a large shopping mall in Xiqing District. In the home goods section, he compared the filling materials and fluffiness of several down quilts, ultimately selecting one that was lightweight and warm. In the clothing section, he picked out two sets of soft and breathable thermal underwear for his father. His mother took a liking to a moisturizing hand cream, and Ye Mingxuan directly grabbed two tubes. Throughout the entire process, he patiently explained his reasons for the selections and took charge of carrying all the shopping bags.

events.name: Purchasing Food Ingredients and Medicines at Supermarkets
events.description: After leaving the shopping mall, they proceeded to a nearby large supermarket. Following the shopping list, Ye Mingxuan pushed a cart and shopped with his mother for red dates, Chinese yam, and lamb for winter stews, along with some easy-to-cook semi-prepared dishes. In the pharmaceutical section, he carefully checked the production dates of cold and gastrointestinal medicines, replenishing the family’s first-aid kit. Before checking out, he cross-referenced the items with the list once more to ensure nothing was missed.

events.name: Arranging Items and Father's Feedback
events.description: Upon returning home, Ye Mingxuan carried the heavy bedding and clothing into the house, sorting and organizing them together with his mother. The new down quilt was directly laid out on his father's bed, the food ingredients were placed in the kitchen, and the medicines were returned to their designated spots. He took the newly purchased thermal underwear to his father's room and asked him to try it on. After putting it on, his father moved his arms around and nodded, saying, "It's quite comfortable, not too tight." Ye Mingxuan then asked if there was anything else he needed. After thinking for a moment, his father replied that there was nothing else for now.

events.name: Family Dinner Celebration
events.description: For dinner, mother prepared a lamb hotpot using the ingredients she had purchased, and the whole family enjoyed it together. Ye Mingxuan was in a relaxed mood, ate more than usual, and consequently gained some weight.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relax, get ready to enjoy family time and handle household chores.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Substantial and heartwarming, it provides tangible care and support for the family through concrete actions, fostering a sense of close connection with loved ones.

2025-11.daily_overview: Sunday was a day of passion and creative inspiration. In the morning, Ye Mingxuan focused on refining the design of rehabilitation tableware, completing the design specifications and initiating CAD modeling. In the afternoon, he fulfilled his commitment to Professor Zhao and himself by immersing himself in organizing his ancient coin collection, which brought him inner peace. In the evening, he engaged in relaxing wood sanding, allowing his mind to rest through repetitive manual work.

events.name: Refine the Design Description
events.description: In the morning, after synthesizing the sketch proposals and his father's initial feedback, Ye Mingxuan selected a design direction for further development: a spoon with a thickened middle section of the handle, featuring anti-slip raised texture and an overall gentle S-shaped curve. He created a detailed design specification document on his computer, noting preliminary dimensional parameters, material considerations (wooden main body, with food-grade silicone wrapping at key contact points), and weight targets, providing a clear basis for CAD modeling.

events.name: Launch CAD 3D modeling
events.description: Subsequently, he opened the SolidWorks software and began creating a three-dimensional model. First, he constructed the basic contour lines of the spoon, then generated the solid model based on the annotated dimensions, completing the preliminary transformation from concept to digital model. Looking at the three-dimensional outline on the screen, he felt that the project had entered a familiar engineering track.

events.name: Organizing Ancient Coin Collections
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan put on white gloves, spread a soft cloth on the desk, and carefully took out the ancient coins from the collection box one by one. Using a magnifying glass, he meticulously examined the condition of each coin, gently brushed away the dust with a soft-bristled brush, and made notes on the inventory list. He particularly placed the cherished Qing Dynasty "Guangxu Yuanbao" coin, which he had acquired at a high price in October, into a separate lined coin case, attaching a label to it. Throughout the process, he remained fully focused, temporarily shutting out the distractions of the outside world.

events.name: Enjoy the tranquility of collecting.
events.description: After tidying up, he carefully placed all the ancient coins back into the collection box, which was well-preserved with desiccants. Quietly admiring these metal pieces that carried both history and personal dedication, he felt a rare sense of tranquility and satisfaction. As Professor Zhao had said, this was his "moment of mental relaxation."

events.name: Balcony Woodworking Relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan went to the mini workspace on the balcony and retrieved the unfinished piece of wood—a half-finished side panel for a toolbox. He put on his safety goggles and began the repetitive, meticulous process of sanding with a plane and sandpaper of varying grits. As he listened to the rustling sound of sandpaper against wood and watched the grain gradually become clear and smooth, his mind emptied, and his stress melted away.

起始状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and creative, planning to engage in activities one enjoys.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Calm, content, and full of energy, they have achieved high-quality rest and spiritual nourishment through interests and creativity.

2025-11.daily_overview: The new week begins with damp and chilly rain and snow. Ye Mingxuan's primary focus is on further refining the CAD model of the rehabilitation utensils, with an emphasis on detailed surface and texture design for the spoon handle. At the same time, he has become aware that his fitness routine has significantly decreased recently due to family matters. He proactively contacted his coach to schedule a consultation, demonstrating his ongoing commitment to health management.

events.name: Precision CAD Modeling
events.description: During breaks in the day and in the evenings, Ye Mingxuan continued refining the spoon model in SolidWorks. He employed complex surface tools to meticulously shape the S-curve of the spoon handle to fit the hand's grip, ensuring smooth transitions. Subsequently, he thickened the middle section of the handle and used the array command to generate evenly distributed hemispherical anti-slip bumps. Looking at the increasingly realistic model on the screen, he could almost feel its ergonomic grip.

events.name: Consult a Fitness Coach
events.description: Considering his recent infrequent visits to the gym and the ongoing demands of family responsibilities, Ye Mingxuan contacted Coach Wang Jian from Lamei Fitness Center via WeChat. He briefly explained that his training had become irregular due to caring for his father and scheduled a consultation for tomorrow evening after work, hoping to receive training advice suitable for his current lifestyle. Coach Wang promptly replied, expressing understanding and confirming the appointment time.

events.name: Project Report Revision
events.description: According to the feedback from the leadership last Friday, Ye Mingxuan utilized working hours to supplement the feasibility report with information on the potential cost increase risks associated with adopting the new process, as well as corresponding contingency plans. He resubmitted the revised report.

events.name: Commuting and Weather
events.description: Today, with sleet falling and the roads slippery, Ye Mingxuan drove his commute more cautiously than usual, increasing his one-way travel time by nearly 20 minutes. He turned on the car radio to listen to the news, his mind occupied with thoughts about winter driving safety and ensuring his parents stay warm.

events.name: Increased appetite due to weather conditions.
events.description: The damp and chilly weather led Ye Mingxuan to eat more hot food during dinner, resulting in a slight increase in his weight.

起始状态.心情: Stay composed and prepared for the workweek and inclement weather.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Focus on the progress of design and feel positive about proactively adjusting the health plan.

2025-11.daily_overview: Today was a day of adjusting personal rhythms while managing multiple tasks. Ye Mingxuan has begun to find a balance between work and family, completed the CAD modeling of rehabilitation tableware, and initiated financial adjustments. In the evening, he met with his fitness coach and successfully shifted his training plan from a "gym-dependent" model to a "home-based micro-exercise" routine to adapt to his new life circumstances. Meanwhile, the arrival of a project bonus has alleviated some of his financial pressure.

events.name: Complete CAD modeling and inspection
events.description: Ye Mingxuan conducted a final inspection of the CAD model for the rehabilitation cutlery. Using the software's measurement tools, he verified all critical dimensions, ensured smooth transitions between surfaces without interference, and assigned different material properties to the model (metal spoon head, matte wood-grain handle). He then generated several high-quality renderings. Looking at the final 3D model, he felt that the design phase had been successfully completed, and the project could now proceed to prototype manufacturing.

events.name: Execute the Financial Adjustment Plan
events.description: He logged into his mobile banking and wealth management apps, and following the plan agreed upon with Manager Zhang last week, suspended the scheduled deductions for two index fund investments. At the same time, he prioritized transferring a portion of his salary received this month into his current account to replenish the family’s emergency fund, taking another step toward the goal of covering six months' worth of living expenses.

events.name: Received project bonus
events.description: In the afternoon, a deposit notification popped up on the mobile banking app. Ye Mingxuan opened it and saw that it was the company’s disbursement of the project milestone bonus for the previous quarter, with a substantial amount. This undoubtedly provided a much-needed boost to the family finances, which had recently faced significant expenses. He began planning how to allocate the money.

events.name: Meeting with a fitness coach to adjust the plan
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan drove to the Lamei Fitness Center. In the private training area, he explained in detail to Coach Wang Jian his recent situation of having fragmented time and being unable to guarantee fixed training durations. Coach Wang expressed complete understanding and demonstrated several sets of exercises suitable for home workouts: wall-assisted incline push-ups, chair-assisted squats, resistance band rows, and variations of planks for core activation. He emphasized that the focus should be on "maintenance" and "alleviating tension from prolonged sitting," rather than muscle gain or fat loss.

events.name: Record New Training Program
events.description: Ye Mingxuan carefully noted down the key points of each movement, recommended sets and repetitions, as well as the weekly frequency (suggesting 15-20 minutes per day is sufficient) in his phone memo. Coach Wang also reminded him to keep his father warm during the recovery period and recommended several stretching exercises for the shoulders and neck. The two agreed to follow up by sending training videos via WeChat for simple progress tracking.

起始状态.心情: Organized and prepared to handle multiple planned tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Suddenly enlightened and feeling more in control, I have successfully completed adaptive adjustments in multiple areas (health, finance, design) and feel more confident in facing future challenges.

2025-11.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan officially advanced the design of rehabilitation utensils to the physical prototype verification stage today. Using the company's 3D printer (or his own equipment), he began printing the first batch of spoon handle prototypes, marking a crucial step from virtual models to tangible reality. Meanwhile, he steadily executed his financial plan by transferring a portion of his bonus into an emergency fund.

events.name: Prepare 3D printing files
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan exported the finalized CAD model in STL format and processed it using slicing software. He set a high printing precision, sliced the spoon handle section separately, and generated a G-code file. Considering that the first print was primarily to verify dimensions and grip feel, he opted for standard PLA material.

events.name: Initiate the first round of 3D printing.
events.description: During the lunch break, he transferred the file to the 3D printer (likely in the company's model room or his own at home) and initiated the printing process. The machine began slowly extruding the first layer of material. After setting the parameters, he let the printer continue working throughout the afternoon, planning to retrieve the prototype before leaving work.

events.name: Arrange Bonus Utilization
events.description: He logged into the online banking system and transferred 60% of the bonus received the previous day into a previously set up money market fund account as a supplement to the emergency fund. The remaining portion was planned to cover upcoming insurance premiums and the final payment for household purchases.

events.name: Obtain initial trial feedback from father
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan removed the support material from the 3D-printed prototypes and presented several versions of the spoon handle with different textures to his father for testing. Using his still-capable right hand, Ye Jianguo held these plastic models and simulated scooping motions, providing initial feedback on which thickness felt more "hand-friendly" and which texture offered better anti-slip performance. Ye Mingxuan carefully noted down the responses.

events.name: Try Home Core Training
events.description: In the evening, he tried the 10-minute home core activation training taught by Coach Wang, including glute bridges and bird dogs, and felt his body activated.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to seeing the first physical manifestation of the design concept.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and full of exploratory spirit, the prototype was successfully printed and valuable firsthand user feedback was obtained, validating the feasibility of the design direction.

According to his father's more specific trial feedback, he made precise adjustments to the model's dimensions and curvature in CAD software. Simultaneously, he completed the subsequent allocation of this month's bonus, paid the relevant expenses, and updated his personal accounts, maintaining clear financial records.

events.name: Optimize CAD Models
events.description: Based on feedback from his father's trial of the 3D-printed prototype the previous night (such as "making this part a bit thicker might make it easier to use" and "the curve is a bit tight, causing the little finger to catch"), Ye Mingxuan opened the model file in SolidWorks and made meticulous modifications. He fine-tuned the diameter of the spoon handle's midsection, optimized the curvature of the S-shaped curve, and adjusted the distribution density of the anti-slip bumps. Engineering thinking and user experience were seamlessly integrated at this moment.

events.name: In-depth communication on usage pain points
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan took the before-and-after model renderings and engaged in another in-depth discussion with his father. He guided his father to describe the specific sensations in areas such as the wrist, the space between the thumb and index finger, and the fingertips during simulated eating motions—whether they felt pressure, sliding, or exertion. These details became crucial references for his second round of optimization.

events.name: Payment of Fees and Account Updates
events.description: Using a mobile payment app, he paid the annual premium for his father's medical insurance with the remainder of his bonus and settled some outstanding balances from last week's family purchases of winter supplies. Subsequently, he updated the income and expenditure records for the current month in a spreadsheet on his personal computer, adding entries such as bonus income, emergency fund transfers, insurance payments, and procurement expenses, ensuring clear accounting and transparent cash flow.

events.name: Home-Based Training Implementation
events.description: In the evening, he performed a 15-minute home workout, including resistance band rows and chair squats, maintaining his habit of micro-exercises.

events.name: Staying up late due to intense focus on design.
events.description: While optimizing the model, Ye Mingxuan became too engrossed and stayed up later than planned, but his heart was filled with contentment.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare for design optimization and financial closure.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Meticulous and systematic, the design has been refined to near perfection through iterative optimization, while financial closed-loop management has also been achieved.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Friday evening, Ye Mingxuan scheduled a dedicated period of "interest therapy" for himself. He systematically organized his collection of ancient coins, proceeding from preparing tools to meticulous cleaning, documentation, and archiving. The entire process was imbued with a sense of ritual, allowing him to immerse fully in the details of history and the tranquility of his personal hobby, effectively alleviating the stress accumulated over the week.

events.name: Preparatory Arrangement Work
events.description: After returning home from work, Ye Mingxian first had dinner with his parents. Afterwards, he entered his study, closed the door, and began creating a focused environment for himself. He prepared soft cloths, gloves, a magnifying glass, coin boxes of various specifications, desiccants, and a new notebook, adjusting the desk lamp to ensure the lighting was ample and soft.

events.name: Clean and inspect one by one
events.description: Putting on white gloves, he opened the collection box and, as if performing a ceremony, took out the ancient coins one by one. Using a soft cloth, he gently wiped away the dust on the coin surfaces while carefully examining the details of the patterns, the patina colors, and the edge wear of each coin with the aid of a magnifying glass. In a new notebook, he recorded the collection numbers, names, condition ratings, and his own remarks for each piece.

events.name: Inspect Storage Environment and Refile
events.description: He inspected the condition of the desiccant in each collection box and replaced two packets that had discolored and lost effectiveness. Then, based on the material (silver coins, copper coins), age, and rarity of the ancient coins, he rearranged their placement within the boxes, ensuring that those of higher value were kept separate from one another to avoid damage from contact.

events.name: Online Communication with Fellow Collectors
events.description: During the sorting process, he shared his insights on organization with fellow collector Zhao Jianguo via WeChat and discussed recent market trends, gaining some new perspectives.

events.name: Special Placement of Cherished Coins
events.description: For that exceptionally well-preserved "Guangxu Yuanbao," he admired it once more for a moment, then carefully placed it into an individual transparent coin case with a soft lining. On the lid of the case, he affixed a label that read, "Acquired at auction in October 2025, Extremely Fine condition."

events.name: Enjoy the Quiet Moments
events.description: After completing all the work, he did not tidy up immediately. Instead, he sat quietly in his chair, his gaze sweeping over these neatly arranged collections, and a sense of calm satisfaction and ownership welled up in his heart. This small "spiritual corner" made him feel incredibly grounded.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Slightly weary, looking forward to some alone time and personal interests in the evening.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Deeply relaxed, calm, and content, high-quality psychological restoration and energy replenishment are achieved through immersion in personal hobbies.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday was a day of critical progress for the Rehabilitation Tableware Project. Based on multiple rounds of testing, Ye Mingxuan finalized the design plan together with his father and began preparing for the production of the wooden prototype (consulting with carpenters and purchasing wood materials). Meanwhile, he also spent the afternoon enjoying a relaxing woodworking session and started preparing for his personal review at the end of the month.

events.name: Finalize the Design Plan
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan presented both the improved prototype, which had been reprinted based on his father's feedback, and the old version to his father for comparative testing. After repeatedly holding and simulating the use of the prototypes, his father Ye Jianguo clearly indicated his final preference: "This curvature feels comfortable, the thickness is just right, and it doesn't dig into the hand." Ye Mingxuan finally finalized all the design parameters for the spoon handle.

events.name: Consulting with Carpenters and Selecting Wood Materials
events.description: After deciding to use solid wood for the final product, Ye Mingxuan sent the final design and rendering drawings to Master Qian Jianguo via WeChat, inquiring about which type of wood (such as black walnut, cherry, or hard maple) would be more suitable and the feasibility of handcrafting. Master Qian promptly replied, recommending black walnut for its hard texture and beautiful grain, and arranged for Ye Mingxuan to visit his workshop the following week to examine the wood materials. Meanwhile, Ye Mingxuan also browsed e-commerce platforms, preliminarily selecting several reputable hardwood suppliers.

events.name: Balcony Woodworking Relaxation
events.description: In the afternoon, the sunlight was just right. Ye Mingxuan went to the workstation on the balcony, retrieved the unfinished piece of wood for the toolbox side panel, put on his safety goggles and gloves, and began meticulously sanding it with a plane and sandpaper of varying grits. He focused on the direction of the wood grain and the smoothness of the surface, the repetitive manual motions allowing his mind to clear and enter a state of flow. Over an hour later, the surface of the wood had become as smooth and warm as jade.

events.name: Preparing for the month-end financial review.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan sorted out all the consumption receipts, electronic payment records, and bank statements for November in his study. He preliminarily categorized them by type (medical expenses, home renovation, daily living, insurance, personal hobbies, etc.), ensuring the data was complete and accurate, and making thorough preparations for the next day's monthly review.

events.name: Share progress with family
events.description: He showed his parents the wood he had polished smooth that day and the finalized spoon design. His father expressed anticipation for having custom utensils made by his son's own hands; his mother smiled and said, "My son's craftsmanship is almost on par with that of a master artisan."

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and goal-oriented, ready to advance the project and enjoy some craft time.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Productive and enjoyable, the project has made decisive progress, personal interests have been satisfied, and there is full confidence in tomorrow's review.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the last day of November, Ye Mingxuan concluded the month with rational reflection and pragmatic planning. During the day, he organized and finalized the documentation for the prototype validation phase of the rehabilitation tableware. In the evening, he systematically conducted a monthly household financial review, thoroughly analyzing income and expenses. Based on this analysis, he drafted a more detailed budget plan for December, creating a clear financial blueprint for the upcoming month.

events.name: Conclude the 3D printing prototype phase.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan inspected the final round of printed optimized prototypes, confirming that both the dimensions and tactile feel met expectations. He organized all materials—from sketches and CAD models to multiple rounds of print files and his father’s trial feedback—into a complete project document for archiving. Subsequently, he cleaned the 3D printer and stored the remaining materials, marking the official conclusion of the prototype validation phase. The next step will shift toward the production of solid wood finished products.

events.name: Structured Micro-Health Management Training
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan conducted a 20-minute home workout in his living room, completing a full set of exercises taught by Coach Wang Jian, including core training and low-impact cardio, adapted to the indoor winter environment.

events.name: Monthly Financial Review and Analysis
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened the accounting software on his computer in the study and entered all the prepared November expenditure data, accurately categorizing each item. The software generated a detailed expenditure report and a pie chart. He carefully analyzed the data: the total income was higher than usual due to project bonuses, but the total expenditure had also increased significantly due to his father's medical expenses, home renovation costs, and insurance premiums. He assessed the impact of these irregular expenses on the family's emergency fund and monthly cash flow, concluding that while there was some pressure, it remained manageable and was buffered by the bonuses and adjustments to fixed investments.

events.name: Adjust the December Budget Draft
events.description: Based on the review conducted in November, Ye Mingxuan began adjusting the December budget draft in the budgeting software. He significantly reduced the budget for personal entertainment, dining out, and shopping, while meticulously setting spending limits for food and daily necessities. Additionally, he specifically allocated a dedicated fund for the cost of solid wood materials for rehabilitation utensils and potential processing fees. The budget reflects the principle of "ensuring basic needs, prioritizing rehabilitation, and strictly controlling non-essential expenses."

events.name: Schedule an Annual Financial Review
events.description: As the end of the year approaches, Ye Mingxuan contacted his financial manager Zhang Wei via WeChat to schedule an annual financial review meeting around December 5th. He informed Manager Zhang that he had completed the review of his household income and expenses for November and would prepare comprehensive financial records from the past year to facilitate more thorough planning.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to wrap up and summarize.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Clear, pragmatic, and well-planned, a thorough review of the past month has provided a sober understanding, and a meticulous financial arrangement has been made for the coming month, bringing a sense of stability and control.

2025-12.daily_overview: As the new week and new month began, Ye Mingxuan continued to uphold his micro-exercise habits while shifting his focus outside of work to a detailed review of the family's finances. Leveraging the structured and methodical strengths of his ISTJ personality, he systematically reviewed the outcomes of last month's health management efforts and initiated a one-month family budget and expense tracking plan. This initiative aims to build a more robust financial foundation to prepare for potential future changes in the family's circumstances.

events.name: Monthly Health Management Review
events.description: Before heading to work, Ye Mingxuan briefly reviewed his November "Micro-Health" practice log in his study. The simple stretches during work breaks and evening walks had indeed alleviated the lower back pain caused by prolonged sitting and project-related stress. He realized that this fragmented, proactive management was particularly important during the special period of his father's recovery, serving as an effective strategy to maintain his basic physical fitness and emotional stability. In his notes, he jotted down several areas for optimization, such as increasing the frequency of shoulder and neck relaxation exercises.

events.name: Initiate fine-tuning of the household budget.
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan contacted his financial advisor Zhang Wei via WeChat. He briefly explained the additional household expenses incurred recently due to his father's recovery needs, as well as his intention to optimize short-term cash flow and strengthen monthly budget control without disrupting long-term investment plans such as his existing fund systematic investment plan. He also sought professional adjustment advice from Manager Zhang.

events.name: Create a detailed budget table for December
events.description: After work in the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened the Excel file on his computer. Integrating Manager Zhang's preliminary suggestions, regular household expenses, and his father's specialized rehabilitation costs, he set clear and specific spending limits for December, covering categories such as dining, transportation, entertainment, shopping, and shared household expenses. Being meticulous, he even allocated a small flexible buffer for potential unexpected situations. Once the budget sheet was completed, he printed it out and pinned it to the bulletin board in his study.

events.name: Set up mobile accounting tools
events.description: To ensure the budget could be implemented and tracked in real time, Ye Mingxuan installed a well-reviewed expense-tracking app on his phone. Based on the budget categories he had established, he created corresponding accounts and expense categories within the app (such as "Father's Recovery," "Daily Dining," "Commuting Fuel Costs," etc.) and tested the quick-entry feature to ensure that every expense could be conveniently and accurately recorded going forward.

events.name: Inquire about Family Supplemental Medical Insurance
events.description: Considering Ye Jianguo's age and health condition, Ye Mingxuan deemed it necessary to add an additional layer of protection against family health risks. He once again contacted financial manager Zhang Wei via WeChat, this time to inquire about the necessity of purchasing commercial supplementary medical insurance for his father, a comparison of the features of mainstream products on the market, and the role and positioning of such insurance within the overall family asset allocation.

events.name: Supplementary Event: The lunch break stretching session was interrupted by an impromptu meeting due to overtime work.
events.description: In the afternoon, an urgent technical issue required Ye Mingxuan's involvement for resolution, which occupied the originally scheduled stretching time during the lunch break. He could only briefly move his shoulders, feeling somewhat tense.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a sense of planning for the new week and thoughts on family matters.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Having completed several preliminary financial planning tasks in a substantial and well-organized manner, I feel a heightened sense of control over the family's future.

2025-12.daily_overview: Work proceeded as usual, but Ye Mingxuan devoted more of his attention to communicating with his family and researching insurance. He practiced a "family-oriented" value system, closely integrating professional financial planning with the practical needs of his family. Through patient explanations and communication, he ensured that important family decisions were advanced with consensus. He stayed up late into the night studying insurance terms, leaving him feeling somewhat fatigued.

events.name: Family Budget Plan Briefing Session
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxiang explained the newly established December family budget plan in detail to his parents, Ye Jianguo and Wang Xiulan. He emphasized the areas that required joint attention, such as daily grocery shopping and public expenses like water, electricity, and gas. He also demonstrated a budgeting app and invited his mother to keep records together. His parents expressed understanding and support, with his mother, Wang Xiulan, offering several practical suggestions for saving on expenses.

events.name: Conduct in-depth research on supplementary medical insurance products.
events.description: After receiving the preliminary product analysis from Manager Zhang Wei, Ye Mingxuan did not make an immediate decision. Instead, he spent the evening researching the detailed terms, user reviews, and claim cases of related products on several insurance information platforms. He then compiled his selected 2–3 key products and comparison points (such as coverage scope, deductible, renewal conditions, etc.) and sent them again to Manager Zhang, requesting his final professional advice from the perspectives of financial planning and family risk management.

events.name: Generate an Insurance Purchase Decision Report
events.description: Based on all the information and feedback from Manager Zhang, Ye Mingxuan compiled a concise and clear decision-making report on his computer. The report clearly identified the most suitable product for his father's current situation, listing the reasons for purchasing it, the next steps (online insurance application), and the points to note after the application. This report reflects his rigorous decision-making process as an engineer.

events.name: Communicating with Father about Insurance Purchase Intentions
events.description: After completing the report, Ye Mingxuan went to the living room to communicate with his father, Ye Jianguo, who was watching a competitive variety show. Avoiding complex financial terminology, he explained in plain language the purpose of purchasing this supplementary medical insurance—primarily to cover the out-of-pocket expenses after medical insurance reimbursement and alleviate potential future hospitalization costs. After listening, his father patted him on the shoulder, expressing understanding and support: "You’ve thought it through thoroughly. I’ll follow your advice."

events.name: Supplementary Event: Due to researching insurance until late at night, bedtime was delayed.
events.description: While organizing the insurance report in the evening, Ye Mingxuan immersed himself in the task and did not finish until late at night. Realizing how late it was, he hurriedly washed up and prepared to rest, but his mind remained somewhat active, which slowed his ability to fall asleep.

2025-12.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan translated his research from the past two days into practical action. He successfully purchased an online insurance policy for his father, completing a crucial step in building a financial safety net for his family's health. Meanwhile, at work, the automated production line project entered a critical debugging phase, requiring him to flexibly switch between high-intensity technical challenges and meticulous family responsibilities. Due to overtime work for debugging, he had a simple dinner and experienced a slight weight loss.

events.name: Complete online enrollment for father's supplementary medical insurance
events.description: During the midday break, Ye Mingxuan carefully reviewed the previously filled-out insurance application information for his father, Ye Jianguo, on the official platform of the selected insurance company. He once again read through the key coverage terms, exclusions, and health declaration details line by line. After confirming everything was correct, he completed the premium payment online, successfully purchasing a supplementary medical insurance for his father that covers hospitalization allowances and specific medication costs.

events.name: Check and forward the electronic policy.
events.description: Shortly after the payment was completed, the electronic insurance policy was sent to Ye Mingxuan's email. After downloading it, he carefully verified key information such as the policy number, insured person details, coverage period, and insurance liabilities to ensure accuracy. Subsequently, he forwarded the electronic policy file along with a summary of the key coverage points he had annotated to his father, Ye Jianguo, via WeChat, and left a message reminding his father to check and save the documents.

events.name: Project Debugging: Precision Calibration of Mechanical Transmission Components
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan and his colleague Zhou Tao immersed themselves in the workshop, conducting joint debugging of the mechanical transmission components for the automated production line under their responsibility. Using high-precision equipment such as laser trackers, they repeatedly calibrated the parallelism of key guide rails and the transmission accuracy of lead screws to ensure the stability and reliability of the mechanical motion foundation. The workshop was filled with the scent of machine oil and the smell of metal friction.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Due to overtime work for debugging, dinner was simple and the return home was late.
events.description: Ye Mingxuan and his colleagues encountered a tricky problem during debugging work, and they were busy until 8 p.m. before resolving it. He only had a simple meal at the company cafeteria, feeling somewhat hungry but noticing a slight weight loss due to stress. On his way home, he played an ancient coin collection podcast to relax.

events.name: Supplementary event: Received an impromptu invitation from an online gaming teammate, took a brief break to relax.
events.description: After returning home, Ye Mingxuan received an invitation from his gaming teammate Zheng Kai to play "League of Legends" together for half an hour. This provided him with a temporary escape from work-related stress, though he ended up going to bed slightly later than usual.

Meanwhile, he has also started planning his weekend leisure activities, including a gathering with old friends and a personal treasure hunt at the antique coin market, injecting some relaxation and anticipation into his busy work and life. In the evening, feeling relaxed due to his ample preparations, he went to bed early.

events.name: Organize annual financial materials
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan was busy in his study. He retrieved the quarterly fund reports and bank statements from the previous year from the filing cabinet and accessed the comprehensive annual household income and expenditure Excel spreadsheet he had maintained on his computer. He sorted these materials into categories and placed them into a dedicated folder, ensuring efficient and clear communication during his meeting with Manager Zhang Wei the following day.

events.name: Schedule a weekend gathering with childhood friends
events.description: While organizing materials, Ye Mingxuan realized he hadn't seen his childhood friend Zhang Wei for a while. He reached out to Zhang Wei via WeChat: "Weizi, are you free on Saturday evening? Let's meet at our usual spot for some barbecue skewers?" Zhang Wei quickly replied: "No problem! I was actually thinking of talking to you about the car issue." The two promptly confirmed their meeting for Saturday evening at a frequently visited barbecue restaurant in Xiqing District.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Python Practice During Work Breaks
events.description: The afternoon work had reached a temporary pause, with half an hour left before the end of the workday. Ye Mingxuan did not immediately start packing up. Instead, he opened the Python editor on his computer and ran a small script he had written the previous night for batch processing simulation data. He checked the output results and optimized a logical judgment in the code. This habit of using fragmented time to reinforce his programming skills had been something he had maintained for nearly a year.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Caring for Succulent Plants on the Balcony
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan went to the balcony to check on his potted succulent plants. With winter setting in, he had reduced the frequency of watering. He gently touched the leaves of the "Peach Egg" with his fingers and found them still plump. He then inspected the "Lithops" to confirm there were no signs of etiolation. This brief moment of care brought him a sense of calm and relaxation.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Resting early due to mild cold symptoms
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan felt a slight dryness and itchiness in his throat, likely caused by the dust in the workshop during the day or changes in the weather. He drank a cup of warm water and decided to rest early to avoid worsening his condition.

events.name: Annual Financial Review and Planning Meeting
events.description: Ye Mingxuan took a half-day leave and went to the Private Banking Department of China Merchants Bank Tianjin Branch. In the quiet meeting room, financial manager Zhang Wei presented the performance of his fund portfolio over the past year (with an overall annualized return of approximately 4.2%) using professional charts. Considering the change in the family's risk tolerance due to Ye Mingxuan's father's illness, Zhang Wei suggested appropriately adjusting the asset allocation by increasing the proportion of highly liquid money market funds and stable bond funds to strengthen the family's emergency reserves.

events.name: Refined Calculation of Future Home Purchase Plans
events.description: During this in-depth conversation, Ye Mingxuan proactively discussed his goal of "purchasing a property within five years" with Zhang Wei. Based on Ye Mingxuan's current income, savings rate, expected future income growth, and potential mortgage policies, they conducted a detailed calculation of the timeline for accumulating the down payment and the affordability of monthly mortgage payments. Following the discussion, Ye Mingxuan decided to adjust his home purchase plan to a longer-term vision, shifting the current focus to accumulating the down payment and setting a specific amount for mandatory monthly savings.

events.name: Sign the Asset Allocation Adjustment Document
events.description: After agreeing with Zhang Wei's new allocation strategy of "prioritizing stability with moderate defense," Ye Mingxuan carefully reviewed the relevant fund conversion agreements and authorization documents. After confirming their accuracy, he signed them on the spot. This means he will convert a portion of high-risk equity funds into more stable money market funds and bond funds.

events.name: Communicating the New Family Financial Plan to Parents
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan conveyed the key points of his discussion with the financial advisor during the day to his parents, Ye Jianguo and Wang Xiulan, in simple and understandable language: the investments had become more secure, the family's "emergency fund" had grown, and there was no rush to buy a house—they would take it step by step. After hearing this, both parents nodded in agreement. His father, Ye Jianguo, said, "You're the expert when it comes to financial management. We trust you." Once again, the family reached a consensus on major financial directions.

events.name: Schedule a follow-up appointment for father on the weekend.
events.description: After the meal, Ye Mingxuan contacted the family doctor Liu Wentao via WeChat to schedule a follow-up appointment for his father on Sunday morning (December 7). He briefly explained that his father's recent recovery had been stable, but there was a bottleneck in finger flexibility training, and he hoped the doctor could provide further guidance.

events.name: Confirm Weekend Gathering Arrangements
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan once again confirmed the specific time and address of the barbecue restaurant for tomorrow's gathering with Zhang Wei on WeChat. Zhang Wei also sent a screenshot, reminding him that the temperature might be lower tomorrow evening and suggesting he wear more clothes.

events.name: Supplementary event: As my cold improved, I ate more of my mother's braised pork for dinner.
events.description: During dinner, Ye Mingxuan felt that his health had improved considerably. His mother had specially prepared his favorite braised pork. He ate a few more bites than usual and felt that he had gained a little weight.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: With a touch of anticipation and a somewhat formal tone, preparing for an important financial discussion.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom, Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: With a sense of relief and confidence, the fog surrounding family finances has been cleared, the direction is now clear, and communication with family members is smooth and pleasant.

state.今日运动: It takes about 40 minutes to walk to and from the bank and handle the necessary matters.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny to cloudy, with increasing winds in the afternoon.
