2025-12.daily_overview: The weekend unfolded in a balance between family responsibilities and personal life. In the morning, I accompanied my father for a follow-up examination, witnessing steady progress in his recovery. In the afternoon, I began implementing a new financial plan. In the evening, I reunited with childhood friends, rekindling old bonds over barbecue and beer, and unexpectedly gained potential support for a personal project. Due to the substantial meal, my weight increased.

events.name: Accompanying father for monthly rehabilitation follow-up examination
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan took leave again to accompany his father, Ye Jianguo, to the hospital for a monthly rehabilitation follow-up examination. The attending physician carefully assessed his father's limb mobility and muscle strength recovery, concluding that the overall rehabilitation progress was stable. However, it was emphasized that daily training must be continued, particularly focusing on fine motor exercises for the fingers. Ye Mingxuan used the memo app on his phone to meticulously record the doctor's new recommendations and the key points of several new rehabilitation exercises.

events.name: Set up and initiate monthly forced savings.
events.description: After returning home from the hospital, Ye Mingxuan immediately opened his mobile banking app. Following the monthly mandatory savings goal he had agreed upon with Zhang Wei the day before yesterday, he set up a recurring transfer scheduled to execute automatically on the day after each payday. Simultaneously, he created a savings goal tracker in his phone’s calendar app and set up monthly reminders to monitor progress. The new financial plan officially took effect from today.

events.name: Plan the Trip to the Antique Market Tomorrow
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan sat in front of the computer in his study, checking the opening hours of the Tianjin Drum Tower Antique Market on Sundays (usually from morning to afternoon). He also browsed several collector forums to see if any fellow collectors had recently mentioned special coin markets there. Next, he opened a map app to plan the most convenient subway transfer route from his home to the market. Finally, he opened his collection notebook to review the condition requirements for the "Open Shell" variety of the "Yuan Datou Coin from the Third Year of the Republic of China" and its current approximate market price expectations.

events.name: Weekend Barbecue Gathering with Childhood Friend Zhang Wei
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan drove to the barbecue restaurant where he had arranged to meet Zhang Wei. The two ordered a pile of skewers and several bottles of beer. Zhang Wei excitedly talked about a large auto show he had visited the previous week, praising the intelligent driving features of several domestic new energy vehicles. Ye Mingxuan, on the other hand, shared updates on his father's recovery and mentioned that he was combining his mechanical knowledge to explore ways to improve rehabilitation aids for his father. Upon hearing this, Zhang Wei’s eyes lit up, and he mentioned that he had a friend working at a medical equipment sales company who might be able to provide product information or connections. He offered to help make the contact. The two also reminisced about their childhood antics, such as raiding bird nests and playing marbles in the community garden, laughing heartily throughout the conversation.

events.name: Supplementary event: After drinking at a gathering, I felt slightly dizzy upon returning home and went to bed late.
events.description: After the gathering, Ye Mingxuan drove home (without drinking alcohol), but he had consumed some beer during the meal and felt a bit dizzy. After washing up, he lay in bed, reminiscing about the conversations with his old friends, and did not fall asleep until late at night.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relax and prepare to handle weekend family and personal matters.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, the results of my father's follow-up examination are reassuring. The reunion with old friends was pleasant and brought unexpected potential support, though I feel somewhat fatigued.

state.今日运动: Accompanying my father for medical treatment, I walked quite a bit, approximately 5,000 steps.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday was packed with multiple tasks: accompanying my father for an important community follow-up appointment and obtaining professional rehabilitation guidance; maintaining my personal German study routine; conducting a strict weekly budget review; and simultaneously preparing for the upcoming workweek and technical seminar. This was Ye Mingxuan's typical "productive" day off. Due to staying up late the night before, he felt slightly drowsy upon waking up early.

events.name: German Situational Dialogue Practice
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Ye Mingxuan spent half an hour sitting at his desk studying German. He envisioned a work scenario: needing to explain a mechanical assembly detail to engineers from a German partner via email. He drafted several key technical descriptions and inquiry sentences, then used the shadowing function of a language learning app to repeatedly practice pronunciation until he felt it was clear and accurate.

events.name: Assist father in preparing for community follow-up medical appointment
events.description: After breakfast, Ye Mingxuan helped his father Ye Jianguo organize the medical insurance card and previous medical records, and checked whether the walker used daily was stable. He had already looked up the bus route and estimated travel time to the Zhongbei Town Community Health Service Center in Xiqing District on his phone in advance to ensure a smooth journey.

events.name: Accompanying Father for Community Follow-up and Consultation
events.description: Ye Mingxuan accompanied his father to the community health service center by bus. In the consultation room, Dr. Liu Wentao conducted a detailed examination for Ye Jianguo, with a particular focus on assessing the safety conditions following the home-based aging-friendly modifications (such as the installation of handrails). He also made slight adjustments to the rehabilitation training plan, adding some engaging finger exercises. Ye Mingxuan specifically inquired about the precautions for correctly using a walking aid at home when navigating slopes and crossing thresholds. Dr. Liu provided highly practical demonstrations and advice on the matter.

events.name: Implementation of Medical Orders and Discharge Communication
events.description: After the follow-up appointment, Ye Mingxuan went to the pharmacy to pick up some newly prescribed traditional Chinese medicine for promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis. On the way home, he called his mother, Wang Xiulan, from the car to convey the doctor’s new recommendations. Once home, the family sat together as Ye Mingxuan demonstrated the finger exercises taught by Dr. Liu to his parents. They then discussed how to better integrate the new training into his father’s daily routine.

events.name: Weekly Budget Execution Review
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan opened the budgeting app on his phone and reviewed the budget chart posted on the wall, going over all the expenses from the past week (December 1-7). He checked each item one by one and found that the "Dining" and "Family Healthcare" categories had slightly exceeded the budget due to dining out with colleagues and purchasing nutritional supplements for his father. He briefly analyzed the reasons for the overspending in his notebook and decided to exercise a bit more control over "Entertainment and Dining" in the following week.

events.name: Receive resource information recommended by childhood friends
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan received a WeChat message from Zhang Wei, which included a contact card and a voice message: "Mingxuan, this is my friend Manager Li who sells medical equipment. I told him about your situation, and he is quite interested in the assistive devices you designed yourself. He said you could have a chat. Add him and see." Ye Mingxuan replied with thanks and added Manager Li's contact information.

events.name: Supplementary event: Due to fatigue, I rested early in the evening, but performed brief stretching before sleep.
events.description: After completing all his tasks, Ye Mingxuan felt some soreness in his body, likely due to the increased activity over the weekend. He performed a 10-minute neck and shoulder stretch before lying down to rest early.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm but slightly drowsy, with the day's schedule all planned out.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet with a strong sense of accomplishment, having completed multiple family and personal tasks and obtained new resource leads.

state.今日运动: Accompanied my father for a follow-up medical appointment, walked approximately 3,000 steps, and performed 10 minutes of stretching exercises in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with a slight improvement in air quality.

2025-12.daily_overview: The new week commenced amidst the intense final debugging phase of the project. Ye Mingxuan collaborated with his team members to resolve several challenging issues that emerged during the joint debugging process. Concurrently, he also prepared for tomorrow's online technical seminar and attended to personal matters scheduled for this week, such as following up on rehabilitation assistive device resources, demonstrating his ability to multitask effectively. Due to work-related stress, he experienced a slight weight loss.

events.name: Final Joint Commissioning and Startup of Automated Production Line
events.description: As soon as he started work, Ye Mingxuan gathered Zhou Tao and Li Xiang in the workshop to initiate the final joint debugging of the automated production line. They operated the equipment according to the full process and quickly identified issues: a robotic arm occasionally jammed while gripping workpieces, and multiple sensor signals exhibited slight delays. Ye Mingxuan was responsible for monitoring the overall status, while Zhou Tao and Li Xiang recorded abnormalities on the mechanical and electrical sides, respectively. The three of them promptly compiled the first version of the problem list.

events.name: Collaborative efforts to resolve joint debugging issues
events.description: Regarding the list of issues, the three individuals divided the tasks and collaborated. Ye Mingxuan and Zhou Tao focused on investigating mechanical jamming and discovered insufficient lubrication and minor foreign particles on a certain guide rail. They promptly cleaned the area and reapplied lubricating grease. Meanwhile, Li Xiang inspected the PLC program in the electrical cabinet and identified that an overly complex logic judgment was causing slow response times. He optimized the program structure, and the signal delay issue was immediately resolved. Throughout the afternoon, the workshop was filled with the sounds of tools and the rapid technical exchanges among the three.

events.name: Prepare for tomorrow's online seminar
events.description: Before leaving work, Ye Mingxuan checked his company emails and confirmed the access link and meeting password for the online seminar on "Digital Twin" scheduled for tomorrow afternoon. He added the link to his calendar reminder and tested the headphones and microphone on his computer to ensure smooth participation in the meeting tomorrow.

events.name: Organize Project Technical Documentation
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan spent an hour organizing project documents in his study. He backed up the mechanical drawings modified during today's debugging, the electrical wiring diagrams, and the PLC program segments optimized by Li Xiang, and systematically archived them into the project folder. This was part of his standard procedure for the final project acceptance and subsequent maintenance.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Initial Contact with Manager Li of Medical Devices
events.description: During a break, Ye Mingxuan sent a brief greeting and self-introduction via WeChat to Manager Li, whom Zhang Wei had recommended. He mentioned that he is a mechanical engineer currently working on designing simple rehabilitation aids for his family, and expressed his hope for an opportunity to exchange ideas and learn. The other party politely replied, welcoming the exchange.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Noon stretching was overlooked due to intense debugging work.
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan and his colleagues were busy with debugging and had no time for a midday stretching break. He felt some stiffness in his shoulders but could only endure it for the time being.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Focused and slightly stressed, aware that this week is the critical period for the project's breakthrough.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Though physically exhausted, the sense of accomplishment from resolving the critical debugging issue alleviated the fatigue.

state.今日运动: Equipment debugging and maintenance in the workshop constitute a moderate-intensity physical activity, lasting approximately 5 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with warm winter sunshine, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-12.daily_overview: The project has entered the final stage of stress testing and internal review. Ye Mingxuan led the team in successfully passing the rigorous continuous operation test and flawlessly demonstrated the project outcomes before senior leadership. This day served as a concentrated showcase of technical capabilities and marked the prelude to the team receiving recognition for months of hard work. Due to the tension of the testing day, appetite was generally subdued, resulting in a slight weight loss.

events.name: Full Load Pressure Test for Automated Production Line
events.description: Throughout the entire day, Ye Mingxuan's team conducted an eight-hour full-load stress test on their repaired and optimized automated production line. They simulated the highest-intensity production rhythm, keeping the equipment running uninterrupted. Ye Mingxuan remained stationed at the main control console, monitoring the overall operational status and various performance metrics; Zhou Tao, holding an infrared thermometer, regularly checked the temperature rise of key bearings and motors; while Li Xiang kept a close eye on the computer screen, recording the stability and response speed of the control system under different loads. By the end of the test, the system was running smoothly with no fault alarms.

events.name: Internal Review and Reporting of Project Outcomes
events.description: After the afternoon testing concluded, Ye Mingxuan, Zhou Tao, and Li Xiang, without taking a break, immediately proceeded to present the project results to their direct supervisor Gao Zhiyuan and project manager Wang Peng. As the primary presenter, Ye Mingxuan showcased the stable data from the stress tests and provided a detailed explanation of the issues encountered during the debugging process, along with the corresponding solutions. Engineer Gao and Manager Wang expressed high satisfaction with the team’s problem-solving capabilities and the final outcomes, and preliminarily confirmed the final version and timeline for delivery to the client.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Technical Chat During Lunch Break
events.description: During lunch, Ye Mingxuan, Zhou Tao, and Li Xiang sat together at a table in the cafeteria. Having relaxed, they stopped discussing work and instead shifted to talking about a bug Zhou Tao had encountered recently while learning a new simulation software, as well as Li Xiang's plan to upgrade his computer configuration. Ye Mingxuan shared an article he had read the previous night about new materials for 3D printing.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Brief Communication with Father After Work
events.description: Returning home from work, Ye Jianguo was in the living room exercising his fingers with a newly learned mobile game. Ye Mingxuan went over to watch for a while, and his father proudly showed him the level he had just passed. Ye Mingxuan offered a few words of encouragement and asked about his father's experience with the finger exercises that day. His father mentioned that the new finger exercises were a bit challenging, but he was willing to keep trying.

events.name: Supplementary event: Ate less for dinner due to test pressure.
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan felt somewhat tired and had a poor appetite. His mother prepared steamed sea bass, but he only ate a little, feeling that his weight had slightly decreased due to stress.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: With a mix of tension and anticipation, today marks the "final exam" before the project acceptance.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: A profound sense of accomplishment and relief, as the core work of the project has been successfully completed and recognized, feeling as if a heavy burden has been lifted from the shoulders.

2025-12.daily_overview: This was a highlight moment in Ye Mingxuan's career. The project he led received the highest honor at the company's quarterly review meeting, and he was personally awarded substantial material rewards. His sense of professional achievement reached its peak, resonating with the joy of his family. At the same time, he began contemplating how to translate this success into more practical assistance for his family—starting to design specialized rehabilitation training tools for his father. Due to celebratory gatherings, his weight increased.

events.name: Received the Intermediate Qualification Certificate for the Computer Technology and Software Professional Technical Qualification Examination.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan received the long-awaited EMS parcel. Upon opening it, he found the "Professional Technical Qualification Certificate for Software Designer (Intermediate Level)." The bright red certificate bore the national emblem and the seals of two ministries. He carefully verified the information such as his name and ID number, and after confirming everything was correct, he solemnly placed the certificate into the certificate folder in his study. He then took a photo and posted it on his WeChat Moments, visible only to close family and friends, with the caption: "A small milestone."

events.name: Attend the Company's Fourth Quarter Project Summary and Recognition Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, the company held a grand quarterly review meeting. As the core leader of the [Automated Production Line Intelligent Upgrade Project], Ye Mingxuan delivered a final results presentation to the company's senior management and key client representatives. His clear logic, solid data, and composed stage presence earned rounds of applause.

events.name: The project was awarded the Annual Star Project and received an individual bonus.
events.description: At the climax of the meeting, the company's general manager announced that Ye Mingxuan's team's project was selected as the "Star Project" of the year. Project manager Wang Peng specifically praised Ye Mingxuan for his key contributions to mechanical structure optimization and on-site debugging during his speech on stage. Subsequently, Ye Mingxuan was invited to the stage, where he received an honorary certificate and a substantial project bonus equivalent to two months' salary. In the audience, Zhou Tao and Li Xiang applauded excitedly.

events.name: Project Team Celebration Dinner
events.description: After the commendation meeting, Ye Mingxuan hosted a dinner for all members of the project team (including Zhou Tao, Li Xiang, Gao Zhiyuan, and others) at a nice restaurant near the company. The atmosphere was lively during the meal, with everyone toasting to the great success of the project and reminiscing about the highs and lows of the past few months. Gao Zhiyuan privately said to Ye Mingxuan, "You did an excellent job this time. The senior management of the company has taken note of you."

events.name: Sharing Career Joy with Family
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Ye Mingxuan showed his parents the award certificate and the text message notification confirming the receipt of the prize money. His mother, Wang Xiulan, was overjoyed and couldn't stop smiling, repeatedly saying, "My son is truly amazing." Although his father, Ye Jianguo, didn't say much, his eyes were filled with approval and pride. Dinner was exceptionally sumptuous, with his mother preparing his favorite dishes: braised pork and steamed sea bass.

events.name: The idea of designing a rehabilitation device for my father began to take shape.
events.description: After dinner, watching his father struggle to pick up food with still somewhat inflexible fingers, Ye Mingxuan felt a sudden inspiration. He took his father's hand and carefully inquired about his specific sensations during finger grip strength training, the desired outcomes he hoped to achieve, and the inconveniences he felt with the existing tools. Based on his father's feedback, a preliminary concept for a "finger grip strength rehabilitation device" that combined simple mechanical principles with human-centered design began to take shape in his mind.

events.name: Supplementary event: After overeating at a gathering, I felt an increase in weight upon returning home.
events.description: During the celebratory dinner, Ye Mingxuan enjoyed a variety of delicious dishes and also drank some wine. After returning home, he felt somewhat full and realized that his weight might have increased due to his diet.

起始状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: A faint sense of excitement and anticipation, with a premonition that today will be an important day.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of honor, happiness, and renewed motivation, professional achievements have been recognized, the family shares in the joy, and a new direction has been found to give back to the family with professional skills.

state.今日运动: No specific sports activities, primarily focusing on meetings and dining events.

2025-12.daily_overview: After the bonus was credited, Ye Mingxuan promptly incorporated it into the family financial plan, transferring the funds into a dedicated reserve account established for his parents' healthcare needs. Simultaneously, he actively participated in industry technical seminars to absorb cutting-edge knowledge. During work breaks, he not only registered for a community rehabilitation assistive device exhibition but also officially launched the rehabilitation equipment project designed for his father, completing the transition from conceptualization to preliminary design. Due to continued dietary habits, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Confirming the Arrival of Project Bonuses and Planning Their Use
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan received a bank notification that his project bonus had been fully credited. He immediately contacted his financial manager, Zhang Wei, to inform him of this additional income. He explicitly expressed his intention to transfer the majority of this amount, along with a portion of the family's previously reserved emergency funds, into the "Family Medical and Rehabilitation Special Account," which is jointly managed with Zhang Wei. This is intended to serve as a long-term reserve for his parents' future health-related expenses. He also requested Zhang Wei to formulate a stable asset allocation strategy for this purpose.

events.name: Execute special fund transfer
events.description: After receiving Zhang Wei's confirmation of the plan, Ye Mingxuan logged into his mobile banking app and executed several transfers: first, he redeemed the family emergency fund reserved in Alipay's Yu'ebao to his bank card. Once the funds arrived, he transferred them, along with the project bonus he had just received, into the designated family medical expense account. After completing the operations, he sent a WeChat message to Zhang Wei for confirmation, feeling that he had built another solid "financial breakwater" for his family.

events.name: Participate in the "Digital Twin" Online Technical Seminar
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan joined the online seminar on time. He listened attentively to the expert's explanation of practical cases of digital twin technology in equipment predictive maintenance and took detailed notes. Midway through, his father asked him to help pour some water, so he briefly stepped away but quickly returned and caught up with the progress. The cutting-edge perspectives shared during the seminar greatly inspired him.

events.name: Digest seminar knowledge and relate it to practice
events.description: After the seminar concluded, Ye Mingxuan downloaded all the materials shared by the organizers. As he browsed through the PowerPoint presentations, he recalled the scenes he witnessed during his visit to the "Lighthouse Factory" in Beijing earlier this year. He attempted to compare the concepts of "digital twin" and "predictive maintenance" with his company's existing equipment management methods, contemplating potential application entry points.

events.name: Sign Up for the Community Rehabilitation Assistive Device Creative Exhibition
events.description: Recalling the simple training spoon he had previously designed for his father, Ye Mingxuan consulted family doctor Liu Wentao via WeChat to inquire whether there was a platform for showcasing or exchanging such ideas. With Dr. Liu's enthusiastic recommendation, he contacted the organizers of a community public welfare project in Xiqing District and successfully registered to participate in the offline exhibition segment of the "Rehabilitation Assistive Device Creative Collection" event this Sunday.

events.name: Refined Design Plan for Finger Rehabilitation Device
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan temporarily set aside the materials from the seminar and devoted himself entirely to the design of the rehabilitation device. He finalized the core solution: an adjustable-grip aluminum alloy main body, providing progressive resistance through springs with different stiffness coefficients, and integrated with a mechanical counter. He conducted an online preliminary screening of the materials and standard parts that might be required (such as aluminum alloy profiles, springs, bearings, and silicone sleeves) and estimated that the approximate cost of the first prototype would fall within an acceptable range.

events.name: Supplementary event: Received an online Python course completion certificate and shared it with fellow student Xu Ming.
events.description: At noon, Ye Mingxuan received an email confirming that he had completed a six-month online Python data analysis course and obtained a certificate of completion. He shared the news with his fellow learner Xu Ming via WeChat, and the two briefly exchanged their learning experiences.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and efficient, and plan to handle several parallel tasks well.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Enriched and innovative, it has not only effectively managed financial and technical learning but also taken substantive steps in personal projects.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today marked a significant moment of professional reflection. The morning's performance review brought news of a deferred promotion. Though initially disheartened, Ye Mingxuan quickly adjusted his mindset through candid communication with his superior and his own rational contemplation. He chose to confide in friends and began to pragmatically plan his future career path. Concurrently, he continued to advance his personal projects, initiating the 3D modeling work for a rehabilitation device. Due to emotional fluctuations, his appetite was average, resulting in a slight weight gain.

events.name: Update Personal Resume
events.description: After arriving at the company in the morning, Ye Mingxuan took advantage of the time before work began to open his personal resume file on the computer. He solemnly added "Software Designer (Intermediate Level)" under the "Professional Skills and Certifications" section. He contemplated the significance of this certificate: it not only served as proof of his digital capabilities in his current mechanical engineering role but could also serve as an additional asset for a potential future transition into industrial software or smart manufacturing.

events.name: Sharing Insights from Technical Seminars with Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Ye Mingxuan carried his tray and sat down next to Zhou Tao and Li Xiang. He briefly shared the content of yesterday's "digital twin" seminar and proposed an idea: "What do you think—could we try building a simple digital model for the production line we just delivered, to use for fault simulation?" This topic immediately sparked a lively discussion among the three of them.

events.name: Annual Performance Review and Career Development Discussion
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan was called into the office of his direct supervisor, Gao Zhiyuan, for his annual performance review. Engineer Gao first highly commended his outstanding performance throughout the year, particularly in the automated production line project. However, Engineer Gao also candidly informed him that, as Ye Mingxuan had devoted a significant portion of his energy to family matters (his father's illness) this year, his engagement in cross-departmental collaboration and technological innovation proposals had somewhat declined. As a result, the promotion review committee decided to postpone his application for promotion to senior engineer this time. Engineer Gao emphasized that the company understood and respected his choice to prioritize family, promising to prioritize a reassessment in the first half of the next year. He also encouraged Ye Mingxuan to take a more proactive role in some forward-looking technology pre-research projects once his family situation stabilized.

events.name: Processing Information and Seeking Emotional Support
events.description: After the interview, Ye Mingxuan returned to his workstation with mixed feelings. He felt a sense of disappointment but also understood that the company's decision was based on an overall performance evaluation. He made a brief phone call to his mother, calmly explaining the situation. After work, he took the initiative to invite his childhood friend Zhang Wei for dinner, hoping to talk with a friend.

events.name: Confiding in a childhood friend and receiving encouragement
events.description: That evening, at another barbecue restaurant they frequented in Xiqing District, Ye Mingxuan told Zhang Wei about the results of his daytime performance review. Zhang Wei comforted him, saying, "Buddy, your family matters are important, and it's understandable that the company made this decision. With your technical skills, you'll definitely succeed next year! Besides, you've already received your bonus and completed the project, so there's no rush." The straightforward and sincere encouragement from his friend made Ye Mingxuan feel much better, and the two began to chat more casually about other topics.

events.name: Initiate 3D modeling of the core components of the rehabilitation device.
events.description: Upon returning home, though somewhat tired, Ye Mingxuan still opened the SolidWorks software on his computer. He transformed the ideas he had developed over the past few days into specific digital models and began designing the core components of the rehabilitation device: the main frame, the sliding handle slider, the spring connection mechanism, and others. He focused on ensuring smooth and error-free assembly relationships and motion trajectories between the components, working until late at night to complete the preliminary modeling of the main structure.

events.name: Supplementary event: Due to feeling low, I ate little for dinner but drank hot milk before going to bed.
events.description: After the evening gathering, Ye Mingxuan returned home feeling somewhat downhearted and only ate a little. Before going to bed, he drank a cup of warm milk to help himself relax, but his weight had increased slightly due to his diet.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Maintain a calm mindset and prepare for a routine workday.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: After experiencing emotional fluctuations, one tends to become calm and pragmatic. Having accepted a temporary adjustment in the pace of career development, attention has now shifted to specific technical practices (modeling) in pursuit of certainty and a sense of achievement.

2025-12.daily_overview: The weekend atmosphere was relaxed and pleasant. In the morning, the final assembly and optimization of the rehabilitation training spoon designed for my father were completed. At noon, I attended a celebratory banquet filled with laughter and joy with my project teammates. In the evening, I brought the joy home to share with my parents. This was a reward for the hard work over the past period and a natural expression of family warmth. Due to the celebratory meal, my weight increased.

events.name: Complete the final assembly and testing of the rehabilitation training spoon.
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan carefully assembled the adjustable nylon wrist strap purchased online with a self-made metal connector at the workbench in his study. He embedded it into the pre-cut groove on the spoon handle and secured it firmly with wood glue. Next, he experimented by placing varying numbers of small steel balls into the hidden counterweight compartment inside the handle. After repeatedly testing the balance, he finally determined the optimal counterweight arrangement that provided the most balanced and effortless grip for his father.

events.name: Final Processing and Inspection of Wooden Spoons
events.description: After the assembly test was completed, Ye Mingxuan evenly applied food-grade wood wax oil to this meticulously crafted beechwood spoon. Once the oil had penetrated the wood and dried slightly, he gently sanded the surface with fine sandpaper to make it smoother and more refined. Finally, he conducted a comprehensive inspection to ensure the spoon body was free of burrs, the wrist strap connection was secure, and the counterweight was appropriate. A rehabilitation training spoon that combined both functionality and aesthetic appeal was finally completed.

events.name: Prepare Community Exhibition Activity Materials
events.description: He placed the training spoon into a small wooden box lined with soft cloth, then printed several design sketches, a simple instruction manual, and an introduction to the design concept. He organized all these materials into a portable document folder, making thorough preparations for the community exhibition scheduled for the next day.

events.name: Project Team Celebration Dinner
events.description: On Saturday evening, Ye Mingxuan, Zhou Tao, Li Xiang, and Gao Zhiyuan gathered as planned at an authentic mala xiangguo restaurant in Xiqing District. Engineer Gao raised his glass first, expressing gratitude to the team, especially for Ye Mingxuan's leadership. During the meal, everyone tacitly avoided work-related topics. Zhou Tao shared the amusing mistakes he encountered while learning Python, Li Xiang complained about the simulation software always crashing at critical moments, and Ye Mingxuan recounted the interesting story of making a wooden spoon. The atmosphere was relaxed and harmonious, and the team's bond grew stronger through shared honors and laughter.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Family Meals
events.description: After the dinner gathering, Ye Mingxuan packed up some untouched dishes that his parents enjoyed and brought them home. His parents were still awake, waiting for him in the living room while watching TV. He opened the takeout containers and briefly shared the joyful atmosphere of the evening gathering. Looking at the food he brought back, his mother Wang Xiulan smiled and said, "It's good for you young people to get together, but you should also take care of your health." His father nodded in agreement. The simple conversation was filled with the warmth of family.

events.name: Refine the 3D design details of the rehabilitation device
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan opened his computer again and, based on the model from the previous day, added a knob for adjusting resistance, a scale indicating grip position, and anti-slip texture to the handles of the rehabilitation device. He meticulously annotated all key dimensions, machining tolerances, and assembly sequence instructions in the engineering drawing, ensuring that the design could clearly guide subsequent processing and manufacturing—whether done by himself or outsourced.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Video call with carpenter Qian Jianguo to consult on assistive device fabrication.
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan contacted carpenter Qian Jianguo via WeChat video, presented the design sketch of the rehabilitation device, and sought advice on wood selection and connection methods. Master Qian patiently provided answers, recommended the use of ash wood, and arranged for him to visit the workshop next week for hands-on learning.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom, Home at No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, looking forward to the weekend gathering and the satisfaction of completing the handmade project.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Content and joyful, having completed a cherished work, enjoyed the camaraderie of comrades, and felt the warmth of family all in a single day, the heart is full.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday is a day that intertwines hobby exploration, social engagement, and family practice. In the morning, he enjoys the pleasure of collecting at the antique market; in the afternoon, he showcases his creativity and receives feedback at a community event; in the evening, he brings his designs back to the family setting for validation and initiates optimization. At the same time, he conducts a financial review and preliminary career planning, making his life both fulfilling and well-structured. Due to prolonged design work, he experiences soreness in his back and waist, while his weight remains unchanged.

events.name: A "Treasure Hunt" at the Drum Tower Antique Market
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan took the subway to the Tianjin Drum Tower Antique Market. He moved with ease among various coin stalls, carefully examining the edge serrations and patina of several "Yuan Datou" silver coins using his high-powered magnifying glass, and discussing recent silver coin market trends with Lao Li, a familiar stall owner. Although he did not come across any particularly desirable coins, he unexpectedly discovered an old book about the minting history of the "Tianjin Machinery Bureau" at a used book stall. The book was in good condition and contained professional content. After some bargaining, he purchased it with satisfaction.

events.name: Mid-Term Review and Adjustment of Budget Execution
events.description: After returning home at noon, Ye Mingxuan checked his budgeting app and found that with half the month gone, nearly 80% of the "entertainment and dining out" budget had been spent on gatherings with his team and childhood friends the previous week. He decided that for the remaining half of the month, he would reduce one unplanned meal with colleagues unless absolutely necessary, and if such gatherings did occur, he would opt for more affordable restaurants. He recorded this adjustment in the remarks column of his budget spreadsheet.

events.name: Community Rehabilitation Assistive Device Creative Exhibition and Exchange
events.description: In the afternoon, Ye Mingxuan brought the rehabilitation training spoon he had designed to the Xiqing District Community Activity Center. Introduced by family doctor Liu Wentao, he presented the design concept of the spoon (featuring anti-slip properties, a wrist strap for secure handling, and suitability for individuals with hand weakness) to some attending patients' family members, community rehabilitation therapists, and interested residents. He also demonstrated its usage on-site. A therapist offered an interesting suggestion to "consider adding a temperature-sensing indicator to the handle," which Ye Mingxuan carefully noted down.

events.name: Assistive Device Trial and Feedback Collection in Home Settings
events.description: After the demonstration event, Ye Mingxuan brought the training spoon home. During dinner, he asked his father, Ye Jianguo, to use the new spoon to eat. He carefully observed his father's grip posture, the smoothness of scooping food, and the comfort of his wrist. After trying it, his father said, "It's easier to hold than a regular spoon and doesn't slip easily, but the strap (wristband) is a bit stiff and digs into the wrist."

events.name: Record Design Optimization Points
events.description: Based on his father's direct feedback, Ye Mingxuan immediately noted in his engineering notebook: "V1.0 Optimization Points: 1. The curvature of the spoon handle needs fine-tuning according to the user's hand shape; 2. Replace the wrist strap material with softer, skin-friendly silicone or a fleece lining; 3. Explore the feasibility of temperature-sensing prompts on the handle (long-term)." This firsthand user feedback is crucial for iterative optimization.

events.name: Preliminary consideration of professional priorities for the next quarter
events.description: In the evening, Ye Mingxuan reviewed the completed projects and the content of the performance appraisal interview. He began to consider which aspects he could focus on at work in the next quarter while balancing family responsibilities, such as delving deeper into a specific simulation software or proactively exploring whether there are any internal technical pre-research projects related to "predictive maintenance" that he could participate in, in order to accumulate capital for next year's re-evaluation.

events.name: Share Gains with Fellow Collectors Online
events.description: Before going to bed, Ye Mingxuan sent photos and a brief description of the old books he had acquired that day to his fellow collector Zhao Jianguo in Xi'an via WeChat, and mentioned the latest controversy about a specific edition of the Yuan Datou coin he had heard at the market. The two engaged in a professional online discussion until late at night.

events.name: Supplementary event: Due to prolonged design work, experiencing soreness and stiffness in the lower back and waist, hot compress and stretching were applied.
events.description: During the evening design optimization session, Ye Mingxuan felt stiffness and soreness in his lumbar muscles, a mild recurrence of a previous strain. He promptly stood up to move around, applied a hot water bottle for heat therapy, and performed a 10-minute lumbar stretch, which alleviated the symptoms.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 128, Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and full of anticipation, planning a day of personal interests and social activities.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, from personal interests to social engagement and family practices, all have received positive feedback and sparked new reflections, though some lower back discomfort slightly affected the mood.

state.今日运动: Walked approximately 6,000 steps at the antique market in the morning and did 10 minutes of stretching in the evening.

2025-12.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Ye Mingxuan, while maintaining his personal study habits, officially launched the project of designing and creating a professional rehabilitation device for his father. Not only did he utilize his engineering skills for design verification and optimization, but he also proactively sought guidance from experienced carpenters, demonstrating his pragmatic and eager-to-learn qualities. The New Year's Eve dinner with his family in the evening served as a heartwarming summary and outlook on the past half-month of overcoming difficulties together as a family and his personal growth.

events.name: Self-Assessment for German Learning Stage Summary
events.description: In the morning, Ye Mingxuan conducted a phase summary of his German language learning over the past six months. He completed a comprehensive self-assessment covering basic grammar, common vocabulary, and some engineering technical terms, and attempted to translate a moderately difficult equipment maintenance manual. The test results satisfied him, confirming that he had acquired the foundational ability to read and understand simple technical documents, which would be highly beneficial for his future reference of German technical materials.

events.name: Year-end Brief Communication with the Financial Manager
events.description: In previous years at this time, Ye Mingxuan would conduct a face-to-face year-end review with his financial manager, Zhang Wei. This year, due to a busy schedule of family matters, he switched to a brief communication via WeChat. He confirmed with Manager Zhang the updated holdings following recent adjustments to the asset allocation. Both parties agreed that no urgent actions were necessary at present and scheduled a detailed annual planning and adjustment session after the Chinese New Year. The communication was efficient and concise.

events.name: Develop a preliminary plan for career advancement in the next six months
events.description: Drawing on Gao Zhiyuan's suggestions and his own reflections, Ye Mingxuan used his lunch break to draft the key points of a six-month professional development plan in his notebook: 1. Dedicate 2-3 hours weekly to studying cutting-edge industry technologies (such as digital twins and Industrial Internet of Things); 2. Proactively request to participate in peripheral work for a technology pre-research project from Senior Engineer Gao; 3. Increase the frequency of informal technical exchanges with Zhou Tao and Li Xiang to mutually inspire each other. The plan is pragmatic and focused.

events.name: Present the rehabilitation device design to father and obtain feedback.
events.description: After work in the evening, Ye Mingxuan turned on his computer and showed his father, Ye Jianguo, the detailed 3D model of the "Finger Grip Strength Rehabilitation Device" that had been fully designed. By rotating the model and presenting simple animations, he explained to his father how it worked. His father listened attentively and suggested, "Could the grip area be a bit wider? My hands are large, and it would be more comfortable to hold." Ye Mingxuan immediately took note and made corresponding adjustments to the model.

events.name: Optimization Design of the Rehabilitation Training Spoon
events.description: Based on his father's feedback after trying it last night, Ye Mingxuan initiated the V1.1 design of the training spoon. He remeasured his father's hand dimensions and adjusted the curvature of the spoon handle in CAD software to better fit his father's hand shape. Meanwhile, he began searching online for softer silicone wristband materials.

events.name: Consulting with the carpenter about auxiliary tool fabrication issues
events.description: Ye Mingxuan sent some design sketches of the rehabilitation device to carpenter Qian Jianguo via WeChat, and left a message asking for advice: If some parts of the structure are to be made of hardwood, which type of wood is both sturdy and not too heavy? How can the metal spring mechanism be securely and aesthetically integrated with the wooden main body? Master Qian quickly replied, recommending ash wood, and invited him to visit the workshop when he had time to discuss the connection methods in detail.

events.name: Family New Year's Eve Dinner and Mid-Month Review
events.description: In the evening, mother Wang Xiulan prepared a sumptuous feast, including Goubuli steamed buns, braised pork, and steamed perch. The family gathered around the table, treating this dinner as a small "New Year's Eve" ritual. Ye Mingxuan raised his glass to thank his parents for their understanding and support during this period, and briefly reflected on the recognition he had received at work as well as the temporary adjustments he had made. Father Ye Jianguo, unusually talkative, affirmed his son's sense of responsibility and growth. Mother, with a smile, urged everyone to eat more and suggested that after the coming spring, when father's health improved further, the family could take a drive to explore nearby areas. The dinner concluded in a warm and hopeful atmosphere.

events.name: Supplementary event: Due to lower back discomfort, a brief stretching routine was performed in the evening followed by an early bedtime.
events.description: After dinner, Ye Mingxuan still felt slight soreness in his lower back. He performed five minutes of lower back stretches and then decided to rest early to avoid overexertion.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at Home, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
起始状态.心情: Calm and determined, a new week begins, continuing to seek balance and breakthroughs among career, family, and personal growth.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Chinese Restaurant/Living Room, No. 128 Zhongbei Avenue, Xiqing District, Tianjin
结束状态.心情: Warm, steadfast, and full of hope. The cohesion of the family is elevated during dinner, plans for the future become clearer, and the heart is filled with the strength to move forward.

events.name: Analyze simulation and debugging data
events.description: In the afternoon, review the finite element analysis report and motion simulation animation provided by colleague Li Xiang, compare the simulation results with the on-site debugging logs, and analyze the changes in key parameters as well as the technical difficulties that led to the project delay.

events.name: Evening Personal Training Fitness Class
events.description: After work, Ye Mingxuan went to the gym for his weekly Tuesday personal training session. Coach Wang Jian focused on guiding joint warm-up and core strengthening exercises to alleviate recent lower back discomfort caused by prolonged sitting.

events.name: Programming Exercises and Health Data Recording
events.description: After returning home from the gym, Ye Mingxuan practiced Python for half an hour, focusing on data cleaning with the pandas library, and began recording daily weight and exercise data to lay the foundation for health management.

events.name: Take father for periodic rehabilitation assessment.
events.description: Accompanying my father to the rehabilitation department of the hospital for an assessment, the results showed significant improvement in grip strength and hand coordination, bringing great relief to the whole family.

events.name: Family Meeting: Review and Planning for the "New Normal"

events.name: Celebratory dinner outing
events.description: To celebrate the father's progress in recovery, the whole family went out to eat Tianjin Goubuli steamed buns and braised pork. Ye Mingxuan consumed a little more than usual, resulting in a slight weight gain.

2025-12.daily_overview: Ye Mingxuan utilized his annual leave for a medical check-up, engaging in in-depth discussions with the doctor about sub-health issues. He began reflecting on and planning proactive health management, resulting in weight loss.

events.name: Go to the community health service center for a physical examination.
events.description: Go to the Xiqing District Community Health Service Center in the morning on an empty stomach, and bring your medical insurance card and last year's report for the annual physical examination.

events.name: Complete the annual routine physical examination items.
events.description: Complete blood draw, blood pressure measurement, electrocardiogram, and B-ultrasound sequentially, which takes about two hours, and obtain immediate results such as a BMI of 24.9.

events.name: Engage in in-depth discussions about health issues with family physicians
events.description: Have an interview with Dr. Liu Wentao to describe the decline in sleep quality and stiffness in the neck and shoulders, and obtain targeted advice.

events.name: Obtain Targeted Health Guidance
events.description: Dr. Liu recommends reducing carbohydrates and increasing protein and vegetable intake for dinner, and teaches breathing relaxation techniques before sleep along with cervical spine health exercises.

events.name: Reflect and Plan for Proactive Health Management
events.description: On the way home, I reflected on the doctor's words and resolved to incorporate health management into my personal plan, taking proactive steps to maintain my well-being.

events.name: Organizing Medical Examination Reports and Doctor's Instructions
events.description: In the afternoon, organize documents and notes into the health record folder, record key points in the phone memo, and set daily reminders.

起始状态.心情: Value and understand your own health.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home
结束状态.心情: Vigilance coexists with determination, providing direction for improvement.
